40014010	Daaci a naba ɓela ura á de ica ire á Yuhanna slemaga baptisma am daŋgay.
40014011	Ta de icaa ire áte Yuhanna am daŋgay wá, tá sanhe am kwatame, ta se vante ge gyaale ŋanna, ŋane keni a zlala an ire na á deza emmeŋara.
40014012	Saremsa pukura-aha-aara ge Yuhanna, ta se eksante emtsa-aara, ta de heɗehe, ta naba de mbeɗanu labare ge Yaisu.
40014013	Cenancena Yaisu labare á emtsa á Yuhanna, ta naba tsetehe am tate ŋanna, ta dema am paare á yawe, ta zlala á dem tate na ta ɓaaka emnde átekwa na. Cenarancena emnde am huɗe á ekse geni zlazlala Yaisu maa, baɗemme á emnde saresse am eksa-aha-aatare, ta ɗabem Yaisu an sera, ta ɗaba ba we á haye, we á haye.
40014014	De sessa Yaisu am paare maa, á zhárá ba dikele á emnde tá kela ádezeŋara, a naba zatervaarhe, a mbateraahe emnde na ta lapika-aha am dagave-aatare.
40014015	Eblyabelya vaciya maa, ta duhe ge pukura-aha-aara á dezeŋara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ɓaaka vaciya mazla-aara, tate na keni kaamba, ambane puwateraapuwa emnde na, a zlarzlala á dem ekse-aha, tá de shakwanu náza za ge shifa-aha-aatare.»
40014016	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ma zlalarka keni ba kalle, vawaterteva ba kure názu tá zuze.»
40014017	Amá ta ŋwanante a ba itare: «Ɓaaka duksa ázeŋere, sey ba depaiŋ ilyeɓe, antara kelfe buwa, ɓaaka umele.»
40014018	«Sawansa una ŋanna ásezerwa», a ba Yaisu.
40014019	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Njawinja baɗemme áte masa na.» Ŋane a halante depaiŋ ilyeɓe, antara kelfe buwa na, a kante ice á dem samaya, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, daaci a kwacaa depaiŋ-aha na, a tegateraa ge pukura-aha, geni tá vaterta ge emnde.
40014020	Baɗemme á emnde, ma ware keni a zuhe á ba áte huɗe-aara, aley jauje zlaɓe ádaliye. Pukura-aha ta halante jugena-aara ŋanna wárá kelaawa ju buwa.
40014021	Kezlakula á emnde a zá náza zá ŋanna wá, tá maga zála debu ilyeɓe, ɓaaka ŋwasha antara egdzara am huɗe-aara.
40014022	Shekwaraaka ɗekiɗeki am iga á za depaiŋ ŋanna, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Dawemda am paare, dawedde kure zuŋŋwe á katafke-aaruwa, ebzaubze guwa á kya erwa. Iya wá, yá puwateraapuwa emtsaaɗe emnde.»
40014023	Puwateraapuwa emnde maa, a naba ɗaleme am egdza wa ba ŋane palle, ge de maga maduwa. Dem vaƴiya ba shagera, ba ŋane palle áte wa ŋanna.
40014024	Am sarte ŋanna wá, paare na pukura-aha tá am huɗe-aara na, zlazlala ƴiƴiye. Amá aŋkwa á maganá palasa vadza á yawe áhuwa, aɗaba a se yateruwa válale, á berhaterá á sem iga.
40014025	An ireŋlya wá, a duhe ge Yaisu de shateraasha pukura-aha-aara na áte ire á haye, amá á zlala á ba an sera-aara áte ire á haye ŋanna.
40014026	Ba naranna pukura-aha-aara ŋane aŋkwa á zlala áte yawe na wá, gazlargazla jipu, ta naba fu hula ge lyawa, aɗaba itare ta kurken shaitaine á yawe.
40014027	Kerteŋ a ndaater elva Yaisu: «Gazlauka degiya una ba iya, a wakurka lyawa», a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare.
40014028	A ŋwanante ge Piyer, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Máki ba jirire una ba ka Yaakadada wá, ndaasendahe elva á ŋa palle, geni yá duwa á dezeŋa áte yawe ba seke náza á ŋa.»
40014029	«Sawa!» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane. A naba tsekwese am paare na ge Piyer, a fantau ge zlala áte yawe á deza Yaisu.
40014030	Amá ba a fantau ge zhárá mága á effeƴa wá, a ja ge lyawa, a fantau ge ŋgye á dem yawe. Daaci a naba fu hula: «Yaakadada-aaruwa lyilya!»
40014031	Kerteŋ a velante erva-aara Yaisu, a de ŋanaahe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Degiya jeba á cekwire á fetarfire na! Labara ka magaa shaige?»
40014032	Daaci ta ɗalema am paare bukerɗe-aatare. Tseriyye a naba ɗuhe ge válale keni.
40014033	Pukura-aha baɗemme ta kezlan ugje ge Yaisu am paare ŋanna. A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ekka wá, ka Egdza á Dadaamiya ba jirire.»
40014034	Ba ebzarubze haye, daaci daraada am haha á Gainaizarait.
40014035	Emnde a ekse na ta de tsekwa am huɗe-aara na diyareddiye Yaisu, daaci duwa-aatare ge itare ta hyenme labare-aara am haha-aatare baɗemme, ta naba sanaa emnde na ta lapika-aha na baɗemme ge Yaisu.
40014036	Ta ndavanuhe geni a vaterteva baráma ge emnde na lapika vuwa-aatare na, tá fafetefafa ba erva-aha-aatare á ba áte we á naŋgyuwe-aara keni. Daaci emnde na ta fafete erva-aha-aatare áte naŋgyuwe á Yaisu baɗemme mbarembe.
40015001	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta semhe ge Farisa-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita á sa am huɗe á Urusaliima, ta se ndavanu elva ge Yaisu, a ba itare:
40015002	«Labara pukura-aha á ŋa tá maŋka názu ta kwaramisaa eggye-aha á miya? Aɗaba ŋá aŋkwa zharaterzhara tá bareka erva ge za náza za áte naɗe á emnde a nadina.»
40015003	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ekkure maa, labara kure keni kwá aŋkwa cuɗa názu a ndaasa Dadaamiya, an tsaha na kwa jansaara ba kure?
40015004	Aɗaba a ba Dadaamiya, ɗematerveɗeme tara eddeŋa an emmeŋa. Ma a ndahesaa ware elva mándzawe áte eddeŋara, bi áte emmeŋara keni, sey tá ejja ba shifa-aara.
40015005	Amá kwa bantsa kure wá: Máki ndakansendahe ge eddeŋa, bi ge emmeŋa, geni nalmane na ma andze yá melakumele an ŋane na wá, aŋkwa fanefa tsekemme, watse yá danán ge Dadaamiya.
40015006	Máki ndakansendahe estuwa wá, ka ɓaaka an wedera melanu ge eddeŋa, ma emmeŋa keni mazle-aara. An jeba á tsaha á kure ŋanna, kezlakuranveka názena a ndaasaa Dadaamiya emtu? Kezlakuranvekezle ba parakke!
40015007	Egdzara á fida-aha, tá demka am huɗe á kure ɗekiɗeki. Sesse jirire á názena ndza a ndahanaa Aisaya am nabiyire-aara na. Ndza a ndahanaa á ba áte kure. Aɗaba a ba ŋane:
40015008	“A bantsa Dadaamiya wá: Emnde na wá, tá aŋkwa á galiyá á ba áte we, am ervauŋɗe-aatare ta ƴiƴiye an ya.
40015009	Tá aŋkwa jáháva ɗeme am sera-aaruwa, amá una ŋanna ba dey. Aɗaba itare tá ndáhá ba naɗe-aha á emndimagwaha, ta ganve ba seke elva-aaruwa.” »
40015010	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde baɗemme: «Sawmbare, cenauvaacena elva na ba shagera:
40015011	Názu á badza ura wá, á badzaná názu á fana edda-aara á dem mbuweka, á badzaná ba názu á segashe am mbuwe á edda-aara.»
40015012	Ta duhe ge pukura-aha-aara á dezeŋara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Diyakdiya emtu ganakini aŋkwa á waterwa elva á ŋa na am ervauŋɗe ge Farisa-aha?»
40015013	A ba Yaisu: «Baɗemme á wulfe na a janaa Edderwa na am samaya na ka tsawe, watse tá eɓɓeta á degashe.
40015014	Ƴawaterƴa seke itare, ábi ta wulfe-aha tá táɗá wulfe-aha seke itare. Máki wulfe á táɗá ukfeŋara wulfe, ba bukerɗire-aatare tá de puwa á dem evege.»
40015015	A ba Piyer á elvan ge ŋane: «Palaŋeraapala maana á naraje na ŋá cenvaacena.»
40015016	«Ba kure keni kwaasau kwá cenanka?
40015017	Baɗemme á názena á dem mbuwe á urimagwe, a tsekwa á ba á dem huɗe, amá á degashe zlaɓe adaliye am ŋane; una ŋanna ni diyakurka?
40015018	Amá názu á segashe am mbuwe á ura wá, kwaye a fantau á sawa am ervauŋɗe, á badzaná ba una ŋanna edda-aara.
40015019	Aɗaba kwakya dzama ire mandzawe na á segashe am ervauŋɗe á ura. Á berhaná ba una ŋanna á de ja shifa, antara mága gwardzire, antara dakarire, an neylire, fidire, ira sanse elva ƴaiƴaihe.
40015020	A badzaná ba jeba á duksa-aha ŋanna ura. Aɗaba zu duksa an erva na baraaka áte naɗe á emnde a nadina wá, una ŋanna á badzeka ura.»
40015021	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a tsetehe ge Yaisu am tate ŋanna, kwaye a zlala á dem haha á Tirus antara Sidaun.
40015022	Aŋkwa mukse Kanani umele á njá am haha ŋanna, a sawhe á seza Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane á ba an ka kwara: «Edda-aaruwa! Ura jeba á Dawuda! Tasle á ŋa zivarze! Aɗaba aŋkwa egdza-aaruwa mukse an shaitaine, aŋkwa á maga ba palasa.»
40015023	Amá mbeɗanareka Yaisu ba elva palle keni. Mukse na keni ƴanka ɗabaterɗaba. Ta naba duhe ge pukura-aha-aara á dezeŋara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ndandaha seke elva palle ge mukse na a ezzlala mazle-aara, aɗaba aŋkwa á hulamitehula ba dey.»
40015024	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Iya wá, ɓelarika ge emnde umele, ta ɓeli ba ge emnde a Iserayiila, aɗaba itare ta ba seke kyawe-aha na, ta keɗa an keɗa na.»
40015025	Amá cenaaka mukse na, a naba se ŋanta sera ge Yaisu: «Tasle á ŋa meliyumele edderwa», a ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu.
40015026	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba elva-aara á elvan ge mukse na: «Haleta ɗafa á egdzara, puwateranve ge kere-aha wá, zlayeka ɗekiɗeki.»
40015027	«Ba estuwa», a ba mukse na, «amá ma kere-aha keni tá wazaná ba itare kwaca á ɗafa na á valya á sawa am erva á dada-aha-aatare na.»
40015028	A ba Yaisu: «Ekka mukse na, kwakya fetarfire á ŋa. Názena ká kataná ká ŋanna wá, a gevge á ba áte una ŋanna.» A naba mbehe ge egdza á mukse ŋanna á ba am sarte ŋanna.
40015029	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a tsetehe ge Yaisu am tate ŋanna, a ɗaba we á haye á Galili, a de ɗaleta áte egdza wa umele, a de njehe áte egdza wa ŋanna.
40015030	Nalga á emnde kwakya ta ɗabem Yaisu á dete wa ŋanna, ta danaa antara emnde a dere, antara wulfe-aha antara ŋgurƴekwe-aha, an uce-aha, antara lapika-aha umele gergere kwakya, ta de puwateraa am sera á Yaisu, a mbateraahe baɗemme.
40015031	Emnde na ndza ta uce-aha tá aŋkwa ndaha elva ba laŋŋe; emnde na ndza ta ŋgurƴekwe-aha mbarembe; emnde na ndza ta dere-aha tá aŋkwa zlala ba laŋŋe; emnde na ndza ta wulfe-aha keni tá aŋkwa nanna ice-aha-aatare baɗemme. Baɗemme á emnde na ta naa una ŋanna, tá maga ba najipu-aara. Daaci baɗemme ta fantau ge gálá Dadaamiya á emnde a Iserayiila.
40015032	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a ɗetaa pukura-aha-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Emnde na tá wiwa am ice ge iya, aɗaba hare keƴe vatena tá á ba ázerwa, názu tá ezza keni ɓaaka. Wayanka yá puwateraapuwa ba estuwa tá an waya am huɗe, a de mbaɗateraaka waya áte barama a da.»
40015033	A ba pukura-aha tá elvan ge ŋane: «Mí de shaná áme kena náza zá am kaamba na ni haa á hyater ge emnde kwakya estuwa?»
40015034	«Aŋkwa wanyara depaiŋ ázekure?» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare. A ba itare: «Aŋkwa depaiŋ vuye, antara egdza kelfe-aha cekwaaŋguɗi.»
40015035	Daaci «njawinja am haha,» á ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde baɗemme.
40015036	Ŋane a halante depaiŋ-aha vuye antara egdza kelfe na, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a kwacaahe, daaci a naba tegateraa ge pukura-aha-aara, itare ta tegateraa ge emnde.
40015037	Ma ware-aatare keni a zuhe á ba áte huɗe-aara, ta ƴanaa ba itare náza zá. Pukura-aha ta jemaa jugena-aara ilila vuye.
40015038	Kezlakula á emnde na ta za náza za ŋanna, tá maga zála debu ufaɗe, ɓaaka ŋwasha antara egdzara am huɗe-aara.
40015039	Daaci Yaisu a puwaa emnde. Am iga-aara maa, a dema am paare, a zlala á dem haha á Magadan.
40016001	Ta sawhe ge Farisa-aha, antara Saduki-aha áseza Yaisu, ta se tsagwaɗana áte elva, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Máki a ɓelakaa ba Dadaamiya wá, maraŋeranmara najipu palle geni ŋá diyeddiye átekwa.»
40016002	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ábi kure máki hyaahya yawe kwakya dem eblya vaciya, kwá ba: Makuralla wá, watse ba laŋŋe sleɗe.
40016003	An eŋlya-waabere keni, má kwa nanna daŋŋwe ekte á samaya, á ŋgya vaciya á ba am huɗe-aara, kwá ba: Watse á maga yawe vatena. Iyau, nalaama-aha na aŋkwa á magava áte samaya wá, baɗemme diyakurdiya; duksa-aha na aŋkwa á marakurná Dadaamiya am zamane na wá, diyakurka!
40016004	Kure emnde na kwá am zamane na, kwa mándzawe-aha jipu, vakuranteka ervauŋɗe á kure ɗekiɗeki ge Dadaamiya. Kure kwá ndava najipu! Ba palle keni kwá nanka mazle-aara, hyaahya ba una kwá aŋkwa ndaaná áte Yaunas werre na.» Ba a ndaaterse una, a naba ƴaterhe, a zlala-aara.
40016005	Am sarte na tá aŋkwa zlala, tá átira degashe am haye á dete iga á guwa, pukura-aha ta naba viyaa depaiŋ, slaslarka ekseksa-aara.
40016006	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Faufa hyema ba shagera, tsufautsufa ire á kure átuge shahi á makala á Farisa-aha antara Saduki-aha.»
40016007	Am cenaránka pukura-aha názu a ndahanaa ŋane, a ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Yaisu a ndaha una ŋanna aɗaba mi viyaa depaiŋ na.»
40016008	Carare cenancena Yaisu elva na tá aŋkwa ndahaná itare am dagave-aatare, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Labara kwá tsala elva a ɓaakire á depaiŋ am dagave á kure? Kure degiya ɓaaka fetarfire á kure ɗekiɗeki!
40016009	Sem ba kina keni aley zlaɓe ba kwá cenanka? Kwá yeheteka á ba áte depaiŋ ilyeɓe na ya kwacateraa ya ge emnde debu ilyeɓe na emtu? Kwá yeheteka á ba áte kezlakula wárá-aha na kwa nahetaa an jugena-aara na emtu?
40016010	Zlaɓe adaliye kwá yeheteka áte depaiŋ vuye na ya kazlateranvaa ya ge emnde debu ufaɗe antara kezlakula á ilila-aha na kwa nahete an jugena-aara na emtu?
40016011	Labara kwá lanaaka ganakini ya ndaakur elva á depaiŋ ka? Iya wá, ya bakuraa, tsufautsufa ire á kure ba shagera atuge shahi á makala na á segashe am Farisa-aha antara Saduki-aha.»
40016012	Daaci sharantaushe pukura-aha mazle-aara geni Yaisu ndahaaka elva a shahi á makala na tá puwaná am depaiŋ; ŋane a ndaha ba elva a názu tá kwaratersa Farisa-aha antara Saduki-aha ge emnde.
40016013	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a zlalehe antara pukura-aha-aara á dem Kaysariya á Filip. A de ndavateru ge pukura-aha-aara áhuwa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme mu, emnde ta baa ya ware?»
40016014	Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Ta bantsa emnde umele ka Yuhanna slemaga baptisma; a baa emnde umele, ka Ailiya; a baa emnde umele zlaɓe adaliye ka Yairaimiya, bi ka ba nabi umele.»
40016015	«Ay, kure ma, kwá ba ya ware?»
40016016	A ŋwanante ge Simaun Piyer: «Ba ka una ka Almasiihu, ka Egdza á Dadaamiya na á fa shifa am ura na.»
40016017	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Simaun egdza á Yaunas, ekka wá, shakansha barka kwakya, aɗaba jirire na ka cenaana áza urimagwe ka, a vaktaa ba Edderwa na am samaya na an ire-aara.
40016018	Yá ndak ba jirire Piyer: Ábi zhera á ŋa ŋanna wá, amaana palaha. Yá faná áte palaha ŋanna emnde na tá fetaare áte ya na baɗemme. Ma emtsa keni á de dateruka ɗekiɗeki.
40016019	Yá fakem egdza a tsekweram á wera kwara á Dadaamiya am erva ge ekka. Ma ka piyetaa uwe ge emnde am duniya na keni, am samaya keni tá á ba áte una ŋanna. Ma ka ƴateraa baráma á uwe ge emnde keni, am samaya keni tá á ba áte una ŋanna.»
40016020	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a teɗaterte hyema ge pukura-aha-aara, geni a ndaranka ge ura umele ɗekiɗeki, ganakini Almasiihu ŋanna ba ŋane.
40016021	Yaisu a fantau am sarte ŋanna ge ndaaterse elva á ire-aara ge pukura-aha-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Sey ba yá duwa á dem Urusaliima. Tá de magiya palasa kwakya male-aha á larde, antara male-aha á liman-aha, ira malum-aha á tawraita. Tá de zlanaazle shifa-aaruwa baɗemme, amá am hare ge keƴire wá, watse yá sesse zlaɓe adaliye an shifa.»
40016022	A naba ɗahese ge Piyer ba itare ta buwa antara Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «A piyetepiya Dadaamiya jeba una, a gevka ɗeme jeba una áte ka Yaakadada-aaruwa!»
40016023	Amá Yaisu a eptsanaa ge Piyer, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Giyapteka ɗekiɗeki, ekka, ka Shaitaine, ká kátá mbeɗiya á dem haypa. Aɗaba názena ká dzamaná ka na jarammeka antara náza á Dadaamiya, náza á ŋa na ba názu tá dzamaná emndimagwaha.»
40016024	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara baɗemme: «Máki edda-aara wayaawaya ɗaba ya wá, a dzameka shifa-aara ɗekiɗeki, a eksanteksa dzaŋgala-aara, á ɗabiɗaba an ŋane.
40016025	Aɗaba máki edda-aara á tataya lya shifa-aara wá, á de keɗanaakeɗa. Amá edda una a keɗaa shifa-aara aɗaba ya, á de shansha zlaɓe adaliye.
40016026	Ma edda-aara a zu emtakire á duniya na baɗemme keni, máki keɗanaakeɗa shifa-aara wá, ázara nampire-aara ge ŋane? A de maganánka duksa ɗekiɗeki. Aɗaba ɓaaka duksa na urimagwe á de vara shifa-aara an ŋane.
40016027	Ya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, watse yá sawa antara malika-aha-aaruwa, an sleksire á Edderwa. Watse yá se pelaterse ge emnde baɗemme, ma ware keni yá se pelansa á ba áte názena ndza a maganaa ŋane.»
40016028	A ba ŋane zlaɓe adaliye: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: a ba am dagave á kure na keni, tá aŋkwa emnde na ni tá de emtseka ba estuwa, sey má naranna sawa-aaruwa ya Ura á emnde baɗemme, má watse yá sawa am sleksire ƴaikke.»
40017001	A magaa hare uŋkwahe am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a ɗetaa tara Piyer, antara Yakuba, ira Yuhanna egdza emmeŋara ge Yakuba ŋanna, a dateraa áte ire á wa umele slaɗɗe ba itare-itare áhuwa.
40017002	Daraada ahuwa maa, a naba eptsavte ge Yaisu am ice-aatare wá, gevge umele ba seke ŋane ka mazle-aara. Feke-aara aŋkwa á mba wulwulire ba seke vaciya, naŋgyuwe-aara gevge dzayye ba telle, aŋkwa mbe ba seke parakkire.
40017003	Daaci pukura-aha na tá zhára ba emndu werre, tara Muusa antara Ailiya, tá aŋkwa ndaha elva antara Yaisu.
40017004	A ba Piyer á elvan ge Yaisu: «Yaakadada-aaruwa, una shagera jipu ŋere keni ŋá aŋkwa áhuna na. Má wayak-waya wá, yá maganaamaga dzadzawe-aha keƴe, palle náza á ŋa, palle náza á Muusa, palle keni náza á Ailiya.»
40017005	Zlaɓe ba elva ŋanna keni ndaaseka Piyer wá, a naba tsekwaterarhe ge kumba. Aŋkwa kwara á ndaha elva am kumba ŋanna. A ba edda-aara: «Una na wa, Egdza-aaruwa! Baɗemme á higa-aaruwa á ba áte ŋane. Cenaucena názena á bakurná ŋane.»
40017006	Cenarancena pukura-aha na kwara ŋanna maa, jaterja lyawa baɗemme, reppe ta kazlaa ugje am haha baɗemme.
40017007	A gapte ge Yaisu á dezetare, a de gejatertehe: «Naba tsawetse. A wakurka lyawa,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare.
40017008	Ta kante ire wá, ta naa ba Yaisu palle ɓaaka ura umele ázeŋara.
40017009	Am sarte na tá átira tsekwa á sa áte ire á wa ŋanna maa, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ma ge ware keni ndaawanka názena kwa nanaa kure na ɗekiɗeki, dem sarte na má tsanetsa ya, ya Ura á emnde baɗemme am faya.»
40017010	Zlauzle elva-aara, ta naba ndavanuhe ge pukura-aha na, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Máki estuwa, labara tá bantsa malum-aha á tawraita geni watse á semse emtsaaɗe Ailiya ádaliye na?»
40017011	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu: «Una ba jire-aatare, ba seke una ta ndahanaa itare ŋanna, á eptsa Ailiya emtsaaɗe, á se tsatsanaatsatsa ŋane duksa baɗemme.
40017012	Amá wá, yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ailiya wá, ndza eptsaptsa á sawa, diyarseka ba emnde, ta naba maga hakuma-aatare áte ŋane. Ya Ura á emnde baɗemme keni tá de magiyán ba estuwa.»
40017013	Daaci diyareddiye pukura-aha mazle-aara ganakini á ndaater elva a Yuhanna slemaga baptisma.
40017014	Tsekwaretsekwa á sa áte ire á wá, ta se bera jahava á emnde. A duhe ge zhele umele, a de kezla ugje am sera á Yaisu,
40017015	a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yaakadada-aaruwa, tasle á ŋa zanvareze seke ge egdza-aaruwa, aŋkwa á maganá palasa tauraurau, ser kwakya á valyaná á dem kárá, antara á dem yawe.
40017016	Ya saterán ge pukura-aha á ŋa, amá dzegwaránka mbanaamba.»
40017017	Ba wera we-aara ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Amá kure emnde a zamane na wá, ɓaaka fetarfire á kure ɗekiɗeki, kwa mandzawe-aha jipu! Watse yá njá antara kure dem laukte-ara? Yá fakurá ervauŋɗe dem sarte-ara estuwa? Sawiyansa kwa kure egdze ŋanna ge iya!»
40017018	Daaci Yaisu a valaarhe á ba an ndzeɗa ge jini na am vuwa á egdze ŋanna, a ŋgyansehe, kerteŋ a naba mbehe ge egdzere á ba am sarte ŋanna.
40017019	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta duhe ge pukura-aha-aara á ba an niya ge ndavanu una ŋanna, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Labara dzegwaŋeranka ŋere ŋgyesaa jini ŋanna?»
40017020	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A maganaa cekwire á fetarfire á kure. Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Máki aŋkwa fetarfire á kure cekwaaŋguɗi, ma ba seke wulfe á pilli keni, kwá bananba ge wa na: Tsetse áhuna, ezzlala ádehuwa, ba jirire á tsettse, á zlala, ɓaaka názu á jakurviyaaje ɗekiɗeki. ((
40017021	Amá keni, jeba á jini na, sey tá ŋgyanse an maduwa, antara tsufa ndera.»))
40017022	Vacite umele jaremmeje pukura-aha am Galili, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, watse ta fime am erva ge emnde.
40017023	Emnde ŋanna tá de jija. Amá am hare ge keƴire wá, watse yá tsetse am faya.» Ba cenarancena una ŋanna pukura-aha maa, daremda am dzama ire ƴaikke.
40017024	Am sarte na daremda tara Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara á dem Kafarnahum, ta duhe ge emnde a jaha hadama á mashidi á deza Piyer, ta de ndavanuhe, a ba itare: «Malum á kure na ŋane á puweka hadama á mashidi emtu?»
40017025	A ŋwaterante ge Piyer: «Á eppuwa», a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare. Daaci am sarte na Piyer aŋkwa á dem bere, Yaisu a ndavanu elva, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ndindaha mu, emnde-ara una tá puwaná hadama antara náza ŋezla ge slekse á larde? Egdzara á larde emtu, wayve-aha he?»
40017026	A ŋutehe ge Piyer: «Tá puwaná ba wayve-aha», a ba ŋane. A ba Yaisu: «Daaci estuwa tá puweka egdzara á larde.
40017027	Aley keni wá, mi zlaɗaterveka ervauŋɗe ge emnde ŋanna. Daaci edduwa áte we á haye, de puwumpuwa narre á ŋa á dem haye, kelfe na ká de eksaná ka zuŋŋwe na wá, naba werura we-aara, watse ká shansha shuŋgu am mbuwe á kelfe ŋanna, á hyephye ge puwa hadama á miya antara ka, naba vaterteva.»
40018001	A ba am sarte ŋanna, ta duhe ge pukura-aha á deza Yaisu, ta de ndavanuhe, a ba itare: «Am kwara á Dadaamiya mu, ware una male arge emnde umele?»
40018002	Ge vaterte jawapa, Yaisu a ɗante egdzere, a tsanaahe á katafke-aatare,
40018003	daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Máki eptsakurapteka, gakurevka ba seke egdzara mesheshe, kwá demka am kwara á Dadaamiya ɗekiɗeki.
40018004	Ura male am kwara á Dadaamiya wá, ba edda una má ganaaga ire-aara, a ganve ire-aara ba seke egdze na náwa ŋane na.
40018005	Ma ware una a lyevaa egdzere seke una aɗaba elva-aaruwa, edda-aara a lyevaa ba iya an ire-aaruwa.»
40018006	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a ba ŋane: «Má edda-aara mbeɗanaambeɗa palle á egdzara ŋanna ta fetaare áte iya na á dem haypa, ámbane tá ŋguɗanemŋguɗa nákwá á ha hiya am mbiye, tá eblyanma am haye á emtsa, ŋgulme ba una ŋanna ge edda-aara.
40018007	Kay! Palase á duniya na, aɗaba kwakya názena á puwa emnde á dem haypa, ɓaaka janaaje-aara ɗekiɗeki. Amá laruwa ge edda una emnde tá puwa á dem haypa aɗaba ŋane na.
40018008	«Máki erva á ŋa, bi sera á ŋa áŋkwa á dáká á dem haypa wá, naba icica áte ka, eblyanveblye ƴiƴiye an ka. Ámbane ká dem tate á shifa na á zleka na an erva palle bi an sera palle, arge una ká njá an uɓiya-aha á ŋa baɗemme, amá ká dem kárá náza ba ge ɗekiɗeki na.
40018009	Máki ice á ŋa á dáká á dem haypa wá, sansese ice ŋanna, eblyanveblye ƴiƴiye an ka. Ámbane ká dem tate á shifa na á zleka ɗekiɗeki na an feke palle, arge una ká njá an ice-aha á ŋa bukerɗe, amá ká dem kárá na ɓaaka emtsa-aara dem ba ge ɗekiɗeki na.»
40018010	«Tsufautsufa ire á kure ba shagera, epsawanaaka ba ura palle keni am egdzara ŋanna. Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Malika-aha-aatare tá ba tsatse á katafke á Edderwa am samaya. ((
40018011	Aɗaba iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, ya se ŋezla una keɗaakeɗa na.))
40018012	Máki ura an kyawe-aha-aara deremke, amá keɗaakeɗa kyawe palle am kaamba, á ƴanka kyawe-aha kul maselmane ju maselmane na áte wa, ŋane á tsekwa á de tataya una keɗaakeɗa na emtu? Emtu ázara a ba kure?
40018013	Yá ndaakur ba jirire, má de shánsha wá, á higetehiga ervauŋɗe-aara jipu á ba arge kyawe-aha kul maselmane ju maselmane na tá aŋkwa na keni.
40018014	Eddekure na am samaya na keni ba estuwa. Ŋane wayaaka ɗekiɗeki ganakini á keɗa ba palle-aatare keni am egdzara-aara ŋanna.»
40018015	«Máki egdza emmeŋa gawge haypa an ka wá, de ndandaha ba kure kwa buwa antara ŋane. Má cenakvaarcene, tsakanmartse ge egdza emmeŋa.
40018016	Amá máki ƴanaaƴa elva á ŋa wá, ká se tatayevá ura palle, bi emnde buwa, lauktu kwá duwa zlaɓe ádaliye antara itare, geni a gevge á ba áte una a ndahanaa wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: Ma ugje-ara keni a tsaatse á ba áte seyde á emnde buwa bi keƴe na.
40018017	Amá máki cenaaka náza-aatare zlaɓe ádaliye wá, naba bateranba ge emnde a fetarfe am jahava. Má cenaaka náza á aiklaisiya wá, a gevge ba seke ura á jeba umele, ba seke edda ŋezla mazle-aara á katafke á ŋa.»
40018018	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a ba ŋane: «Yá bakurá ba jirire: Ma kwa piyetaa uwe am duniya na keni, am samaya keni tá á ba áte una ŋanna. Ma kwa ƴateraa baráma á uwe keni, am samaya keni tá á ba áte una ŋanna.
40018019	«Yá ndaakurndaha zlaɓe ádaliye: Má emnde buwa am dagave á kure ta ŋguɗaa ye-aatare palle ge ndava duksa am maduwa, á vaterteva Edderwa na am samaya na duksa ŋanna.
40018020	Aɗaba am tatu ta jamme emnde buwa bi keƴe am zhera-aaruwa, iya yá aŋkwa am dagave-aatare.»
40018021	Daaci a tsetehe ge Piyer damme á deza Yaisu ge ndavanundave, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yaakadada, yá ƴanaare haypa ser wanyara ge egdza emmerwa, máki ŋane á far ba mága haypa an ya? Dem ser vuye emtu?»
40018022	«A"aa ser vuyeka, ser kul vuye kul vuye ser vuye», a ba Yaisu.
40018023	Am iga á una ŋanna a ba ŋane: «Náwa gáráva á názu á magavá am kwara á Dadaamiya: Aŋkwa slekse umele, a ɗetaa emnde a slera-aara geni tá vante lisaafi á nalmane-aara baɗemme.
40018024	Demde am lisaafi wá, jesarje edda á gema-aara á ɗaban ge nalmane kwakya jipu, ta eksanvaahe.
40018025	Edda-aara ŋanna ba názara-aara keni ɓaaka ge pelese gema na. Daaci a ba zanwe-aara: Eksauvaksa irice-aara velawuvele. Velawuvele mukse-aara, antara egdzara-aara, ira názu am huɗe á há-aara baɗemme, ge pela gema-aaruwa an ŋane.
40018026	Daaci a duhe ge zhel ŋanna á deza edda á gema, a de kezlaa ugje á katafke-aara, a ba ŋane: Tasle á ŋa fifa ervauŋɗe ambarka á ŋa, yá eppela baɗemme.
40018027	Ura male na a naba zanvaarehe, a ƴanaa gema ŋanna baɗemme, a belanaahe.
40018028	«Amá ŋane ba segashe-aara, a se ja ba ire antara ukfeŋara, ndza tá am slera palle, ŋane keni a ɗaban ge egdza gema wá, a naba ŋanaahe am kwara: Sey ká pelisepele duksa-aaruwa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ukfeŋara na.
40018029	Ukfeŋara a kezlanaa ugje, a ba ŋane: Tasle á ŋa fifa ervauŋɗe yá pelaksepele baɗemme!
40018030	Amá faaka ervauŋɗe ɗekiɗeki, a de ŋguɗehe am daŋgay, sey máki pelesepele duksa-aara baɗemme.
40018031	«Ba ta naa una ŋanna emnde umele na ndza tá am slera kerɗe na wá, tá geja ba ire. Tá de balanse labara ŋanna baɗemme ge zanwe-aatare.
40018032	Daaci zanwe a naba ɓelaa emnde-aara, ta de ɗanante, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: Ekka wá, ka slemándzawe ba jire. Ekka ni ya naba ƴakaare gema-aaruwa baɗemme aɗaba slapala á ŋa;
40018033	Abi zlaya ka keni ma ká zanvaareze estuwa ge ukfeŋa?
40018034	Jaaja ervauŋɗe zanwe-aara. A ba ŋane: A daránda á dem daŋgay, ŋane keni sey má pelesepele gema-aaruwa baɗemme.»
40018035	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a far una Yaisu: «Edderwa na am samaya na keni, á de magakurán ba estuwa ge kure keni, má kwá ƴateraareka an ervauŋɗe á kure palle ge emnde a magakuraa haypa.»
40019001	Yaisu zlanaazle elva-aara, a naba tsetehe am Galili, a zlala á dem haha á Yahudiya áte iga a guwa á Urdun.
40019002	Emnde kwakya ta ɗabemhe áduwa, emnde umele tá an emnde-aha-aatare ta lapika-aha. Yaisu a de mbateraahe.
40019003	Daaci ta duhe ge Farisa-aha umele ádeza Yaisu, ta de tsagwaɗanaa áte elva. Ta de ndavanuhe, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Vantevahe tawraita baráma ge zhele geni á ɓelánaaɓelá mukse-aara aɗaba dalila á ma uwe keni?»
40019004	A ŋwaterantehe, a ba ŋane: «Ndaakurseka názu am wakita á Dadaamiya emtu? Am fakta wá, Dadaamiya a nderaterhe tara zhele an mukse.»
40019005	Daaci a ba ŋane: «Aɗaba una ŋanna, zhele á ƴá tara eddeŋara antara emmeŋara, tá mázláva an mukse-aara; itare ta buwa ŋanna, tá gevge ba vuwa palle.
40019006	Estuwa, ta buweka mázle-aara, tá geva ba vuwa palle. Daaci názena ni a janmaa Dadaamiya wá, a icanveka urimagwe.»
40019007	Farisa-aha ŋara ta ndavanuhe: «Labara a bantsa Muusa zhele á vante nalmesheri á ica nika ge mukse, máki ba estuwa?»
40019008	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Muusa a vakurte baráma a pakyava antara ŋwasha-aha á kure na wá, aɗaba degdegire á ire á kure. Am fakta wá, ndza estuweka ɗekiɗeki.
40019009	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ma ware una a ɓelaa mukse-aara, wallá a ekseva am gwardzire, a de gaa umele, a magaa ba gwardzire.»
40019010	A ba pukura-aha-aara tá elvan ge ŋane: «Máki elva á tara zhele an mukse gevge estuwa wá, ambane emnde tá ƴanƴa elva á nika ba ɗekiɗeki.»
40019011	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Emnde baɗemme ka una tá dzegwándzegwa eksar elva ŋanna, sey ba emnde na Dadaamiya a vaterte hákuma á nja estuwa.
40019012	Aŋkwa dalila-aha gergere na ni á piyante gá mukse bi de gá zhele ge ura: Ura umele wá, ta yanaa á ba an ŋane, vuwa-aara ba estuwa, elva á nika á taa gevka ge ŋane. Náza á emnde umele, ta halatertaave ba emndimagwaha. Emnde umele zlaɓe ádaliye, ta ƴaa nika aɗaba kwara á Dadaamiya. Kwaye ŋane tsáha ŋanna, edda una á dzegwándzegwa na, a eksanteksa.»
40019013	Emnde kwakya ta sanaa egdzara ge Yaisu, ganakini á puwaterar erva a barka-aara, antara á magaterar maduwa, amá pukura-aha ta naba valateraarhe ge emnde a saa egdzara ŋanna.
40019014	Daaci, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Piyawaterteka, ƴawaterƴa a sarsawa egdzara ásezerwa, aɗaba kwara á Dadaamiya náza á emnde na má garevge ba seke itare.»
40019015	Daaci a puwateraarhe erva a barka-aara áte ire-aha-aatare, a tsetehe am tate ŋanna, a zlalehe.
40019016	A sawhe ge dawale umele áseza Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Malum, shagera slera-ara yá maganaamaga, lauktu yá sha shifa na á zleka na?»
40019017	A ba Yaisu, á elvan ge ŋane: «Labara ka ndaviyu elva áte duksa na shagera? Ɓaaka ura shagera ɗekiɗeki sey ba ura palle. Máki wayak-wáyá ká daada á dem tate á shifa na á zleka na wá, ŋanaaŋa shairiya-aha á Dadaamiya.»
40019018	A ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu: «Ura-ara-aha-aara ge shairiya-aha?» A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Una a ba: Jeka shifa, maŋka gwardzire, ileka, maŋka seydire á fida áte ura,
40019019	ɗematerveɗeme tara eddeŋa an emmeŋa, ira ewwáyá sleriya á ŋa ba seke ire á ŋa. Kwaye ŋane shairiya-aha ŋanna.»
40019020	A ba dawale ŋanna á elvan ge Yaisu: «Una ŋannaaŋa baɗemme. A juwa uwe umele?»
40019021	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Máki ká kátá gev edda una hyephye am duksa baɗemme wá, de valuvále názu am rezege á ŋa baɗemme, tegatertega shuŋgu-aara ge taláge-aha. Ekka watse ká shánsha láɗá-aara am samaya, daaci sawa ɗabiɗába.»
40019022	Ba a cenaa una ŋanna dawale ŋanna maa, a da á ba an dzámá ire, aɗaba nalmane-aara kwakya jipu.
40019023	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Yá bakurá ba jirire: Zlazlaɗa jipu ganakini ura berba á demda á dem kwara á Dadaamiya.
40019024	Yá ndaakurndáhá zlaɓe ádaliye: Náwa zlazlaɗa ganakini á dedde nazlegwame am ɓiye á lipere, amá zlazlaɗa ba náza á sleberba zlaɓe adaliye ge dem kwara á Dadaamiya.»
40019025	Ba ta cenaa una ŋanna pukura-aha wá, tá geja ba ire. A ba itare: «Máki ba estuwa wá, ɓaaka ura á ŋezleseŋzle ɗekiɗeki.»
40019026	A zharateraahe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare. « Áza emnde wá, una á taa gevka, amá Dadaamiya wá, ɓaaka názu á janviya ge ŋane.»
40019027	Piyer a eksetaa elva, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Kwaye ŋere, ƴaŋeránƴa duksa baɗemme, náwa ŋá ɗaba ba ka na mu, watse á geva estara náza á ŋere?»
40019028	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Am sarte na má watse se njaniinja ya, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme am kurshi á sleksire-aaruwa am duniya na watse á de sawa áŋwaslire na, am sarte ŋanna wá, kure emnde kelaawa ju buwa na kwá aŋkwa ɗabiɗába na keni, watse kwá sha kurshi á ƴaikkire kelaawa ju buwa áte kure, kwá de njá am kurshi-aha ŋanna ge kya shairiya á Iserayiila-aha jeba kelaawa ju buwa.
40019029	Ma ware una a ƴaa eddeŋara, bi emmeŋara, bi egdzar mama-aha-ŋara zála an ŋwásha, bi egdzara-aara, bi fe-aara, bi a ƴaa huɗe á há-aatare baɗemme aɗaba iya, á de shánsha una-aha ŋanna huɗe deremke ira shifa na á zleka na.
40019030	Amá emnde kwakya ta emnde a zuŋŋwa ba itare kina, tá de gev emnde a kataliya. Emnde kwakya tá am kataliya kina, watse tá gev emnde a katafka ba itare.»
40020001	«Am kwara á Dadaamiya wá, náwa tá gáráva an labáre na náwa ŋane na: Aŋkwa edda á há a degashe an eŋlya werre ge de hálá emnde bariyama á dem fe á náfá-aara.
40020002	Daaci mbera-aatare maa, ta zluwa á ba áte gane na ndza tá vaterteva ba kelaazare na; gane ŋanna suley suley áte váha. Daaci a naba daterhe á dem fe-aara.
40020003	A sesehe zlaɓe ádaliye am saa maselmane maa, á zhárá ba emnde umele áte we á kwaskwe, ɓaaka slera-aatare.
40020004	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: “Kure keni daumbare á dem fe-aaruwa, watse yá vakurta názena deydey á slera á kure.”
40020005	Tá naba duhe. Edda á fe ŋanna a sesehe zlaɓe ádaliye an vacitire keni, a magán ba estuwa. An lásar keni a magán ba seke una ŋanna.
40020006	Herzhe watse emnde tá maga niya sá am fe maa, a sesehe ge edda á fe ŋanna, á zhárá ba emnde umele zlaɓe ádaliye tá áte we á kwaskwe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: “Labára kwa váha á njá áhuna, ɓaaka názena kwa maganaa kure?”
40020007	Tá ŋwanante, a ba itare: “Aɗaba ɓaaka ura a ndavaŋerndáva.” A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: “Kure keni naba saumbare á sem fe-aaruwa, magaumaga slera.”
40020008	«Eblyablya vaciya maa, a ba edda á fe á elvan ge male á emnde a slera-aara: “Ɗaterɗáhá, tegatertega mbera-aha-aatare, ká fantau áte emnde na ta duwa á kataliya, ká zláná áte emnde na ta duwa itare zuŋŋwe á dem slera.”
40020009	Ta duhe ge emnde na ta de fantau ge slera herzhe á eblya vaciya na, baɗemme-aatare ta sha suley palpale.
40020010	Am iga-aatare, ta duhe ge emnde na ta fantuwa itare zuŋŋwe ge slera na. Itare ta kurken watse an saga náza-aatare, amá itare keni ta vaterte ba suley palpale ŋanna.
40020011	Ta lyevaahe, amá jaterja ervauŋɗe áte edda á fe ŋanna.
40020012	A ba itare tá elvan ge edda á fe: “Náwa emnde na ta se gejante slera ba cekwaaŋguɗi ni, ka biyateraa shuŋgu kalkale antara náza á ŋere na ŋa váha deppe á maga slera áte zlaɗa á vaciya na!”
40020013	Amá edda á fe a ŋwanante ge palle-aatare, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: “Ba palle a zlerma na ya magakanaa ya ɓaaka ura-aaruwa. Ha! Ndza zlamiyuka am gane geni suley palle áte váha emtu?
40020014	Lyevaalya suley á ŋa, jinaaja. Iyá yá kátá vanteva ge edda una a fantau á kataliya na keni ba seke názá á ŋa.
40020015	Emtu aŋkwa slepiyite mága slera an shuŋgu-aaruwa áte una yá kataná iya emtu? Emtu ká shelha aɗaba ya maganaa shagerire ge ura emtu?” »
40020016	Yaisu zlauzle am tsáká elva-aara, a farhe zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane: «Emnde na tá am kataliya kina, tá de gev emnde a katafke. Emnde na tá á katafke kina, tá de gev emnde a kataliya.»
40020017	Aŋkwa á dem Urusaliima Yaisu wá, a ɗetaa pukura-aha-aara kelaawa ju buwa. Tá átira a zlálá, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
40020018	«Duwa á miya á dem Urusaliima kina na wá, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme tá de eksivaksa, tá de vite ge male-aha á liman-aha, antara malum-aha á tawraita. Tá de ndahaná itare geni a jareja shifa-aaruwa.
40020019	Daaci tá de fime am erva ge emnde na ɓaaka nadina-aatare, tá de zlazlisá itare, tá de jiya itare, tá de zleŋeliya itare áte dzaŋgala. Amá am hare ge keƴire wá, watse yá tsetse am fáyá.»
40020020	Duwa á emmarge egdzara á Jaibaidaiyus, ta duwa antara ba egdzara-aara ŋanna á de katafke á Yaisu, a kezlaa ugje á katafke-aara, a ndavanuhe máki á shansha ŋálá ázeŋara.
40020021	«Ká kátá uwe ka emmaaye,» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane. A ŋwanante, a ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu: «Máki dakemda am sleksire á ŋa wá, yá kátá palle á egdzara-aaruwa na á de shá njá am naɗafa á ŋa, palle keni á de shá njá am názlaɓa á ŋa.»
40020022	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ábi diyakurka wedere á kure na ma andze kwá ndava ŋane na. Kina wá, watse kwá dzegwándzegwa emtu sha zlaɗa áte náza-aaruwa na watse yá essha na?» Tá ŋwanante: «Ŋá dzegwándzegwa,» a ba itare.
40020023	«Zlaɗa-aaruwa wá, ba jire watse kwá de essha, amá elva a de njá am naɗafa-aaruwa antara am názlaɓa-aaruwa wá, am erva-aaruweka una ŋanna. Tá aŋkwa emnde na a dzeratersaa Edderwa ge de njá am sleɗe-aha ŋanna.»
40020024	De cenaráncena pukura-aha umele na jaruje kelaawa na labáre ŋanna, a naba jaterhe ge ervauŋɗe áte egdzar mama-aha buwa ŋanna.
40020025	A ɗatertehe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Náwa diyakurdiya ganakini slekse-aha á larde wá, itare tá aŋkwa á kwárá larde-aha-aatare an márá hákuma áte emnde. Male-aha á ekse keni tá aŋkwa á márá hákuma-aatare am ekse.
40020026	Amá jeba á una ŋanna wá, a gevka am dagave á kure. Ma ware una á kátá gev male keni, arge una ŋanna wá, a gevge ba seke walaaɗi á kure.
40020027	Ma ware una á kátá gev slekatafke á kure keni, a gevge ba seke náve á kure. Malire wá, ba una ŋanna am ice á Dadaamiya.
40020028	Ba iya Ura á emnde baɗemme keni, sanka geni tá se magiya emnde slera, amá iya una ya se magateraa slera ge emnde, ya se ƴá shifa-aaruwa geni yá lyelye emnde ba kwakya.»
40020029	Segashe-aatare am ekse á Yairikau maa, emnde kwakya ta daa ɗaba Yaisu.
40020030	Tá aŋkwa wulfe-aha buwa tá á njanja áte we á uŋŋule, cenaráncena aŋkwa á degashe Yaisu, ta naba kante kwárá: «Yaakadada, Egdza á Dawuda, tasle á ŋa zaŋervareze,» a ba itare.
40020031	Ta valateraarehe ge emnde, ta bateraa a ɗaruɗe, amá itare ta farhe zlaɓe adaliye á ba an hula, a ba itare: «Yaakadada, Egdza á Dawuda, zaŋervareze.»
40020032	A tsaahe ge Yaisu, a ɗaterte á dezeŋara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwá kátá yá magakurá estara kina?»
40020033	Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Ŋá kátá ba ŋá nanna ice á ŋere Yaakadada».
40020034	Yaisu a zatervaarehe, a semtateraa ice-aha-aatare. Ba seke ndaha á miya na emnde buwa na sharansha ice-aha-aatare, ta ɗabete Yaisu.
40021001	Daraada am ekse á Baytifaji áte vuwa á Wa Anyaranyara, zlauzle herzharanteherzhe Urusaliima maa, Yaisu a ɓelaa pukura-aha-aara buwa á de katafke.
40021002	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Dawmbare á dem ekse na kwaye á katafke á miya na wá, ba kerteŋ kwá de bera úmá á ezzeŋwa an ŋguɗa, tá antara egdza-aara wá, pelawaapele, sawiyansa.
40021003	Máki a ndaakur elva ura umele wá, bawanánba ge edda-aara geni a ndavanaa Yaakadada, á de ƴakuránƴa, kwá sánsa.»
40021004	Á magava una ŋanna, geni a gevge elva na aŋkwa a ndahesaa nabi na, a ba ŋane:
40021005	«Bawateránba ge emnde a berni á Siyauna wá: Kwáye aŋkwa á sawa slekse á kure á sem ekse á kure an kemaarire, aŋkwa á sawa áte úmá á ezzeŋwa ira egdza-aara.»
40021006	Daaci ta naba zlala pukura-aha na, ta de magán ba seke una a baternaa Yaisu.
40021007	Ta sanmehe úmá á ezzeŋwa na antara egdza-aara áseza Yaisu, ta ndakaa zane-aha-aatare áte ezzeŋwa-aha ŋanna lauktu a njetaa Yaisu átekwa.
40021008	Kwakya nálga, emnde umele ta pelanse zane-aha-aatare áte baráma, emnde umele ta ɗatsaa hyema á debina, ta pelanse áte baráma ŋanna.
40021009	Daaci ma emnde na tá á zlala á katafke á Yaisu, ma emnde na tá am iga-aara keni baɗemme-aatare tá leva ba hula, a ba itare: «A vanteva Dadaamiya ɗemɗemire ge Egdza á Dawuda, a ganga barka ge edda una á sawa am zhera á Yaakadada na, Slekse ba Dadaamiya palle am samaya.»
40021010	Am sarte na Yaisu aŋkwa á dem huɗe á Urusaliima maa, emnde baɗemme am huɗe á berni ŋanna, tá aŋkwa á ndava geni ware ŋane zhele ŋanna. Baɗemme á huɗe á ekse ba hayakhayake.
40021011	Ta ŋwaterante ge dikele á emnde na tá dá ɗaba Yaisu na, geni una nabi Yaisu ura Nasarátu am haha á Galili.
40021012	Duwa á Yaisu á dem mashidi ƴaikke, a de beraa emnde a válá kazlaŋa, antara emnde a shákwá kazlaŋa am mashidi, a naba ŋgyaterse. A zaɗanve tabel-aha á emnde a peteke, antara kurshi-aha á emnde a válá takala masar baɗemme.
40021013	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba Dadaamiya: Bere-aaruwa wá, tá ɗaháná an bere á maduwa. Amá kure kwa ganve hwalakwa á nabera-aha.»
40021014	Tá aŋkwa wulfe-aha antara emnde a dere, ta semhe áseza Yaisu á ba am mashidi ŋanna, a naba mbateraahe.
40021015	Ba ta naa slera á najipu na a maganaa Yaisu na male-aha á liman-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita wá, a naba jaterhe ge ervauŋɗe. Aɗaba antara ba egdzara keni tá aŋkwa á hula á ba dem zhegela, a ba itare: «A vanteva Dadaamiya ɗemɗemire ge Egdza á Dawuda.»
40021016	A ba male-aha ŋanna, tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Ka cenáncena názena tá ndahaná itare ka?» «Ane, ya cenáncena», a ba Yaisu. «Kure ndaakurseka-he názena am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: Shakánsha gálá am mbuwe á egdzara saɗaɗɗe, antara egdzara na tá áte erva na emtu?»
40021017	Mázla-aara, ba zlala-aara ázetare, a desehe am huɗe á berni baɗemme. Kwaye a zlálá á dem Baytaniya, a de háre áhuwa.
40021018	Mákuralla-aara aŋkwa á sá Yaisu á sem huɗe á berni maa, ŋanaaŋa waya.
40021019	Daaci a naa mama á nabugda áte we á uŋŋule, a duhe á dem ekte á nabugda ŋanna, shánka egdzere átekwa, jauwa ba hyema. A ndahese elva-aara áte nabugda ŋanna, a ba ŋane: «Egdzere áte ka wá, gaɗɗiru tá nánka.» Kerteŋ welasewele nabugda na baɗemme.
40021020	Tá maga ba najipu pukura-aha am ta naa una ŋanna. Ta ndavanu ge Yaisu geni a sawa estara welasewele nabugda na shekwaaka ɗekiɗeki.
40021021	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Máki fakurtaarefe á ba an jirire, magakurka shaige, anƴƴa una náwa ya maganta iya ge nabugda na ka, ma kwa banán ba ge wa na: Tsetse áhuna de mbeɗanaambeɗá ire á ŋa á dem háye keni, sey á magaavemage.
40021022	Máki aŋkwa fetarfire á kure wá, ma kwa ŋála uwe keni kwá shánshá.»
40021023	Yaisu a duhe á dem mashidi, a de fantau ge kwaraterse duksa ge emnde. Ta duhe ge male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á Yahudiya-aha á dezeŋara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ka shanaa áme hákuma á mága duksa-aha na? Emtu a vaktaa ware baráma-aara?»
40021024	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Iya keni yá ndavakurundave, máki vakuriteva jawápa wá, yá ndaakurse tate na ni ya shaa hákuma átekwa.»
40021025	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A ɓelanaa ware Yuhanna ge se magaterá baptisma ge emnde? Dadaamiya emtu, emndimagwaha he?» Ta fantau ge ndahanaa am dágave-aatare emtsaaɗe: «Má mi banaa a ɓelanaa Dadaamiya, watse á bamiya: labára fakurtaareka an ŋane?
40021026	Má mi baa, ta ɓelanaa ba emndimagwaha, sey mí kuva emnde keni, aɗaba emnde baɗemme fartarfe ganakini Yuhanna nabi á Dadaamiya.»
40021027	Aɗaba una ŋanna, «Diyaŋerka», a ba itare tá elvan ge Yaisu. A ba Yaisu: «Iya keni yá ndaakurka náza-aaruwa ma ya shaa hákuma á mága duksa-aaruwa áza ware keni.»
40021028	Yaisu a fateraarehe zlaɓe ádaliye ge elva an naraje na. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Aŋkwa ura an egdzara buwa. A de banaa ge una male na: Vatena ká de maga slera am fe.
40021029	A ŋwanante ge egdzere: Yá duka, á bina. A dzamanaahe wá, am iga-aara a naba duhe.
40021030	Daaci duwa á dada á deza palle na keni, a de banaa ba elva ŋanna. Ŋane wa: Ane, yá duwa edda, á bina, amá wá, daaka.
40021031	Ate kure mu, ura-ara am egdzara ŋanna una a magaa názena a katanaa eddeŋara?» «Ba egdze na ta ndaan ge ŋane zuŋŋwe na,» a ba itare. Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Watse tá daada ba emnde á ŋezla antara zaware-aha zuŋŋwe á dem zlanna á Dadaamiya arge kure.
40021032	Aɗaba sámsa Yuhanna, a kwarakurse baráma a jirire, fakurtaareka an ŋane. Amá emnde a ŋezla, antara zaware-aha wá, fartaarefe an ŋane. A ba am sarte na nakuránna duksa ŋanna zlauzle keni, aley eptsakurka am tuba geni kwá fetaraarfe an ŋane.»
40021033	«Cenaucena naraje umele zlaɓe ádaliye,» a ba Yaisu: «Ndza aŋkwa edda á há umele, a dzeɓaa náfa á inabauhi am fe-aara, a jantaave an dala, a magaa tate á ɓeca egdza á náfá, ira bere á edda á ufa fe ŋanna, daaci a ƴateraa fe ŋanna baɗemme am erva ge emnde a slera, ŋane a daa shula.
40021034	Samsa sarte a tsaka inabauhi maa, edda á fe na a ɓelaa emnde a slera-aara umele áseza emnde na a ƴateraa fe am erva, geni tá lyanvaalya dza á inabauhi-aara.
40021035	Amá náwa názu ta magatertaa itare: Ta sluwatervaahe baɗemme á emnde na a ɓelateraa edda á fe na, ta hyanhe ge palle-aatare an ja, buwire-aatare ta ja shifa-aara ba ɗekiɗeki, keƴire-aatare ta dzagese an nákwá.
40021036	Edda á fe na a naba ɓelaa emnde a slera-aara umele jauje ba ge una am zuŋŋwire na, amá emnde a mága slera am fe ta de magateraa ba názena ta magaterte ge emnde zuŋŋwe.
40021037	Mazla-aara wá, edda á fe na a ɓelateraa egdza-aara ba ge ŋane. A ba ŋane: Egdza-aaruwa ba ge iya na wá, sey tá de fa zherwe áte ŋane.
40021038	Amá ba ta puwete ice áte ŋane emnde a mága slera am fe wá, a ba itare am dágave-aatare: Yawwaa, kwaye samsa edda una watse á zaná ŋane waráta á fe á miya na. Gwawamiyargwe, jaumija ba shifa-aara, fe-aara ŋanna watse á gev ba náza á miya.
40021039	Daaci má ta eksevaahe, ta danse áte iga a dala á fe ŋanna, ta naba ja shifa-aara.»
40021040	A ndavateruhe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Má samsa edda á fe na mu, watse á magaterá uwe ge emnde a mága slera am fe na?»
40021041	Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Watse á zatervaareka ɗekiɗeki ge emnde a mándzawe ŋanna, sey watse á ceɓaterceɓa, watse á ƴaterá inabauhi-aara am erva ge emnde na ni watse tá vante dza á inabauhi-aara an uŋŋule-aara na.»
40021042	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Aŋkwa naraje am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: “Ba nákwa ŋanna ta eblyanvaa emnde a nyáŋa bere na una, a eksantehe ge Dadaamiya, a ganve nákwá na á ŋáná ŋane ndzeɗa á bere ŋanna baɗemme. Kwaye ŋane názena a maganaa Yaakadada, shagera ge miya, máki namiyanna duksa ŋanna.” Ábi ndaakursende naraje ŋanna.»
40021043	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire, una keni watse ba estuwa ŋanna. Watse Dadaamiya á de sanse hákuma á maga slera-aara am erva á kure, á de vaterte ge emnde a jeba umele na tá de fansaarefe na.
40021044	Nákwá ŋanna wá, ma ware una a mbeɗehe átekwa keni, sey á kezlevkezle am tate umele. Edda una a eblyaara nákwá ŋanna ge ŋane, á hánaahe edda-aara á ganvege ba seke haha.»
40021045	Ba ta cenaa naraje-aha á Yaisu na, male-aha á liman-aha antara Farisa-aha wá, ta naba diyeddiye geni á ndahaná áte itare.
40021046	Ta naba tátaya pute á ekseksa-aara, amá á waterwa lyawa átuge jáháva á emnde na, aɗaba emnde baɗemme njarantenje Yaisu, geni ŋane nabi á Dadaamiya.
40022001	Yaisu aŋkwa á vaterte sera á elva á ba an naraje zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
40022002	«Náwa názu á gárává an dem zlanna á Dadaamiya: Aŋkwa slekse, a magaa muŋri á larusa, a ganaa gyaale ge egdza-aara.
40022003	Daaci a ɓelaa walaaɗi-aha-aara, tá de ɗanante emnde na ni tá se za ɗafa á larusire na, amá emnde ŋanna kwalarevkwále sarka.
40022004	A ɓelaa emnde umele zlaɓe ádaliye an nara-aara, a ba ŋane: Bawateranba ge emnde na ya ndavateraa ya na wá: Ceɓanceɓa dalau-aha-aaruwa, antara dabba-aha-aaruwa umele na ni tá an ŋasla jipu na, an tsatsa duksa baɗemme, sawmbare á sem muŋri á larusa!
40022005	Amá emnde na ta ɗahateraa á dem muŋri ŋanna faranuka hyema ge una ŋanna ɗekiɗeki, ta zlalehe á dem tate á wedere-aha-aatare. Ura umele a dem fe-aara, umele a dem tsakala-aara,
40022006	emnde umele ta sluva emnde a ɓela á slekse ŋanna, ta magateraa palása, ta ceɓaa shifa-aatare.
40022007	Daaci jaaja ervauŋɗe slekse maa, a naba ɓela sawji-aha-aara geni tá de ceɓá emnde a ceɓa shifa ŋanna, ta zu ekse-aatare baɗemme an kárá.
40022008	Daaci a ba slekse á elvan ge emnde a slera-aara umele: Muŋri á larusa wá, an gya, amá emnde na ndza ya ɗaterɗaha na wá, tá fuka mázla-aara.
40022009	Naba zlalauzlala á dete we á wálkame-aha, ma kwa shaa emnde-ara keni ɗawaterɗáhá, a se zaruze.
40022010	Duwa-aatare á dete we á wálkame-aha, baɗemme á emnde na ta de shateraa itare na, ta saterhe baɗemme, emnde a jirire, an emnde a mándzawe baɗemme, a se nahete ge huɗe á há an nalga.
40022011	«A tsete ge slekse, a de zhárá emnde na a ɗahateraa ŋane maa, a naa ba ura, tsekwámka am naŋgyuwe á dem larusa.
40022012	A ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: Ura-aaruwa, ka shanaa estara ka baráma á sehuna tsekwakemka am naŋgyuwe á larusa na? Palle á elva na a ndahanaa zhel na ɓaaka.
40022013	Daaci a ba slekse á elvan ge kwakwane-aha-aara: Puwawanempuwa zawa am mbiye ge zhel na, takwasawutakwasa ba shagera erva-aha antara sera-aha-aara baɗemme, de eblyawanmeblye á dem tate na tabeɗamme jipu na ágáshe, a kyuwa kwa áhuwa, a ekkerɗa slare-aara.»
40022014	Ge zla elva-aara Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Kwakya emnde na á ɗaháterá Dadaamiya, amá á dzerese ba cekwa am huɗe-aara.»
40022015	Daaci duwa á Farisa-aha, ta de magaa sawari-aatare geni sey tá eksevaksa Yaisu áte elva.
40022016	Am iga á sawari-aatare ŋanna maa, ta naba ɓela pukura-aha-aatare umele antara emnde á Hirudus á deza Yaisu, geni tá de ndavanu elva na. A ba itare: «Malum, diyaŋerdiya geni ekka wá, ka slejirire, ka slekwaraterse jirire á Dadaamiya ge emnde áte una á kataná ŋane, ɓaaka lámbe á ŋa áte ŋgahire á urimagwe na tá ndahaná emnde na.
40022017	Daaci náwa ŋá ndava ázeŋa wá, ndaŋerndaha názena ka disaa ka. Am tawraita á miya mu, aŋkwa emtu baráma á puwaná hadáma ge male á larde á Rauma, ɓaaka he?»
40022018	Amá kerteŋ diyeddiye Yaisu mándzawire na ta kwamanaa itare baɗemme. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwa emnde a fida, labára kwá tsagwaɗitsagwaɗa?
40022019	Marawiyánmárá emtsaaɗe shuŋgu na tá puwa hadáma an ŋane na.» Ta maranaa suley palle.
40022020	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Nderáva á ware una áte shuŋgu na? Ira zhera na mu, zhera á ware?»
40022021	Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Náza á male á larde á Rauma.» A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Daaci má estuwa wá, puwawanpuwa ge male á larde názu zlaya-aara, ge Dadaamiya keni názu zlaya-aara.»
40022022	Tá maga ba najipu á jawapa na ta cenanaa itare na. Daaci ta ƴaa Yaisu, ba zlala-aatare.
40022023	Ba vacite ŋanna zlaɓe ádaliye maa, ta naba sem ge Saduki-aha áseza Yaisu. Ba itare emnde na ta bantsa itare, ɓaaka tse á emnde am faya na. Ta se ndavanu elva, a ba itare:
40022024	«Malum, a ba Muusa, máki emtsamtsa zhele ƴanka egdzere wá, a melesemele egdza emmeŋara mukse-aara geni á yaná egdzara ge egdza emmeŋara na keɗaakeɗa na.
40022025	Iyau, ndza tá aŋkwa dawalaa vuye ázeŋere ta egdzar mama, duwa á makaji-aatare, a gaa gyaale, áma a naba keɗehe, a ƴaa mukse na ɓaaka egdzere.
40022026	A melese ge sleɗaba-aara, ŋane keni a keɗehe, a ƴaa mukse na ɓaaka egdzere. Keƴire-aatare keni ba estuwa, itare vuye na baɗemme ta gaa ba mukse ŋanna, baɗemme zlaruzle ƴaránka egdzere ba palle keni.
40022027	Am iga-aatare baɗemme, a keɗehe ge mukse ŋanna keni.
40022028	Vaci tse á emnde am faya mu, watse átuge ware palle mukse na? Aɗaba itare vuye na ndza mukse-aatare ba ŋane palle!»
40022029	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kure jakuraaveje áte baráma a jirire, aɗaba diyakurka názu am wakita á Dadaamiya, diyakurka ndzeɗa á Dadaamiya keni ɗekiɗeki.
40022030	Má tsaretse emnde a faya wá, ɓaaka gá mukse, ma ŋwasha keni ɓaaka de gá zhele. Emnde baɗemme tá de njá ba seke malika-aha am samaya.
40022031	Tse á emnde am faya keni maa, kure ndaakurseka názu a bakurnaa Dadaamiya áte elva ŋanna emtu? Aɗaba a ba ŋane áte eggye-aha á kure werre:
40022032	Ba iya una ya Dadaamiya á Ibrahima, ya Dadaamiya á Isiyaaku, ya Dadaamiya á Yakubu. Daaci máki estuwa wá, tá á ba an shifa-aatare emndu werre. Aɗaba Dadaamiya wá, ŋane Dadaamiya á emnde na tá an shifa, Dadaamiya á emnde na ni tá an emtseka.»
40022033	Baɗemme á dikele á emnde na ta cenaa jawapa-aara na tá maga ba najipu-aara.
40022034	Cenaráncena Farisa-aha geni jawapa á Yaisu katevaaka ye ge Saduki-aha maa, ta naba jamme átirpalle.
40022035	Aŋkwa ura palle am dágave-aatare wá, ŋane malum á tawraita, a magaa niya-aara geni á de tsagwaɗa Yaisu áte elva. A ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu:
40022036	«Malum ƴaikke, ƴaikka ura-ara am shairiya-aha á Dadaamiya baɗemme?»
40022037	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ewwáya Yaakadada Dadaamiya á ŋa an ervauŋɗe á ŋa baɗemme, an shifa á ŋa baɗemme, an eŋkale á ŋa baɗemme.
40022038	Ƴaikke ba una ŋanna am shairiya-aha á Dadaamiya, ɗemɗeme zlaɓe adaliye.
40022039	Náwa buwire-aara na ni tá gáráva na: Ewwáya sleriya á ŋa ba seke ire á ŋa.
40022040	Am tawraita á Muusa antara názu ndza ta kwaratersaa nábi-aha umele ge emnde, ƴaikke-aara ba shairiya-aha buwa na.»
40022041	Am tá aŋkwa Farisa-aha jarammeje átirpalle maa, Yaisu a ndavateru elva na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
40022042	«Kure mu, kwá slanve uwe ge Almasiihu? Kwá ba wulfe á ware?» Ta ŋwanante a ba itare: «Wulfe á Dawuda.»
40022043	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ay estara kena Dawuda keni ndza á ɗaháná an Yaakadada na? Aɗaba a ba Dawuda an hákuma á Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe:
40022044	“A ba Yaakadada á elvan ge Yaakadada-aaruwa: Njinja am naɗafa-aaruwa, dem sarte na má ganatervege kelaade-aha á ŋa tate á puwa sera á ŋa.”
40022045	Máki ndza a ɗantaa Dawuda Almasiihu an Yaakadada, á sawa estara kena zlaɓe ádaliye ni á gev wulfe-aara na?»
40022046	Ba palle keni jerka edda una ni á ŋwananteŋwa. A fantau á ba am sarte ŋanna, ɓaaka ura á kwamaha de ndavanu elva mázla-aara.
40023001	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge jáháva antara pukura-aha:
40023002	«Malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha wá, slera-aatare tá kwaraterse názu a ndahanaa tawraita á Muusa ge emnde ákyiye.
40023003	Daaci fawatersaarefe, magaumága názena tá bakurná itare baɗemme. Amá wá, magauka názena tá maganá itare na ɗekiɗeki. Aɗaba názu tá kwaraterse ge emnde na, itare tá maŋka áte una ŋanna.
40023004	Tá faterar gwatame ɗemɗeme ge emnde, amá itare ba gulanda-aatare keni tá feka átekwa ɗekiɗeki ge melaterumele.
40023005	Baɗemme á názena tá maganá itare, tá magán ba geni a zhararaterzhárá emnde. Estuwa, tá puwa nayya-aha, tá dzeɓemá am duksa ba seke laya, tá ŋguɗaná áte wafke-aha-aatare antara áte erva-aha-aatare, ira tá saganve jeba á puwa-aha umele aŋkwa áte zane-aha-aatare.
40023006	Ma am muŋri-ara keni itare tá kátá ba sleɗe na ni an dárádza jipu na. Am mashidi keni sleɗe-aatare sey á jauje ge náza á emnde baɗemme, ma ware keni á náterna.
40023007	Tá kátá emnde tá ɗaháterá an “malum”, tá gater use an ga ire am dágave á zlamaha.
40023008	Amá kure wá, vawaterteka baráma ge emnde geni tá ɗahákurá an malum-aha, aɗaba baɗemme á kure kwa ba egdzar mama, aŋkwa Malum á kure ba palle.
40023009	Ɗahauka ura áte duniya na an dada ɗekiɗeki, aɗaba Eddekure ba palle aŋkwa am samaya.
40023010	A ɗaharakurka an male ɗekiɗeki, aɗaba aŋkwa Male á kure ba palle, ba ŋane una Almasiihu.
40023011	Ma male ware am dágave á kure keni, a gevge walaɗi á kure.
40023012	Ma ware una a kantaa ba ŋane ire-aara na, sey tá de gánaaga. Áma edda una ni a gaa ire-aara wá, tá de kananteka.»
40023013	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha, kure kwa emnde a fida! Watse zlaɗa ge kure aɗaba kwá piyaterante dem kwárá á Dadaamiya ge emnde. Kure keni dakuremka, emnde na tá kátá demda na keni kwa piyaterante. ((
40023014	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha, kure kwa emnde a fida! Kwá lyatervuwe duksa-aatare ge wegyegwar ŋwasha, daaci kwá slaɗanve maduwa-aha á kure geni tá fakura áte emnde a jirire. Aɗaba una ŋanna, zlaɗa á kure á de jauje ge náza á emnde baɗemme.))
40023015	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha, kwa emnde a fida! Watse zlaɗa ge kure, aɗaba kwá aŋkwa ja ɗaba am larde-aha antara áte ire á haye-aha baɗemme, geni kwá shansha ura palle á gevge am dza á kure ge ɗaba nadina á kure. Má shakuránsha keni, kwá ganve edda-aara dza á kárá, á jakuruuje ba ge kure ma ser buwa keni.
40023016	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha, wulfe na ni kwá táɗá wulfe-aha. Aɗaba a ba kure: Má ura zauze waɗa an mashidi ƴaikke, ɓaaka názu á maganmága, sey máki a zu waɗa án dindar na am mashidi na lauktu á eɗɗaba waɗa-aara.
40023017	Kure wá, kwa uce-aha ba jire, kwa wulfe-aha! Ƴaikke ura-ara ŋane am duksa-aha ŋanna? Amaana ƴaikke dindar na am mashidi emtu? Tá eksetá mashidi wá, tá ganve dindar cuɗeɗɗe an ŋane emtu?
40023018	Kwa bántsa kure zlaɓe ádaliye wá: Má ura a zu waɗa an názu tá fa sadake átekwa wá, ɓaaka názu á maganmága ɗekiɗeki. Amá máki edda-aara a zu waɗa an sadake na átekwa na wá, á eɗɗaba waɗa-aara ŋanna.
40023019	Kure wá, kwa wulfe-aha! Ƴaikke ura-ara ŋane am duksa-aha ŋanna? Amaana ƴaikke sadake arge duksa na tá faná átekwa na emtu? Emtu ƴaikke duksa na tá fa sadake átekwa, á ganvá ŋane sadake ŋanna cuɗeɗɗe na he?
40023020	Yá ndaakur ba jirire, máki edda-aara zauze waɗa an duksa na tá faná sadake ge Dadaamiya átekwa na wá, edda-aara a zu waɗa an duksa ŋanna ira sadake na átekwa na keni.
40023021	Edda una má zauze waɗa an mashidi ƴaikke, a zu waɗa an mashidi ka palle. A zu waɗa an Dadaamiya na am mashidi ŋanna keni.
40023022	Edda una a zu waɗa an samaya, a zu waɗa an kurshi á sleksire á Dadaamiya, ira Dadaamiya na á njá am kurshi ŋanna keni.
40023023	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure, malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha, aɗaba kwa emnde a fida! Ɗále-aha seke tara ɗale á minti, antara timba ira makshaksha wá, kwá aŋkwa vante luser-aara ge Dadaamiya. Amá duksa ƴaikke na á kwaratersa tawraita ge emnde seke tara jirire, antara maggwire, ira dzayyire á ervauŋɗe wá, kwá maŋka. Mbate keni ma andze kwá maganá á ba antara una-aha ŋanna, ɓaaka una kwá ƴanseƴe.
40023024	Kure keni kwa wulfe-aha, kwá taɗa wulfe-aha seke kure. Kwá ƴemese ugjanja am yáwe á kure, amá ezlegwame wá, ƴemakurka, kwá shaná á ba antara ŋane.
40023025	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha á tawraita an Farisa-aha, aɗaba kwa emnde a fida! Kwá bárá iga á náza sha duksa antara tasa-aha á za duksa á kure, amá an naha tara neylire, antara shagerkire am huɗe-aara.
40023026	Ekkure Farisa-aha wá, kwa wulfe-aha! Barawábárá emtsaaɗe huɗe á tasa-aha á kure, iga-aara watse á gevge tseɗaŋŋe.
40023027	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha, kwa emnde a fida! Kure kwa ba seke irekhye-aha na an bárá an duksa dzayye, zariya am ice á emnde, amá am huɗe-aara wá, an naha ba se á emtsa, an weshege-aha gergere.
40023028	Kure keni kwa ba seke una ŋanna. Ágáshe wá, kwa emnde a jirire áza emnde, amá kwakya fida antara mándzawire am kure.»
40023029	«Watse zlaɗa ge kure malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha, aɗaba kwa emnde a fida! Kwá aŋkwa nderá irekhya á nabi-aha geni hayakuránháyá slera á eggye-aha á kure, kwá aŋkwa caɗa irekhya á emnde na ndza ta magaa jirire á Dadaamiya,
40023030	aley wá, a ba kure: Ma andze ŋá aŋkwa am zamane á eggye-aha á ŋere wá, ma ŋá melateruka ge ceɓa shifa á nabi-aha.
40023031	Ba kure keni diyakurdiya am ire á kure geni kwa wulfe-aha á emnde na ndza ta ceɓaa shifa á nabi-aha.
40023032	Naba magaumága slera á kure ƴawánka, zlawanaazle slera á eggye-aha á kure.
40023033	«Kwa havale-aha, kwa egdzara á pushe ba jire! Una ni kwá de ŋezla am shairiya, kwá duka á dem kárá á jahanáma, a ba kure? Kwá ŋezleka ɗekiɗeki.
40023034	Aɗaba una ŋanna yá ndaakur ba jirire, cenaucena elva na: Watse yá ɓelakurá nabi-aha, antara emnde a eŋkale, ira malum-aha, amá emnde umele-aatare watse kwá ceɓa shifa-aatare, emnde umele watse kwá zleŋeláterá áte dzaŋgala, emnde umele watse kwá slerpáterá an ja am mashidi-aha á kure, watse kwá de tatayatertátaya am ekse-aha baɗemme.
40023035	Daaci baɗemme á uzhe á emnde cuɗeɗɗe na ndza ta ceɓateraa am duniya na, kwaye emtsa á Habila, sem emtsa á Zakariya baɗemme á ba am mbiye á kure. Zakariya na wá, yá ndahá elva á Zakariya egdza á Barakiya na ndza kwa janaa am dagave á tara bere cuɗeɗɗe antara duksa na tá faná sadake ge Dadaamiya átekwa na.
40023036	Una yá ndaakur ba jirire: Baɗemme á uzhe á emnde ŋanna á ba am mbiye á emnde a zamáne na!»
40023037	«Urusaliima, Urusaliima, ekka ka ceɓaa nabi-aha, ka ceɓaa emnde na a ɓelateraa Dadaamiya an nákwá! Ser kwakya una yá kátá jema emnde á ŋa ásezerwa, ba seke náza á mama á ukkula, máki a jemaa egdzara-aara á dem ekta á zlambake-aara. Amá kwalakefkwale.
40023038	Kina wá, ƴanakaaƴa, ká de gev ba kaamba!
40023039	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Kwá puweteka ice á kure áte iya mazla-aara, dem sarte na ni watse kwá bánba ba kure an we á kure ganakini a ganga Dadaamiya barka ge edda una a sawa an zhera á Yaakadada na!»
40024001	Daaci sessa Yaisu am mashidi ƴaikke, aŋkwa á zlálá maa, ta duhe ge pukura-aha-aara á dezeŋara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ezzhara emtsaaɗe jeba á nderáva á mashidi na.»
40024002	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Una ŋanna kwá zharaná kure baɗemme na, watse á mbeɗa baɗemme, ba nákwá palle keni watse á jauka áte ukfeŋara nákwá.»
40024003	De njaanja Yaisu áte ire á Wa Anyaranyara, ta duhe ge pukura-aha-aara á ba an niya á dezeŋara, ta de ndavanuhe, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ndaŋerndaha watse á magava am sarte-ara una ŋanna? Watse ŋá dise áte uwe ganakini herzha sawa á ŋa, an zle á duniya?»
40024004	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Kure wá, faufa ba hyema, a se keɗarakuraaka emnde umele.
40024005	Aɗaba watse kwakya emnde na tá de sawa an zhera-aaruwa, ma ware keni á se ba: Ba iya una ya Almasiihu. Daaci tá se keɗa emnde kwakya.
40024006	Watse kwá cenáncena labare á wáva-aha am larde-aha na ba herherzhe an kure, antara am larde-aha na ƴiƴiye an kure, amá gazlauka ɗekiɗeki. Sey á de magava una-aha ŋanna, amá zlaɓe zle á duniya ka emtsaaɗe.
40024007	Watse larde umele á de darge larde umele an wáva. Emnde á slekse umele, tá de darge kwárá á slekse umele an wáva. Waya antara gejava á haha á de magava am tate-aha gergere.
40024008	Baɗemme á una-aha ŋanna, zlaɓe ba fakta á zlaɗa emtsaaɗe, ba seke náza á mukse na fanantaufe zlaɗa á yá.
40024009	«Watse tá sluwakursluwa, tá vakurte ge emnde tá magakurá palasa, tá de ceɓa shifa á kure. Emnde baɗemme tá de dá ba kelaadire ádete kure aɗaba zhera-aaruwa.
40024010	Emnde kwakya tá de ƴá fetaare áte ya mazla-aara am sarte ŋanna, tá de maga ba kelaadire, antara dugune am dagave-aatare.
40024011	Tá de jesaareje nabi-aha fida kwakya, tá de keɗa emnde kwakya.
40024012	Watse á kwakyevaa ba shagerkire am dagave á emnde. Watse kwakya emnde na á de gula wáyáva-aatare.
40024013	Amá edda una tsaatse shagera dem halavuwa-aara wá, á lyelye shifa-aara.
40024014	Á hyemhya labare á higa, elva a sem kwara á Dadaamiya, am huɗe á duniya baɗemme, watse tá maganaamaga seydire am larde-aha baɗemme, lauktu á sawa zle á duniya.»
40024015	«Watse kwá nánna duksa na ni tá ɗaháná an shagerkire emtaŋka ɗekiɗeki na am tate á cuɗeɗɗe. Nabi Daniyail wá, ndza a enndaha elva-aara werre. Ma a ndaasa ware elva-aaruwa na keni, a cenevaacena elva ŋanna ba shagera.
40024016	Vacite na ni má nakuranna duksa ŋanna wá, watse kyaakya ge emnde na tá am Yahudiya, tá zlerda zhagade á dem huɗe á wa.
40024017	Edda una áte ire á bere keni, a tsuŋka á dem huɗe á bere ge hálá kazlaŋa-aara.
40024018	Edda una am fe keni, a eptseka á sá ge se hálá naŋgyuwe-aara.
40024019	«Watse á tsaame kwa zlaɗa á ŋwasha na watse tá á huɗe am sarte ŋanna, antara ŋwasha na tá an egdzara áte erva na!
40024020	Ŋalauŋála Dadaamiya ganakini zhagade á kure a gevka am sarte á ekhye, bi an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe!
40024021	Aɗaba watse kwakya jipu zlaɗa am sarte ŋanna. Ta nderaa estuwa duniya, sem vatena, jerka jeba á zlaɗa ŋanna ɗekiɗeki. Á de jesarka keni zlaɗa na ni ta kalle an una ŋanna.
40024022	Ma andze gulanaaka Dadaamiya hare-aha á zlaɗa ŋanna wá, ma andze á jauka ura an shifa ba palle keni. Amá a naba gulanaahe ge Dadaamiya aɗaba emnde na a dzeratersaa ŋane.
40024023	«Daaci am sarte ŋanna, ma a bakurnaa ware: Nawa aŋkwa Almasiihu áhuna, bi kwaya aŋkwa áhuwa, lyiyauka elva ŋanna ɗekiɗeki.
40024024	Aɗaba watse tá jesareje almasiihu-aha fida, antara nabi-aha fida am sarte ŋanna. Watse tá maga nalaama-aha antara najipu-aha gergere kwakya, geni ambane tá keɗateraakeɗa emnde na ni a dzeratersaa Dadaamiya áte eŋkale.
40024025	Cenawáncena! Náwa fanakuremfa ya am vuwa zlauzle.
40024026	«Daaci ma tá bakurá: Kwaye aŋkwa Almasiihu am kaamba keni, kure daumbareka. Ma tá bakurá: Náwa ŋane, a sheɓevaa ire-aara áhuna keni, fautaareka an elva-aatare ɗekiɗeki.
40024027	Aɗaba ba seke mága á kárá á ráde á sawa am samaya, á fantau am geɗi dem pute keni ba ŋane na wá, watse sawa á Ura á emnde baɗemme keni ba estuwa.
40024028	Aɗaba am tate na ni aŋkwa lipa átekwa, zaatate-aha keni tá jaháva á ba ádehuwa.»
40024029	«Kerteŋ am iga á zlaɗa ŋanna maa, vaciya á de gevge daŋŋwe baɗemme, tere keni á de máreka parakkire-aara, terlyakwa-aha keni watse tá geda á sem áhá, baɗemme á ndzeɗa á názena áte samaya á de gejavtegeje ba ŋarŋare sleɗe.
40024030	Daaci tá de zhárá ba nalaama á Ura á emnde baɗemme á sawa am samaya. Baɗemme á emnde na tá am duniya na tá de kyuwa, daaci tá zhárá ba iya Ura á emnde baɗemme yá aŋkwa á sawa áte kumba, yá sawa an hákuma ƴaikke antara ɗemɗemire.
40024031	Tá de fertanteferta derkwákwá ƴaikke, daaci yá de ɓela malika-aha-aaruwa á dem karáfke-aha á duniya ufaɗe kerɗe, geni tá jatermaare ge emnde na ya dzeratersaa ya na baɗemme.»
40024032	«Diyaweddiye á ba áte mama á nabugda. Máki kwa nanna gedaageda hyema átekwa, ƴaaƴa umele aŋwaslire wá, diyakurdiya ganakini herzhavteherzhe madare.
40024033	Una keni ba duksa palle. Máki aŋkwa á magava duksa-aha ŋanna wá, diyaweddiye ganakini iya keni yá ba áte we á sera mazla-aara ge sawa.
40024034	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Emnde a zamane na tá de zlauka ba estuwa, sey máki naránna duksa-aha ŋanna.
40024035	Tara samaya an haha wá, tá naba keɗa, tá zlauzle. Amá elva-aaruwa wá, á keɗeka ɗekiɗeki, sey má gevge.»
40024036	«Elva á hárá á bere, antara sarte ŋanna wá, ɓaaka slediya-aara ɗekiɗeki. Ma malika-aha am samaya, ba iya Egdza á Dadaamiya keni diyanka, sey diyaa ba Dadaamiya palle ŋane Dada.
40024037	Ba názena ndza a magava am zamane á Nuhu na wá, watse ba seke una ŋanna kalkale má watse yá sawa iya ya Ura á emnde baɗemme.
40024038	Am sarte na zlaɓe samka yáwe á keɗa duniya wá, slera á emnde ndza ba tátaya emtakire á duniya; tá ezza, tá essha, tá gá larusa, tá vaterte gyaale-aha-aatare ge zála, a semaa estuwa kwaskwe na a demaa Nuhu á dem paare-aara, tá maga ba una.
40024039	A se keɗateraahe ba estuwa yawe á keɗa duniya, farka hyema ɗekiɗeki. Má watse yá de sawa iya ya Ura á emnde baɗemme keni, á de magava ba estuwa.
40024040	Watse yá se bera emnde buwa am fe, watse yá eksa palle, palle-aatare yá ƴánƴa.
40024041	Ŋwasha buwa tá há hiya, yá eksa palle, yá ƴá palle.
40024042	Aɗaba una ŋanna, njawinja á ba am niya á kure. Aɗaba diyakurka sarte na ni á de sawa Yaakadada á kure átekwa na.
40024043	Aŋkwa duksa palle, diyaweddiye ba shagera: Máki diyaadiya edda á há sarte na ni watse á sawa neyle átekwa na wá, á peka háre ɗekiɗeki, aɗaba wayaaka á demda neyle á dem huɗe á há-aara.
40024044	Kure keni ba estuwa. Sarte na ni watse iya Ura á emnde baɗemme yá de sawa átekwa na wá, diyakurka. Daaci njawinja á ba am niya á kure.»
40024045	«Sleslera-ara ŋane dzayye ervauŋɗe-aara, sleŋkale zlaɓe ádaliye na? Ba edda una ni má zanwe-aatare a ƴanaa huɗe á há-aara baɗemme am erva ge ŋane, á vatertá ŋane náza za ge emnde na tá am huɗe á há ŋanna baɗemme, á vatertá an laukte-aara na.
40024046	Yá ndaakur ba jirire, watse higa ƴaikke ge sleslera ŋanna, máki zanwe-aara a se beranaa á ba am slera-aara.
40024047	Rezege-aara baɗemme keni á naba fanemfe am erva zanwe-aara ge sleslera ŋanna.
40024048	Amá máki daŋŋwe ervauŋɗe á sleslera ŋanna wá, á naba bánba am ervauŋɗe-aara ganakini labára á saaka zanwe-aaruwa watsewatse.
40024049	Daaci á fantau ge magateraa palasa an ja ge emnde a slera umele, á zá názu am huɗe á há, á essha antara emnde a mbazla umele.
40024050	Daaci má á sa zanwe á sleslera ŋanna wá, á sa á ba an kwaskwe na ni tamaaka ŋane ɗekiɗeki, á sa am sarte na ni diyaaka ŋane ɗekiɗeki na.
40024051	Palasa na á se magante zanwe-aara ge sleslera ŋanna wá, náza enndaaka. Ba emtaŋkire na ni á se puwa emnde a fida á demkwa na wá, ŋane keni á ba am huɗe-aara. Á de kyuwa-aara am tate ŋanna, á de kerɗa ba sláre ge zlaɗa.»
40025001	«Daaci dem zlanna á Dadaamiya wá, watse á gáráva an labare á gyaale-aha ta kelaawa, ta tsetehe an kárá á fanus-aha-aatare am erva, ta de yainu ge edda á larusa.
40025002	Emnde ilyeɓe am gyaale-aha ŋanna ɓaaka eŋkale-aatare ɗekiɗeki. Ilyeɓe-aatare keni, ta emnde a eŋkale jipu.
40025003	Duwa á gyaale-aha na ɓaaka eŋkale-aatare na maa, ta haletaa ba kárá-aha á fanus-aatare, amá magarka kaashi á kanandzir.
40025004	Amá gyaale-aha na tá an eŋkale na wá, ta haletaa kárá á fanus-aha-aatare, ira kwalaba-aha-aatare kanandzir am huɗe-aara.
40025005	Saaka edda á larusa ŋanna watsewatse maa, a naba ceɓaterhe ge háre. Gyaale-aha kelaawa na baɗemme parupe háre.
40025006	«Am huɗe á vaƴiya wá, tá cena ba hula: Náwa samsa edda á larusa! Sawesse ásezeŋara, a ba itare.
40025007	Daaci gyaale-aha kelaawa na baɗemme tsaretse am háre na, tá fantau ge mba kárá á fanus-aha-aatare.
40025008	Daaci: Kawaŋeruke kanandzir-aha á kure na, náwa á emtsa kárá-aha á ŋere, a ba emnde na ɓaaka eŋkale-aatare na, tá elvan ge emnde a eŋkale.
40025009	Ta ŋwaterante ge emnde a eŋkale, a ba itare tá elvan ge itare: Ŋere ŋá velka! Watse á hyamiyarka antara kure, dawmbare ádeza emnde a válá kanandzir.
40025010	Ba zlarzlálá itare á de shekwa kanandzir na, a semhe ge edda á larusa keni. Gyaale-aha ilyeɓe na ndza tá am niya-aatare na daremda á dem bere á ga nika antara edda á larusa ŋanna, ta heɗetaa bere an tsekweram.
40025011	Shekwaashekwa wá, saremsa gyaale-aha umele na keni. Ta ketaa kwara: Edda! Edda, weraŋerantewera bere, a ba itare.
40025012	Amá a ŋwaterante ge edda á larusa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Diyanakurka ya ɗekiɗeki, ma kwa emnde-ara keni.»
40025013	Ge zla elva-aara Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ma vaatara keni, njawinja á ba am niya á kure, aɗaba diyakurka kwaskwe ŋanna, diyakurka sarte ŋanna.»
40025014	«Adaliye dem zlanna á Dadaamiya wá, á gáráva an zhel umele a daa shula. Lauktu á zlálá, a ɗetaa emnde a slera-aara, a tegateraa nalmane-aara.
40025015	A vante jekka deremke ilyeɓe ge slezuŋŋwe-aatare. Ge buwire-aatare, a vante jekka deremke buwa. Ge keƴire-aatare, a vante jekka deremke. Ma ware keni a vante ba deydey á ndzeɗa-aara, daaci ba zlálá-aara ge ŋane.
40025016	Duwa edda una a shaa jekka deremke ilyeɓe, kerteŋ a de mbeɗa erva an ŋane, a shetaa riba jekka deremke ilyeɓe.
40025017	Edda una ta vante jekka deremke buwa na keni, a de magán ba estuwa, ŋane keni a shetaa riba jekka deremke buwa.
40025018	Amá edda una ta vante jekka deremke na wá, ŋane a de yese evege am haha, a heɗem nalmane á zanwe-aara am huɗe-aara.
40025019	«Shekwaashekwa wá, a naba saahe ge zanwe á emnde a slera ŋanna, a ɗaterte ge zhárá lisaafi á slera na ta maganaa itare.
40025020	A sawhe ge edda una ndza ta vante jekka deremke ilyeɓe na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge zanwe-aara: Ndza ka vite jekka deremke ilyeɓe, náwa ya shante riba jekka deremke ilyeɓe.
40025021	Shagera, a ba zanwe-aara á elvan ge ŋane: Ka sleslera á jirire, dzayye huɗe á ŋa. Ka magaa slera an duksa na cekwa dáradza-aara an ervauŋɗe á ŋa palle; kazlaŋa na kwakya dárádza-aara keni sey yá fakemfa am erva. Sawa mí higa antara ya.
40025022	A semhe ge edda una ndza a vante jekka deremke buwa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge zanwe-aara: Ndza ka vite jekka deremke buwa, náwa ya shante riba keni jekka deremke buwa.
40025023	Shagera, a ba zanwe-aara á elvan ge ŋane: Ká sleslera á jirire, dzayye ervauŋɗe á ŋa. Ka magaa slera an duksa na cekwa dárádza-aara an ervauŋɗe á ŋa palle; kazlaŋa na kwakya dárádza-aara keni sey yá fakemfa am erva. Sawa mí higa antara ya.
40025024	«Am iga-aatare baɗemme maa, a semhe ge edda una ndza ta vante jekka deremke palle na keni áseza zanwe. A ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: Ambarka á ŋa male, diyandiya ganakini ka slemándzawe, ma jaŋka ba wulfe á duksa á ŋa keni, ká hálá ba duksa; ma tegaŋka ba duksa á ŋa keni ká jáha ba duksa.
40025025	Iya jiija lyawa, ndza ya heɗem shuŋgu á ŋa am haha, náwa ŋane duksa á ŋa.
40025026	A ŋwanante ge zanwe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: Ka sleslera mándzawe, ka masefe! Diyakdiya ganakini ya slemándzawe, á ba ka? Ma janeka ba wulfe á duksa-aaruwa keni yá hála ba duksa; ma teganka ba duksa-aaruwa keni yá jahá ba duksa, á ba ka?
40025027	Máki ba estuwa wá, ma andze ka de puweme nalmáne-aaruwa am baŋ kwa, daaci ma ya se lyiya nalmáne-aaruwa an yawe.
40025028	Daaci lyauvaalya jekke deremke na ázeŋara na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde na tá tsatse ázeŋara, vawanteva ge edda una an jekka deremke ilyeɓe, riba keni estuwa na.
40025029	Aɗaba edda una aŋkwa ázeŋara wá, tá de fanaarefe, tá de sagananvesage ba kwakya. Amá edda una shanteka ɗekiɗeki wá, ba una cekwa am erva-aara na keni, tá de lyevaalya am erva-aara.
40025030	Ŋguɗi na ɓaaka námpire-aara ɗekiɗeki ŋanna maa, naba dawansede á degashe, de eblyawanmeblye á dem tate na ni tabeɗamme jipu na, á de kyuwa-aara am huɗe-aara, á de kerɗa ba sláre ge zlaɗa.»
40025031	«Má watse samsa Ura á emnde baɗemme am sleksire antara malika-aha-aara baɗemme wá, a se njema am kurshi á sleksire-aara.
40025032	Daaci baɗemme á emnde na tá am huɗe á duniya tá de jammeje á katafke-aara, á de láterá ŋane emnde baɗemme, ba seke náza suni má á lesa kyáwe-aha, á saterse am dagave á náwe-aha.
40025033	Kyawe-aha wá, watse á puwáterá am naɗafa-aara, nawe-aha keni am nazlaɓa-aara.
40025034	Náwa elva na á de baterná slekse ge emnde na tá am naɗafa-aara: Kure emnde na Edderwa a gakur barka-aara na, sawmbare á sem ƴaikkire na ta tsatsakurán ge kure kwaye am fakta á duniya.
40025035	Aɗaba am sarte na a wiwa waya, kure kwa vite náza za; a wiwa ndera, kwa vite názu yá shushe; ndza ya wayve, kwa lyivaahe á dem mba á kure.
40025036	Am sarte na yá an ukhyiye dey, kwa tsekwime am naŋgyuwe; ndza ya lapika, zakurivaareze; ndza yá am daŋgay, kwa duwa á de zharizhara.
40025037	Daaci watse tá ŋwananteŋwa emnde a jirire na á ndaater elva na: Ndza ŋa nák vaatara á wáká waya, lauktu ŋa vakte náza za na Yaakadada? Ŋa nák áme á wáká ndera, ŋa vakte yawe?
40025038	Ŋa nák vaatara ka wayve am ekse á ŋere, ŋa lyiyáká am mba á ŋere? Bi ká an ukhyiye dey ŋa tsekwakeme am naŋgyuwe?
40025039	Ŋa nák vaatara lapika, bi ká am daŋgay, ŋa de zharakzhárá?
40025040	Watse á ŋwateranteŋwa slekse: Náwá yá sakuransese jirire-aara: Ba kelaa má kwa magateraa una-aha ŋanna ge egdzar mama-aha-aaruwa na cekwa ndzeɗa-aatare na wá, kwa magiyán ba ge iya.
40025041	«Am iga á una ŋanna maa, náwa názu watse á baterná slekse ge emnde na tá am názlaɓa-aara: Jawinaaja ázerwa, kure emnde na nyainyaikurvenyainye Dadaamiya, zlalauzlalawa á dem kárá na ɓaaka emtsa-aara ɗekiɗeki, ta tsatsannaa ge Shaitaine antara malika-aha-aara na!
40025042	Aɗaba ndza a wiyaa waye, kure vakuriteka náza za; ndza a wiyaa ndera, vakuriteka yawe;
40025043	ndza ya wayve, lyiyakurika á dem mba á kure; ndza yá an ukhyiye dey, vakuriteka naŋgyuwe; ndza ya lapika, ndza yá am daŋgay, dakurka á de zharizhárá.
40025044	Daaci watse tá ŋwananteŋwa itare keni: Ndza ŋa nák vaatara á wáká waya antara ndera, bi ka wayve, bi ká an ukhyiye dey, melaŋerakuka na Yaakadada? Ndza ŋa nak vaatara ká lapika, bi ká am daŋgay, daŋerka á de zharakzhárá?
40025045	Watse á ŋwateranteŋwa slekse: Náwa yá sakuransese jirire-aara: Ba kelaa má kwalakurevkwala magateraa una-aha ŋanna ge emnde na cekwa ndzeɗa-aatare na, magakuriyanka ba ge iya.
40025046	Daaci itare, watse tá dáterá á de magaterá palasa na á zleka ɗekiɗeki na. Amá emnde a jirire wá, tá de shá shifa na á zleka na.»
40026001	Zlanaazle Yaisu tsáká elva-aara maa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara:
40026002	«Diyakurdiya muŋri á Paska wá, a juwaa ba háre buwa. Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, watse tá eksiva á ba am muŋri ŋanna, tá de zleŋeliyá áte dzaŋgala.»
40026003	De jarammeje male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á Yahudiya-aha á ba am sarte ŋanna am mba Kayafas ŋane male á liman-aha baɗemme.
40026004	Daaci ta njantaa átirpalle geni tá eksevaksa Yaisu an nasherire, tá keɗánaakeɗa shifa-aara.
40026005	A ba itare am dágave-aatare: «Magaumika una ŋanna vaci muŋri, geni a tsaranteka emnde elva.»
40026006	Am sarte na Yaisu am Baytaniya na wá, a dem mbá á Simaun umele ndza á waná derve,
40026007	a demhe ge mukse umele an kuderá á waye-aara, á se emtake, kwakya gane-aara, a de puwar waye ŋanna ge Yaisu áte ire-aara am sarte na aŋkwa á za ɗafa.
40026008	Ba ta naa una ŋanna pukura-aha, a naba jaterhe ge ervauŋɗe, a ba itare: «Azara shagerire-aara jeba á bádza duksa na?
40026009	Ambane ka ma ta velu waye ŋanna, ma tá sha shuŋgu kwakya an ŋane, daaci ma tá tegater ge talága-aha!»
40026010	De cenáncena Yaisu elva na tá weshaná itare, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Labára kwá hyaná lyuwa ge mukse na? Názena a maginaa ŋane na shagera jipu.
40026011	Aɗaba uwe, talága-aha wá, ma vaatara keni watse tá aŋkwa átevege kure, amá iya wá, watse ya ɓaaka átevege kure.
40026012	Ŋane wá, waye na a puwiyaare ŋane na wá, tsatsiyaatsatse ge ɓeliya am evege.
40026013	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Am huɗe á duniya baɗemme, baɗemme á tate na ni tá de ɓálá labare á higa átekwa na wá, tá de ndaha názena ni a maganaa mukse na keni, tá de viyanaaka.»
40026014	Daaci aŋkwa palle á pukura-aha kelaawa ju buwa, zhera-aara Yahuda Iskariyaud, a tsete duwa-aara á deza male-aha á liman-aha,
40026015	a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwá vite uwe yá magakuránmaga ya pute na ni á demda Yaisu am erva á kure?» Ta naba kezlanaa shuŋgu kul keƴe, cappe ta puwanem am erva.
40026016	A fantau á ba am sarte ŋanna Yahuda ge tataya faterem Yaisu am erva ge emnde na á ba an keski.
40026017	Am váha zuŋŋwire na tá za muŋri na ɓaaka shahi á makalá am huɗe-aara na, duwa á pukura-aha, ta de ndavanu ge Yaisu, a ba itare: «Ká kátá ŋá de tsatsaká ɗafa á Paska am tate-ara?»
40026018	A ŋute ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Dawmbare á dem mba á manya am huɗe á ekse, de bawanánba wá: a ba malum wá, hyephye sarte-aaruwa yá kátá za muŋri á Paska antara pukura-aha-aaruwa am mba á ŋa.»
40026019	Pukura-aha ta magaa názena a baternaa Yaisu na, daaci ta tsatsaa muŋri á Paska.
40026020	Am iga a maŋgaripu maa, Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara ta nja arge masane.
40026021	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare arge masane ŋanna wa: «Náwa yá ndaakur elva, yá ndaakur ba jirire: Watse á veliya ba palle á kure.»
40026022	Daaci, baɗemme á pukura-aha jáviya ba tá kyuwa, ta fantau ge ndavanu an palpale, ma ware keni ba: «Iya ka ndza Yaakadada?»
40026023	A ŋute ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Edda una ni erva á ŋere antara ŋane am tása na wá, watse á veliya ba ŋane.
40026024	Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, ɓaaka pekya-aara sey ba yá emtsa. Ate una ta puwete am wakita á Dadaamiya áte iya wá, ba estuwa. Amá watse zlaɗa jipu ge edda una ni á de veliyá ŋane, ambane ma yareka.»
40026025	Yahuda wá, á de velaná ba ŋane keni, a eksetaa elva, a ba ŋane: «Iya ka ndza Yaakadada?» A ŋwanante ge Yaisu: «Ba estuwa.»
