40026026	Am sarte na tá aŋkwa za masane maa, Yaisu a eksetaa ɗafa, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a kezlanve ɗafa na, daaci a vaterte ge pukura-aha-aara. «Nawmbare zawuze,» a ba ŋane, «una ŋanna vuwa-aaruwa.»
40026027	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a eksante feka, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a vaterte: «Shawushe», a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare.
40026028	«Aɗaba una ŋanna uzhe-aaruwa; a puvaa aɗaba emnde kwakya, geni emnde kwakya a sharánsha gabera á haypa-aha-aatare, Dadaamiya á ŋguɗaterá an una ŋanna namána ge emnde.
40026029	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Am sali kataliya na wá, yá dalika á shá yawe á egdza á náfa antara kure mázla-aara, sey watse mí de shá ba una aŋwaslire am zlanna á Edderwa.»
40026030	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta eksante lahe á gálá Dadaamiya, ba tse-aatare, ta zlala ádete ire á Wa Anyaranyara.
40026031	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «An vaƴiya vatena wá, baɗemme á kure na watse kwá ƴiyaaƴa. Aɗaba aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: Watse yá ejja suni, baɗemme á kyawe-aha am walda tá de kya.
40026032	Amá má watse tsanetse am faya wá, watse yá daada ba iya zuŋŋwe arge kure á dem Galili.»
40026033	A ŋwanante ge Piyer, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ma ƴarakaaƴa emnde umele keni, iya wá, yá ƴakaaka ɗekiɗeki.»
40026034	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu: «Yá ndak ba jirire, an vaƴiya ba vatena na, lauktu á kyuwa tsákálá, watse ká bánba ka ser keƴe geni diyakikire.»
40026035	A ba Piyer: «Yá ndaaka una ɗekiɗeki. Ma emtsa antara ka keni ba yá emtsa.» Baɗemme á pukura-aha umele keni ta ndahán ba estuwa.
40026036	Daaci daada Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara á dem tate na tá ɗahaná an Gaicaimane na. A ba ŋane á elvan ge pukura-aha: «Náwa njawinja áhuna, iya kwaye yá de maga maduwa áhuwa.»
40026037	A eksetaa tara Piyer, antara egdzara á Jaibaidaiyus buwa, ta duwa antara ŋane. Fantaufe wá, á tápá emtaŋkire, á tápá ba zlaɗa na ni an tsaka ire na am ervauŋɗe-aara.
40026038	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ɓaaka zlaɗa na ni yá tapánka na am ervauŋɗe-aaruwa, yá tápá zlaɗa á emtsa. Naba njawinja áhuna, pauka háre ɗekiɗeki, sheraumishera ice ba shagera.»
40026039	A zlalehe ƴiƴiye cekwaaŋguɗi an itare, a de kezlaa ugje am haha, wafke-aara ba teppe áte haha, a magaa maduwa. A ba ŋane am maduwa-aara: «Eddaye-aaruwa, máki á gevge wá, tasle á ŋa jinaaja zlaɗa na ba ƴiƴiye an ya. Amá wá, áte una yá wayaná ya ka, áte una ka wayetaa ka.»
40026040	Daaci ba tse-aara wá, a seza pukura-aha keƴe na, amá a se berater tá am háre. A ba ŋane á elvan ge Piyer: «Dzegwakuránka njá an ice ba saa palle keni degey?
40026041	Pauka háre! Magaumaga maduwa geni a badakuruka shaitaine. Ire á urimagwe wá, wayaawáya jipu mága fesaarfire, amá ɓaaka payɗa á vuwa.»
40026042	A daliye zlaɓe ádaliye ge buwire, a de magaa maduwa-aara, a ba ŋane: «Eddaye-aaruwa, mákini á taa jaaveka zlaɗa ŋanna áte ya na, sey ba yá shushe wá, a gevge ba namaari á ŋa.»
40026043	Eptsa-aara zlaɓe ádaliye á seza pukura-aha-aara, a se berater tá á ba am háre. Dzegwaránka ɓasha háre ɗekiɗeki.
40026044	A daliye zlaɓe ádaliye á dem tate á maduwa-aara, a de magaa ba kelaa maduwa-aara ŋanna ge keƴire.
40026045	Zlauzle wá, a eptsehe zlaɓe ádaliye á seza pukura-aha-aara na. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kure kwá pá ba háre á kure, kwá aŋkwa puwansepuwe shifa á kure ka? Ay degiya, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme, hyephye sarte-aaruwa. Kwaye tá de fime am erva ge emnde a haypa.
40026046	Tsawetse! Kwaye samsa edda una ni a veliyaa ŋane na, mí de yainuye.»
40026047	Ba elva ŋanna keni zlaɓe zlanaaka Yaisu wá, tá zhárá ba sesse Yahuda palle á pukura-aha kelaawa ju buwa. Emnde kwakya tá sá ɗaba Yahuda ŋanna, tá an katsákar-aha, antara zade-aha ceppe am erva. Ta ɓelateraa male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á Yahudiya-aha.
40026048	Yahuda na a veluwa ŋane Yaisu na maa, kwaratersekwara nalaama á ŋgyekwaterá Yaisu ge dikele á emnde ŋanna. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ba máki kwa niina yá aŋkwa gan use ge ura ni, seke aŋkwa urire á ŋere an edda-aara wá, edda una kwá tatayaná kure na ba ŋane, naba eksauváksa.»
40026049	Ba watsewatse wá, a duhe ge Yahuda ŋanna á deza Yaisu: «Use malum», a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane, daaci á gan use an ervauŋɗe-aara palle agire.
40026050	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «A gevge názena ka se maganaa ka na ura-aaruwa.» Daaci yálla á ba emnde na, erva am mbiye ge Yaisu, ta naba eksevaahe.
40026051	Ura palle am emnde á Yaisu, a naba teɗese masalam-aara ŋane keni, a wa sleslera á male á liman-aha, a icanaa hyema palle.
40026052	«Femfa masalám á ŋa am bere-aara», a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane. «Aɗaba emnde na tá teɗa masalam, itare keni watse tá keɗaterá á ba an masalám.
40026053	Diyaŋka ka yá dzegwándzegwa ɗaha Edderwa ge se meliyumele, ba seke ndáhámina ká zhárá ba malika-aha á wáva á tsaaka an debu kelaawa ju buwa emtu?
40026054	Amá watse á geva estara kena názena á ndaaná wakita á Dadaamiya na? Aɗaba áte una am wakita wá, sey á gevge ba estuwa.»
40026055	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge dikele á emnde ŋanna baɗemme: «Kwá se eksiyá an masalam-aha, antara zade-aha am erva na mu, ya neyle emtu? Ábi kelaazare yá njá á ba am mashidi, yá aŋkwa kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde, labára eksakurika?
40026056	Amá diyaweddiye geni baɗemme á mága ŋanna wá, ba geni a gevge elva-aha na ni ta ndahanaa nabi-aha aŋkwa am wakita á Dadaamiya na.» Daaci kyaakya zhagade ge pukura-aha baɗemme, ta naba ƴánhe.
40026057	Daaci emnde na ta eksevaa Yaisu na, ta dan ba suuwe á dem mba á Kayafas ŋane male á liman-aha. Mbate kerteŋ jarammeje malum-aha á tawraita, antara male-aha á ekse katakappe am mba á male ŋanna.
40026058	Piyer wá, a daa ɗaba Yaisu á dehuwa, amá wá, gaterápteka ɗekiɗeki. A de demhe á ba á dem riya-aara, a de njehe am dágave á emnde a ufa mashidi, ge zhara lámare ŋanna, ma watse á zla estara keni.
40026059	Male-aha á liman-aha antara emnde a kendekyiya na baɗemme farantaufe ge tataya ba ni ma a ndarsende emnde umele elva an dzála áte Yaisu, ma ba fida keni, lauktu ma tá bá ŋanaaŋa shairiya á emtsa.
40026060	Kwakya tsa emnde na ta de ɗatsanve fida ge Yaisu, amá ɓaaka názu ta eksanaa áte ŋane. Am iga-aara, saremsa emnde umele ta buwa wá,
40026061	a ba itare: «Zhel na degi a bantsa ŋane: Yá dzegwándzegwa mbeɗánaambeɗa mashidi á Dadaamiya ƴaikke na. Yá nderaalindere am hare keƴe, á bina.»
40026062	Hattse a tsete ge male á liman-aha na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu: «Ká ndaka elva ɗekiɗeki ka? Tá ndáhá uwe ŋane áte ka emnde na?»
40026063	Amá a ɗu ba we-aara Yaisu. Daaci a ba male á liman-aha na á elvan ge ŋane: «Yá ndavaku una an zhera á Dadaamiya edda á shifa, ndindaha ba jirire ba ka una ka Almasiihu, ka Egdza á Dadaamiya na emtu?»
40026064	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, «Ba estuwa,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane. «Amá wá, á katafke cekwaaŋguɗi watse kwá niina ya Ura á emnde baɗemme yá njá am naɗafa á Saksage na Slekse ba ŋane na, watse kwá niina zlaɓe adaliye, má watse yá sawa áte kumba á samaya.»
40026065	Daaci male á liman-aha na a naba dzadzanve zane áte vuwa-aara, a ba ŋane: «A ganve ire-aara kalle an Dadaamiya.» A ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Ɓaaka wedere á miya an seyde-aha mazla-aara. Ábi cenakuráncena an hyema á kure názena a ndahanaa ŋane.
40026066	Emtu estara á bá kure?», a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde a kendekyiya. A ba emnde: «Una ba haypa-aara, a njeka an shifa ɗekiɗeki.»
40026067	Daaci ta naba kyefanem nyaihe am ice, ta vavante ɗeɗekwa, emnde umele ta vavante babárva,
40026068	a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Almasiihu, diyeddiye mu a jakaa ware.»
40026069	Am sarte ŋanna wá, Piyer aŋkwa á njá am dagela am huɗe á riya á male á liman-aha. Daaci a sesehe ge kwatena á male á liman-aha maa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge Piyer: «Ka keni ka ura á Yaisu zhel emnde a Galili na.»
40026070	Amá eksarka Piyer ɗekiɗeki, a ba ŋane á elvan ge kwatena ŋanna á katafke á emnde baɗemme: «Ma ká ndaha elva á uwe keni diyanka ya ɗekiɗeki.»
40026071	A tsete ge ŋane aŋkwa á dete wakyiya, sesse kwatenaha umele daduwa á dezeŋára. Ba a puwete ice áte ŋane wá, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Degiya una keni ba ura á Yaisu zhel emnde a Nasarátu na!»
40026072	Piyer a naba kwaleve zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane: «Náwa waɗa-aaruwa máki diyandiya dawale ŋanna. Ba jirire diyanka dawale ŋanna.»
40026073	Cekwaaŋguɗi am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta gapte ge emnde na tá aŋkwa áhuwa á deza Piyer, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ba jirire ka keni ka ba palle-aatare, aɗaba á ba áte nara á ŋa keni diyarakdiya emnde, diyardiya tate na ka sawa átekwa na.»
40026074	Daaci Piyer a fantau ge za waɗa-aha, a ba ŋane: «Náwa Dadaamiya diyanka dawale ŋanna ɗekiɗeki.» Á ba am sarte ŋanna wá, tsáktsákwalikwaa, á ba tsákálá.
40026075	Daaci Piyer a naba yehete elva na ndza a bannaa Yaisu, a ba ŋane: Lauktu á kyuwa tsákálá wá, ká de bánba ka ser keƴe ge diyakikire na. Mazla-aara ba segáshe-aara, a de kyuwa á ba an yawe á kyuwa.
40027001	Weráwera ekse an eŋlya werre wá, baɗemme á male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á ekse njarantenja mazle-aara ganakini sey tá ejja shifa á Yaisu.
40027002	Ta naba puwete záwa áte ŋane, ta danán ge sleksu Pilaatu, ŋane slekse ƴaikke am kwara ŋanna, a fanaa ŋgumna a Rauma.
40027003	Yahuda na a velanaa ŋane Yaisu na nanna ganakini ŋguɗarŋguɗa Yaisu am shairiya maa, a deme am tuba, a naba sateraa shuŋgu-aatare kul keƴe na ndza ta vantaa áte Yaisu na ge male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á ekse.
40027004	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Yá an haypa ba iya, aɗaba ya velu ura cuɗeɗɗe geni tá ejja shifa-aara.» A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ázara lámbe á ŋere áte una ŋanna? Una á shá ba ka.»
40027005	Yahuda a naba puwateranve shuŋgu am mashidi ƴaikke, a de zleŋelaa ire-aara áte záwa.
40027006	Daaci male-aha á liman-aha ta halante suley na. Amá á bá itare: «An piya am tawraita ganakini mi puwante suley na ge suley á slera á Dadaamiya, aɗaba gane á shifa á ura.»
40027007	Daaci ta magaa sawari am dagave-aatare, geni tá shekwevshekwe fe á slendera gahe umele an ŋane, ge heɗa wayve-aha am huɗe-aara, ta naba shekweve.
40027008	Aɗaba una ŋanna, sem vatena tá ɗáhá fe ŋanna an fe á uzhe.
40027009	Daaci gevge názena ndza a ndahanaa nabi Yairaimiya, a ba ŋane: «Halarantehálá suley kul keƴe na egdzara á Iserayiila, ta ges gane-aara átekwa na,
40027010	daaci ta shekweve fe á slendera gahe an ŋane, ba seke una a binaa Yaakadada na.»
40027011	Tsarnaatse Yaisu á katafke á slekse ƴaikke, a ndavanuwa ŋane elva ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ba ka una ka slekse á Yahudiya-aha na emtu?» A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, «Ba estuwa», a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane.
40027012	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á larde, tá aŋkwa ɗatsanve elva wá, Yaisu a naba ɗu we-aara mazla-aara.
40027013	Daaci a ba slekse á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká cenánka elva na tá tsakaná áte ka na emtu? Labára ká ndaaka elva?»
40027014	Amá Yaisu a ɗu ba we-aara, kamákamá ndahaaka elva. Haa slekse a magaa najipu kwakya.
40027015	Ba kelaa má samsa muŋri á Paska wá, slekse aŋkwa á ɓelaterá daŋgay palle, edda una tá kataná itare na ge emnde a ekse.
40027016	Ay am sarte ŋanna maa, ndza aŋkwa slemandzawe umele am daŋgay, zhera-aara Yaisu Barabas.
40027017	Daaci á bá slekse á elvan ge jáháva: «Am dágave á tara Yaisu Barabas, antara Yaisu na tá ɗahaná an Almasiihu na mu, kwá kátá yá ɓelakurá ware?»
40027018	Diyaadiya tsa ganakini ta danaa Yaisu aɗaba ba shelha ɓaaka elva umele.
40027019	Am sarte na sleksu Pilaatu aŋkwa á kya shairiya á Yaisu na ma, mukse-aara a naba ɓelanvaa ura, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Maganánka ba uwe keni ge zhel ŋanna ɗekiɗeki, ɓaaka haypa-aara. Aɗaba vatena ya hare á ba am palasa á shene aɗaba ŋane.»
40027020	Amá a ba male-aha á liman-aha, antara male á ekse tá elvan ge jáháva: «Bawánba kure geni a ɓelarakurnaaɓela ba Barabas, a jareja Yaisu.»
40027021	Slekse a ndavateruhe zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwá kátá yá ɓelakurá ware am emnde buwa ŋanna?» Ta vante jawapa, á ba itare: «Ɓelaŋernaaɓela ba Barabas.»
40027022	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Yá maganá uwe ge Yaisu na tá ɗahaná an Almasiihu na?» Baɗemme-aatare ta ŋwanante, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Zleŋelezleŋela áte dzaŋgala!»
40027023	A ba sleksu Pilaatu á elvan ge itare: «A gu uwe estuwa?» Amá itare ta far hula á ba an ndzeɗa, a ba itare: «Zleŋelezleŋela áte dzaŋgala!»
40027024	Am nanna sleksu Pilaatu ɓaaka názu á maganá ŋane, emnde tá far ba hula maa, a kevaa yawe, a baraa erva-aara á katafke á emnde, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Shifa á zhel na kwá de jáná kure na, haypa-aara á shika ɗekiɗeki, á shá ba kure.»
40027025	Baɗemme á jáháva a ŋwanante, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Una á shakaaka, haypa á ja shifa á zhel na á ba am mbiye á ŋere antara egdzara á ŋere.»
40027026	Daaci sleksu Pilaatu a naba ɓelateraa Barabas, amá Yaisu wá, ta zu an ja, lauktu ta de zleŋelaná áte dzaŋgala.
40027027	Daaci ta naba danhe ge sawji-aha á sleksu Pilaatu Yaisu na á dem huɗe á há á slekse, ta de jamme ge sawji-aha baɗemme, tá á ba arge ŋane.
40027028	Ta naba tsekwanse am naŋgyuwe-aara, ta tsekwanme am dira haŋŋe.
40027029	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta nderse dake, ta faɗanse ire an ŋane ágire ɗaŋkaula, ta fanem zade am naɗafa-aara. Mazla-aara ta gyanu rume ágire tá epsawupsawa, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Aska á ŋa, slekse á Yahudiya-aha!»
40027030	Ta naba kyefanem nyaihe am ice. Ta lyevaa zade na am erva-aara, geni tá jáná an ŋane am ire.
40027031	Zlaruzle am maganaa palasa, ta tsekwanse am dira haŋŋe na, ta tsekwanme am náza-aara, lauktu ta dáná á dem tate na ta zleŋelanaa áte dzaŋgala.
40027032	Am sarte na daransede, ta de jaa ire antara ura Siraine umele zhera-aara Simaun, ta naba hyarhe ganakini á sepá dzaŋgala á Yaisu.
40027033	Daraada am tate ŋanna tá ɗaháná an Gaulgauta na, amaana: Tate á feka á ire maa,
40027034	ta de fanu mbazla ge Yaisu áhuwa. Mbazla ŋanna keni aŋkwa duksa ƴaiƴaihe am huɗe-aara. Amá ba a tapanaahe ge Yaisu mbazla na wá, a naba kwalve, shaaka ɗekiɗeki.
40027035	Daaci ta naba tsakwanse am kazlaŋa-aara, ta zleŋelehe áte dzaŋgala, ta tegaa kazlaŋa-aara am dagave-aatare. Ge tega kazlaŋa-aara na wá, ta maga njeri am dagave-aatare, ganakini a sesse edda una ni á zaná ŋane ma uwe keni.
40027036	Daaci ta njehe á ba áhuwa ŋanna ge ufufa-aara.
40027037	Ta puwete názena ta bantsa itare tá jáná aɗaba ŋane na áte naláwa, ta fetehe átire ge ŋane. Náwa názena ni ta puwetaa itare: «Ba ŋane una Yaisu, slekse á Yahudiya-aha.»
40027038	Tá aŋkwa neyle-aha buwa ta zleŋelater átirpalle antara Yaisu áte dzaŋgala-aha-aatare. Palle ta zleŋelanaa am naɗafa, palle keni am názlaɓa.
40027039	Emnde a degáshe am tate ŋanna tá geja ba ire, tá ámbera ezzlazle.
40027040	A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ábi ka bántsa ka ká naba mbeɗanaambeɗa mashidi ƴaikke na, á ba am hare keƴe ká nderendere umele á ba ka? Labara ká taa ŋezlanaaka ba ka ire á ŋa? Máki ka ba Egdza á Dadaamiya, tsekwanaatsekwa kwa ire á ŋa áte dzaŋgala na!»
40027041	Male-aha á liman-aha, antara malum-aha á tawraita, ira male-aha á ekse baɗemme ta fantau ge epsawa Yaisu. Ta bántsa itare wá:
40027042	«Iyau, á dzegwándzegwa ŋezla emnde umele, ire-aara wá, á taa ŋezlanaaka! Ábi ŋane slekse á Iserayiila-aha? A tsekwanaatsekwa kwa ire-aara áte dzaŋgala na? Máki tsekwaatsekwa wá, baɗemme mi fetarfe áte ŋane.
40027043	A bántsa ŋane a fetaare an Dadaamiya, ŋane Egdza á Dadaamiya, mi ezzhara kwa kina má watse á sawa Dadaamiya ŋanna á se melanumele!»
40027044	Neyle-aha buwa na ta zleŋelaterhe áte dzaŋgala antara Yaisu na, itare keni ta zlazlese Yaisu ba seke male-aha ŋanna.
40027045	Daaci a tsekwaa ge tabeɗammire an vacitire am huɗe á duniya baɗemme, dem lásar emnde ta á ba am tabeɗammire ŋanna.
40027046	Á maga saa keƴe wá, Yaisu a ketaa kwárá á ba an ndzeɗa: «Aili! Aili! Laima sabaktani?» Amaana wá: «Dadaamiya-aaruwa labára ƴakiyaaƴa? Dadaamiya-aaruwa labára ƴakiyaaƴa?»
40027047	Á bá emnde umele am emnde na tá aŋkwa á tsaatse áhuwa: «Zhel na degiya á ɗaha nabi Ailiya.»
40027048	Palle-aatare a teɗante zhagade, a de eksetaa sausau, a ŋguɗetaa áte zade, a femhe am mbazla umele ɗaŋɗaŋe ba estuwa, daaci a kante, a fante áte we ge Yaisu geni a shushe.
40027049	Amá a ba emnde umele-aatare: «Tsawaatse emtsaaɗe, mi ezzhara má watse á semsa Ailiya ŋanna á se melanumele.»
40027050	Yaisu a fu hula zlaɓe ádaliye, mazla-aara a naba zlu ge shifa-aara.
40027051	Am sarte ŋanna maa, aŋkwa kacekaca á dzegwa am mashidi ƴaikke wá, a naba tamme kalkale, a fantau á sawa átire sem áhá. Haha keni aŋkwa á gajava, palaha-aha tateptate ba ɓaley ɓaleye.
40027052	Irekhya-aha keni kerteŋ tá an wara, emnde á Dadaamiya na ndza matsarematsa na kwakya tsaretse am faya.
40027053	Emnde na ta tsetaa am faya ŋanna wá, am sarte na tsetsa Yaisu am faya na, daremda á dem berni cuɗeɗɗe, emnde kwakya naráterna.
40027054	Sawji-aha na a sáteraa ŋgumna a Rauma, antara male-aatare baɗemme tá aŋkwa ufa Yaisu na. Ba ta naa gejava á haha antara názena magaavemaga baɗemme na wá, dámdá lyawa am itare jipu. A ba itare: «Zhel na egdza á Dadaamiya ba jire.»
40027055	Tá aŋkwa ŋwasha keni kwakya am tate ŋanna. Ta tsaahe ƴiƴiye, ta zhara názena ni aŋkwa á magava na. Ŋwasha ŋanna kwaye ta saa á ɗaba Yaisu á sawa am kwara á Galili ge maganaa slera.
40027056	Tá aŋkwa tara Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, antara Maari emmetare ge tara Yakuba an Yusufa, ira emmarge egdzara á Jaibaidaiyus, am dagave á ŋwasha ŋanna.
40027057	Herzhe watse á belya vaciya wá, a naba semhe ge sleberba umele ura á ekse á Arimatiya zhera-aara Yusufa. Ŋane keni fetarfe áte Yaisu.
40027058	A duhe ge Yusufa ŋanna á deza sleksu Pilaatu, a de ndavanu baráma á eksa emtsa á Yaisu. Daaci a ba slekse a varanteva.
40027059	Duwa á Yusufa, a eksante emtsa na, a de faɗeme am kalpakane aŋwaslire tseɗaŋŋe, jeba á kalpakane ŋanna ba lefeɗɗe.
40027060	Daaci a de zlavanaahe am irekhya-aara halál na a yese am cacera, zlaɓe ba uŋŋule á zlauzle-aara ge yá irekhya ŋanna. Daaci a berhanu palame ƴaikke ge we á irekhya ŋanna, lauktu a zlala.
40027061	Amá tara Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, antara Maari umele na wá, itare zlalarka, ta naba njehe, wafke-aatare ba ndaŋŋe á deza irekhya na.
40027062	Makuralla-aara, amaana kwaskwe á puwansepuwe wá, ta naba tsetehe ge male-aha á liman-aha antara Farisa-aha ta deza sleksu Pilaatu.
40027063	A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ambarka á ŋa, yehaŋerteyeha názena a ndahanaa slefida ŋanna am sarte na zlaɓe an shifa. A bantsa ŋane, watse á tsetse am faya am hare-aara ge keƴire am evege.
40027064	Ambane ká ɓela emnde tá de ufa irekhya-aara am hare keƴe ŋanna. A de teɗarseka pukura-aha-aara, daaci watse tá baterán ge emnde geni tsetse am faya. Daaci fidire-aatare ŋanna á de jauje ge una werre.»
40027065	A ba edda á hákuma á elvan ge itare: «Kwaye sawji-aha ŋanna, dawmbare, de magaumága názena kwa dzegwanaa kure ge ufufa-aara.»
40027066	Daaci ba zlálá-aatare, ta de vanyaa we á irekhya ba shagera, ta fafete damshe á ŋgumna, ta ɓazlaa sawji-aha ge ufufa-aara.
40028001	Dedde kwaskwe á puwansepuwe, an eŋlya werre ge laade wá, daremda tara Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, antara Maari umele na ta de zhara irekhya na.
40028002	Ba watsewatse shekwaraaka ɗekiɗeki wá, baɗemme á haha á gyagya á ba an ndzeɗa, a tsekwaa ge malika á Yaakadada á sawa am samaya, a berhanvuwe palame na ge we á irekhya maa, a njetaa átekwa.
40028003	Malika na á mbá wulwulire ba seke kárá á ráde. Naŋgyuwe-aara dzayye telle jauje ba ge sluzhe keni.
40028004	Naranna emnde a ufa irekhya na wá, ba gyaagya keni tá gyagyeteka mazla-aara ge lyawa, garevge ba seke ɓaaka shifa am itare ɗekiɗeki.
40028005	Amá ŋwasha na wá, a ba malika ŋanna á elvan ge itare: «A wakurka lyawa ɗekiɗeki, aɗaba diyandiya kwa se tataya Yaisu na ta zleŋelaa áte dzaŋgala na.
40028006	Amá ŋane ɓaaka áhuna mazla-aara, tsetse am faya ba seke una ndza a enndaha na. Sawmbare nawanaana tate na ndza á zlava átekwa.
40028007	Kina wá, dawmbare ba watsewatse, de mbeɗawaterumbeɗe labare ge pukura-aha geni ɓaaka, tsetse. Baira watse á daada ba ŋane zuŋŋwe arge kure á dem Galili. Kwá de nanaana áhuwa. Una ya bakurnaa ba iya.»
40028008	Daaci ba zlálá-aatare ge ŋwasha na áte we á irekhya, ta zlálaa á ba á zhagade ge daterá labare na ge pukura-aha á Yaisu. Tá zlálá na wá, ervauŋɗe-aatare ba seke nama, an wesha an lyawa zlaɓe ádaliye.
40028009	Cekwaaŋguɗi wá, Yaisu a se yaiterwa á ba an ye ge ŋwasha na: «A vakurteva Dadaamiya hairire», á bá ŋane á elvan ge itare. Zhagade ge ŋwasha na ádezeŋara, ta kezlan ugje, ta ŋante sera, tá aŋkwa á eggala.
40028010	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «A wakurka lyawa ɗekiɗeki. De bawateranba ge egdzar mama-aha-aaruwa, a darduwa á dem Galili, tá de niina áhuwa.»
40028011	Zlaɓe tá á ba átira zlala emtsaaɗe ŋwasha na wá, sawji-aha á ufa irekhya na keni, emnde umele-aatare zlarzlala á dem huɗe á ekse, ta de mbeɗateru labare ge male-aha á liman-aha.
40028012	Male-aha á liman-aha ta magaa sawari am dagave-aatare antara male-aha á ekse maa, ta vaterte shuŋgu camballe ge sawji-aha na.
40028013	A ba itare ta elvan ge itare: «Bawanba geni tá se teɗesaa ba pukura-aha-aara an vaƴiya am sarte na ŋere ŋá am hare.
40028014	Ma a cenanaa ba edda á hákuma keni, diyaŋerdiya ŋere názena ni ŋá de ndahaná ŋere, ba názara keni á shakuraaka ɗekiɗeki.»
40028015	Daaci sawji-aha ta naba lyevaa shuŋgu na, ta maganaa áte una ni ta ndaaterndaa na. Ta naba hyanme fida ŋanna am dagave á Yahudiya-aha baɗemme, sem vatena ta tsaa á ba áte una itare.
40028016	Daaci zlarzlala pukura-aha kelaawa jemtekwe kereɗɗe á dem Galili, ta deba áte egdza wa na ndza a baternaa Yaisu na.
40028017	Ba ta puwete ice áte ŋane, ta kezlan ugje, tá aŋkwa á eggala. Amá emnde umele-aatare ta magaa shaige ganakini ŋane ka.
40028018	Samsa Yaisu á sezetare ba herezhzhe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Baɗemme á hákuma ta fimaa á ba am erva-aaruwa, ma am samaya, ma am duniya keni.
40028019	Daaci naba dawmbare ma á dem larde-ara keni baɗemme, ma emnde-ara keni gawatervege emnde-aaruwa, mágawateránmaga baptisma an zhera á Edderwa, an zhera á Egdza-aara, an zhera á Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe.
40028020	Kwarawatersekware maga fesarfire am názena ya fakuraara ya baɗemme. Diyaweddiye ganakini iya antara kure wá, yá aŋkwa antara kure ma vaatara keni, dem halavuwa á duniya.»
41001001	Náwa a fantuwa estuwa labare á higa, elva a Yaisu Almasiihu Egdza á Dadaamiya:
41001002	Aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á nabi Aisaya, a ba Dadaamiya: «Náwa yá ɓela sleɓela-aaruwa á katafke á ŋa, á tsatsakaná ŋane baráma.
41001003	Zlaɓe ádaliye a ba ŋane: Aŋkwa ura á ɓálá elva am kaamba, a ba edda-aara: Tsatsawanaatsatse uŋŋule ge Yaakadada, tsawanaatse baráma-aara a gevge ba ndeɗɗe.»
41001004	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a naba semhe ge Yuhanna slemaga baptisma á sem kaamba, ba seke una a ndaana nabi ŋanna, a fantau ge ɓalaterá waazu ge emnde, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Magaumága tuba, lyauvaalya baptisma, á ƴakuraarƴe Dadaamiya haypa-aha á kure.»
41001005	Daaci saresse emnde a Urusaliima ba kwakya, antara emnde na tá am kwárá á Yahudiya gergere baɗemme, ta seza Yuhanna ge cena waazu-aara, daaci ta naba sanse haypa-aha-aatare, ŋane keni maa, a magateraa baptisma am guwa á Urdun.
41001006	Naŋgyuwe na a tsekwanaa Yuhanna wá, ta hanaa am úgje á ezlegwame, ndza á ŋguɗa ba gwagwa. Náza za-aara keni maa, á za ba iwe, antara nama.
41001007	A baa ŋane am waazu-aara: «Aŋkwa á sawa ura am iga-aaruwa wá, edda-aara ŋanna an hakuma ba ŋane arge iya, ba ge saɗanse kimake am sera keni hyanefka ya ɗekiɗeki.
41001008	Iya, yá aŋkwa á magakurá baptisma an yawe, amá ŋane wá, á se magakurá baptisma an Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe.»
41001009	Á ba am hare-aha ŋanna maa, a naba semhe ge Yaisu á sa am Nasarátu am kwárá á Galili, Yuhanna a se baranve am guwa á Urdun.
41001010	Am sarte na sessa Yaisu am yawe, a naa wertehe ge samaya, aŋkwa á tsekwa Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe á setarge ŋane ba seke takala.
41001011	Cekwaaŋguɗi wá, tá cená ba ye á sawa am samaya ŋanna, a ba edda-aara á elvan ge ŋane: «Ba ekka una ka Egdza-aaruwa wayanak-wáyá jipu, baɗemme a higa-aaruwa á ba áte ka.»
41001012	Cekwaaŋguɗi am iga á una ŋanna wá, Sheɗekwe á Dadaamiya á naba daa Yaisu á dem kaamba.
41001013	Hare kul ufaɗe á njá á ba am dagave á dabba-aha am kaamba, a de badanaa Shaitaine am hare kul ufaɗe ŋanna. Ta magannaa ba malika-aha slera am kaamba ŋanna.
41001014	Ŋguɗarŋguɗa Yuhanna am daŋgay maa, am iga-aara daduwa Yaisu keni á dem kwárá á Galili, a de fantau ge ɓalaterá labáre á higa na ni a ɓelanaa Dadaamiya ge emnde.
41001015	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kina wá, hyefhye sarte na ni a tsanaa Dadaamiya, samsa sarte á nja am kwárá-aara, magaumága tuba, lyauvalya labáre á higa.»
41001016	A gapte ge Yaisu cekwaaŋguɗi a ɗába we á haye á Galili wá, a naa egdzar mama buwa, tara Simaun, tá an egdza emmeŋara Andere. Tá aŋkwa á puwa narre-aatare á dem yawe aɗaba itare ta emnde a sluwa kelfe.
41001017	Daaci a naba ɗaterɗáhá Yaisu: «Sawmbare ɗabawiɗába, yá gakurvege emnde a jaha emnde á sem sera-aaruwa, ba seke una ni má tá jahava kelfe-aha á dem narre na,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare.
41001018	Ba watsewatse, ta naba puwanve narre-aatare á ba áhuwa ŋanna, ta ɗába Yaisu.
41001019	Ta gapte ba cekwaaŋguɗi á de katafke wá, Yaisu a naa egdzara á Jaibaidaiyus, tara Yakuba tá an egdza emmeŋara Yuhanna tá am paare á yawe, tá aŋkwa á tsatsa narre-aatare.
41001020	Daaci a naba ɗaterɗáha Yaisu itare keni, ta naba ƴaa eddetare Jaibaidaiyus am paare áhuwa antara emnde a slera-aara, itare ta ɗába Yaisu.
41001021	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara ŋanna ta zlala á dem huɗe á Kafarnahum. Samsa kwaskwe á puwansepuwe a naba dem mashidi á Yahudiya-aha, a de kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya.
41001022	Itare ta mága ba najipu-aara, aɗaba ŋane kwaraterseka seke náza á malum-aha á tawraita, amá edda á elva ŋanna ba ŋane, á kwaraterse á ba an hákuma.
41001023	Vacite ŋanna maa, ndza aŋkwa ura an shaitaine am vuwa-aara am jáháva-aatare,
41001024	a naba fu hula zhel ŋanna, a ba ŋane a elvan ge Yaisu am hula-aara: «Ekka Yaisu ura Nasarátu na mu, ká kátá uwe ka ázeŋere? Niya á ŋa ka se keɗaŋerkeɗa emtu? Iya diyanakdiya ganakini ka Ura Cuɗeɗɗe na ɓelakaa Dadaamiya na.»
41001025	Yaisu a naba valarhe ge shaitaine ŋanna, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ɗuɗe we á ŋa, sesse am zhel na ba kina!»
41001026	Daaci a naba slakalapte ge shaitaine am zhel na, a fu hula an ndzeɗa-aara baɗemme, a sesehe am ŋane.
41001027	Baɗemme á emnde tá maga ba najipu-aara. A ba itare am dágave-aatare: «Ázara kena jeba una? Ba vaci palle keni cenaŋeránka jeba á tsaha na, naŋeránka keni jeba á hákuma na ni, ura ba a ndanse elva ge shaitaine am ura ni, a naba sesehe!»
41001028	Kerteŋ hyaranmehye labare á Yaisu am kwárá á Galili baɗemme.
41001029	Ba segashe-aatare am mashidi wá, Yaisu a ɗaba tara Simaun antara Andere á dem mba-aatare, ta ɗabaterɗába tara Yakuba antara Yuhanna keni á dehuwa.
41001030	Duwa-aatare maa, ta de beraa shawle á Piyer mukse, á ba á zlava, á wáná zlagzlagi. Daaci ba demda á Yaisu, ta naba mbeɗanuhe.
41001031	A duhe ge Yaisu á dezeŋara, a de ŋanaa ba erva, a tsantehe, a naba mbehe, a fantau ge magateraa kashi.
41001032	Eblyabelya vaciya, herzha máŋgaripu maa, emnde ta saa emnde-aha-aatare na lapika vuwa-aatare, antara emnde na tá an shaitaine na baɗemme áseza Yaisu.
41001033	Baɗemme á emnde a huɗe á ekse saresse, ta se jamme áte we á wakyiya ŋanna.
41001034	Yaisu a mbateraahe emnde kwakya am lapikere-aha-aatare gergere, a ŋgyanse shaitaine-aha kwakya am emnde. Vaterteka baráma ɗekiɗeki ge shaitaine-aha ŋanna ge ndaase elva, aɗaba itare diyardiya Yaisu ma ware ŋane keni.
41001035	Mákurálla-aara wá, a sesehe ge Yaisu á ba an ireŋlya, a zlalehe á dem kaamba ƴiƴiye an ekse ba shagera, a de maga maduwa áhuwa.
41001036	Daaci ta naba ɗabemhe ge tara Simaun antara emnde na ni tá ba kerɗe, ta de tataya tate na átekwa.
41001037	De sharánsha maa, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Degiya emnde baɗemme tá aŋkwa á tatayaktátaya jipu!»
41001038	Amá a ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Mi zlálawa á miya á dem ekse-aha na herherzhe, yá de magaterá waazu ge emnde a ekse-aha ŋanna keni, aɗaba a siyaa ba una ŋanna.»
41001039	Mázla-aara ba zlálá-aatare, ta fantau ge já ɗaba am kwárá á Galili baɗemme, aŋkwa á magaterá waazu ge Yahudiya-aha am mashidi-aha-aatare, aŋkwa á ŋgya shaitaine-aha keni am vuwa á emnde.
41001040	A semhe ge slederve umele, a se kezlaa ugje á katafke-aara, a fantau ge ŋala ázeŋara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Má wayak-waya wá, ká dzegwándzegwa givege ba meteɗɗe vuwa-aaruwa.»
41001041	Daaci Yaisu a naba zanvaarhe, a pelse erva-aara, a de fete áte ŋane, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Wayanwáyá ká mbembe, ba meteɗɗe vuwa á ŋa.»
41001042	Ba seke ndaha á miya na, a naba mbehe ge slederve ŋanna meteɗɗe.
41001043	Amá lauktu á ɓelanaaɓela wá, a teɗanánte hyema ba shagera,
41001044	a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ɓalananseka ma ge ware keni ɗekiɗeki. Názena ká de maganaaka wá, de maranánmárá ire á ŋa ge liman, vanteva sadake á ŋa ge Dadaamiya áte una a ndanaa Muusa ge seydire á ŋa á katafke á emnde baɗemme ganakini mbakmbe.»
41001045	Amá ŋane, ba zlala-aara wá, a de ɓalse labare ŋanna áza emnde baɗemme. Aɗaba una ŋanna Yaisu dzegwánka marse ire-aara áza emnde mazla-aara, sey á njá á ba am kaamba ƴiƴiye an ekse, tá duwa ba emnde ádezeŋara, á sawa am tate-aha gergere.
41002001	Haraahare cekwaaŋguɗi wá, a naba eptsehe ge Yaisu, á sem huɗe á Kafarnahum, cenarancena emnde ganakini saasa, aŋkwa am mba.
41002002	Daaci kwakya nalga a se jamme am huɗe á ha ŋanna, sete we á wakyiya keni ɓaaka sleɗe ɗekiɗeki ge kwakyire á emnde. Daaci Yaisu a fantau ge ndater elva á Dadaamiya.
41002003	Á ba am sarte ŋanna maa, ta semhe ge emnde umele, ta sanaa ura an matsa uɓiya-aara, ta saa sepanaa emnde ufaɗe am dagave-aatare.
41002004	Amá dzegwaránka dáná á de katafke á Yaisu aɗaba kwakyire á nalga. Daaci ta naba ɗalte áte ire á dzuguru, ta naba weraa ire á dzuguru ŋanna am ndaŋŋire á tate na ni átekwa Yaisu, ta velem zhel na antara egdera-aara baɗemme.
41002005	Nánna Yaisu fetarfire á emnde ŋanna maa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge edda una lapika na: «An bárá haypa-aha á ŋa baɗemme egdza-aaruwa.»
41002006	Áy, tá aŋkwa malum-aha á tawraita umele á njanja am tate ŋanna. Malum-aha ŋanna ta fantau ge dzamanaa am ervauŋɗe-aatare, a ba itare:
41002007	«Kwaye zhel na aŋkwa á lyiya sleɗe á Dadaamiya. Ware edda una á dzegwándzegwa ƴanár haypa ge ura máki Dadaamiya ka palle?»
41002008	Kerteŋ a naba diyeddiya Yaisu názena tá aŋkwa á dzamaná itare, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Labára kwa dzamete una am ervauŋɗe á kure?
41002009	Ázara una tsaftsafe jauje ge banán ge edda una lapika vuwa-aara: An bárá haypa-aha á ŋa, bi baná: Tsettse, eksanteksa egdera á ŋa, ezzlala an sera á ŋa?
41002010	Iya wá, yá kátá kwá diyeddiye geni iya Ura á emnde baɗemme yá an hákuma ge ƴateraare haypa ge emnde am duniya na.» Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge edda una an matsa uɓiya-aara na:
41002011	«Ya ndaa ba ekka, tsettse, eksanteksa egdera á ŋa, ezzlala á da.»
41002012	Kerteŋ tsettse zhele na á katafke-aatare baɗemme, a eksante egdera-aara, a naba zlálá. Baɗemmire-aatare tá maga ba najipu-aara, a ba itare: «Ba ser palle keni ndza naŋeránka jeba á una ɗekiɗeki.» Daaci ta fantau ge gala Dadaamiya.
41002013	Yaisu a naba eptsa ádaliye ádete we á haye á Galili. Kwakya nalga ta duhe ádezeŋara, daaci a fantau ge ndater elva á Dadaamiya.
41002014	Am iga á tsetse-aara áhuwa, a naa egdza á Halfa á njá am bere á hadáma, zhera-aara Laiwi, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Tsettse, sawa, ɗabiɗába.» A naba tsa Laiwi, a ɗába Yaisu.
41002015	Am iga-aara maa, tara Yaisu tá aŋkwa za ɗafa antara pukura-aha-aara am mba á Laiwi ŋanna, ta naba záná átirpalle antara emnde a jaha hadáma ira emnde a haypa umele, aɗaba kwakya jeba á emnde ŋanna ta daa ɗaba Yaisu.
41002016	Tá aŋkwa Farisa-aha umele, ta malum-aha á tawraita, ta naa Yaisu aŋkwa za ɗafa antara emnde a jaha hadáma ira emnde a maga haypa gergere. A ba itare tá elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Labára á za ɗafa antara jeba á emnde ŋanna?»
41002017	De cenatercena Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Emnde na lapiya vuwa-aatare wá, ɓaaka wedere-aatare áza dauktar, sey ba emnde na lapika vuwa-aatare una tá deza dauktar. Daaci ba duksa palle ge iya keni. Sanka ya á se tataya emnde na tá am jirire, ya se tataya ba emnde a haypa.»
41002018	Vacite umele maa, pukura-aha á Yuhanna antara Farisa-aha tá aŋkwa tsufá ndera, amá pukura-aha á Yaisu tsufarka. Daaci ta naba duhe ge emnde umele, ta ndavanu ge Yaisu, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Labára pukura-aha á ŋa tá ekseka ndera?»
41002019	Daaci a ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Emnde na tá ɗahaterá á sem larusa keni, kwa kurken tá dzegwándzegwa tsufa ndera emtu, am sarte na tá áza zhele á larusa? Am sarte na ni aŋkwa zhele á larusa am dagave-aatare wá, tá dzegwánka tsufa ndera ɗekiɗeki.
41002020	Amá aŋkwa á sawa sarte umele wá, watse tá pakyava antara zhele á larusa. Am sarte ŋanna wá, itare keni, watse tá tsufá ndera.
41002021	«Ɓaaka ura a venya emgyegwe a naŋgyuwe an baukta áŋwaslire, aɗaba máki á venyaná an una áŋwaslire, una áŋwaslire na á teɗa emgyegwe a naŋgyuwe na, daaci á farfe te-aara.
41002022	«Zlaɓe ádaliye, tá puweka mbazla áŋwaslire á dem emgyegwe a kanyakanya-aha. Aɗaba máki tsetse mbazla, á tatanvetate kanyakanya-aha na. Daaci á puwa mbazla á dem haha, kanyakanya keni badzafbadze. Daaci máki mbazla áŋwaslire wá, sey tá puwaná á dem kanyakanya-aha na áŋwaslire.»
41002023	Vacite umele an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe, a degashe Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara praatte am dágave á fe-aha á hiya maa, pukura-aha-aara ta naba fantau ge kázla ire á hiya na.
41002024	A ba Farisa-aha tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Labára pukura-aha á ŋa tá maga duksa na an piya vaci puwansepuwe?»
41002025	A naba ŋwaterantehe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ekkure ndaakurseka názu ndza a maganaa Dawuda am sarte na irice-aara antara emnde-aara baɗemme ŋateraaŋa waya, tá an wedere á náza za ba jipu na emtu?
41002026	Duwa-aatare á dem mashidi wá, Dawuda ŋanna a naba eksante tapiske na ta fan ge slera á Dadaamiya na, ta naba zuhe antara emnde-aara. Amá shairiya á Dadaamiya wá, a vaterte barama ba ge liman-aha palle za tapiske ŋanna. A mágava una ŋanna am zamane á Abiyatar ŋane male á liman-aha.»
41002027	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Á maganá ba kwaskwe á puwansepuwe nampire ge urimagwe. Urimagweka una á maganá nampire ge kwaskwe á puwansepuwe.
41002028	Daaci ba Ura á emnde baɗemme una edda á vaci puwansepuwe.»
41003001	Vacite umele maa, Yaisu a daliye zlaɓe ádaliye á dem mashidi, a de bera ura an emtsa erva-aara vacite ŋanna.
41003002	Am mashidi ŋanna maa, tá aŋkwa emnde na tá tsagwaɗa ba Yaisu, ta fantau ge zhárá Yaisu an eŋkale-aatare baɗemme, má watse á mbanaambe ura an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe, lauktu ma tá puwar elva aɗaba una ŋanna.
41003003	Amá Yaisu a naba banán ge zhele na an emtsa erva-aara na: «Naba tsettse, tsaatse á katafke á emnde baɗemme.»
41003004	Daaci a naba ndavateru ge emnde baɗemme, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A vamite baráma á mága uwe tawraita an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe? Mága maggwire emtu, mandzawire he? Lya ura emtu, keɗa ura he?» Ta naba heɗu we-aatare ŋwarka.
41003005	Jaaja ervauŋɗe á Yaisu, a zharateraahe, degdegire á ire á emnde ŋanna wantewa jipu. Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge zhele na: «Pelansepele erva á ŋa.» A naba pelanse, erva-aara gevge ba laŋŋe ba seke erva-aara werre.
41003006	Mazla-aara ba zlálá á degashe ge Farisa-aha, ta de magaa sawari-aatare antara emnde á Hirudus, geni tá maganá estara, lauktu tá keɗanaakeɗa shifa á Yaisu.
41003007	Daaci ba zlálá ge Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara á dete we á haye á Galili. Kwakya nalga na ta ɗabanaa ádehuwa. Emnde ŋanna ta segashe am kwara á Galili, emnde umele ta sawa á sa am huɗe á Urusaliima,
41003008	antara am kwara á Yahudiya baɗemme, antara á sa am kwara á Idumaya, antara á sa á katafke á guwa á Urdun, ira á sa am kwara á Tirus antara Sidaun. Emnde ŋanna baɗemme ta se á ba áza Yaisu aɗaba cenaráncena labare-aara.
41003009	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara, tatayauwivaatataya egdza paare á yawe, geni a ɓecariteka emnde.
41003010	Aɗaba ŋane slemba emnde, daaci emnde na lapika vuwa-aatare na kwakya ta berdavuwa ásezeŋara, geni tá fetefa erva-aatare áte ŋane.
41003011	Emnde na tá an shaitaine, ba ta puwete ice-aatare áte ŋane maa, reppe ta naba mbeɗa am sera-aara, ta ámbera hula, a ba itare am hula-aatare: «Ba ekka una ka Egdza á Dadaamiya.»
41003012	Amá a naba valaterarhe ge Yaisu á ba an ndzeɗa geni a ndaharka elva áte ŋane ɗekiɗeki, ma ware ŋane keni.
41003013	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a ɗetaa emnde na a wayateraa ŋane, ta ɗála emnde ŋanna antara ŋane áte egdza wa.
41003014	Ate wa ŋanna maa, a de dzerese emnde kelaawa ju buwa am itare, a ɗaateraa an emnde a ɓela. A dzeraterse ganakini tá nja antara ŋane ba kelaazare, á ɓelaterá á de ɓalaterá labare á higa ge emnde.
41003015	Daaci a vaterte hákuma á ŋgya jini-aha am ura.
41003016	Náwa zhera-aha á emnde a ɓela ŋanna: Simaun ŋane una Yaisu a fante zhera á Piyer,
41003017	tara Yakuba tá an egdza emmeŋara Yuhanna itare ta egdzara á Jaibaidaiyus, Yaisu a faterte zhera á Bauwanairgais, amaana: hula á samaya, aɗaba itare ta emnde a ica ervauŋɗe watsewatse;
41003018	Andere, Filip, Bartaulauma, Mata, Taumas, Yakuba á Halfa, Tadawus, Simaun na wayaaka tá kwaráterá emnde umele na,
41003019	ira Yahuda Iskariyaut edda una a velu Yaisu áza kelaade-aha-aara na.
41003020	Saasa Yaisu maa, se jarammejahe emnde zlaɓe ádaliye, ba sarte á zu duksa keni sharánka tara Yaisu an pukura-aha-aara.
41003021	Am sarte na cenaráncena emnde a há-aatare, a ba itare: «Una wá, hairireka mazla-aara.» Daaci ta naba duhe geni tá teɗeseteɗe am dagave-aatare.
41003022	Tá aŋkwa malum-aha á tawraita am emnde ŋanna ta sawa á sa am huɗe á Urusaliima, ta bantsa itare: «Aŋkwa Bailjaibul slekse á shaitaine-aha am ŋane.» Emnde umele keni ta ndahán ba estuwa, a ba itare: «A vantaa ba slekse á shaitaine-aha ŋanna hákuma ge ŋgyesaa shaitaine am ura na.»
41003023	Daaci Yaisu a ɗaterte baɗemme á dezeŋara, a vaterte elva an naraje, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Á sáwá estara ni Shaitaine á báká ire-aara na?
41003024	Am kwárá á slekse palle, máki emnde tegarsetege gergere buwa wá, á zlaleka hákuma mazla-aara.
41003025	Zlaɓe ádaliye, am huɗe á há palle, máki tegarsetege emnde gergere buwa, huɗe á há ŋanna á zlaleka mazla-aara.
41003026	Ba duksa palle ge Shaitaine keni. Má gevge ni Shaitaine a teganse ire-aara buwa am kwárá-aara wá, hákuma-aara á duka á de katafke, ma vaatara keni á zle.»
41003027	Yaisu aŋkwa á sla Shaitaine an slendzeɗa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ɓaaka ura á dzegwándzegwa zá há á slendzeɗa, máki eksevaaka emtsaaɗe slendzeɗa a puwanse erva ákataliya, lauktu ŋane á zá há-aara baɗemme.
41003028	«Diyaweddiye una ba shagera: Baɗemme á haypa-aha na tá maganá emnde, antara elva a mándzawe na tá valyaná itare áte Dadaamiya na, á ƴateraareƴa Dadaamiya baɗemme.
41003029	Amá edda una ni a ndaase elva a mándzawe áte Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe wá, ɓaaka ƴanarƴe ge ŋane ɗekiɗeki. Aɗaba haypa-aara ŋanna náza ba ge ɗekiɗeki.»
41003030	A bateraa una Yaisu na wá, aɗaba ta bantsa emnde umele-aatare: An shaitaine.
41003031	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, ta semhe ge tara emmeŋara, antara egdzar mama-aha á ŋara, ta tsaahe á ba ágashe, ta ɓelaa ura, ta de ɗante.
41003032	Am sarte ŋanna kwakya emnde ázeŋara, amá ta naba ndahanhe, a ba itare: «Tá aŋkwa á ndaváká tara emmeŋa, antara egdzar mama-aha-ŋa ágashe.»
41003033	A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ware ŋane emmerwa ge iya? Emnde-ara itare egdzar mama-aha-aaruwa ge iya?»
41003034	Daaci a zharaa emnde na tá ázeŋara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde baɗemme: «Náwa tara emmerwa antara egdzar mama-aha-aaruwa tá áhuna.
41003035	Ma ware una á maga názu á kataná Dadaamiya, egdza emmerwa ba ŋane, emmerwa ba ŋane.»
41004001	Yaisu a daliye zlaɓe á de kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde áte we á haye á Galili. Kwakya nalga á emnde a jemaa á katafke-aara. Aɗaba una ŋanna, a njema am paare, ŋane áte ire á haye; emnde wá, baɗemme tá á ba am haha áte we á haye ŋanna.
41004002	A kwaraterse duksa kwakya an naraje-aha, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
41004003	«Cenawancena, náwa yá bakurá elva: Sesse zhele umele ge de puwa nalkame am fe-aara.
41004004	Am sarte na aŋkwa á puwa nalkame ŋanna, wulfe-aha umele a de valyaa áte uŋŋule, ta se tsakantehe ge ƴiye-aha.
41004005	Wulfe-aha umele, a de valyaa áte cacera, cekwa haha, a naba sese á ba áte watsewatsire aɗaba cekwa haha.
41004006	Amá de sesse vaciya an kárá-aara wá, deraadera aɗaba ɓaaka slalwe ŋgelama.
41004007	Wulfe-aha umele zlaɓe ádaliye, a valyemaa am dake, a waltaa am dake, a ɓecante ge dake, magaaka ire.
41004008	Amá wulfe-aha umele wá, a puwaa á ba am haha shagera, a sesehe ba shagera, a waltaa an uŋŋule-aara, a magaa ire. Ekte-aha umele, ta yayaa egdzara kul keƴe kul keƴe, ekte-aha umele ta yayaa kul uŋkwahe kul uŋkwahe, ekte-aha umele zlaɓe ádaliye ta yayaa deremke deremke.»
41004009	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Edda una máki aŋkwa hyema-aara, a cenevaacena!»
41004010	Am sarte na ɓaaka dikele á emnde ázeŋara, ta juwa ba emnde umele-aatare antara pukura-aha kelaawa ju buwa, ta naba ndavanu maana á naraje-aha-aara.
41004011	A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane: «Kure wá, vararakurteva baráma geni kwá diyeddiye nasherire na am kwara á Dadaamiya, amá emnde umele wá, ma yá ndaterndáhá keni sey á ba an naraje.
41004012	Estuwa, ma tá aŋkwa á zharaná á ba an ice-aatare keni, tá diseka ɗekiɗeki; ma tá aŋkwa á cenaná á ba an hyema-aatare keni, tá ceneseka ɗekiɗeki. Aɗaba itare, ɓaaka wedere-aatare an ɗaba Dadaamiya. Ayka wá, ma andze á naba ƴateraarƴe Dadaamiya!»
41004013	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kina cenakuránka naraje na? Máki cenakuránka una, kwá de cenaná estara kena naraje-aha umele na?
41004014	Náwa maana á naraje ŋanna. Slepuwa wulfe ŋanna wá, á puwa ba elva á Dadaamiya.
41004015	Emnde umele, itare ta ba seke uŋŋule. Tá cenvaacena elva á Dadaamiya, amá kerteŋ á sawa shaitaine, á tsakse elva ŋanna am itare.
41004016	Emnde umele itare ta ba seke cacera. Má cenaráncena elva á Dadaamiya, kerteŋ tá lyiyaná á ba an higa.
41004017	Amá tá vanteka sleɗe ge elva á Dadaamiya ŋanna am itare. Daaci má jerje lámare umele bi zlaɗa aɗaba elva ŋanna wá, tá ƴá fetarfire-aatare ba watsewatse.
41004018	Emnde umele zlaɓe ádaliye, itare ta ba seke dake. Tá lyevalya tsa elva á Dadaamiya,
41004019	amá wá, á dem dagave á dzama á ire an kazlaŋa á duniya, antara waya á nalmane kwakya, ira waya á duksa-aha umele gergere am duniya na. Á ɓecanta ba una ŋanna elva á Dadaamiya na am itare, á maŋka nampire ɗekiɗeki.
41004020	Amá emnde umele wá, itare ta ba seke haha na sleɗe shagera na. Tá cenevaacena elva á Dadaamiya, tá lyiyaná an ervauŋɗe-aatare palle, elva ŋanna á maga nampire am itare. Emnde umele aŋkwa nampire-aatare cekwa, emnde umele nampire-aatare deydey, amá emnde umele wá, kwakya nampire-aatare.»
41004021	Yaisu a farhe zlaɓe ádaliye ge tsakaterá elva, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ware edda una máki a mbante kárá á fanus, á fáná am ekte á egdera, bi á uŋmbar tasa? Ɓaaka ɗekiɗeki, sey tá zleŋelaná á ba áte tate-aara.
41004022	Daaci diyaweddiye ganakini baɗemme á názena an sheɓe kina, watse á sesse ásegashe. Baɗemme á názena nasherire kina, watse tá diyeddiya emnde baɗemme.
41004023	Edda una, máki aŋkwa hyema-aara, a cenevaacena.»
41004024	Zlaɓe ádaliye a ba ŋane, á elvan ge itare: «Faufa hyema am názena kwá cenaná kure baɗemme na. Aɗaba baɗemme á názena kwá magaterná kure ge emnde na wá, Dadaamiya keni á de magakurná á ba áte una ŋanna ge kure keni. Baira á de januje ŋane am una kure kwá magaterán ge emnde.
41004025	Edda una máki aŋkwa ázeŋara na wá, watse tá de fanaarfe zlaɓe adaliye ge ŋane. Amá edda una an erva dey wá, ba egdza una ázeŋara na keni, tá de lyanvulye.»
41004026	Yaisu a farhe zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Náwa názu á gáráva an názena á magava am kwara á Dadaamiya: Duwa á ura umele, a puwaa wulfe am fe-aara.
41004027	Daaci ŋane á pá ba hare-aara, á kezla ba hare á bere, amá wulfe ámbera á ba segashe, aŋkwa á wala, ɓaaka názu a disaa ŋane am huɗe-aara ɗekiɗeki.
41004028	Baɗemme, á maganá ba haha slera. A sanse wulfe, a walante, a magaa ire, haa a nanve.
41004029	Má welasewele, edda fe a duwa á ba an náza wa masa-aara, a de icica, aɗaba hyephye sarte.»
41004030	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Mí slaterá an uwe kwara á Dadaamiya? Mí shateru an naraje-ara ge emnde?
41004031	Kwara á Dadaamiya wá, á gáráva an wulfe á pilli. Ŋane wá, cekwa ba ŋane am wulfe-aha baɗemme.
41004032	Amá má jaremje am haha, sesse wá, á wala jipu, haa á jauje ba ge duksa-aha umele an wala, á vala erva, ƴiye-aha tá njá am sheɗekwe-aara, tá maga bere-aatare keni átekwa.»
41004033	Yaisu a kwaraterse estuwa elva ge emnde an naraje-aha áte una tá cenáncena.
41004034	Baɗemme á elva-aara a kwaraterse á ba an naraje. Amá ge pukura-aha-aara, am sarte na ɓaaka emnde ázetare wá, a palateraa sera-aara baɗemme.
41004035	Ba vacite ŋanna herzha maŋgaripu wá, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Ebzaumibze haye ádehuwa-aara.»
41004036	Daaci ba tse-aatare, ta ƴaa emnde am tate ŋanna. Pukura-aha ta daa Yaisu am paare na a njemaa ŋane am huɗe-aara, amá paare-aha umele keni ndza aŋkwa áhuwa.
41004037	Cekwaaŋguɗi wá, a naba tsete ge válale ƴaikke átire á haye ŋanna, a maganaa ŋane vádza á haye á ba an ndzeɗa haa a nante paare an yawe.
41004038	Yaisu ŋane á zlava áte kataliya á paare, a ɓelete ire-aara áte náza ɓela ire, á pá ba hare-aara. Duwa á pukura-aha-aara, ta tsante am hare na, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, mí keɗa ni ɓaaka lambe á ŋa?»
41004039	Ba tsetse-aara, a naba valarhe ge válale na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge haye: «Tsaatse ba tseriyye.» Daaci a naba tsahe ge válale, tseriyye sleɗe ba seke ndza magaaveka duksa.
41004040	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Labára kwá maga lyawa estuwa? Ɓaaka fetarfire á kure áte ya emtu?»
41004041	Daaci jaterja lyawa jipu, a ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Ware kena ŋane una ni dete ba effeƴa antara haye keni tá fansarfe na?»
41005001	Am sarte na icaransice haye ŋanna maa, daraada áte iga a guwa ŋanna. Tate ŋanna wá, am kwara á Gairasaine-aha.
41005002	Ba a tsekwese ge Yaisu am paare wá, a naba sesehe ge zhele umele am dagave á irekhya-aha, a se yainu á ba an ye ge Yaisu.
41005003	Zhele ŋanna wá, an jini am ire, á njá á ba am dagave á irekhya-aha. Ɓaaka ura á dzegwándzegwa tákwasa ŋane, ma an tsavaytsavaye keni.
41005004	Aɗaba ser kwakya tá puwante sasala áte sera, tá tákwasaná erva an tsavaytsavaye, amá a ɓataahe baɗemme. Ɓaaka ura á dzegwándzegwa ŋá zhel ŋanna ɗekiɗeki.
41005005	Vaƴi vacika á já á ba ɗába am dagave á irekhya-aha antara áte ire á wa-aha, ámbera á hula, á tata vuwa-aara an nákwa.
41005006	Am sarte na ni a naa Yaisu, a se yainuye na wá, a sawa á ba an zhagade, kreppe a se mbeɗehe am sera-aara,
41005007	a fu hula an ndzeɗa-aara baɗemme, a ba ŋane am hula-aara á elvan ge Yaisu: «Ekka Yaisu Egdza á Dadaamiya Slekse, ázara am dagave á miya? Yá ndaaka aɗaba Dadaamiya, tasle á ŋa, fiyemka am zlaɗa!»
41005008	A ndanaa aɗaba uwe una ŋanna, aɗaba a ndaase elva-aara Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Ekka shaitaine, sesse am zhel na!»
41005009	Daaci Yaisu a ndavanu zhera-aara ge zhele ŋanna, a ŋwanante, a ba ŋane: «Zhera-aaruwa wá, Dikele á Emnde, aɗaba ŋa vayye.»
41005010	Zhele ŋanna a fantau ge kyuwanfe ge Yaisu geni a ƴaterƴa jini-aha ŋanna, a njarinja á ba am kwara ŋanna.
41005011	Am tate ŋanna maa, ndza aŋkwa walda á nabezhe ƴaikke, tá piyá áte egdza wa maa,
41005012	jini-aha ŋanna ta fantau ge ŋala Yaisu, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Tasla á ŋa, vaŋerteva ka baráma, ŋá de njá am nabezhe-aha na.»
41005013	Yaisu a naba vaterte baráma ŋanna. Mazla-aara ta naba sesehe ge jini-aha am zhel na, ta dem nabezhe-aha ŋanna. Nabezhe-aha ŋanna á maga debu buwa, amá ta naba zlerdaa zhagade a sate egdza wa ŋanna, ta puwamme am haye, a ndateruhe ge haye baɗemme.
41005014	Daaci zhagade ge suni-aha á nabezhe ŋanna, ta dateraa labáre ge emnde a makwata antara emnde a huɗe á ekse baɗemme. Daaci estuwa nalga tá kelá á dem tate ŋanna ge de zhárá názena magaavmage.
41005015	Daraada áza Yaisu, tá zhárá ba zhel na ndza an jini-aha am ŋane na á njá, an eŋkale-aara ba laŋŋe, a tsekweme am naŋgyuwe ba seke emnde. Amá itare, baɗemme ta fantau ge mága lyawa.
41005016	Daaci emnde na ni ta naana á ba an ice-aatare mága ŋanna baɗemme na, ta fantau ge tsakaterse sera-aara baɗemme, geni a shanaa estara ire-aara zhel ŋanna, antara keɗa á nabezhe-aha na.
41005017	Amá itare, ta ŋala Yaisu geni a dedde am larde-aatare ba ɗekiɗeki.
41005018	Estuwa Yaisu a naba ɗalme am paare á yawe, amá zhele na shansha ire-aara na a ndavanu ge Yaisu, geni ŋane keni a eɗɗaba.
41005019	Amá eksarka Yaisu. A ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Eptseptsa á dem mba á kure, de vaterteva sera á názena a magakanaa Yaakadada na, antara zevarzire-aara na a zakvaara ŋane na baɗemme ge emnde á kure.»
41005020	Daaci ba zlálá á zhele ŋanna, a de fantau ge ɓala labare-aara am kwara na tá ɗahaná an Ekse Kelaawa na. Baɗemme á emnde na ta cenaa labare-aara na tá maga najipu.
41005021	A eptsehe zlaɓe ádaliye ge Yaisu, a icanse haye ásete we-aara, ta se jamme ge nalga a emnde kwakya zlaɓe ádaliye ázeŋara.
41005022	A semhe ge palle á male-aha am mashidi, zhera-aara Yayrus, a se kezlaa ugje am sera á Yaisu,
41005023	a fantau ge ŋala ázeŋara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Tasla á ŋa, sawa fetefa erva á ŋa áte egdza-aaruwa mukse lapika, aɗaba herzhe á degashe shifa am ŋane. Má dakemda ka wá, á emtseka mazla-aara, sey á mbembe.»
41005024	Daaci Yaisu a naba duhe antara ŋane, kwakya emnde ta daa á ɗabaná ádehuwa, tá ámbera eɓɓeca áte baráma.
41005025	Ndza aŋkwa mukse am dagave á emnde ŋanna, yawe kelaawa ju buwa á maga ba palasa á kela á uzhe.
41005026	Kwakya zlaɗa na a shanaa mukse ŋanna áza dauktar-aha. A keɗaa nalmane-aara baɗemme, aley shanka ŋgulmire ɗekiɗeki, sey ba á farfe.
41005027	De cenáncena mukse ŋanna labáre á Yaisu maa, a ba ŋane: «Una wá, ma ya de fete erva-aaruwa á ba áte naŋgyuwe-aara keni, yá mbembe.» Daaci a naba duhe á ba am dagave á emnde ŋanna, a de fete erva-aara áte naŋgyuwe á Yaisu á kya iga.
41005029	Kerteŋ a naba icevhe ge kela á uzhe-aara ŋanna, ba ŋane keni tapanaatápá am vuwa-aara ganakini mbaambe.
41005030	Á ba am sarte ŋanna a naba tapanaahe ge Yaisu keni am vuwa-aara ganakini sessa ndzeɗa am ŋane, mbanaambe ura. A naba eptsavte am dagave á nalga ŋanna, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A gejantaa ware naŋgyuwe-aaruwa?»
41005031	Ta ŋwanante ge pukura-aha-aara, a ba itare: «Ká zhárá dikele á emnde ŋanna tá ɓecakɓeca na ni, a gejaktaa ware, a ba ka?»
41005032	Amá a zharateraahe ge Yaisu, ge dise edda una a magaa una ŋanna.
41005033	Daaci gazlaagazla mukse na, aɗaba tapanaatapa názu a gev am vuwa-aara. Daaci a sawhe ámbera á gyagya ba seke maagara, a se kezlaa ugje am sera á Yaisu, a ndanse jirire-aara baɗemme.
41005034	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Mbakaambe fetarfire á ŋa egdza-aaruwa, ezzlálá á ba an hairire, de njinja ba layye.»
41005035	Yaisu zlaɓe á ba an elva áte we, ta semhe ge emnde á sawa am mba á Yayrus male am mashidi, a ba itare tá elvan ge Yayrus: «Ɓaaka egdzere. Ƴanƴa malum mazla-aara.»
41005036	Amá Yaisu fanuka hyema ge elva-aatare. A ba ŋane á elvan ge Yayrus: «A waŋka lyawa ɗekiɗeki, naba fetarfe ka.»
41005037	Daaci a duhe, amá velaaka baráma ɗekiɗeki ganakini tá ɗabaná emnde ádehuwa, sey ta ɗabanaa ba tara Piyer, Yakuba, ira Yuhanna egdza emmeŋara ge Yakuba ŋanna.
41005038	Daraada am mba á Yayrus maa, ta de beraa emnde kwakya tá maga ba emtaŋkire. Emnde umele tá kyuwa, emnde umele tá tsáka ɗákwa.
41005039	A demhe ge Yaisu á dem huɗe á há, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Labára kwá maga emtaŋkire, kwá kyuwa estuwa? Egdzere emtsaaka, á pá ba háre.»
41005040	Amá ta naba puwar dzáká, ágire tá epsawepsawa. Daaci Yaisu a naba bakaterse ásegashe baɗemme, a ƴaa ba tara emmeŋara antara eddeŋara ge egdzere, ira pukura-aha-aara keƴe na, ta demhe antara ŋane á dem bere na á zlava am huɗe-aara egdze na.
41005041	Daaci ŋane a de ŋanaa ba erva ge egdze na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Talita kuma», amaana: «Egdzere, ya bakanaa ba iya tsettse.»
41005042	Ba seke ndáhá á miya na tsetsa egdze na. Egdze ŋanna, yawe kelaawa ju buwa. Daaci baɗemme tá maga ba najipu-aara.
41005043	Amá Yaisu a fater magiya kwakya, geni a ɓalarka ɗekiɗeki. Am iga á una ŋanna, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Vawanteva náza za ge egdzere.»
41006001	Daaci a tsete ge Yaisu áhuwa, a zlala á dem ekse na ni a waletaa am huɗe-aara na. Pukura-aha-aara keni ta duwa á ba antara ŋane.
41006002	Samsa kwaskwe á puwansepuwe maa, ta naba dem mashidi, a de kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde. Emnde kwakya jarammeje am mashidi ŋanna. Am sarte na cenarvaacena elva-aara, ta mága najipu kwakya áte ŋane, a ba itare: «A de mbese áme elva na estuwa? A shanaa áme ŋane ilmu na? Ázara kwa ba najipu-aha na á maganá ŋane na!
41006003	Ábi ba ŋane una slega nafa egdza á Maari na? Egdza emmetare ge tara Yakuba antara Yauseys, Yahuda, ira Simaun. Egdzar mama-aha-ŋara ŋwasha keni ta ba am dagave á miya.» A piyatertaa ba una ŋanna ge fetare áte ŋane, ɓaaka umele.
41006004	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ma áme keni emnde tá fa zherwe áte nabi á Dadaamiya, amá am huɗe á há-aatare, antara vara-aha-aara, ira emnde a ekse-aara baɗemme wá, tá feka zherwe áte ŋane.»
41006005	Daaci magaaka najipu-aha kwakya am ekse ŋanna, sey ba una a puwaterar erva ge emnde umele-aatare, a mbateraahe.
41006006	Yaisu á maga ba najipu-aara aɗaba ɓaakire á fetarfire á emnde a ekse ŋanna. Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a naba tse am ekse ŋanna, a zlálá á dem ekse-aha na herherzhe na, a de kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde a ekse-aha ŋanna.
41006007	Vacite umele maa, a jatermaare ge pukura-aha-aara am tate palle, a vaterte hákuma áte shaitaine-aha, lauktu a fantau ge ɓelaterɓela bubuwa.
41006008	Lauktu a ɓelaterɓela wá, a fater bariya, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Eksauka ba uwe keni am erva, sey ba zade á kure palle. Magauka kashi á náza za, ma shuŋgu keni am lyiba.
41006009	Fawaumfa kimake am sera, amá dawánka zane bubuwa.»
41006010	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Máki dakuremda am ekse wá, njawinja á ba am mba na máki lyarakurvaalya am huɗe-aara na, dem sarte á zlálá á kure am ekse ŋanna.
41006011	Má lyiyarakurka emnde, bi cenarka elva á kure wá, dawedde am ekse-aatare, papawaapape berbere na áte sera á kure. Magawateránmaga una ŋanna, watse tá disá ba itare antara Dadaamiya.»
41006012	Daaci ba zlálá ge pukura-aha, tá de ɓelaterá elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde geni a magarmága tuba.
41006013	Ta ŋgyesaa jini-aha kwakya am emnde; emnde na lapika vuwa-aatare keni, ta gaterve waye an zhera á Dadaamiya, mbarateraambe baɗemme.
41006014	A cenanaa estuwa sleksu Hirudus labare á Yaisu aɗaba baɗemme á emnde tá ndáhá ba ŋane. Ta bantsa emnde umele: «A tsetaa ba Yuhanna slemaga baptisma am faya. Aɗaba una ŋanna an hákuma á mága najipu-aha gergere.»
41006015	Amá a ba emnde umele: «Una Yuhanna ka, nabi Ailiya werre.» A ba emnde umele zlaɓe ádaliye: «Una ba nabi umele tsekemme, amá ŋane keni ba nabi á Dadaamiya ba seke nabi-aha werre.»
41006016	De cenáncena sleksu Hirudus gajawe-aatare maa, a ba ŋane: «Una ba Yuhanna slemaga baptisma. Ndza icanaayica ire áte ŋane, amá a tsetaa ba ŋane ŋanna am faya!»
41006017	A bateraa una ŋanna aɗaba ndza a ndahanaa ba ŋane ŋanna geni a eksarvaksa Yuhanna. Daaci ta naba eksevaahe, ta puwete zawa áte ŋane, ta de ɓelema am daŋgay. A ŋguɗanaa aɗaba uwe Hirudus Yuhanna; aɗaba Hirudus ŋanna a eksantaave Hirudiya ge egdza emmeŋara Filip.
41006018	Amá aŋkwa á ndandaha Yuhanna, geni a eksantaave mukse ge egdza emmeŋara na wá, una ŋanna zlayeka ɗekiɗeki.
41006019	Aɗaba una ŋanna Hirudiya wayaaka zhárá Yuhanna an shifa ɗekiɗeki, ɓaaka ba pute-aara ge já shifa-aara.
41006020	Aɗaba Hirudus wá, ŋane á kuvá Yuhanna jipu, wayaaka á geja shifa-aara, aɗaba diyaadiya ganakini Yuhanna ura á Dadaamiya, ura jirire. Ba kelaa máki Yuhanna aŋkwa á baná elva ge sleksu Hirudus wá, á taa weranteka ba we-aara keni, amá wayaawáyá tsa eccena-aara.
41006021	Vacite umele maa, shansha Hirudiya baráma á já Yuhanna. Samsa sarte á ya sleksu Hirudus, a naba gyaa muŋri, daaci a naba ɗante galipa-aha-aara, antara male-aha á sawji-aha ira male-aha umele am kwara á Galili.
41006022	Duwa á gyaale á Hirudiya, a de shekelaterante ge male-aha na a ɗahateraa slekse na. Hayaranháyá jipu tara slekse an emnde-aara baɗemme. A naba banánba slekse ge gyaale ŋanna, a ba ŋane: «Ma ká kátá uwe keni, naba ndaviyundave, yá vakteva.»
41006023	A naba zanu waɗa-aara, geni ma a ndavanu uwe keni, sey a vanteva, una ma kyalma á rezege-aara keni, sey á vanteva.
41006024	Daaci ba degashe-aara ge gyaale na, a deza emmeŋara, ge ndavanu názena ni á se ndavanu ge slekse na. Amá a ba emmeŋara: «De enndava ka a varakteva ba ire á Yuhanna slemaga baptisma.»
41006025	Kerteŋ a semhe áseza slekse, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yá kátá ká vite ire á Yuhanna slemaga baptisma am kwatame.»
41006026	Una ŋanna namaari-aareka ɗekiɗeki, amá dzegwánka kwalarkwale aɗaba waɗa na a zanuwa ŋane á katafke á emnde-aara na.
41006027	Daaci a naba ɓela sawji á dem daŋgay, ge de sá ire á Yuhanna na. Ba zlálá á sawji na, á dem daŋgay na, a de ica ire áte Yuhanna,
41006028	a sanán ge gyaale ŋanna am kwatame. Duwa á gyaale ŋanna, a de vante ge emmeŋara.
41006029	Daada labare ádeza pukura-aha-aara, ta naba sawhe, ta eksante emtsa-aara, ta de heɗehe.
41006030	Saraasa emnde a ɓela á Yaisu, ta se ndahanhe baɗemme á názena ta maganaa itare antara názena ta kwaraterse ge emnde.
41006031	Emnde keni ba tá sawa emnde na, tá zlálá emnde na, ɓaaka ica-aatare ɗekiɗeki áza tara Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara. Ba sarte á za náza za keni ta shanka ɗekiɗeki. Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare, «Máki estuwa wá, mi zlalawa á dem tate na ta ɓaaka emnde na, kwá de puwansepuwe cekwaaŋguɗi.»
41006032	Daaci ta naba deme am paare, ba zlálá-aatare á dem tate na ta ɓaaka emnde átekwa, ba itare an ire-aatare.
41006033	Amá naraterna emnde kwakya am sarte na tá zlálá na, daaci ta naba diyatersediye, ta ɗabateremhe an sera. Emnde umele keni saresse am ekse-aha gergere, ta ɗabateremhe an sera. Baira ta dema ba itare zuŋŋwe arge tara Yaisu an pukura-aha-aara.
41006034	De sessa Yaisu am paare maa, á zhárá ba dikele á emnde tá kela ádezeŋara. Á zharaterzhara wá, a naba zatervaarhe, aɗaba ta ba seke kyawe-aha na ɓaaka suni am ekte ge itare na. Daaci a fantau ge kwaraterse duksa kwakya áte Dadaamiya.
41006035	Eblyabelya vaci maa, ta duhe ge pukura-aha-aara ádezeŋara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Degey ɓaaka vaciya mazla-aara, tate na keni kaamba.
41006036	Ambane puwateraapuwa emnde na, a zlarzlala á dem ekse-aha antara egdzar makwata-aha na herherzhe áhuna, tá de shakwanu náza za ge we-aatare.»
41006037	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Vawaterteva ba kure náza za!» A ba pukura-aha tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ká kátá ŋá de shekwaterá náza za jekka deremke wanyara, lauktu á hyater ge emnde na?»
41006038	A ndavateru ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwá an depaiŋ wanyara ázekure? De zharawazhara wára?» Ta de zharanaahe, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Depaiŋ á ŋere aŋkwa ilyeɓe ámasla an kelfe buwa.»
41006039	Mazla-aara a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Njawateraanja emnde áte masa an slala an slala.»
41006040	Daaci ta naba njateraahe emnde deremke deremke, am slala-aha umele kul ilyeɓe kul ilyeɓe.
41006041	Zlauzle una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a naba halante depaiŋ ilyeɓe, antara kelfe buwa na, a kante ice á dem samaya, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya. Daaci a kwacaa depaiŋ-aha na, a tegateraa ge pukura-aha, geni tá vatertá itare ge emnde. Am iga á una ŋanna a tegateraa kelfe-aha na keni.
41006042	Baɗemme á emnde, ma ware keni a zuhe á ba áte huɗe-aara náza zá na, aley jauje zlaɓe ádaliye.
41006043	Pukura-aha ta halante jugena á depaiŋ antara kelfe ŋanna wárá kelaawa ju buwa.
41006044	Kezlakula á emnde a zá náza zá ŋanna wá, tá maga zála debu ilyeɓe.
41006045	Shekwaraaka ɗekiɗeki am iga á una ŋanna, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Dawemda am paare, dawedde kure zuŋŋwe á katafke-aaruwa, ebzaubze guwa á kya erwa. Iya wá, yá puwateraapuwa emtsaaɗe emnde.»
41006046	Puwateraapuwa emnde maa, a naba ɗalete áte egdza wa, a de maga maduwa.
41006047	Zhedaazheda ice, gevge vaƴi maa, zlarzlálá pukura-aha an paare á dem dagave á haye ba shagera, amá Yaisu wá, á ba áte wa ŋanna ba ŋane palle.
41006048	Á zhárá pukura-aha-aara á sawa áte wa ŋanna wá, tá baka paare an zlaɗa jipu, á magaterá palasa effeƴa á eptsaterá á dem iga. An ireŋlya wá, a duhe ge Yaisu de shateraasha pukura-aha-aara na áte ire á haye, ŋane á zlálá á ba an sera-aara áte ire á haye ŋanna. Amá a de magaa ba seke á kátá ƴaterseƴe.
41006049	Ba naranna pukura-aha-aara aŋkwa á zlálá an sera-aara áte ire á yawe na wá, ta naba fu hula, aɗaba itare ta kurken shaitaine á yawe.
41006050	Itare baɗemme ba seke á degáshe shifa am itare ge lyawa. Daaci kerteŋ a ndahater elva Yaisu: «Gazlauka, degiya una ba iya!»
41006051	Daaci a naba ɗaleme am paare á dezetare wá, tseriyiiye a naba tsaahe ge effeƴa na. Tá geja ba ire pukura-aha-aara, tá maga najipu.
41006052	Aɗaba degdege ire-aatare jipu, cenaránka itare najipu na a maganaa an depaiŋ na.
41006053	Ba ebzarubze haye wá, tá am haha á Gainaizarait, daaci ta ŋguɗaa paare-aatare áte we á guwa.
41006054	Ba segashe-aatare am paare wá, emnde ta naba dise Yaisu.
41006055	Daaci ba zhagade-aatare á dem ekse-aha-aatare, ta de sanaa emnde-aha-aatare na ni á waterá vuwa-aatare áte egdera-aha-aatare. Ma a dem tate-ara Yaisu keni, tá maga ba una emnde.
41006056	Baɗemme á tate na ni a de tsekwaa átekwa Yaisu, ma a de tsekwaa am berni, ma áte makwata, ma am egdza ekse baɗemme, emnde ta sanaa emnde-aha-aatare na ni lapika vuwa-aatare, ta fanaa á katafke-aara am dagave á emnde baɗemme, ta ŋalateruŋale geni tá fetefa erva-aha-aatare á ba áte we á naŋgyuwe-aara keni. Daaci baɗemme á emnde na ni ta fete erva-aatare áte ŋane mbarembe.
41007001	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Farisa-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita umele ta sawa am Urusaliima ta se jamme áza Yaisu.
41007002	Amá ta naa pukura-aha umele ta naba zu ɗafa an erva a liya, bararaaka emtsaaɗe áte una ta kwaratersaa am nadina-aatare.
41007003	Aɗaba Farisa-aha antara Yahudiya-aha-aatare baɗemme wá, tá zeka ɗafa an erva a liya ɗekiɗeki, sey tá bara erva-aatare ba shagera emtsaaɗe. Estuwa tá aŋkwa maga duksa á eggye-aha-aatare an eŋkale-aatare baɗemme.
41007004	Ma ta saa á ba am kwaskwe keni, tá zeka ɗafa ɗekiɗeki, máki tsakaraaka yawe. Aŋkwa zlaɓe kwakya naɗe á eggye-aha-aatare na tá fansaare itare, ba seke bara tasa-aha-aatare, antara gahe-aha-aatare, ira kazlaŋa na ta janaa an verzhagane baɗemme á ba an tsufa ázetare.
41007005	Aɗaba una ŋanna, ta duwa Farisa-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita á deza Yaisu, ta de ndavanundave, a ba itare: «Labára pukura-aha á ŋa tá fansarka ge názena ta kwaraŋersaa eggye-aha a ŋere, tá naba zá ɗafa an erva a liya na?»
41007006	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Una wá, ba jire á Aisaya, aɗaba ndza maganaamaga ŋane nabiyire áte kure kwa emnde na. Aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: Emnde na wá, tá aŋkwa á galiya á ba áte we, am ervauŋɗe-aatare ta ƴiƴiye an ya.
41007007	Tá aŋkwa jáháva ɗeme am sera-aaruwa, amá una ŋanna ba dey. Aɗaba itare tá ndáhá ba naɗe-aha á emndimagwaha, ta ganve ba seke elva-aaruwa.»
41007008	Daaci a eksante elva-aara zlaɓe ádaliye Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kure kwa ƴaa shairiya á Dadaamiya, kwá aŋkwa fansar ge naɗe-aha á emndimagwaha.»
41007009	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Diyakurdiya eptsanve iga ge shairiya á Dadaamiya, geni kwá ganvege naɗe-aha á emndimagwaha.
41007010	Ábi a enndaha Muusa, a ba ŋane: Ɗematerveɗeme tara emmeŋa an eddeŋa. Ma ware una a ndaase elva ƴaiƴaihe áte eddeŋara bi áte emmeŋara, edda-aara a njeka an shifa ɗekiɗeki.
41007011	Amá kwa bantsa kure, ma edda-aara á kátá melanu ge eddeŋara bi ge emmeŋara keni, máki ndasendahe edda-aara ganakini aŋkwa duksa ma andze yá melaku an ŋane, amá ya fan ge slera á Dadaamiya wá,
41007012	daaci ɓaaka wedera á edda-aara ge melanu ge eddeŋara bi ge emmeŋara mazla-aara. Estuwa á ba elva á kure.
41007013	An una ŋanna wá, kwa ganve elva á Dadaamiya ba seke duksa dey, kwa tsaa áte naɗe-aha á eggye-aha á kure. Kwakya jeba á duksa-aha ŋanna kwá maganá kure.»
41007014	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde baɗemme: «Sawmbare, cenauvaacena elva na ba shagera.
41007015	Nazu á badza ura an Dadaamiya wá, názena á faná edda-aara á dem mbuweka, á badzená názena á segashe am mbuwe á edda-aara.» ((
41007016	Edda una máki aŋkwa hyema-aara, a cenevaacena.))
41007017	Am sarte na ƴaterƴa Yaisu emnde, a de deme am bere maa, pukura-aha ta de ndavanu maana á naraje ŋanna.
41007018	A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane: «Iyau, kure keni kwaasau zlaɓe shakuranka eŋkale-aara, cenakuranka? Diyakurka ganakini ɓaaka názu á duwa ádagashe á dem mbuwe á urimagwe, á badzaterá an Dadaamiya emtu?
41007019	Aɗaba una ŋanna á duka á dem ervauŋɗe, amá á dem huɗe, á segashe zlaɓe ádaliye am edda-aara.» An elva-aara ŋanna wá, ganvege náza za baɗemme ba halal.
41007020	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Ba názena ni á segashe am mbuwe á edda-aara una á badzaterá an Dadaamiya.
41007021	Aɗaba kwakya shagerkire á hala na á segashe am ervauŋɗe á ura. Á berhaná ba una ŋanna á de maga dakarire, neylire, á de já shifa,
41007022	á de maga gwardzire, á dem waya duksa á ura, á de maga mandzawire, á de zlerma ura, á de maga ŋguɗiyire, á dem shelha, á dem zá vuwa á ura, á dem gálá ire, ira á dem wucire.
41007023	Daaci baɗemme á duksa-aha ŋanna, á segashe á ba am ervauŋɗe á urimagwe, á badzaterá ba una ŋanna an Dadaamiya-aara.»
41007024	Tsetsa Yaisu áhuwa, kwaye a zlálá á dem ekse-aha na herherzhe an berni á Tirus. A de demhe am bere, wayaaka tá diyeddiya emnde, amá dzegwanka sheɓe.
41007025	Aŋkwa mukse umele an shaitaine egdza-aara, egdzere mukse maa, ba a cenaa labare á Yaisu wá, a naba duhe ádezeŋara, a de kezlanaa ugje,
41007026	a fantau ge ŋala Yaisu geni a ŋgyainseŋgye shaitaine ŋanna am egdza-aara. Mukse ŋanna wá, mukse á Yahudiya ka, ŋane mukse á Yunaniŋkau am emnde á Siraufiniki.
41007027	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ƴaterƴa a zaruze emtsaaɗe egdzara ɗafa. Haleta ɗafa á egdzara, puwateranve ge kere-aha wá, una zlayeka ɗekiɗeki.»
41007028	«Ba estuwa,» a ba mukse na, «amá ma kere-aha keni tá wazaná ba itare kwaca á ɗafa na á valya á sawa am erva á egdzara.»
41007029	A lyevaa ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ŋwakteŋwa shagera. Naba zlálá á da, ɓaaka shaitaine am egdza á ŋa mazla-aara.»
41007030	Daaci a naba da-aara mukse na, a de bera egdza-aara, á zlava áte egdera ba lapilayye, ɓaaka shaitaine am ŋane.
41007031	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a tsete ge Yaisu am Tirus, a zlálá á dem Sidaun. Tsante am Sidaun maa, a segashe am kwara á tate na tá ɗahaná an Ekse Kelaawa na praatte, ge sete we á haye á Galili.
41007032	Ahuwa maa, ta sanaa makwaya umele zhele, á taa ndaaseka elva an uŋŋule-aara keni. Daaci ta ŋala Yaisu ganakini á puwar erva-aara, á mbanaambe.
41007033	Daaci Yaisu a sanse zhel ŋanna am dagave á emnde, a de tsanaahe ba ŋane palle, a shaɓanem gulanda-aha-aara am hyema, a kyefaa nyaihe-aara, a gante áte nara,
41007034	a kante ice á dem zhegela, a puwese shifa á ba an ndzeɗa; «Aifata,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge zhel ŋanna. Amaana: A wartewárá hyema-aha á ŋa.
41007035	Ba seke ndaha á miya na kerteŋ wartewárá hyema-aha-aara, a werte ge we-aara keni, a fantau ge ndaha elva á ba an uŋŋule-aara.
41007036	Amá Yaisu a fater magiya kwakya geni a ndaaranka ma ge ware keni. Amá ba seke una ŋane a fater magiya kwakya na wá, itare keni ta de ɓalse labare ŋanna kwakya áza emnde.
41007037	Daaci baɗemme á emnde tá maga ba dikere-aara, a ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Baɗemme á názena a maganaa ŋane na ba shagera! Antara ba makwaya-aha keni á vaterte hyema degey! Wuce-aha keni á weraterta we, tá ndaha elva ba laŋŋe!»
41008001	Am sarte ŋanna maa, ta semhe ge emnde umele zlaɓe ádaliye ta kwakya jipu, ta se jamme áza Yaisu. Am ɓaaka náza za áza emnde ŋanna, Yaisu a ɗetaa pukura-aha-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
41008002	«Emnde na tá wiwa am ice ge iya, aɗaba hare keƴe vatena tá á ba ázerwa, názu á ezza keni ɓaaka.
41008003	Máki puwanateraapuwa ba estuwa, ɓaaka názu ta zuwaa itare wá, á de ceɓateraaceɓa waya áte baráma. Aɗaba emnde umele-aatare, ta sawa á sa am tatu ƴiƴiye.»
41008004	Ta ŋwanante ge pukura-aha, a ba itare: «Á de shaná áme kena ura náza zá am kaamba na ni á hyater ge emnde na?»
41008005	«Aŋkwa wanyara depaiŋ ázekure?» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare. Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Ŋá an depaiŋ vuye.»
41008006	Daaci: «Njawinja am haha,» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde baɗemme. Ŋane a halante depaiŋ-aha vuye na, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a kwacaahe, daaci a naba tegateraa ge pukura-aha-aara, geni tá vatertá itare ge emnde. Daaci pukura-aha ta tegateraa depaiŋ na ge emnde.
41008007	Ndza aŋkwa egdza kelfe-aatare zlaɓe ádaliye. Yaisu a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya arge kelfe ŋanna keni, daaci a tegateraa ge pukura-aha-aara, geni tá vatertá kelfe ŋanna keni ge emnde.
41008008	Baɗemme-aatare, ma ware keni a zuwa á ba áte huɗe-aara, ta ƴanaa ba itare náza zá. Pukura-aha ta halante jugena-aara kenday vuye.
41008009	Emnde ŋanna keni ta vayye tsa, tá maga debu ufaɗe. Am iga una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a naba puwateraahe,
41008010	ŋane a demhe am paare antara pukura-aha-aara, kwaye ta zlala á dem kwara á Dalmanuta.
41008011	Ta duhe ge Farisa-aha ádeza Yaisu wá, a dateraa ba gajawe, ta de tsagwaɗanaa áte elva. A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Máki a ɓelakaa ba Dadaamiya wá, maraŋeranmárá najipu palle geni ŋá diyeddiye átekwa.»
41008012	Daaci Yaisu a puwese shifa á ba an ndzeɗa, a ba ŋane: «Labára ŋane emnde a zamane na tá tataya ba najipu na? Yá ndaakur ba jirire, ɓaaka najipu na ni tá marateranmárá mazla-aara.»
41008013	Mazla-aara ba tse-aara áhuwa, a deme am paare, a eptsehe zlaɓe ádaliye ásete we á guwa á sehuna-aara.
41008014	Am tse-aatare ŋanna maa, pukura-aha ta naba viyaa náza zá, tá á ba an depaiŋ palle ázetare.
41008015	Hyemhye am ndáhá elva a Yaisu an naraje an shahi á makala maa, a fater magiya, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Degiya faufa hyema, tsufautsufa ire á kure átuge shahi á makala á Farisa-aha, antara Hirudus!»
41008016	A ba pukura-aha am dagave-aatare: «A ndaha una Malum, aɗaba ŋa viyaa depaiŋ.»
41008017	Diyeddiye Yaisu názena tá ndahaná itare, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Labára kwa bantsa kure, aɗaba kwa viyaa depaiŋ? Kwaasau zlaɓe diyakurka, ba egdza a una ni kwá taa cenvaaka? Kwaasau zlaɓe shakuránka eŋkale?
41008018	Kwá á ba an ice á kure ni, aley kwá nanka? Kwá á ba an hyema á kure ni, kwá cenánka? Yehauteyeha
41008019	á ba áte depaiŋ ilyeɓe na ya kwacanaa ya, ta zanaa emnde debu ilyeɓe na. Kwa halante jugena-aara wárá wanyara?» Ta ŋwanante: «Wárá ilyeɓe,» a ba itare.
41008020	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Depaiŋ vuye na ya kwacanaa ya, ta zanaa emnde debu ufaɗe na mu, kwa halante jugena-aara kenday wanyara?» Ta ŋwanante: «Kenday vuye,» a ba itare.
41008021	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Aley ni kwaasau zlaɓe diyakurka?»
41008022	Se tsekwartsekwa am Baytisayda, ta se yainu á ba an ye ge Yaisu emnde, ta sanaa ura wulfe, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Puwetepuwa erva á ŋa áte zhel na tasla á ŋa, geni a mbembe.»
41008023	Yaisu a naba ŋá zhel ŋanna áte erva, a danse á dete iga a ekse. Daraada áhuwa maa, a de kyefaa nyaihe-aara, a gante áte ice-aha ge zhel na, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká aŋkwa nanna emtu?»
41008024	A kante ice-aara wulfe na, a ba ŋane: «Yá aŋkwa nanna emnde tá aŋkwa zlálá, amá ta ba seke nafa-aha.»
41008025	Daaci a puwanem erva-aha-aara zlaɓe ádaliye am ice, mazla-aara a naba ŋgyaiŋgyesaa ice-aara zhel na, a mbehe á ba áte una ŋanna, aŋkwa á nanna ba laŋŋe.
41008026	Mazla-aara a ɓelanaahe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ezzlálá á da, eptseka á dem huɗe á ekse na mazla-aara.»
41008027	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a naba tsetehe ge Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara, kwaye ta zlálá á dem ekse-aha na am kwara á Kaysariya á Filip. Tá áte baráma á zlálá maa, a ndavateru ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ta baa uwe emnde áte iya, ta baa iya ware?»
41008028	Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Emnde umele wá, ta baa ka Yuhanna slemaga baptisma. A baa emnde umele, ka nabi Ailiya werre. A baa emnde umele zlaɓe adaliye, ka ba nabi umele tsekemme.»
41008029	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ay kure ma, kwá ba, ya ware kena?» A ŋwanante ge Piyer, a ba ŋane: «Ba ka una ka Almasiihu na.»
41008030	Daaci a fater magiya Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ndahawanka ge ura umele mazla-aara.»
41008031	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a fantau ge vaterte sera á elva ge pukura-aha-aara. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, ɓaaka pekya-aara, sey yá shushe zlaɗa kwakya. Male-aha á larde, antara male-aha á liman-aha, ira malum-aha á tawraita, tá de ƴiyaaƴa, watse tá zlanaazle shifa-aaruwa baɗemme, amá am hare buwa ge keƴire wá, watse yá tsetse am faya.»
41008032	A ndaterse una ŋanna ba parakke, sheɓaaka. A naba ɗahese ge Piyer ba itare ta buwa antara Yaisu, a de maganaa gajawe áte elva ŋanna.
41008033	Amá a naba eptsavte ge Yaisu áseza pukura-aha umele, a fantau ge valar ge Piyer, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Jinaaja ekka ka Shaitaine. Aɗaba názena ká dzamaná ka na jarammeka antara náza á Dadaamiya, náza á ŋa na ba názu tá dzamaná emndimagwaha.»
41008034	Mazla-aara Yaisu a ɗante pukura-aha-aara antara emnde baɗemme, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Máki edda-aara wayaawáyá ɗaba ya wá, a dzameka shifa-aara ɗekiɗeki. A eksanteksa dzaŋgala-aara, a ɗabiɗába an ŋane.
41008035	Aɗaba máki edda-aara á tataya lya shifa-aara wá, á de keɗanaakeɗa. Amá edda una a keɗaa shifa-aara aɗaba iya, antara aɗaba labare á higa wá, á de shansha zlaɓe adaliye.
41008036	Ma edda-aara a zu emtakire á duniya na baɗemme keni wá, ázara námpire-aara ge ŋane máki keɗanaakeɗa shifa na á katafke na?
41008037	Emtu watse aŋkwa názu ura á de várá shifa-aara an ŋane emtu? Ɓaaka ɗekiɗeki.
41008038	Am zamane na wá, emnde eptsaranveptsa iga ge Dadaamiya, wayarka fetaara áte ŋane. Ay degiya, ma ware una a magaa zherwe am dágáve-aatare ge baa ura-aaruwire, bi ge ndahater elva-aaruwa wá, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme keni, watse á wiyá zherwe ge baa ŋane ura-aaruwire, má watse yá sawa an malika-aha cuɗeɗɗe, an ƴaikkire á Edderwa.»
41009001	Yaisu a farhe zlaɓe ádaliye ge ndaaterndaha, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire, á ba am dagave á kure na keni, tá aŋkwa emnde na ni watse tá emtseka ba estuwa, sey máki naránna an ice-aatare Dadaamiya á jáhá emnde á dem kwara-aara an hákuma-aara.»
41009002	A magaa hare uŋkwahe am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a ɗetaa tara Piyer antara Yakuba ira Yuhanna, a dateraa áte ire á wa umele slaɗɗe, ba itare itare áhuwa. Daraada áhuwa maa, a naba eptsavte ge Yaisu am ice-aatare wá, gevge umele ba seke ŋane ka mazla-aara.
41009003	Naŋgyuwe-aara gevge dzayye ba telle, tellire-aara an tsaka ire. Naŋgyuwe-aara ŋanna wulwule jipu.
41009004	Daaci pukura-aha na tá zhárá ba emndu werre, tara Ailiya antara Muusa, tá aŋkwa ndaha elva antara Yaisu.
41009005	A ba Piyer á elvan ge Yaisu: «Malum, ŋere keni ŋá aŋkwa áhuna na wá, shagera jipu. Kina wá, ŋá magakurá dzadzawe-aha keƴe, palle náza á ŋa, palle náza á Muusa, palle keni náza á Ailiya.»
41009006	A ndaase elva ŋanna ba estuwa, amá diyaaka názena á ndahaná ŋane. Aɗaba itare pukura-aha keƴe ŋanna gazlargazla jipu.
41009007	Cekwaaŋguɗi wá, a naba tsekwateraarhe ge kumba. Daaci tá cená ba kwara am kumba ŋanna. A ba edda-aara: «Una náwa ŋane na wá, Egdza-aaruwa na ya wayetaa ya. Cenancena názena á bakurná ŋane.»
41009008	Estuwa ta kante ice wá, ta naa ba Yaisu palle, ɓaaka ura umele ázeŋara.
41009009	Am sarte na tá átira tsekwa á sa áte ire á wa ŋanna maa, Yaisu a fater magiya, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ndawanka názena kwa naaná kure na ma ge ware keni, a njinja á ba am huɗe á kure dem sarte na tsetsa Ura á emnde baɗemme am faya.»
41009010	Faransarfe am elva ŋanna, amá a ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Uwe ŋane tsete am faya na a ndahanaa ŋane na?»
41009011	Aɗaba una ŋanna, ta de ndavanu ge Yaisu, a ba itare: «Labára tá bantsa malum-aha á tawraita, sey máki eptsaptsa nabi Ailiya emtsaaɗe?»
41009012	A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane: «Una ba jire-aatare, ba seke una ta ndahanaa itare ŋanna, á eptsa Ailiya emtsaaɗe, á se tsatsanaatsatsa ŋane duksa baɗemme. A ba iya wá, labára a ba wakita á Dadaamiya, watse á shushe zlaɗa kwakya Ura á emnde baɗemme, watse tá epsawanaapsawa emnde?
41009013	Ay degiya wá, ya ndaakur ba jirire, ndza eptsaptsa Ailiya á sawa, amá emnde ta naba magaa hakuma-aatare áte ŋane. Una ŋanna daada á ba áte una á ndaaná wakita á Dadaamiya.»
41009014	Am sarte na saraasa maa, ta se bera emnde kwakya antara malum-aha á tawraita áza pukura-aha umele na. Tá aŋkwa gajawe malum-aha á tawraita antara pukura-aha na am dagave-aatare.
41009015	Baɗemme á emnde na, ba ta naa Yaisu wá, tá maga ba najipu-aara. Ba zhagade ádezeŋara, ta de yainuye an use.
41009016	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Kwa gajawe arge uwe kure antara emnde na?»
41009017	A ŋwete ge ura palle am dagave á emnde, a ba ŋane: «Malum, ya sakaa egdza-aaruwa egdzere zhele, aɗaba aŋkwa jini am ŋane, á piyante ndaha elva.
41009018	Jini-aara ŋanna, ma a tsete am tate-ara keni, sey ba á velyanaavelya á dem haha, á kela ugbalyailye, á kerɗa slare, á wulesewule vuwa-aara kaŋgelaŋŋe. Ya ŋala pukura-aha á ŋa ganakini tá ŋgyanseŋgye jini ŋanna am ŋane, amá dzegwaranka.»
41009019	Ba wera we-aara ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Amá kure emnde a zamane na wá, ɓaaka fetarfire á kure ɗekiɗeki! Watse yá njá antara kure dem laukte-ara? Yá fakurá ervauŋɗe dem sarte-ara estuwa? Sawiyansa kwa kure egdze ŋanna ge iya!»
41009020	Daaci ta naba saa egdzere ásezeŋara. Ba a puwete ice-aara áte Yaisu jini na am egdza ŋanna wá, a naba fantau ge slakala am egdzere, a velyaa egdze na am ire, á taɓara egdze na am haha, á kela ugbalyailye am mbuwe-aara.
