41009021	Yaisu a ndavanu ge eddeŋara, a ba ŋane: «A fanantau am sarte-ara?» A ba eddeŋara: «A fanantau daga am sarte na zlaɓe egdzere cekwa.
41009022	Ba kelaa ma tsetse jini-aara ŋanna wá, sey ba á maganánmaga palasa. Am sarte umele á eblyanme am kárá, am sarte umele á eblyanme am yawe, á kátá ba já shifa á egdzere. Daaci máki ká dzegwándzegwa wá, tasla á ŋa zaŋervarze, melaŋerumele.»
41009023	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Máki yá dzegwándzegwa emtu, a ba ka? Áza edda una ni aŋkwa fetarfire-aara wá, ɓaaka názena ni á gevka na.»
41009024	Kerteŋ ŋwateŋwa eddarge egdzere, a ba an ká kwara a ba ŋane: «Fantarfe, amá á hyepka fetarfire-aaruwa, tasla á ŋa meliyumele am huɗe-aara.»
41009025	Daaci Yaisu á zhárá ba tá aŋkwa kela emnde ásezetare, a naba valarhe ge jini ŋanna, a ba nane: «Ekka jini na ká piyante ndaha elva ge ura, ká ganve ura makwaya na, ya bakanaa ba iya, sesse am egdze na, ezzlálá, salika á sem ŋane ɗekiɗeki.»
41009026	A naba fu hula jini na am egdzere, a slakalme am egdzere, a naba sesehe am ŋane. Amá ba seke ɓaaka shifa am ŋane, haa ta bantsa emnde umele: «Ɓaaka, emtsamtsa egdze na.»
41009027	Amá Yaisu a ŋanaahe áte erva, a tsante, a naba tsaahe ge egdzere an sera-aara.
41009028	Am sarte na daraada, ta juwa ba itare antara pukura-aha-aara maa, ta naba ndavanuhe ge pukura-aha, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Labara dzegwaŋeranka ŋere ŋgyesaa jini ŋanna?»
41009029	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Jeba á jini na wá, sey tá ŋgyansá an maduwa.»
41009030	Daaci tsaretse am tate ŋanna, ba zlálá-aatare á dem tate umele, ta degashe am huɗe á Galili praatte. Am sarte ŋanna wá, ndza wayaaka Yaisu tá diyeddiye emnde tate na tá átekwa.
41009031	Aɗaba aŋkwa á vaterte sera á elva-aha ge pukura-aha-aara. A ba ŋane á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, watse tá fime am erva ge emnde, tá de já shifa-aaruwa. Amá am hare ge keƴire wá, watse yá tsetse am faya.»
41009032	Ba palle cenaranka pukura-aha elva-aara ŋanna. Amá ge ndavanu elva-aha keni, a wateraa lyawa.
41009033	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, daraada am Kafarnahum. Am sarte na tá am bere, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde-aara baɗemme: «Ndza kwa gajawe arge uwe kure áte barama?»
41009034	Amá ta heɗu ba we-aatare, ɓaaka ura á ndaha elva. Aɗaba ndza ta gajawe arge ƴaikkire, geni watse mala ware am dagave-aatare.
41009035	Daaci a njehe ge Yaisu áte tate a njá, a ɗetaa pukura-aha-aara kelaawa ju buwa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ma ware una á kátá gev slekatafke á kure keni, á ganvege ire-aara ba seke ŋane slekataliya á emnde baɗemme, antara walaaɗi á emnde baɗemme.»
41009036	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a eksante egdzere, a se tsanaahe á katafke-aatare am huviye-aara ge ŋane, daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
41009037	«Ma ware una a lyevaa egdzere seke una aɗaba elva-aaruwa, edda-aara a lyevaa ba iya an ire-aaruwa. Edda una a lyevaa iya maa, a lyevaa iya ka palle, a lyevaa ba edda una a ɓeliɓela na an ire-aara.»
41009038	A ba Yuhanna á elvan ge Yaisu: «Malum, ŋere wá, ŋa naa ura umele á ŋgyá jini-aha am emnde an zhera á ŋa, amá ŋa naba piyante, aɗaba ŋane palle á miya ka.»
41009039	A ba Yaisu: «A"aa, piyawanteka. Aɗaba ɓaaka ura a magaa najipu an zhera-aaruwa ni, am iga-aara á valya elva áte iya.
41009040	Aɗaba máki edda-aara dagalaaka tsawe ásete miya wá, ura á miya ba ŋane.
41009041	Yá ndaakur ba jirire, ma edda-aara a vakurte ba yawe á essha keni, máki a vakurtaa aɗaba zhera-aaruwa geni kwa emnde á Almasiihu wá, edda-aara á de shansha laɗa-aara.»
41009042	Zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Má edda-aara mbeɗanaambeɗa palle á egdzara ŋanna ta fetaare áte iya na á dem haypa wá, ámbane tá ŋguɗanem nákwá á há hiya am mbiye, tá eblyanma am haye, á emtsa, ŋgulma ba una ŋanna ge edda-aara.
41009043	«Máki erva á ŋa aŋkwa á dáká á dem haypa wá, naba icica áte ka, eblyanveblye ba ƴiƴiye. Ámbane ká dem tate á shifa na á zleka na an erva palle, arge una ká njá an erva-aha á ŋa bukerɗe, amá ká dem kárá á jahanama, kárá na á emtseka ɗekiɗeki na. ((
41009044	Jahanama ŋanna wá, ma weshege-aara, ma kárá-aara keni, á emtseka ɗekiɗeki.))
41009045	Máki sera á ŋa aŋkwa á dáká á dem haypa wá, naba icica áte ka, eblyanveblye ba ƴiƴiye. Ámbane ká dem tate á shifa na á zleka na an ser palle, arge una ká njá an sera-aha á ŋa bukerɗe, amá tá de eblyaká á dem kárá á jahanama na. ((
41009046	Jahanama ŋanna wá, ma weshege-aara, ma kárá-aara keni, á emtseka ɗekiɗeki.))
41009047	Zlaɓe ádaliye, máki ice á ŋa aŋkwa á dáká á dem haypa wá, naba sansese ice ŋanna. Ámbane ká dem zlanna á Dadaamiya an feke palle, arge una ká njá an ice-aha á ŋa bukerɗe, amá tá de eblyaká á dem kárá á jahanama na.
41009048	Jahanama ŋanna wá, ma weshege-aara, ma kárá-aara keni, á emtseka ɗekiɗeki.
41009049	«Diyaweddiye geni, ma ware keni, á de maraná ba kárá názu am edda-aara, ma emtake, ma emtaŋka keni, ba seke náza elleŋa á maraná ŋane emtakire á ɗale.
41009050	Elleŋa wá, duksa ŋgelama. Amá máki elleŋa ŋanna ɓaaka ɗaŋɗaŋire-aara mazla-aara mu, tá maganá uwe ganakini á gevge ɗaŋɗaŋe zlaɓe ádaliye? Ɓaaka pute ɗekiɗeki. Aɗaba una ŋanna, marausemare duksa ŋgelama am kure, njawinja an hairire am dagave á kure.»
41010001	A naba tsete ge Yaisu am tate ŋanna, a zlálá á dem kwara á Yahudiya. Am Yahudiya, a de ebzu guwa á Urdun. Áhuwa keni de jarammeje emnde kwakya ázeŋara, a fantau ge kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya, aɗaba ŋane nja-aara ba estuwa.
41010002	Am sarte ŋanna maa, ta duhe ge Farisa-aha umele ádezeŋara, ta de ndavanu elva geni tá tsagwaɗaná átekwa. A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Vantevahe tawraita barama ge zhele geni á ɓelanaaɓela mukse-aara?»
41010003	Ge vaterte jawápa maa, Yaisu keni a ndavaterundave, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A bakuraa uwe Muusa áte una ŋanna?»
41010004	A ba itare: «Muusa wá, a ƴaa barama geni zhele ŋanna á puwanante nalmesheri á ica nika ge mukse, á vanteva am erva.»
41010005	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Muusa a puwakurte una ŋanna aɗaba ba degdegire á ire á kure.
41010006	Amá áte una am fakte wá, estuweka. Am fakta, am sarte na Dadaamiya a nderaa duksa baɗemme wá, “a nderaterhe tara zhele an mukse”.
41010007	“Aɗaba una ŋanna zhele á ƴa tara eddeŋara an emmeŋara, tá njá antara mukse-aara.
41010008	Itare ta buwa ŋanna, tá gevge ba vuwa palle.” Estuwa, ta buweka mazla-aara, tá geva ba vuwa palle.
41010009	Daaci názena ni a janmaa Dadaamiya wá, a icanveka urimagwe.»
41010010	Am sarte na tá am bere antara pukura-aha-aara maa, ta naba ndavanu ge pukura-aha á ba áte elva ŋanna zlaɓe ádaliye.
41010011	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ma ware una zhele, máki a ɓelaa mukse-aara, a de gaa umele, a magaa ba gwardzire, guge haypa an mukse-aara na a ɓelanaa ŋane.
41010012	Ba duksa palle ge mukse keni. Máki a segashe am mba á zhele-aara, a de gaa umele, a magaa ba gwardzire.»
41010013	Emnde kwakya ta sanaa egdzara ge Yaisu geni á puwaterar erva a barka-aara, amá pukura-aha ta naba valaterarhe ge emnde a sá egdzara ŋanna.
41010014	Amá náterna Yaisu wá, a naba jehe ge ervauŋɗe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge pukura-aha: «Piyawaterteka, ƴawáterƴa, a sarsawa egdzara ásezerwa, aɗaba kwárá á Dadaamiya náza á emnde na má garevge ba seke itare.
41010015	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ma ware edda-aara keni, máki lyevaaka dem kwárá á Dadaamiya ba seke náza á egdzere wá, ŋane á taa demka ɗekiɗeki.»
41010016	Am iga á una ŋanna, a naba lyevaa egdzara á dem erva-aara, a puwaterar erva, a gaterar barka.
41010017	Dedde Yaisu áte barama, aŋkwa á zlálá maa, a duhe ge zhele umele ádezeŋara á ba an zhagade, a de kezlaa ugje am sera-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, diyandiya ganakini ka ura mággwe. Naba ndindaha, yá maga tara uwe antara uwe, lauktu yá shá shifa na á zleka na?»
41010018	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Labára ká ɗahiyá an ura mággwe? Ɓaaka ura mággwe, máki Dadaamiya ka palle.
41010019	Ábi diyakdiya shairiya-aha á Dadaamiya na a ba ŋane: Jeka shifa, maŋka gwardzire, ileka, maŋka seydire á fida áte ura, zlermeka duksa á ura, ɗematerveɗeme tara eddeŋa an emmeŋa. Ábi diyakdiya una-aha ŋanna baɗemme.»
41010020	A ŋwete, a ba ŋane: «Una ŋanna kwaye á sawa am egdzarire-aaruwa keni ŋanaaŋa.»
41010021	A ɓelanu ice á Yaisu, wayetewaya jipu am ervauŋɗe-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Máki estuwa wá, a ƴakar ba duksa palle. De valuvale názu am rezege á ŋa baɗemme, tegatertega shuŋgu-aara ge talage-aha, ekka watse ká shánsha laɗa-aara am samaya. Daaci sawa ɗabiɗaba.»
41010022	Ba a cenaa una ŋanna wá, puwaapuwa vuwa-aara, ba eptsa iga-aara, a zlálá an dzámá ire campaukkwe, aɗaba nalmane-aara kwakya jipu.
41010023	Daaci Yaisu a zharaa pukura-aha-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kay! Zlazlaɗa jipu geni tá demda emnde a berba am kwara á Dadaamiya.»
41010024	Palle á názu tá ndahaná pukura-aha ɓaaka, elva ŋanna jauje ge ndzeɗa-aatare. Amá ŋane a fateraarhe zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane: «Una yá ndaakur ba jirire, zlazlaɗa jipu ganakini tá demda emnde á dem kwara á Dadaamiya.
41010025	Náwa zlazlaɗa ganakini á dedde názlegwame am ɓiye á lipere, amá zlazlaɗa ba náza á sleberba zlaɓe ádaliye ge dem kwara á Dadaamiya.»
41010026	Ba ta cenaa una ŋanna pukura-aha wá, tá geja ba ire. A ba itare: «Máki ba estuwa wá, ɓaaka ura á ŋezleseŋzle ɗekiɗeki.»
41010027	A zharateraahe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Áza emnde wá, una taa gevka, amá Dadaamiya wá, ɓaaka názu dzegwanka ŋane.»
41010028	Piyer a eksetaa elva, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Kwaye ŋere, ƴaŋeránƴa duksa baɗemme, ŋá ɗaba ba ka.»
41010029	A ŋwete ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare baɗemme: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire, ma ware una a ƴaa há-aara, bi egdzar mama-aha-ŋara zala an ŋwasha, bi emmeŋara, bi eddeŋara, bi egdzara-aara, bi fe-aara, máki a ƴanaa aɗaba zhera-aaruwa antara aɗaba labare á higa wá,
41010030	ba jirire á de shansha zlaɓe ádaliye una-aha ŋanna baɗemme ma huɗe deremke keni; ma bere, ma egdzar mama-aha-ŋara zala an ŋwasha, ma emmeŋara, ma egdzara-aara, ma fe-aha. Baɗemme á de shansha zlaɓe ádaliye á ba am duniya na. Amá wá, zlaɗa keni á shushe. Á katafke á de shá shifa na á zleka na.
41010031	Amá emnde kwakya ta zuŋŋwa ba itare kina, tá de gev emnde a kataliya. Emnde kwakya tá am kataliya kina, watse tá gev emnde a katafka ba itare.»
41010032	Tara Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara tá áte barama á ɗala á dem Urusaliima. Yaisu wá, ŋane á katafke, pukura-aha-aara tá aŋkwa ɗabaná á kataliya, ta ƴiƴiye cekwaaŋguɗi antara ŋane. Pukura-aha-aara tá á ba an lyawa am vuwa. Dikele á emnde na tá ɗabaterɗaba na keni, tá á ba an lyawa ŋanna. Yaisu a ɗante pukura-aha-aara zlaɓe ádaliye ádezeŋara, a ndaaterahe zlaɓe ádaliye názena watse á de shá ŋane,
41010033	a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Duwa á miya á dem Urusaliima kina na wá, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme tá de eksivaksa, tá de vite ge male-aha á liman-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita. Tá de ndahaná itare geni a jareja shifa-aaruwa. Daaci tá de fime am erva ge emnde na ɓaaka nadina-aatare,
41010034	tá de zlazlisá itare, tá de kyafiyar itare nyaihe, tá de ziyá itare an ja, tá de janá itare shifa-aaruwa. Amá am hare ge keƴire wá, watse yá tsetse am faya.»
41010035	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta duhe ge egdzara á Jaibaidaiyus, tara Yakuba an Yuhanna, ádeza Yaisu. A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, náwa ŋa se ŋala ázeŋa, máki ŋá shansha barama-aara.»
41010036	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwá kátá uwe kure ázerwa?»
41010037	A ba itare: «Máki á ɓashaŋerɓasha ervauŋɗe á ŋa wá, má watse de njakiinja am ƴaikkire á ŋa wá, ŋá kátá palle á ŋere á de njá am naɗafa á ŋa, palle á ŋere keni á de njá am názlaɓa á ŋa.»
41010038	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Ábi diyakurka wedere á kure na ma andze kwá ndava ŋane na. Kina wá, watse kwá dzegwándzegwa emtu sha zlaɗa áte náza-aaruwa na watse yá essha na? Zlaɓe ádaliye, watse kwá dzegwándzegwa emtu sepá názena watse yá sepaná ya am vuwa-aaruwa na?»
41010039	Ta naba ŋwanante: «Ŋá dzegwándzegwa,» a ba itare. A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu: «Shagera,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Watse kwá de shá zlaɗa á ba áte náza-aaruwa, watse kwá de sepá názena yá de sepaná ya am vuwa á kure.
41010040	Amá elva a de njá am naɗafa-aaruwa antara názlaɓa-aaruwa wá, am erva-aaruweka una ŋanna. Sleɗe-aha ŋanna náza emnde na ni Dadaamiya a tsatsaterán ge itare.»
41010041	De cenaráncena una ŋanna pukura-aha umele kelaawa na maa, ta naba ica ervauŋɗe áte tara Yakuba antara Yuhanna.
41010042	Cenáncena Yaisu, a ɗaaterte baɗemme-aatare ádezeŋara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Náwa diyakurdiya ganakini emnde na ta slekse-aha á larde ba itare am duniya na wá, tá aŋkwa á kwárá larde-aha-aatare an márá hákuma áte emnde. Male-aha á ekse keni, tá aŋkwa á márá hákuma-aatare am ekse.
41010043	Amá jeba á una ŋanna wá, a gevka am dagave á kure. Ma ware una á kátá gev male keni, arge una ŋanna wá, a gevge ba seke walaaɗi á kure.
41010044	Ma ware una á kátá gev slekatafke á kure keni, a gevge ba seke nave á kure. Malira ba una ŋanna am ice á Dadaamiya.
41010045	Aɗaba ba iya Ura á emnde baɗemme keni, sanka geni tá se magina emnde slera, amá iya una ya se magateraa slera ge emnde, ya se ƴá shifa-aaruwa, geni yá lyelye emnde ba kwakya.»
41010046	Mazla-aara maa, daraada am Yairikau. Am sarte na tá aŋkwa á zlálá am ekse ŋanna tara Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara maa, kwakya emnde na ta ɗabaterɗaba. Aŋkwa ura wulfe zhera-aara Bartimawus egdza á Timawus, a njehe áte baráma na tá aŋkwa ɗabaná itare na, ge ŋala áza emnde.
41010047	Am sarte na cenáncena ganakini ba Yaisu ura Nasarátu una á degashe na, a fantau ge ɗaha Yaisu á ba an ká kwara, a ba ŋane: «Yaisu Egdza á Dawuda, tasla á ŋa zivarze.»
41010048	Kwakya emnde na ta valarhe, ta banaa a ɗuɗe, amá ŋane a far ká kwara, a ba ŋane: «Egdza á Dawuda, tasla á ŋa zivarze.»
41010049	Daaci a tsaahe ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Ɗauɗaha, á sawa.» Ta de ɗante wulfe na, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ehhiga kwa mazla-aara, kwaye á ɗakɗaha, sawa ásezeŋara.»
41010050	A naba tsetehe á ba áte watsewatsire, a puwanve kacekaca-aara, a duhe á ba an zhagade.
41010051	Daada áza Yaisu, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká kátá yá magaká estara kina?» A ŋwanante ge wulfe, a ba ŋane: «Yá kátá ba ice, malum-aaruwa.»
41010052	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Naba zlálá á da, mbakaambe fetarfire á ŋa.» Ba seke ndaha á miya na, shansha ice-aara, a ɗabete Yaisu.
41011001	Herzharanteherzhe Urusaliima am dalbe á ekse-aha buwa tara Baytifaji antara Baytaniya, tá áte vuwa á Wa Anyaranyara maa, Yaisu a ɓelaa pukura-aha-aara buwa á de katafke.
41011002	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Dawmbare á dem ekse na kwaye á katafke á miya na wá, ba tara demda á kure wá, kwá de bera egdza á ezzeŋwa an ŋguɗa, zlaɓe njateka ura áte iga-aara, naba pelawaapele, sawiyansa.
41011003	Máki ura a bakuraa, kwá maga uwe kure, bawananba ge edda-aara geni a ndavanaa Yaakadada, watse á eptsakurnaptsa zlaɓe ádaliye.»
41011004	Mazla-aara ta naba zlala, ta de bera ezzeŋwa áte ŋguɗa áte wakyiya á ura herzhe an we á baráma, ta naba eppela.
41011005	Ta ndavateru ge emnde na tá áhuwa, a ba itare: «Labára kwá pelá ezzeŋwa na?»
41011006	Ta ŋwaterantehe, ta bateraa elva na a ndaateraa Yaisu na, daaci ta naba ƴaterhe ge emnde ŋanna, ta sawa an ŋane.
41011007	Ta sanaa ezzeŋwa na ge Yaisu, ta ndakete kacekaca-aha-aatare áte iga á ezzeŋwa ŋanna, lauktu a njetaa Yaisu átekwa.
41011008	Emnde kwakya ta pelanse kacekaca-aha-aatare áte baráma, emnde umele ta ɗatsaa hyema á debina am fe, itare keni ta se pelanse.
41011009	Daaci ma emnde na tá á katafke á Yaisu, ma emnde na tá am iga-aara keni, baɗemme-aatare tá leva ba hula, a ba itare: «Dadaamiya wá, Slekse. A ganga barka ge edda una á sawa an zherá á Yaakadada na.
41011010	A famfe Dadaamiya barka am kwárá á wulfe á eggyemiya Dawuda na watse mí njá am huɗe-aara na. Dadaamiya am samaya wá, Sleksa ba ŋane palle.»
41011011	Daaci a dem ge Yaisu á dem huɗe á Urusaliima, a zlálá ba suuwe á dem mashidi ƴaikke. De zharanaazhara názu am mashidi maa, ba segashe-aara, ta naba eptsa á dem Baytaniya antara pukura-aha-aara, aɗaba aŋkwa á sawa vaƴiya.
41011012	Makuralla-aara maa, ta naba segashe am Baytaniya, tá aŋkwa á eptsa zlaɓe ádaliye. Ate baráma maa, ŋanaaŋa waya Yaisu.
41011013	A naa mama á nabugda an hyema átekwa ƴiƴiye cekwaaŋguɗi an itare, a naba duhe geni ámbane aŋkwa egdzere átekwa. Duwa-aara á dem ekte á nabugda ŋanna, amá shanka ba názara keni átekwa, sey a jauwa ba hyema, aɗaba sarte a yá á nabugdeka.
41011014	Daaci a ndaase elva-aara áte nabugda ŋanna, a ba ŋane: «Ekka wá, gaɗɗiru tá nánka egdzere áte ka mazla-aara.» Cenarancena pukura-aha una ŋanna baɗemme.
41011015	Am sarte na daraada am Urusaliima maa, Yaisu a de á ba am mashidi ƴaikke. Daduwa á dem mashidi maa, a de beraa emnde a válá kazlaŋa antara emnde a shekwa-aara am huɗe-aara, a naba ŋgyaterse ásegashe. A zaɗanve tabel-aha á emnde a peteke, antara kurshi-aha á emnde a válá takala masar.
41011016	A piyaterte ge emnde a degashe an kazlaŋa am huɗe á mashidi, ge dáná á dem tate umele.
41011017	Daaci a fantau ge kwaraterse názu am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: «Aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba Dadaamiya: Bere-aaruwa wá, tá ɗahaná an bere á mága maduwa á emnde baɗemme. Amá kure, kwa ganve hwalakwa á nabera-aha.»
41011018	Ba ta cenaa una ŋanna male-aha á liman-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita wá, mazla-aara ta naba fantau ge mága pute-aatare ge keɗa shifa á Yaisu. Damda lyawa am itare, aɗaba baɗemme á emnde hayaranhaya jipu elva na a kwaratersaa ŋane.
41011019	Eblyablya vaci maa, ba degashe Yaisu am huɗe á berni antara pukura-aha-aara baɗemme.
41011020	Makuralla-aara an eŋlya-waabere maa, ta naba eptsehe zlaɓe ádaliye, tá sem berni. Am sarte na tá áte baráma á sawa maa, ta naa nabugda na welasewele antara uksuwe-aara baɗemme.
41011021	A naba yehete ge Piyer elva na a ndaasa Yaisu áte nabugda ŋanna. Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, ezzhárá emtsaaɗe, nabugda na ka nyainyaivaa ka áwaya na, emtsamtsa baɗemme.»
41011022	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara baɗemme: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire, máki fakurtarfe an Dadaamiya wá,
41011023	ma kwa banán ba ge wa na náwa ŋane na: Tsetse áhuna, de eblyememblye am haye keni, á naba gevge. Máki magakurka shaige, fakurtaarfe á ba an jirire geni názena kwá ndavaná kure á de gevge wá, ba á gevge ŋanna aɗaba kure.
41011024	Aɗaba una ŋanna yá ndaakur ba jirire, máki kwá ƴeká duksa wá, fawtarfe ba seke shakuránsha duksa ŋanna zlauzle, sey ba kwá shansha.
41011025	Daaci máki kwá aŋkwa á maga maduwa, amá diyakurdiya ganakini aŋkwa slehaypa an kure wá, naba ƴawanarƴe, Eddekure na am samaya na á de ƴakuraarƴe ge kure keni. ((
41011026	Amá má kure kwá ƴateraarka ge emnde wá, Eddekure na am samaya na, á ƴakuraarka ge kure keni.»))
41011027	Saremsa zlaɓe ádaliye á sem Urusaliima maa, ta naba dem mashidi ƴaikke. Yaisu aŋkwa á jaɗaba am mashidi ŋanna, ta naba duhe ge male-aha á liman-aha antara malum-aha á tawraita ira male-aha á larde ádeza Yaisu,
41011028	ta de ndavanu elva, a ba itare: «Ka shanaa áme hákuma á mága duksa-aha na? Emtu a vaktaa ware baráma-aara?»
41011029	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Iya keni, yá ndavakurundave duksa palle. Máki vakuriteva jawápa wá, iya keni yá ndaakurse tate na ni ya shaa hákuma átekwa.»
41011030	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A ɓelanaa ware Yuhanna ge se magaterá baptisma ge emnde? Dadaamiya emtu, emndimagwaha he? Vawiteva jawápa.»
41011031	Ta fantau ge ndahanaa am dagave-aatare emtsaaɗe: «Má mi banaa a ɓelanaa Dadaamiya, watse á bamiya: Labára fakurtaareka an ŋane?
41011032	Má mi banaa ta ɓelanaa ba emndimagwaha keni, zlazlaɗa zlaɓe.» Ta kuva emnde jipu aɗaba baɗemme á emnde fartarfe ganakini Yuhanna nabi á Dadaamiya.
41011033	Aɗaba una ŋanna, «Diyaŋerka», a ba itare tá elvan ge Yaisu. A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Iya keni yá ndaakurka náza-aaruwa ma ya shaa hákuma á mága duksa-aaruwa áza ware keni.»
41012001	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a vaterte elva an naraje na. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Aŋkwa ura umele a ica fe-aara, a dzeɓaa náfá á inabauhi am huɗe-aara, a jantaave an dala, a magaa tate á ɓeca egdza a náfá, ira bere á edda á ufa fe ŋanna, daaci a ƴateraa fe ŋanna baɗemme am erva ge emnde a slera, ŋane a daa shula.
41012002	Samsa sarte á egdza a náfá maa, a naba ɓelaa palle á emnde a slera-aara áseza emnde na a ƴateraa fe am erva na, geni á se lyanvaalya dzaaŋara am egdzara á náfá na.
41012003	Amá itare, ta naba eksevaa sleslera ŋanna, ta zuhe an já, ta ɓelanaahe an erva dey.
41012004	Edda á fe a naba ɓelaa sleslera-aara umele. Ŋane keni ta se zlazlese, ta kyanmaarhe.
41012005	Edda á fe na a naba ɓelaa sleslera-aara zlaɓe ádaliye. Ŋane wá, ta se jaa ba shifa-aara. Kwaye ŋane názena ta magaterte ge emnde a slera á edda á fe. Umele ta shanu ba zlaɗa, umele ta jaa ba shifa-aara.
41012006	A jauwa ba ura palle áza edda á fe ge eɓɓela-aara, egdza-aara ba ge ŋane wayaawáyá jipu na. Am iga-aara a ɓelaa ba ŋane. A ba ŋane: “Egdza-aaruwa ba ge iya na wá, sey tá de fá zherwe áte ŋane.”
41012007	De samsa egdza-aara ŋanna maa, a ba emnde a kwara fe am dagave-aatare: Yawwaa, kwaye samsa edda una watse á zaná ŋane waráta á fe á miya na. Gwawamiyargwe, jaumiya shifa-aara, fe-aara ŋanna á de gev ba náza á miya.
41012008	Daaci ta eksevaa egdza-aara ŋanna, ta naba jaa shifa-aara, ta de eblyanve áte iga á dala.»
41012009	Daaci a ndavateru ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kina wá, watse á magaterá uwe edda á fe ge emnde a kwara fe ŋanna? Ay degiya watse á se ceɓa emnde ŋanna baɗemme, á faterem fe-aara am erva ge emnde umele.
41012010	Aŋkwa naraje am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: Ba nákwá ŋanna ta eblyanvaa emnde a nyáŋa bere na una, a eksantehe ge Dadaamiya, a ganve nákwá na á ŋáná ŋane ndzeɗa á bere ŋanna baɗemme.
41012011	Kwaye ŋane názena a maganaa Yaakadada, shagera ge miya, máki namiyanna duksa ŋanna. Ábi ndaakursende naraje ŋanna.»
41012012	Male-aha á Yahudiya-aha tá kátá eksa Yaisu á ba am sarte ŋanna, aɗaba diyardiya ganakini á ɓálá nákwa ŋanna á ba áte itare. Amá a wateraa lyawa átuge emnde, daaci ba tse-aatare, ta naba zlálá, ta ƴanhe.
41012013	Daaci ta de magaa sawari-aatare, ta ɓelanve Farisa-aha antara emnde á sleksu Hirudus, ge de ndavanu elva tá tsagwaɗaná an ŋane.
41012014	Ta duhe ge emnde ŋanna, a ba itare tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Malum, diyaŋerdiya geni ekka wá, ka slejirire, ɓaaka lambe á ŋa átuge ice á emnde, ɓaaka lambe á ŋa áte ŋgahire á urimagwe keni. Ka, ká kwaraterse ba uŋŋule á Dadaamiya ge emnde. Ndaaŋernda ba jirire, am tawraita á miya mu, aŋkwa emtu baráma á puwaná hadáma ge male á larde á Rauma, ɓaaka he? Ɓuweka ɗekiɗeki, ŋá eppuwa emtu, ŋá puweka he?»
41012015	Amá diyaadiya Yaisu názena a satersa na. Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Labára kwá tsagwaɗitságwaɗa? Sawiyansa shuŋgu yá nanaana.»
41012016	Ta naba de sanaa shuŋgu na. A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Nderáva á ware una áte shuŋgu na? Ira zhera na, zhera á ware?» Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare: «Náza á male á larde á Rauma.»
41012017	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Daaci má estuwa wá, puwawanpuwa ge male á larde názu zlaya-aara, ge Dadaamiya keni názu zlaya-aara.» Baɗemme-aatare tá maga ba najipu á jawapa-aara ŋanna.
41012018	Daaci ta duhe ge Saduki-aha keni ádeza Yaisu. Ba itare emnde na tá bantsa itare, ɓaaka tse á emnde am faya na. Ta se ndavanu elva, a ba itare:
41012019	«Malum, aŋkwa a puwamitaa Muusa, a ba ŋane: má keɗaakeɗa egdza emmeŋara ge ura, a ƴaa mukse ɓaaka egdzere wá, a melesemele egdza emmeŋara ge zhele-aara mukse ŋanna, a fanfa wulfe ge egdza emmeŋara na keɗaakeɗa na.
41012020	Iyau, ndza tá aŋkwa dawalaa vuye ta egdzar mama, duwa á makaji-aatare, a gaa gyaale, amá a naba keɗehe, a ƴaa mukse na, ɓaaka egdzere.
41012021	Daaci a naba melese ge sleɗába-aara mukse na, ŋane keni a naba keɗehe, a ƴaa mukse na ɓaaka egdzere. A melese ge keƴire-aatare keni, ŋane keni ba lahe ŋanna.
41012022	Itare vuye na ta gaa ba mukse ŋanna palle, amá ɓaaka ura a yaa egdzere an ŋane, lauktu á keɗá. Am iga-aatare, a keɗa ge mukse na keni.
41012023	Vaci tse á emnde am faya mu, watse átuge ware mukse na palle? Aɗaba itare vuye na ndza mukse-aatare ba ŋane palle!»
41012024	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kure jakuraaveje áte baráma a jirire. A jakuraa uwe áte barama? Aɗaba diyakurka názu am wakita á Dadaamiya, diyakurka ndzeɗa á Dadaamiya keni ɗekiɗeki.
41012025	Aɗaba máki tsarettse emnde am faya wá, ɓaaka gá mukse, ma ŋwasha keni ɓaaka de gá zhele mazla-aara. Emnde baɗemme tá de njá ba seke malika-aha am samaya.
41012026	Elva a tse á emnde am faya maa, ndaakurseka názena a puwetaa Muusa áte elva a dake emtu? Aɗaba a ba Dadaamiya á elvan ge Muusa áte eggye-aha á kure werre wá: Ba iya una ya Dadaamiya á Ibrahima, ya Dadaamiya á Isiyaaku, ya Dadaamiya á Yakubu.
41012027	Daaci máki estuwa wá, tá á ba an shifa-aatare emndu werre. Aɗaba Dadaamiya wá, ŋane Dadaamiya á emnde na tá an shifa, Dadaamiya á emnde na ni tá an emtseka. Daaci diyaweddiye ganakini jakuraaveje ba jirire.»
41012028	Aŋkwa malum á tawraita umele, a cenanaa á ba an hyema-aara názena ta ndaana tara Yaisu antara Saduki-aha maa, ŋane a nanna ganakini ŋwaterteŋwa Yaisu shagera. Daaci ŋane keni a naba duhe an ndava-aara ádezeŋara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ƴaikka ura-ara am shairiya-aha á Dadaamiya baɗemme?»
41012029	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Eccena kwa, náwa yá ndakndaha: Cenevaacena elva na ba shagera Iserayiila! Yaakadada Dadaamiya á miya wá, ba ŋane palle una Yaakadada.
41012030	Ewwáya Yaakadada Dadaamiya á ŋa an ervauŋɗe á ŋa baɗemme, an shifa á ŋa baɗemme, an eŋkale á ŋa baɗemme, ira an ndzeɗa á ŋa baɗemme.
41012031	Eccena zlaɓe ádaliye náwa buwire-aara: Ewwáya sleriya á ŋa ba seke ire á ŋa. Ɓaaka una á ju ge una-aha ŋanna.»
41012032	A ba malum á tawraita na á elvan ge Yaisu: «Una wá, ŋwakteŋwa shagera, malum. Elva á ŋa na ba kalkale-aara. Yaakadada wá, ba ŋane palle una Dadaamiya, ɓaaka umele.
41012033	Shagera ba urimagwe á wáyá Dadaamiya-aara an ervauŋɗe-aara baɗemme, an eŋkale-aara baɗemme, an ndzeɗa-aara baɗemme, ira á wáyá sleriya-aara ba seke ire-aara. Ƴaikka ba una ŋanna arge sadake á dabba-aha, antara sadake á duksa-aha umele na tá vante ge Dadaamiya.»
41012034	Nanna Yaisu ganakini a ŋwanante á ba an uŋŋule-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ekka wá, a ƴakar ba kapáka palle ge dem kwara á Dadaamiya.» Am iga á una ŋanna, ɓaaka ura a kwamaa ndavanu elva mazla-aara.
41012035	Daaci Yaisu aŋkwa á kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde am mashidi ƴaikke maa, a naba ndavateruhe, a ba ŋane: «Ta bantsa malum-aha á tawraita Almasiihu wulfe á Dawuda mu, a sawa estara?
41012036	Aɗaba ndza a banba Dawuda an hákuma á Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe, a ba ŋane: A ba Yaakadada á elvan ge Yaakadada-aaruwa: Njinja am naɗafa-aaruwa, dem sarte na má ganatervege kelaade-aha á ŋa tate á puwa sera á ŋa.
41012037	Dawuda an ire-aara a ɗahanaa an Yaakadada. Ay á sawa estara kena ni á gev wulfe-aara na?» Baɗemme á dikele á emnde ŋanna, ta cenanvaa á ba an higa.
41012038	Daaci am sarte na aŋkwa á vaterte sera á elva-aha, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Faufa hyema am ire á kure áza malum-aha á tawraita. Aɗaba itare ta emnde a waya marava am zane saɗaɗɗe, tá kátá emnde tá gater use an ga ire am dagave á zlamaha.
41012039	Am mashidi keni maa, tá kátá ba sleɗe na átire ge náza á emnde baɗemme na. Ma am muŋri keni, itare sey tá de kátá ba sleɗe na ni an dárádza jipu na.
41012040	Emnde a za ŋwasha wegyege áte há keni ba itare. Daaci tá slaɗanve maduwa-aatare ákatafke á emnde wá, geni ta emnde a jirire ágire. Itare zlaɗa-aatare á de jauje ge náza á emnde baɗemme vaci shairiya.»
41012041	Daaci a njehe ge Yaisu herzhe an nakwati na tá puwa sadake á nasherire á dem huɗe-aara na, á zhárá emnde tá aŋkwa puwa sadake á dem nakwati na. Á zhárá dikele á emnde a berba, tá puwa sadake-aatare wá, sadake-aatare kwakya jipu.
41012042	Am iga-aatare maa, a tsetehe ge wegyege a mukse umele ŋane taláge, a de puwum kwaɓa-aara buwa.
41012043	Daaci Yaisu a ɗante pukura-aha-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Wegyege a mukse na kwaya ŋane talage ba jipu na wá, ŋane a puwum názá-aara, jauje ge náza á emnde baɗemme.
41012044	Aɗaba itare wá, kwakya nalmane-aatare ta saa ba cekwa-aara ge sadake á nasherire. Amá mukse na wá, ŋane talage. Ɓaaka tsa umele, amá a naba saa názu am rezege-aara baɗemme.»
41013001	Saresse am mashidi ƴaikke maa, a ba pukura-aara umele á elvan ge ŋane: «Malum ezzhara emtsaaɗe jeba á nderáva á mashidi na, ƴaikkire-aara antara zariyire á nákwa-aha-aara na baɗemme.»
41013002	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká nanna una ŋanna baɗemme na wá, watse á mbeɗa baɗemme, ba nákwa palle keni watse á jauka áte ukfeŋara nákwa.»
41013003	De njaanja Yaisu áte ire á Wa Anyaranyara am ndaŋŋire á mashidi ƴaikke. Pukura-aha-aara tara Piyer an Yakuba, Yuhanna ira Andere, itare wá, tá aŋkwa ázeŋara. Ta ndavanuhe ge pukura-aha-aara ŋanna, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane:
41013004	«Ndaŋerndaha watse á magava am sarte-ara una ŋanna? Watse ŋá dise áte uwe ganakini herzhe á magava duksa-aha ŋanna?»
41013005	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kure wá, faufa ba hyema, a se keɗarakuraaka emnde umele.
41013006	Aɗaba watse kwakya emnde na tá de sawa an zhera-aaruwa, ma ware keni á se ba: Ya ŋane ba iya. Daaci tá se keɗa emnde kwakya.
41013007	Watse kwá cenáncena labare á wáva-aha am larde-aha na ba herherzhe an kure, antara am larde-aha na ƴiƴiye an kure, amá gazlauka ɗekiɗeki. Sey á magaavemage una-aha ŋanna, amá zlaɓe zle á duniya ka emtsaaɗe.
41013008	Watse larde umele á de darge larde umele an wáva. Emnde á slekse umele, tá de darge kwara á slekse umele an wáva. Á de gejava haha am tate-aha gergere, á de demda waya am larde-aha gergere. Una-aha ŋanna wá, zlaɓe ba fakta á zlaɗa emtsaaɗe, ba seke náza á mukse na fanantaufe zlaɗa á ya.
41013009	«Amá kure wá, faufa hyema ba shagera áte ire á kure. Aɗaba watse tá dákurá á de katafke á shairiya, tá de slerpákurá an ja am mashidi-aha-aatare. Watse tá de tsákurá á katafke á male-aha á duniya, tá de tsákurá á katafke á slekse-aha aɗaba zhera-aaruwa. Estuwa, kure keni kwá de ndaasendahe seydire áte iya á katafke-aatare.
41013010	Amá wá, sey máki cenaráncena emnde labare á higa am jeba-aha á emnde na tá am duniya baɗemme, lauktu á zla duniya.
41013011	Am sarte na ni watse tá dákurá á de katafke á shairiya na wá, dzamauka ire á názena kwá de ndaaná kure, de ndaundaha ba názena ni á de semsa á sem ire á kure am tate ŋanna. Aɗaba una ŋanna elva á kure ka, á de vakurta ba Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe.
41013012	Am sarte ŋanna maa, emnde umele tá de vaterta ba itare an erva-aatare egdzar mama-aha-aatare ge emnde, geni a de ceɓarateraaceɓa. Dada-aha keni tá de vaterta ba itare egdzara-aatare ge emnde, geni a de ceɓarateraaceɓa. Egdzara umele keni tá de daterar ge dada-aha-aatare antara mama-aha-aatare, tá de ceɓa ba shifa-aatare.
41013013	Emnde baɗemme tá de dá ba kelaadire ádete kure aɗaba zhera-aaruwa. Amá edda una tsaatse shagera dem halavuwa-aara wá, á lyelye shifa-aara.»
41013014	«Watse kwá nanna duksa na ni tá ɗaháná an shagerkire emtaŋka ɗekiɗeki na am tate na zlaya-aara ka. (Ma a ndaasa ware elva-aaruwa na keni, a cenevaacena elva ŋanna ba shagera). Vacite na ni má nakuranna duksa ŋanna wá, watse kyaakya ge emnde na tá am Yahudiya, tá zlerda zhagade á dem huɗe á wa.
41013015	Edda una áte ire á bere keni, a tsuŋka á dem huɗe á bere ge hálá kazlaŋa-aara.
41013016	Edda una am fe keni, a eptseka á sá ge se hálá naŋgyuwe-aara.
41013017	Watse á tsaame kwa zlaɗa á ŋwasha na watse tá á huɗe am sarte ŋanna, antara ŋwasha na tá an egdzara áte erva na!
41013018	Ŋalauŋála Dadaamiya ganakini a gevka lámare ŋanna am sarte á ekhye.
41013019	Aɗaba watse kwakya jipu zlaɗa am sarte ŋanna. Ta nderaa estuwa duniya daga am fakta sem vatena, jerka jeba á zlaɗa ŋanna ɗekiɗeki. Á de jerka keni zlaɗa na ni ta kalle an una ŋanna.
41013020	Ma andze gulanaaka Dadaamiya hare-aha á zlaɗa ŋanna wá, ma andze á jauka ura an shifa ba palle keni. Amá a naba gulanaahe ge Dadaamiya aɗaba emnde na a dzeratersaa ŋane tá átuge ŋane na.
41013021	«Daaci am sarte ŋanna, ma a bakurnaa ware: Náwa aŋkwa Almasiihu áhuna, bi kwaye aŋkwa áhuwa, lyiyauka elva ŋanna ɗekiɗeki.
41013022	Aɗaba watse tá jesaareje almasiihu-aha fida, antara nabi-aha fida am sarte ŋanna. Watse tá maga nalaama-aha antara najipu-aha gergere, geni ambane tá keɗateraakeɗa emnde na ni a dzeratersaa Dadaamiya na áte eŋkale.
41013023	Kure wá, faufa hyema ba shagera, aɗaba fanakuremfa am vuwa zlauzle.»
41013024	«Am iga a hare-aha á zlaɗa ŋanna maa, vaciya á de gevge daŋŋwe baɗemme, tere keni á de máreka parakkire-aara,
41013025	terlyakwa-aha keni watse tá geda á sem áhá, baɗemme á ndzeɗa á názena áte samaya á de gejavtegeje ba ŋarŋare sleɗe.
41013026	Daaci watse tá zhárá ba iya Ura á emnde baɗemme yá aŋkwa á sawa áte kumba, yá sawa an hákuma ƴaikke antara ɗemɗemire.
41013027	Watse yá ɓela malika-aha-aaruwa á dem karáfke-aha á duniya ufaɗe kerɗe, tá jatermaare ge emnde na ya dzeratersaa ya na á sawa am tate-aha baɗemme.»
41013028	«Diyaweddiye á ba áte mama á nabugda. Máki kwa nanna gedaageda hyema átekwa, ƴaaƴa umele aŋwaslire wá, diyakurdiya ganakini herzhavteherzhe madare.
41013029	Una keni ba duksa palle. Máki aŋkwa á magava duksa-aha ŋanna wá, diyaweddiye ganakini iya keni yá á ba áte we á sera mazla-aara ge sawa.
41013030	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: emnde a zamane na tá de zlauka ba estuwa, sey máki naranna duksa-aha ŋanna.
41013031	Tara samaya an haha wá, tá nabe keɗa, tá zlauzle. Amá elva-aaruwa wá, á keɗeka ɗekiɗeki, sey má gevge.»
41013032	«Amá elva á hárá á bere, antara sarte ŋanna wá, ɓaaka slediya-aara ɗekiɗeki. Ma malika-aha am samaya, ba Egdza á Dadaamiya keni diyaaka, sey diyaa ba Dadaamiya palle ŋane Dada.
41013033	Daaci faufa hyema, pauka hare, aɗaba diyakurka sarte ŋanna.
41013034	Una ŋanna watse á magava ba seke náza á edda á há, má á daa shula. Lauktu á zlálá, á faterem huɗe á há-aara am erva ge emnde a slera-aara, ma ware keni á far slera na á de maganá ŋane, á vante sawari ge slewufa á wakyiya, geni a peka hare ɗekiɗeki.
41013035	Daaci ba duksa palle ge kure keni. Pauka hare, tsakwautsakwa hyema, aɗaba diyakurka sarte na ni á de sá edda á há átekwa na. Bi watse á sá an maŋgaripu, bi an huɗe á vaƴiya, bi an ireŋlya, bi an eŋlya.
41013036	Máki saasa am beressire wá, a se berakurka kwá am hare.
41013037	Elva ŋanna ya bakurnaa iya na wá, ge emnde baɗemme. Daaci baɗemmire á kure, pauka hare, tsakwautsakwa hyema!»
41014001	A juwaa ba hare buwa tá maga muŋri á Paska antara muŋri á depaiŋ na ɓaaka shahi á makala am huɗe-aara na. Am sarte ŋanna maa, male-aha á liman-aha, antara malum-aha á tawraita, tá aŋkwa tatayaná á ba an ndzeɗa dabari ganakini tá eksevaksa Yaisu á ba an nasherire, tá keɗanaakeɗa shifa-aara.
41014002	A ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Magaumika una vaci muŋri, geni a tsaranteka emnde elva.»
41014003	Am sarte na Yaisu am Baytaniya maa, a dem mbá á Simaun umele ndza á waná derve. Tá arge ɗafa maa, a duhe ge mukse umele an kuderá á waye umele tá ɗahaná an nardisa, á se emtake, kwakya gane-aara keni. Daaci mukse na a naba kezlanvuhe ge we á kuderá á waye ŋanna, a puwanem waye na am ire ge Yaisu.
41014004	Emnde na tá aŋkwa áhuwa ŋanna wá, emnde umele-aatare a naba jaterhe ge ervauŋɗe, a ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Azara nampire-aara kina ta badzanve waye na?
41014005	Ábi ma andze tá naba veluvele ma gursa deremke keni, daaci ma tá naba tegatertega ge talaga-aha.» Daaci ta fantau ge far haypa ge mukse na.
41014006	Amá a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Weshawananteka ire ge mukse na. Labára kwá hyainá lyuwa? Názena a maginaa ŋane na shagera jipu.
41014007	Aɗaba talaga-aha wá, ma vaatara keni watse tá á ba átevege kure. Ba kelaa má kwá kátá magaterá shagerire, watse ba kwá emmaga. Amá iya wá, watse ya ɓaaka átevege kure.
41014008	Mukse na wá, ŋane maginaamaga názena ni a dzegwanaa ŋane. A puwiyar waye na wá, tsatsiyaatsatse zlauzle ge ɓeliya am evege.
41014009	Yá ndaakur ba jirire, am huɗe á duniya baɗemme, baɗemme á tate na ni tá de ɓálá labare á higa átekwa na wá, tá de ndaha názena ni a maganaa mukse na keni, tá de viyanaaka.»
41014010	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a naba tsetehe ge Yahuda Iskariyaut, ŋane keni ba palle á pukura-aha kelaawa ju buwa. A duhe ge ŋane ádeza male-aha á liman-aha, a de bateraa á kátá velateru Yaisu.
41014011	Higa ge male-aha na, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Watse ŋá vakte nalmane.» Daga á ba am sarte ŋanna, Yahuda a fantau ge tataya faterem Yaisu am erva-aatare.
41014012	Am váha zuŋŋwire na ni tá zá muŋri na ɓaaka shahi á makala am huɗe-aara na wá, tá ceɓán ba vacite ŋanna egdza kyawe á Paska. Ta ndavanu ge pukura-aha-aara, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ká kátá ŋá de tsatsakaná áme ɗafa á Paska?»
41014013	Daaci Yaisu a eksetaa emnde buwa am pukura-aha-aara, a ɓelateraa á de katafke. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Dawmbare á dem huɗe á ekse, kwá de já ire antara zhele á sepa yawe am hwama wá, ɗabauɗaba á dem mba na á duwa ŋane.
41014014	De bawanánba ge edda á há wá, a ba Malum: Áma bere na ŋá de zá ɗafa á Paska am huɗe-aara antara pukura-aha-aaruwa?
41014015	Daaci ŋane á de marakurá bere ƴaikke átire ge bere an tsatsa kazlaŋa am huɗe-aara baɗemme, kwá de tsatsamiya ɗafa á muŋri am huɗe-aara.»
41014016	Daaci ba zlálá ge pukura-aha na á dem huɗe á ekse, tá de bera duksa ba seke una a baternaa Yaisu na. Ta tsatsaa ɗafa á muŋri am bere ŋanna.
41014017	Am iga a maŋgaripu maa, daada Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara.
41014018	Am sarte na tá aŋkwa á zá masane, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire, watse á veliya ba palle á kure, kwa emnde na náwa má zá ɗafa átirpalle na.»
41014019	Daaci baɗemme á pukura-aha jáviya ba tá kyuwa. Ta fantau ge ndavanu an palpale, ma ware keni á baná ba: «Iya ka ndza Yaakadada?»
41014020	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Watse á veliya ba palle á kure, kwa pukura-aha kelaawa ju buwa na náwa má zá ɗafa am tása palle na.
41014021	Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, ɓaaka pekya-aara, sey ba yá emtsa. Áte una ta puwete am wakita á Dadaamiya áte ya wá, ba estuwa. Amá watse zlaɗa jipu ge edda una ni á de veliyá ŋane, ambane ma yareka.»
41014022	Am sarte na tá aŋkwa zá masane maa, Yaisu a eksetaa ɗafa, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a kezlanve ɗafa na, daaci a vaterte ge pukura-aha-aara. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Nawmbare, lyauvalya. Una na wá, vuwa-aaruwa.»
41014023	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a eksante feka, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a vaterte, itare baɗemme sharushe. Am sarte na tá aŋkwa esshá, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
41014024	«Una ŋanna uzhe-aaruwa a puvaa aɗaba emnde kwakya, Dadaamiya á ŋguɗaterá an una ŋanna namána ge emnde.
41014025	Yá ndaakur ba jirire, am sali kataliya na wá, yá dalika á shá yawe á egdza a náfa mazla-aara, sey watse yá de shá ba una áŋwaslire am zlanna á Dadaamiya.»
41014026	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ta eksante láhe á gálá Dadaamiya, ba tse-aatare, ta zlálá ádete ire á Wa Anyaranyárá.
41014027	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Baɗemme á kure na watse kwá ƴiyaaƴa. Aɗaba aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: “Watse yá ejja suni, baɗemme á kyawe-aha tá de zaɗevzaɗe.”
41014028	Amá má watse tsanetse am faya wá, watse yá daada ba iya zuŋŋwe arge kure á dem Galili.»
41014029	A ba Piyer á elvan ge ŋane: «Ma ƴarakaaƴa emnde umele keni, iya wá, yá taa ƴakaaka ɗekiɗeki.»
41014030	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yá ndak ba jirire, an vaƴiya ba vatena na, lauktu á kyuwetekyuwa tsákálá ge buwire wá, watse ká banba ka ser keƴe geni diyakikire.»
41014031	Amá a farhe zlaɓe ádaliye Piyer, a ba ŋane: «Yá ndaaka una ɗekiɗeki. Ma á eksa shifa keni, emtsa á miya ba buwa.» Pukura-aha umele keni baɗemme ta ndaha ba una.
41014032	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, daraada am tate umele tá ɗahaná an Gaicaimane. A ba ŋane á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Njawinja áhuna, kwaye iya yá de maga maduwa áhuwa.»
41014033	A eksetaa tara Piyer an Yakuba ira Yuhanna, á zlálá antara itare á dem tate ŋanna. Daaci a fantau ge tápá emtaŋkire, antara zlaɗa na ni an tsaka ire na am ervauŋɗe-aara.
41014034	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ɓaaka zlaɗa na ni yá tapanka am ervauŋɗe-aaruwa na, yá tápá zlaɗa á emtsa. Naba njawinja áhuna, pauka hare ɗekiɗeki, sherauseshere ice ba shagera.»
41014035	A zlalehe ƴiƴiye cekwaaŋguɗi an itare, a de kezlaa ugje am haha, a magaa maduwa, a ŋala Dadaamiya geni máki á gevge wá, a sawka zlaɗa ŋanna ásete ŋane.
41014036	A ba ŋane: «Eddaye-aaruwa, ɓaaka názu á gevka ázeŋa. Tasle á ŋa, jinaaja zlaɗa na ásete iya na. Amá wá, a gevge ba namaari á ŋa arge náza-aaruwa.»
41014037	Daaci ba tse-aara wá, a seza pukura-aha keƴe na, amá a se berater tá am hare. A ba ŋane á elvan ge Piyer: «Simaun, ka ŋara ka pa hare? Dzegwakanka njá an ice ba saa palle keni degey?
41014038	Pauka hare! Magaumaga maduwa geni a badakuruka shaitaine. Aɗaba ire á urimagwe wá, wayaawáya jipu mága fesaarfire, amá ɓaaka payɗa á vuwa.»
41014039	A zlalehe zlaɓe ádaliye, a de magaa ba maduwa-aara ŋanna.
41014040	Eptsa-aara zlaɓe ádaliye áseza pukura-aha-aara, a se berater tá á ba am hare. Dzegwaránka ɓasha háre ɗekiɗeki. Daaci ta ba haslakke ba estuwa, ɓaaka názu tá ŋwananta itare.
41014041	Am sarte na a eptsa ge keƴire, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kure kwá pá ba hare á kure, kwá aŋkwa á puwansepuwe shifa á kure ka? Ay degiya hyaahya pa hare ŋanna, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme, hyephye sarte-aaruwa. Kwaye tá de fime am erva ge emnde a haypa.
41014042	Tsawetse, kwaye samsa edda una ni a veliyaa ŋane na, mí de yainuye!»
41014043	Ba elva ŋanna keni zlaɓe zlanaaka Yaisu wá, kerteŋ tá zhárá ba sesse Yahuda palle á pukura-aha kelaawa ju buwa. Emnde kwakya tá sá ɗaba Yahuda ŋanna, tá an katsákar-aha, antara zade-aha ceppe am erva. Ta ɓelateraa male-aha á liman-aha, antara malum-aha á tawraita, ira male-aha á Yahudiya-aha.
41014044	Yahuda na a veluwa ŋane Yaisu na maa, kwaratersekware zlauzle nalaama á ŋgyekwaterá Yaisu ge dikele á emnde ŋanna. A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ba máki kwa niina yá aŋkwa gan use ge ura ni, seke aŋkwa urire á ŋere an edda-aara wá, edda una kwá tatayaná kure na ba ŋane, naba eksauváksa, ŋawanaaŋa ba shagera, má kwá danda na ɓelawanaaka.»
41014045	Ba samsa Yahuda ŋanna wá, a naba duhe suuwe ádeza Yaisu wá, «Use Malum,» a ba ŋane, á gan use an ervauŋɗe-aara palle ágire.
41014046	Daaci yalla á ba emnde na, erva am mbiye ge Yaisu, ta naba eksevaahe.
41014047	Ay, palle á emnde á Yaisu a naba teɗese masalam-aara am bere, a waa sleslera á male á liman-aha, a icanaa hyema palle.
41014048	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde na ta se eksa ŋane: «Kwá se eksiyá an masalam-aha, antara zade-aha am erva na mu, ya neyle emtu?
41014049	Ábi kelaazare yá njá á ba am dagave á kure am mashidi, yá aŋkwa kwaraterse elva á Dadaamiya ge emnde, labára eksakurika? Amá diyaweddiye geni una ŋanna a gev ba geni, a gevge názena á ndaaná wakita á Dadaamiya.»
41014050	Daaci kyaakya zhagade ge pukura-aha baɗemme, ta naba ƴánhe.
41014051	Aŋkwa dawale umele a ɗaba Yaisu maa, ŋane a duwá á ba an gwaɗau-aara áte vuwa. Ta ekseksa ŋane keni,
41014052	amá a naba ƴateraa gwaɗau am erva, ba zhagade-aara an ukhyiye dey.
41014053	Daaci ta naba daa Yaisu na á dem mba á male á male-aha á liman-aha baɗemme. Kerteŋ jarammeje male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á larde, ira malum-aha á tawraita baɗemme am mba á liman ŋanna.
41014054	Piyer wá, a daa ɗaba Yaisu ádehuwa, amá wá, gaterápteka ɗekiɗeki. A de demhe á ba á dem riya á liman ŋanna. Áhuwa maa, a de demhe am dagave á emnde a ufa mashidi, tá aŋkwa cena kárá, a njehe.
41014055	Male-aha á liman-aha antara emnde a kendekyiya na baɗemme farantaufe ge tataya emnde ge mága seydire áte Yaisu, ma ba fida keni, lauktu ma tá bá ŋanaaŋa shairiya á emtsa.
41014056	Kwakya tsa emnde na ta de ɗatsanve fida ge Yaisu, amá ɓaaka názu ta eksanaa áte ŋane.
41014057	Daaci ta tsetehe ge emnde umele, ta de magaa seydire á fida na áte Yaisu, a ba itare:
41014058	«Zhel na degey ndza ŋa cenáncena am mbuwe-aara a ba ŋane: Yá naba mbeɗánaambeɗa mashidi ƴaikke na ta nderanaa emndimagwaha na, yá nderaalindere á ba am hare keƴe, á duka erva á urimagwe á dem huɗe-aara, á bina.»
41014059	Aley, ba itare keni jammeka elva-aatare am seydire-aatare.
41014060	Daaci a tsete ge liman ƴaikke na á katafke á emnde baɗemme, a ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu: «Ká ndaaka elva ɗekiɗeki ka? Tá ndáhá uwe ŋane áte ka emnde na?»
41014061	Amá ŋwaaka Yaisu, a ɗu ba we-aara. A ndavanuhe zlaɓe ádaliye ge liman na, a ba ŋane: «Ba ekka una ka Almasiihu, Egdza á Saksage na emtu?»
41014062	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Ane, ya ŋane ba ya. Amá baɗemmire á kure na, watse kwá niina zlaɓe ádaliye iya Ura á emnde baɗemme, yá njá am naɗafa á Saksage na Sleksa ba ŋane na. Zlaɓe ádaliye watse kwá niina yá sawa am kumba á samaya.»
41014063	Ba a ndaase una Yaisu wá, liman ƴaikke na a naba dzadzanve zane áte vuwa-aara. A ba ŋane: «Una wá, ŋa ɓaaka an wedere á seyde umele mazla-aara.
41014064	Ábi kwa cenanaa á ba an hyema á kure, a ganve ire-aara kalle an Dadaamiya. Ázara a ba elva á kure?» A ba itare baɗemme-aatare, «Una wá, ŋanaaŋa shairiya, a njeka an shifa ɗekiɗeki.»
41014065	Daaci emnde umele ta fantau ge kyefanem nyaihe am ice ge Yaisu, ta faɗanse ice an kacekaca, ta vavante ɗeɗekwa, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Diyeddiye emnde na ta jakja na.» Ta eksante emnde a ufa mashidi, ta vavante babarva itare keni.
41014066	Amá Piyer wá, zlaɓe ba nja-aara am áhá-aara, am huɗe á há ŋanna. Daaci a duhe ge palle á kwatena-aha á liman ŋanna ádezetare,
41014067	a naa Piyer á cená kárá, a zharaa Piyer ba shagera, a ba ŋane: «Ábi ka keni ka ba ura á Yaisu ŋanna, ura Nasarátu na?»
41014068	Amá eksarka Piyer ɗekiɗeki, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ma ká ndaha elva á uwe keni, diyanka ya ɗekiɗeki. Elva á ŋa na á duka á dem ire-aaruwa.» Daaci a naba tsetehe am tate ŋanna, a zlala ásete wakyiya. Tsaktsakwalikwaa, á ba tsákálá keni.
41014069	Cekwaaŋguɗi wá, kwatena na nanna Piyer zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Degiya zhel na kwaya ŋane na keni, ba palle-aatare.»
41014070	Amá Piyer ba eksarka ŋanna. Shekwaashekwa cekwaaŋguɗi a ba emnde na tá áhuwa, tá elvan ge Piyer: «Ɓaaka shaige-aara ɗekiɗeki, ka keni ka ba palle-aatare. Aɗaba ekka keni, ka ura Galili.»
41014071	Amá Piyer a fantau ge za waɗa-aha, a ba ŋane: «Náwa Dadaamiya diyanka dawale ŋanna ɗekiɗeki.»
41014072	Ba ŋane keni zawze waɗa wá, tsaktsakwalikwaa, á ba tsákálá ge buwire. Daaci a naba yehete názena a ndaana Yaisu. Aɗaba a bananba Yaisu: «Lauktu á kyuwetekyuwa tsákálá ge buwire wá, ká de banba ka ser keƴe geni diyakikire.» Daaci a naba fantau ge kyuwa.
41015001	Daaci makuralla-aara á ba an eŋlya-waabere, ta naba jamme ge male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á larde, malum-aha á tawraita ira male-aha umele na tá njá am kendekyiya na baɗemme. Ta puwete zawa áte Yaisu, ta dáná ádeza sleksu Pilaatu.
41015002	A ndavanu ge slekse, a ba ŋane: «Ba ka una ka slekse á Yahudiya-aha tá enndá na?» A ŋwanante ge Yaisu: «Ba estuwa,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane.
41015003	Male-aha á liman-aha ta fantau ge ɗatsanve fida kwakya ge Yaisu.
41015004	Daaci a ba sleksu Pilaatu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká cenánka elva na tá tsakaná itare áte ka na emtu? Labára ká ndaaka elva?»
41015005	Amá Yaisu ɗuwa ba we-aara, ndahaaka elva mazla-aara, haa Pilaatu á maga najipu-aara.
41015006	Ba kelaa má samsa muŋri á Paska maa, mbarsemba emnde a ekse, slekse á ɓelaterá daŋgay palle, edda una tá kataná itare.
41015007	Ay am sarte ŋanna maa, ndza aŋkwa dawale umele, zhera-aara Barabas an ŋguɗa am daŋgay. Ta halateraa antara emnde umele, ta magaa fitenire, haa ta naba ja shifa am fitenire ŋanna.
41015008	Daaci ta naba ɗálá emnde a ekse ádeza sleksu Pilaatu, ta de ndavanu názena ni mbarsembe ba kelaa iva na.
41015009	A ba sleksu Pilaatu á elvan ge itare: «Wayakurwáyá emtu an slekse á Yahudiya-aha, yá ɓelakurnaaɓela?»
41015010	Diyaadiya tsa ganakini male-aha á liman-aha ta danaa Yaisu aɗaba ba shelha, ɓaaka elva umele.
41015011	Amá male-aha á liman-aha ta naba fantau ge gaa ervauŋɗe á emnde. Aɗaba una ŋanna ta bantsa itare: «Ɓelaŋernaaɓela ba Barabas.»
41015012	A ndavateruhe zlaɓe ádaliye ge slekse, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ay yá maganá uwe ge edda una kwá ɗahaná an slekse á Yahudiya-aha na?»
41015013	Ta ŋwanante á ba an ká kwara á dem zhegela, a ba itare: «Zleŋelezleŋela áte dzaŋgala!»
41015014	A ba slekse á elvan ge itare: «A gu uwe estuwa?» Amá itare ta far hula á ba an ndzeɗa, a ba itare: «Zleŋelezleŋela!»
41015015	Am slekse á kátá higatertehiga emnde, a naba ɓelateraa Barabas. Amá Yaisu wá, ta zu an já, lauktu tá de zleŋelaná áte dzaŋgala.
41015016	Daaci ta naba teɗante ge sawji-aha á dem huɗe á há á sleksu Pilaatu, ta de jemmaa sawji-aha baɗemme ásetarge ŋane.
41015017	Ta tsekwanme am dira haŋŋe, ta nderse dake, ta faɗanse ire an ŋane agire ɗaŋkaula.
41015018	Mazla-aara ta fantau ge gyanu rume agire, a ba itare: «Aska á ŋa, slekse á Yahudiya-aha.»
41015019	Ta naba taɗanu zade am ire, ta kyafanem nyaihe am ice, ta kezlaa ugje á katafke-aara, tá fá daradza áte ŋane agire.
41015020	Zlaruzle am epsawepsawa maa, ta tsakwanse am dira na, ta tsekwanme am naŋgyuwe-aara. Daaci ta danse á dem tate na tá de zleŋelaná átekwa na.
41015021	Tá aŋkwa danda maa, ta naba jaa ire antara ura Siraine umele, zhera-aara Simaun, eddetare ge tara Alaikzandere antara Rufus, ŋane átira sa á sawa am makwata. Daaci sawji-aha na ta naba hyarhe ge sepala dzaŋgala á Yaisu.
41015022	Ta danhe Yaisu na á dem tate na tá ɗahaná an Gaulgauta na, amaana: Tate á feka á ire.
41015023	Áhuwa ŋanna maa, ta kátá fanu mbazla ge Yaisu. Mbazla ŋanna keni aŋkwa duksa ƴaiƴaihe am huɗe-aara ge gulanna zlaɗa, amá Yaisu shaaka.
41015024	Mazla-aara ta naba zleŋelehe áte dzaŋgala. Itare ta tegaa kazlaŋa-aara am dagave-aatare. Ge tega kazlaŋa-aara na wá, ta maga njeri am dagave-aatare, ganakini a sesse edda una ni á zaná ŋane ma uwe keni.
41015025	Am sarte na ta zleŋelanaa áte dzaŋgala ŋanna wá, ta zleŋelanaa am saa maselmane á eŋlya.
41015026	Ta naba puwete dalila á já shifa-aara an ire ge ŋane, a ba itare: «Ŋane una slekse á Yahudiya-aha.»
41015027	Tá aŋkwa neyle-aha buwa ta zleŋelateraa átirpalle antara Yaisu áte dzaŋgala-aha-aatare. Palle ta zleŋelanaa am naɗafa-aara, palle keni am nazlaɓa-aara. ((
41015028	A gevaa estuwa názena ni a ndaana wakita á Dadaamiya. Aɗaba a ba wakita á Dadaamiya: «Ŋane keni ta femhe am kezlakula á emnde a mága haypa.»))
41015029	Emnde a degáshe am tate ŋanna tá geja ba ire, tá ámbera ezzlazle. A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Há! ba ka una! Ábi ka bantsa ka: Ká naba mbeɗanaambeɗa mashidi ƴaikke na, á ba am hare keƴe ká nderendere umele, á ba ka?
41015030	Labára ká taa ŋezlanaaka ba ka ire á ŋa? Tsekwanaatsekwa kwa ire á ŋa áte dzaŋgala na!»
41015031	Male-aha á liman-aha, antara malum-aha á tawraita keni, ta epsawse ba estuwa. A ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Iyau, á dzegwándzegwa ŋezla emnde umele; ire-aara wá, á taa ŋezlanaaka!
41015032	Ábi ŋane Almasiihu, slekse á Iserayiila keni ba ŋane. A tsekwanaatsekwa ire-aara áte dzaŋgala wá, baɗemme mí fetarfe áte ŋane.» Antara ba emnde na ta zleŋelateraa antara Yaisu na keni, ta ezzlazle.
41015033	An vacitire wá, a naba tsekwaa ge tabeɗammire ásetarge duniya baɗemme, dem lásar emnde tá á ba am tabeɗammire ŋanna.
41015034	Am saa keƴe wá, Yaisu a ketaa kwárá á ba an ndzeɗa: «Aili! Aili! Laima sabaktani?» Amaana wá: «Dadaamiya-aaruwa labára ƴakiyaaƴa? Dadaamiya-aaruwa labára ƴakiyaaƴa?»
41015035	Á bá emnde umele am emnde na tá aŋkwa á tsatse áhuwa: «Á ɗaha nabi Ailiya degiya ŋane.»
41015036	Palle-aatare a naba teɗante zhagade, a de eksetaa sausau, a ŋguɗetaa áte zade, a femhe am mbazla umele ɗaŋɗaŋe ba estuwa, daaci a kante, a fantaa áte we ge Yaisu geni a shushe. Daaci a ba ŋane: «Zharaumizhárá emtsaaɗe, má watse á semsa Ailiya ŋanna á se tsekwanaatsekwa.»
41015037	Amá Yaisu a fu hula á ba an ndzeɗa, mazla-aara á dese ge shifa am ŋane.
41015038	Am sarte ŋanna maa, aŋkwa kacekaca á dzegwa am mashidi ƴaikke wá, a naba tamme kalkale, a fantau á sawa átire sem áhá.
41015039	Male á sawji-aha á Rauma na aŋkwa áhuwa, á njá am ndaŋŋire á wafke á Yaisu, nanna emtsa a Yaisu maa, a ba ŋane: «Zhel na wá, egdza á Dadaamiya ba jire.»
41015040	Ŋwasha umele keni ndza tá aŋkwa áhuwa. Ta tsaahe ƴiƴiye, lauktu ta zhara názena ni aŋkwa á magava na. Tá aŋkwa tara Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, an Salaume, ira Maari emmetare ge tara Yakuba cekwa antara Yauseys.
41015041	Ŋwasha ŋanna wá, daga am Galili tá aŋkwa ɗaba Yaisu, tá aŋkwa melanumele. Tá aŋkwa zlaɓe ádaliye ŋwasha umele am tate ŋanna, itare keni ta saa á ɗaba ba Yaisu.
41015042	Vacite ŋanna maa, vaci mága niya, aɗaba makuralla-aara kwaskwe á puwansepuwe. Herzhe á belya vaci wá,
41015043	a semhe ge Yusufa ura Arimatiya. Yusufa ŋane wá, ura male am kendekyiya ƴaikke. Am ervauŋɗe-aara ŋane keni aŋkwa á ufa ba zamane á njá am kwara á Dadaamiya. Daaci ŋane a naba sherse ice, a duhe ádeza sleksu Pilaatu, a de ndavanu baráma á eksa emtsa á Yaisu.
41015044	Cenáncena sleksu Pilaatu ganakini kerteŋ emtsamtsa Yaisu, a mága ba najipu-aara. Aɗaba una ŋanna a ɓelaa we, ta de ɗahanante male á sawji-aha. A se ndavanuhe, a ba ŋane: «Emtsa-aara shekwaashekwa emtu?»
41015045	Am sarte na cenáncena jirire-aara áza male á sawji-aha na, a naba vante baráma ge Yusufa.
41015046	Daaci Yusufa a de shekuve kalpakane, jeba á kalpakane ŋanna ba lefeɗɗe, a se tsekwaa emtsa á Yaisu áte dzaŋgala, a de faɗeme am kalpakane na. Daaci a de feme am evege ta yese am cacera, a berhanu palame ƴaikke ge we á evege ŋanna.
41015047	Amá tara Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, antara Maari emmeŋara ge Yauseys wá, itare ndza tá á ba áhuwa, ta ezzhara am sarte na tá heɗá Yaisu ŋanna.
41016001	Dedde kwaskwe á puwansepuwe maa, tara Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, antara Maari emmeŋara ge Yakuba, ira Salaume, ta de shekuve waye-aatare á se emtake, ta fehe, geni watse tá de wecar ge emtsa á Yaisu.
41016002	An eŋlya werre ge laade, lauktu á sessa vaci wá, daraada itare ádete irekhya.
41016003	Am sarte na tá átira duwa, a ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Kina mu, watse á berhamiyanvuwa ware dada palame na ge we á evege?»
41016004	Amá daraada wá, ta de beraa ba an berha dada palame ŋanna áte we á evege.
41016005	Ta naba duhe á dem huɗe-aara wá, ta de beraa ba dawale á njá am naɗafa, am naŋgyuwe dzayye. A naba jaterhe ge lyawa ŋwasha na.
41016006	«A wakurka lyawa,» a ba dawale ŋanna á elvan ge itare. «Aɗaba kwa se tataya Yaisu ura Nasarátu na ta zleŋelanaa áte dzaŋgala na. Ŋane ɓaaka áhuna, tsetse am faya. Náwa tate na ndza á zlava ŋane átekwa na.
41016007	Kina wá, kure wá, zlauzlálá, dawateranda labáre ge pukura-aha-aara, Piyer keni á ba am itare. Baira ɗeme watse á daada ba Yaisu ŋanna zuŋŋwe arge kure, á dem Galili. Kwá de nanaana áhuwa, ba seke una ndza bakurnaa ŋane.»
41016008	Daaci ba segashe-aatare am irekhya na wá, ta teɗante zhagade emtsaaɗe ge lyawa, tá gyagya ba seke maagara, palle á ura á baná elva ge ura ɓaaka am itare, aɗaba gazlargazla jipu.
41016009	Am sarte na tsetsa Yaisu am faya, an eŋlya werre ge laade na wá, a maranse ire-aara ge Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala zuŋŋwe. Mukse ŋanna wá, ndza ŋgyanseŋgye Yaisu jini-aha vuye am ŋane.
41016010	A de ɓalatersaa ŋane labáre á tse á Yaisu am faya ge emnde na ta ɗába ŋane. A de berater baɗemme tá á ba am emtaŋkire, tá kyuwa.
41016011	Aŋkwa á bateranba ɗeme mukse na ganakini tsetsa Yaisu am faya, a naana á ba an ice-aara, aley fartarka.
41016012	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a marateraa ire-aara ge emnde buwa-aatare, tá áte baráma dete makwata, amá a nyanve ire-aara seke ŋane ka.
41016013	Ta daahe, ta de ɓalaterse labáre-aara ge emnde-aatare umele, aley ba fartarka ŋanna.
41016014	Shekwaashekwa zlaɓe ádaliye maa, Yaisu a de marateraa ire-aara ge pukura-aha-aara kelaawa jemtekwe tá arge ɗafa. A naba velateraahe aɗaba ɓaakire á fetarfire antara degdegire á ire na ta maganaa itare na. Aɗaba fartarka an emnde na ta naa ŋane á ba an ice-aatare am iga a tsetse-aara am faya.
41016015	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Zlauzlálá á dem huɗe á duniya baɗemme, dawateranda labáre á higa na ge emnde baɗemme.
41016016	Ma a fetaara ware, lyevaalya baptisma, á lyelye shifa-aara. Edda una má fetarka wá, á de ŋezleka am shairiya á Dadaamiya.
41016017	Náwa najipu-aha na watse tá naana emnde, tá maganá emnde a fetarfe. Watse tá ŋgya jini-aha am ura an zhera-aaruwa. Watse tá ndáhá elva áŋwaslire na ni ba itare keni diyarka na.
41016018	Watse tá puwaterar erva ge emnde na ta lapika-aha, tá de mbembe. Zlaɓe ádaliye, ma ta halante zahe am erva, ma ta shu daldalkwanu keni, ɓaaka nazu á magateránmaga duksa-aha ŋanna.»
41016019	Am sarte na ni zlauzle á tsakaterá elva Yaakadada Yaisu ge pukura-aha-aara maa, a naba kapte á dem samaya, aŋkwa á njá am naɗafa á Dadaamiya.
41016020	Pukura-aha-aara keni, ta naba kyaa á de ɓálá labáre á higa am huɗe á duniya baɗemme. Ndza aŋkwa Yaakadada an itare am slera-aatare. A maratersaa ŋane ge emnde geni waazu-aatare jirire, aɗaba a magaa najipu-aha gergere á kyá erva an itare.
42001001	Áska á ŋa Tiyaufilus, Emnde kwakya puwartepuwa labáre á názena a magava am dagave á miya.
42001002	Ta puwete názena ŋa cenanaa áza emnde na ta naana an ice-aatare duksa ŋanna daga á ba am fakta-aara. Emnde ŋanna wá, Dadaamiya a faterar slera á ɓalaterá labáre ŋanna ge emnde baɗemme.
42001003	Aɗaba una ŋanna, iya keni ya fantau ge pakya sera-aara daga fakta-aara dem halavuwa-aara, hayananhaya jipu am mbarka á ŋa. Una ŋanna yá aŋkwa puwakte ge ekka keni názena ya shanaa ya na baɗemme, yá puwakte á ba áte una ya cenanaa ya na kalkale.
42001004	Baɗemme á una yá magán ba geni ekka keni ka diyeddiye jirire á elva ŋanna ta ndakndaa na.
42001005	Am zamane na ni ndza sleksa Hirudus am Yahudiya maa, ndza aŋkwa liman umele zhera-aara Zakariya, ŋane palle á liman-aha na male-aatare liman Abiya. Zhera á mukse-aara Ailizabait, ŋane wulfe á Haruna male á liman-aha werre.
42001006	Bukerɗe-aatare antara mukse-aara ta emnde a jirire á katafke á Dadaamiya, ta emnde a fansaare ge shairiya-aha á Yaakadada baɗemme.
42001007	Amá egdzere wá, sharánka ba palle keni, aɗaba Ailizabait dziire. Am sarte ŋanna wá, bukerɗe-aatare garevge emgyegwar emnde.
42001008	Vacite umele maa, Zakariya aŋkwa á maga slera á limanire-aara á katafke á Dadaamiya, aɗaba daada áte itare liman-aha á Abiya baɗemme.
42001009	Ge tega slera-aatare am dagave-aatare liman-aha maa, mbarsembe maga njeri. Daaci vacite ŋanna maa, daada áte ŋane ganakini á de ɗizaná ŋane kajiiji am mashidi á Yaakadada.
42001010	Am sarte á ɗiza kajiiji ŋanna maa, baɗemme á emnde tá maga maduwa á ba ágashe.
42001011	Daaci a naba jesaarhe ge malika á Yaakadada á katafke á Zakariya, a tsaahe áte vuwa á duksa na tá ɗiza kajiiji átekwa na, am naɗafa-aara.
42001012	Ba a puwete ice áte ŋane Zakariya wá, a naba gazlehe, ɓaaka názu á ndaana ŋane.
42001013	Amá a ba malika á elvan ge ŋane: «Zakariya, a waŋka lyawa. Aɗaba Dadaamiya lyevaalya maduwa á ŋa. Mukse á ŋa Ailizabait á de yaka egdzere zhele, watse ká fá zhera-aara Yuhanna.
42001014	Watse á gev higa ƴaikke ge ekka. Emnde kwakya tá de higatehiga aɗaba egdze ŋanna.
42001015	Aɗaba áza Yaakadada wá, watse ura male ba ŋane am emnde. Ŋane wá, watse á sheka mbazla antara názu á já eŋkale á ura baɗemme. Ŋane watse an naha ba Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe am ŋane daga á sawa am huɗe á emmeŋara.
42001016	Watse á jatermaara ŋane ge Iserayiila-aha kwakya á sem sera á Yaakadada Dadaamiya-aatare.
42001017	Watse á sawa ŋane á katafke á Yaakadada, hala-aara antara hákuma-aara watse ba kalkale antara náza á nabi Ailiya werre. Á se jemá ŋane ye á dada-aha antara egdzara-aatare. Emnde na tá fansaareka ge Dadaamiya keni, á se tsatermaara ŋane. Á se tsatsaná ŋane emnde ge ufa Yaakadada.»
42001018	Amá a ba Zakariya á elvan ge malika: «Yá dise áte uwe ganakini una ŋanna á de gevge? Aɗaba ŋere antara mukse-aaruwa baɗemme ŋa emgyegwar emnde.»
42001019	Daaci a ŋwanante ge malika, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Iya wá, ya malika Jeberilla. Ya tsetaa á katafke á Dadaamiya, ya sleslera-aara. A ɓeliyaa ba ŋane ganakini yá saká labáre á higa na.
42001020	Amá faktarka an iya. Ay degiya watse á gevge ba jirire, má hyephye laukte-aara. Aɗaba faktarka ŋanna wá, ká gevge uce, ká taa ndaaseka elva ɗekiɗeki, dem sarte na má gevge duksa ŋanna.»
42001021	Am sarte ŋanna maa, baɗemme á emnde tá ufa ba Zakariya ágashe, tá maga ba najipu á shekwaashekwa-aara am mashidi.
42001022	De sesse maa, dzegwánka ndaater elva ɗekiɗeki, a ŋgyakwateraa elva-aara á ba an erva. Ta dise áte una ŋanna emnde ganakini aŋkwa názu a naaná ŋane am mashidi.
42001023	Am sarte na zlauzle slera á limanire á Zakariya maa, a naba dahe á dem mba-aara.
42001024	De haraare cekwaaŋguɗi am mba maa, mukse-aara Ailizabait a naba shaa huɗe. Amá a essheɓe, tere ilyeɓe á sheɓa ba ŋane. A ba ŋane am ervauŋɗe-aara:
42001025	«Kina wá, siisessa Yaakadada am zherwe am dagave á emnde.»
42001026	Ailizabait an huɗe á tere uŋkwahe maa, Dadaamiya a naba ɓelaa malika Jeberilla á dem ekse á Nasarátu am kwara á Galili.
42001027	A ɓelanaa ádeza gyaale umele, á shebaná dawale na zhera-aara Yusufa na. Yusufa ŋanna wá, ŋane wulfe á sleksu Dawuda. Zhera á gyaale na a shebanaa ŋane Maari.
42001028	Daaci a demhe ge malika na ádeza gyaale ŋanna, a de gan use-aara, a ba ŋane: «Use gyaale. Ekka wá, Dadaamiya Yaakadada magakánmaga ŋgurna, aŋkwa ŋane antara ka.»
42001029	Amá use-aara ŋanna weshanantewesha ire ge Maari, a ba ŋane am ervauŋɗe-aara: «Ázara kena jeba á ga use na?»
42001030	A ba malika á elvan ge ŋane: «A waŋka lyawa Maari. Aɗaba Dadaamiya magakánmaga ŋgurna.
42001031	Kina wá, watse ká shá huɗe, ká de yá egdzere zhele, ká de faná zhera á Yaisu.
42001032	Watse ura male, Egdza á Dadaamiya Slekse. Watse Dadaamiya á vante sleksire ba seke náza á eggyeŋara Dawuda werre.
42001033	Á de kwaraná ŋane larde á Iserayiila dem ba ge ɗekiɗeki. Sleksire-aara á de tseka ɗekiɗeki.»
42001034	A ba Maari á elvan ge malika: «Á de magava estara una ŋanna? Aɗaba iya, ya ba gyaale.»
42001035	A ŋwanante ge malika, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Watse á sawa Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe á setarge ekka, á de maganá ba Dadaamiya Slekse hákuma-aara am ka. Aɗaba una ŋanna, egdze na ká de yaná ka na wá, watse cuɗeɗɗe, ŋane Egdza á Dadaamiya.
42001036	Vareŋa Ailizabait keni á huɗe á egdzere zhele, gevge emgyegwe á mukse tsa. Ndza dziire tsa, amá a shaa huɗe tere uŋkwahe vatena.
42001037	Aɗaba ɓaaka názu á janviya ge Dadaamiya.»
42001038	Daaci a ba Maari: «Iya ya kwatena á Dadaamiya. A giyanvege Dadaamiya á ba áte una ka ndaana ka.»
42001039	Á ba am sarte ŋanna maa, ba watsewatse a naba tsetehe ge Maari, a naba zlala á ba an hadzala, á dem mba á vareŋara Ailizabait am ekse umele am huɗe á wa a Yahudiya.
42001040	Daaduwa, á de demhe am mba á Zakariya, a de gan use ge Ailizabait.
42001041	Am sarte na cenancena Ailizabait use-aara, egdzere am huɗe-aara a naba fantau ge fatsava. A nahetaa á ba am sarte ŋanna Ailizabait an Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe,
42001042	a ba ŋane á ba an ká kwara: «Dadaamiya a gakar barka ba ge ekka am dagave á ŋwasha baɗemme. Barka-aara a njinja am egdze na am ekka na.
42001043	Ya hyep ware ha ni emmeŋara ge Yaakadada-aaruwa á sem mba-aaruwa na?
42001044	Ya ndaana aɗaba uwe una? Aɗaba am sarte na ya cenaa ga use á ŋa na wá, egdzere a naba fantau ge shekela am huɗe-aaruwa á higa.
42001045	Higa ƴaikke ge ekka, aɗaba faktarfe am ervauŋɗe á ŋa ganakini názena ta ɓalakseɓale na á de ganvege Yaakadada baɗemme.»
42001046	Daaci a ba Maari: «Yá gálá Yaakadada Dadaamiya an ervauŋɗe-aaruwa baɗemme.
42001047	Á higa ervauŋɗe-aaruwa kwakya áte ŋane Slelya shifa-aaruwa.
42001048	Aɗaba ŋane á zhárá ba iya ya kwátena-aara na hyainepka ba uwe keni. Daga ba kina keni tá aŋkwa á banba emndimagwaha, tá de banba zlaɓe adaliye ma vaatara keni, geni yá an barka á Dadaamiya am vuwa.
42001049	Aɗaba Dadaamiya na Sleksa ba ŋane palle na a magiyaa duksa ƴaikke. Ŋane wá, zhera-aara cuɗeɗɗe.
42001050	Á de zatervaara ba ŋane zlaɓe ádaliye ge emnde na tá an lyawa-aara am ervauŋɗe dem eggye-aha.
42001051	Maganaamaga ŋane slera ƴaikke an ndzeɗa á erva-aara, a zaɗanve emnde a mága kuravire,
42001052	a tsekwaa slekse-aha áte sleksire, a vaterte daradza ge talaga-aha.
42001053	A gater barka kwakya ge emnde na peteke erva-aatare, amá a puwaa emnde a berba an erva-aatare ilyeɓe.
42001054	A tsaterme am iga ge emnde a slera-aara Iserayiila-aha. Aɗaba viyanaaka magaterá shagerire-aara ge emnde-aara,
42001055	áte una ndza a banán ge eggyemiya Ibrahima, ganakini watse á maganán ge ŋane dem eggye-aha-ŋara baɗemme na.»
42001056	Á hyephye tere keƴe a maganaa Maari am mba á Ailizabait, lauktu a zlala á dem mba-aara.
42001057	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a naba hyephye ge sarte á Ailizabait, daaci a naba yaa egdzere zhele.
42001058	Am sarte na cenaráncena vara-aha-ŋara antara emnde a slala-aatare, ganakini Dadaamiya a magateraa shagerire kwakya, ta naba sawa, ta se higa antara itare.
42001059	Am hare ge tiisire maa, ta naba eptsehe zlaɓe ádaliye ge se ɓela egdzere am sheɗekwe, antara ge fá zhera. Itare tá kátá fá Zakariya cepen á eddeŋara,
42001060	amá a ba emmarge egdzere: «Estuweka, zhera-aara Yuhanna.»
42001061	Amá a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ábi ba palle á ura tá ɗahaná an zhera na keni, ɓaaka am emnde á ŋa.»
42001062	Daaci ta ndavanu ge eddarge egdzere, ta ŋgyakwanaa an ŋgyakwa, geni á kátá faná zhera-ara ge egdza-aara.
42001063	Daaci Zakariya a ndavateru naláwa, ta vante, a puwete: «Zhera-aara Yuhanna,» a ba ŋane. Baɗemme á emnde tá maga ba najipu-aara.
42001064	Ba a puwete zhera ŋanna wá, kerteŋ a naba pelehe ge nara-aara keni, a fantau ge ndaha elva, á gala Dadaamiya á ba an ká kwara.
42001065	Daaci baɗemme á emnde a slala-aatare, ta farhe zlaɓe ádaliye ge mága lyawa á Dadaamiya am ervauŋɗe-aatare, ta hyanme labáre ŋanna am huɗe á wa a Yahudiya baɗemme.
42001066	Baɗemme á emnde na ta cenaa labáre ŋanna, ta fantau ge dzamaná am ire-aatare geni watse á gev ware egdze ŋanna á de katafke. Amá ba jirire ndza aŋkwa hákuma á Yaakadada antara egdze ŋanna.
42001067	Ba vaci fá zhera ŋanna maa, Zakariya eddarge egdzere a naba nahete an Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe, a fantau ge mága nabiyire, a ba ŋane:
42001068	«Yaakadada Dadaamiya á Iserayiila-aha wá, ɓaaka kalle-aara. Aɗaba a tsaterme am iga ge emnde-aara, aŋkwa ŋezlaterŋezla,
42001069	a naba jansaare ge slelya ura an hákuma jipu am dagave á wulfe-aha á sleslera-aara Dawuda.
42001070	Maganaamaga názena ndza a ndaase á kya an we á nabi-aha-aara werre.
42001071	Aɗaba ndza a ndaase werre ganakini watse á ŋezlamiŋezla am erva á kelaade-aha, ɓaaka názu tá de eksaná itare áte miya ɗekiɗeki.
42001072	Ndza a baterán ge eggye-aha á miya ganakini watse á zatervarze dem eggyeggye, á de viyanaaka namana-aara ɗekiɗeki. Una ŋanna á maganá ŋane kina.
42001073	Aɗaba ndza a zanu ba waɗa-aara Dadaamiya ge eggyemiya Ibrahima,
42001074	ganakini watse á ŋezlemiyaaŋezla am erva á kelaade-aha á miya, á de gamive emnde a slera-aara na ni tá an higa an ervauŋɗe,
42001075	ta emnde cuɗeɗɗe, ta emnde a jirire á katafke-aara ma vaatara keni.
42001076	«Ay ekka wá, egdza-aaruwa, ká de gev nabi á Dadaamiya Slekse. Aɗaba ká de zlálá ka á katafke á Yaakadada, ká de tsatsanaa ka baráma-aara.
42001077	Watse ká fateremá ka am vuwa ge emnde-aara ganakini á se lyaterá ŋane, á se ƴateraare haypa-aha-aatare baɗemme.
42001078	Aɗaba kwakya wayavire antara maggwire á Dadaamiya. Á de maraminá ba ŋane parakkire-aara á sawa am samaya,
42001079	ge maraterá parakkire ge emnde na tá am tabeɗammire, tá kuva emtsa na; antara ge kwaramise zlálá áte baráma á hairire.»
42001080	Daaci a walte ge Yuhanna, farfe eŋkale-aara keni ba kwakya, a fantau ge de njá am kaamba, dem sarte na ni a marse ire-aara á katafke á Iserayiila-aha-aatare baɗemme, ganakini ŋane sleslera á Dadaamiya.
42002001	Á ba am sarte ŋanna yaireya Yuhanna na maa, jerje elva á sawa áza male á haha á Rauma baɗemme, zhera-aara Agustus, geni sey tá já jembel á emnde na tá am kwara-aara baɗemme.
42002002	Já jembel á emnde ŋanna wá, zuŋŋwire-aara ba una ŋanna. Am sarte ŋanna maa, ndza Kiriniyus una slekse ƴaikke am haha á Siriya.
42002003	Daaci baɗemme á emnde, ma ware keni a zlala, á de puwa zhera-aara á ba am ekse-aara.
42002004	Yusufa keni maa, a naba tsetehe am Nasarátu am kwara á Galili, a zlala á dem Baytilama ekse á sleksu Dawuda werre am kwara á Yahudiya. Aɗaba ŋane wulfe á Dawuda ŋanna.
42002005	Daaci ta zlala antara Maari na á shebaná ŋane lyemlye huɗe na, geni ta de puwa zhera-aatare itare keni.
42002006	Am sarte na tá am Baytilama ŋanna maa, a naba hyephe ge sarte á Maari,
42002007	a yaa egdzere zhele, egdzere zuŋŋwire-aara. A yanaa á ba am bere á dabba-aha, aɗaba ɓaaka sleɗe am bere á wayve-aha ge kwakyire á nalga. Daaci a faɗeme am baukta, a zlavanaahe am náza za duksa á dabba-aha.
42002008	Am ekse ŋanna maa, tá aŋkwa suni-aha wá, itare tá njá á ba am kaamba-aatare. An vaƴi wá, tá hare á ba tsákwá hyema áte walda-aha-aatare.
42002009	An vaƴi vacite ŋanna maa, a naba jesaarhe ge malika á Yaakadada á katafke-aatare, Yaakadada a naba maraa parakkire-aara an tsaka ire ásete itare wá, jaterja lyawa jipu.
42002010	Amá: «A wakurka lyawa,» a ba malika na á elvan ge itare. «Aɗaba ya sakuraa labáre á higa, á de gev higa ƴaikke ge emnde baɗemme.
42002011	Aŋkwa yarakuraaya Slelya ura á ba an vaƴi na, am ekse á Dawuda. Egdze ŋanna wá, ba ŋane una Almasiihu, Yaakadada.
42002012	Náwa názena ni kwá de dise egdze ŋanna átekwa: watse kwá de berá egdzere áŋwaslire an faɗa am baukta, á zlava am náza za duksa á dabba-aha.»
42002013	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, kerteŋ, jarsaarje dikele á malika-aha umele á sawa am samaya, ta se jamme antara ŋane, ta fantau ge gala Dadaamiya, a ba itare:
42002014	«Daradza wá, á zlayán ba ge Dadaamiya palle am samaya. A tsekwaa hairire-aara á sem duniya, á sem emnde na ni a wayateraa ŋane.»
42002015	Am sarte na ƴaraterƴa malika-aha, zlarzlálá á dem samaya maa, a ba suni-aha am dagave-aatare: «Mi zlalawa á dem Baytilama, mí de zhara názena a jesaara áhuwa, a baminaa Yaakadada na.»
42002016	Daaci ta naba tsetehe, ta zlala á ba an hadzala, ta de beraa Maari antara Yusufa, ira egdzere áŋwaslire á zlava am náza za duksa á dabba-aha.
42002017	Zhararaazhárá egdzere maa, ta tsakse názena ni a baternaa malika áte egdze ŋanna baɗemme.
42002018	Baɗemme á emnde na ta cenaa názena ta tsakatersaa suni-aha na, tá maga ba najipu.
42002019	Maari wá, ŋane cenáncena elva ŋanna baɗemme, ŋanaaŋa am ire-aara, aŋkwa á eddzama am ervauŋɗe-aara.
42002020	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, ta naba eptsa-aatare suni-aha na á dem tate-aatare. Tá aŋkwa gálá Dadaamiya am ƴaikkire-aara átira zlala. Ta galanaa aɗaba názena ta naana itare, antara názena ta cenanaa itare na baɗemme, aɗaba ta de beraa duksa na a baternaa malika na baɗemme.
42002021	Am hare ge tiisire maa, hyephye sarte ge ɓela egdzere am sheɗekwe. Ta fete zhera keni ba vacite ŋanna. Ta fete zhera á Yaisu. Una zhera na ni a ndaana malika, ba huɗe-aara keni zlaɓe shanka emmeŋara na.
42002022	Hyephye sarte á bara Maari maa, ta naba zlala á de maga názena a ndaana tawraita á Muusa áte mukse na a yaa egdzere, geni a gevge cuɗeɗɗe zlaɓe ádaliye. Daaci ta duhe, ta dáná antara egdzere á de katafke á Yaakadada am mashidi ƴaikke am Urusaliima, geni átuge ŋane.
42002023	Aɗaba aŋkwa an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya, geni baɗemme á egdzere zhele na egdza walire na wá, á wálá átuge Yaakadada.
42002024	Ta vanta antara sadake-aatare ge Yaakadada áte una a ndaana tawraita-aara, a ba ŋane: «Tá fá takala-aha buwa bi takala-aha á masar buwa.»
42002025	Ay, am sarte ŋanna maa, ndza aŋkwa zhele umele am Urusaliima, zhera-aara Simaun. Zhele ŋanna slefa-zherwe áte Dadaamiya jipu, ura mággwe. Ŋane á ufa ba edda una ni watse á se lyaterá ŋane Iserayiila-aha baɗemme na. Aŋkwa Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe keni antara ŋane.
42002026	A ndandaha Sheɗekwe ŋanna, geni ŋane á emtseka ɗekiɗeki, máki nánka Almasiihu Sleɓela á Yaakadada.
42002027	Ay, vacite ŋanna maa, a naba banánba Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe, geni a ezzlala zlaɓe ádaliye á dem mashidi ƴaikke. Am sarte na ni tara emmeŋara antara eddeŋara ge Yaisu, ta daa Yaisu á dem mashidi ge de maganaa názena a ndaana tawraita na wá, ta de beraa ba Simaun ŋanna.
42002028	Simaun a de lyevaa egdze na am erva-aara, a naba slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane:
42002029	«Yaakadada-aaruwa, kina wá, gevge názena ndza ka binaa ka na. Ƴanƴa a emtsemtsa sleslera á ŋa á ba an hairire.
42002030	Aɗaba puwantepuwa ice-aaruwa áte edda una ni ka ɓelanaa ka ge se lya emnde.
42002031	Ya nanna uŋŋule á lya na ka tsatsateraa ka ge nalgaadama baɗemme.
42002032	Una wá, ŋane parakkire na ni á de marakse am ice á emnde a duniya baɗemme, tá de diyaksediye. Á de gev daradza ƴaikke ge emnde á ŋa Iserayiila-aha keni.»
42002033	Tara emmeŋara antara eddeŋara ge Yaisu, tá maga ba najipu á elva na á tsakaná Simaun áte egdza-aatare na.
42002034	Simaun a naba gater barka. Am iga á una ŋanna, a ba ŋane á elvan ge Maari: «Egdze na náwa ŋane na wá, á de maraterná ŋane Dadaamiya ge emnde, amá tá de lyiyeka emnde. Dadaamiya a eksese ŋane, ganakini ŋane á gev náza vaterte ektápaare ge emnde kwakya am Iserayiila-aha. Á ba am Iserayiila-aha ŋanna zlaɓe ádaliye, emnde kwakya tá de shá ƴaikkire, á de katerteka Dadaamiya aɗaba ŋane.
42002035	Estuwa, á se marsá ŋane ásegashe názena tá slaslaná emnde am ervauŋɗe-aatare baɗemme. Ekka emmeŋara keni maa, ɓaaka zlaɗa na ni watse ká tapánka ka am ervauŋɗe á ŋa na.»
42002036	Ndza aŋkwa mukse umele nabi, zhera-aara Hanna, ŋane egdza á Fanuyail. Fanuyail ŋane wulfe á Asair werre. Hanna ŋanna gevge emgyegwe a mukse kurcumme. Am gyaalire-aara, ndza ta magaa ba yawe vuye antara zhele-aara na a sanse am mba á eddeŋara, daaci a naba keɗehe ge zhele-aara.
42002037	Am iga á una ŋanna wá, gaaka zhele umele mazla-aara, a nja ba wegyegye a mukse. Vaƴi vacika a maganaa ba slera ge Dadaamiya, á eksa ndera, á ŋala ba Dadaamiya-aara am mashidi. Daaci am sarte ŋanna ta daa Yaisu á dem mashidi na wá, mukse ŋanna shanaasha yawe kul tiise ju ufaɗe.
42002038	A gateraptehe ge emnde a há á Yaisu. Ŋane keni a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya. Daaci a fantau ge baterá elva-aara ge emnde na tá ufa ba sarte na ni Dadaamiya á se lya Urusaliima na.
42002039	Am sarte na zlarnaazle emnde a há á Yaisu mága názena a ndaana tawraita á Yaakadada maa, ta naba da-aatare an egdzere á dem ekse-aatare am Nasarátu am kwara á Galili.
42002040	Egdze ŋanna aŋkwa á farfe an wala, antara an dzaŋdzaŋire. Egdze ŋanna an eŋkale jipu, an barka á Dadaamiya am vuwa.
42002041	Ba kelaa sakanderi emnde a há á Yaisu tá de maga muŋri á Paska am Urusaliima.
42002042	Ate iva na Yaisu shanaasha yawe kelaawa ju buwa, ta duwa antara ba ŋane.
42002043	Zlauzla muŋri wá, ta naba da-aatare, amá ta ƴaa egdzere am Urusaliima, itare diyarka.
42002044	Ta kurken ŋane keni á ba aŋkwa am dagave á emnde na ta saa kerɗe. Lauktu tá diyeddiye wá, varváha deppe á zlala. Am iga á una ŋanna, ta fantau ge tatayanaa áza emnde-aatare ge itare, antara áza emnde a diyava-aatare baɗemme,
42002045	amá sharánka. Daaci ba eptsa-aatare zlaɓe ádaliye á dem Urusaliima.
42002046	Am hare ge keƴire lauktu ta de shanaa am mashidi ƴaikke, á njá am dagave á malum-aha, aŋkwa á cenatercena, ámbera á ndavateru elva-aha.
42002047	Baɗemme á emnde na tá cená názena a ndaana ŋane, tá maga ba najipu áte ŋane. Aɗaba kwakya eŋkale-aara, jawapa-aha-aara á ba an uŋŋule-aara.
42002048	Ba ta puwete ice-aatare áte ŋane tara emmeŋara an eddeŋara wá, tá maga ba najipu-aara. A ba emmeŋara á elvan ge ŋane: «Labára ka magaŋeraa una, egdza-aaruwa? Ŋere antara eddeŋa, daŋeremda am dzama ire ƴaikke aɗaba ka, ŋá ámbera tatayaktataya kinekineka.»
42002049	A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kwá tatayiyá aɗaba uwe? Diyakurka ganakini zlaya-aaruwa ge njá am bere á Edderwa emtu?»
42002050	Amá cenaránka názu am elva-aara ŋanna ɗekiɗeki.
42002051	Daaci a naba saa antara itare á sem Nasarátu. A fatersaarfe jipu. Amá emmeŋara wá, ba palle keni elva-aha ŋanna keɗarka ɗekiɗeki, baɗemme á ba am ire-aara.
42002052	Daaci aŋkwa farfa Yaisu an wala, antara an eŋkale. Hayanhaya Dadaamiya egdze ŋanna, emnde keni hayaránhaya baɗemme.
42003001	Haraare áte iva na mala Tibairiyus am haha á Rauma, shanaasha yawe kelaawa jiilyeɓe am malire-aara wá, ndza sleksa Pauntiyus Pilaatu am kwara á Yahudiya, Hirudus slekse am kwara á Galili, egdza emmeŋara Filip á kwará Ituriya antara Tarakaunitisa, Lisaniyus slekse am kwara á Abilain.
42003002	Male-aha á liman-aha wá, tara Hanas antara Kayafas. Am laukte ŋanna maa, Dadaamiya a naba banaa elva-aara ge Yuhanna egdza á Zakariya am kaamba.
42003003	Daaci Yuhanna a naba fantau ge ja ɗaba an waazu am ekse-aha na herherzhe an guwa á Urdun na baɗemme, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Magaumágá tuba, lyauvaalya baptisma, á ƴakuraarƴe Dadaamiya haypa-aha á kure.»
42003004	Estuwa wá, názena a puwetaa nabi Aisaya na gevge. Aɗaba a ba ŋane: «Aŋkwa ura á ɓala elva am kaamba, a ba edda-aara: Tsatsawanaatsatse uŋŋule ge Yaakadada, tsawanaatse baráma-aara ba ndeɗɗe.
42003005	Baɗemme á ɗambake-aha watse á gevge ba kalkale, Wa-aha antara gavaye-aha baɗemme watse ɓaaka, Kwaana-aha á baráma keni watse á njeka, baɗemme watse ba tsekke. Baɗemme á baráma na an badza na, á de gevá an memiya áte kalkalire.
42003006	Baɗemme á emnde watse tá nanna uŋŋule a lya na ni a tateraa Dadaamiya.»
42003007	Daaci kwakya emnde ta kelaa ádeza Yuhanna am kaamba ŋanna, ganakini á magateránmaga baptisma. Amá a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Egdzara á kelaade-aha na, a bakurnaa ware ganakini magaumága tuba, watse kwá de eŋzleseŋzle am názena á de magaterná Dadaamiya ge emnde na tá aŋkwa am ervauŋɗe-aara na?
42003008	Magaumága kure názena ni tá diyeddiye átekwa ganakini kure wá, ƴakuránƴa mága á kure werre, magakurnaamaga tuba. Bawánka mazla-aara am ire á kure ganakini miya wá, mi egdzara á Ibrahima miyenne, ázara lámbe á miya. Yá bakurá ba jirire: ba nákwá-aha na náwa ŋane na keni, Dadaamiya an hákuma á gaterve egdzara á Ibrahima.
