42023002	Daraada ákatafke á slekse maa, ta de fantau ge ica sera á Yaisu á ba áhuwa. Ta banán ge slekse: «Náwa zhel na á wesha larde á miya. A bantsa ŋane, a varanteka hadáma ge male á larde á Rauma ɗekiɗeki. A bantsa ŋane zlaɓe: Ba iya una ya Almasiihu, ya slekse ƴaikke.»
42023003	A ndavanuhe ge sleksu Pilaatu: «Ba ka una slekse á Yahudiya-aha na emtu?» A ŋwanante ge Yaisu: «Ba estuwa.»
42023004	A ba Pilaatu á elvan ge male-aha á liman-aha antara dikele á emnde ŋanna baɗemme: «Shanánka ya haypa áte zhel na dammaru ge záná an shairiya.»
42023005	Amá itare ta farhe zlaɓe ádaliye á ba an ndzeɗa, a ba itare: «Degey an názena á kwaratersa ŋane ge emnde na á tsante fitenire am larde á miya! Kwaye ndza a fantau á ba am Galili, amá a se hyanme am Yahudiya baɗemme, se ba áhuna keni samsa an ŋane!»
42023006	Sleksu Pilaatu ba a cenaa ta tsalante Galili am huɗe-aara na wa, a fantau ge ndáva tate na ni a sawa Yaisu átekwa, a ba ŋane: «Zhel ŋanna ura Galili emtu?»
42023007	Am sarte na diyeddiye ganakini Yaisu a sawa á sa am tate na á kwaraná sleksu Hirudus, a naba ɓelanaa ádezeŋara. Aɗaba am hare-aha ŋanna Hirudus keni á ba am huɗe á Urusaliima.
42023008	Sleksu Hirudus a higa jipu am sarte na a puwete ice-aara áte Yaisu. Aɗaba haraare á cená ba labare-aara, haraare á kumá ba ŋane, geni watse á nanna najipu ázeŋara.
42023009	Daaci a ndavanu elva-aha gergere, amá ŋwanárka Yaisu ɗekiɗeki.
42023010	Tá aŋkwa male-aha á liman-aha, antara malum-aha á tawraita áhuwa maa, ta fantau ge ica sera á Yaisu á ba an ndzeɗa.
42023011	Mazla-aara sleksu Hirudus antara sawji-aha-aara ta fantau ge valyanse elva a epsawa ge Yaisu, ta epsawse ba ŋga, ta tsekwanme am zane zariya jipu, ta naba eptsanaahe ádeza sleksu Pilaatu.
42023012	Garevge slakate-aha ba vacite ŋanna tara Hirudus an Pilaatu, aɗaba ndza ta emnde a dágala.
42023013	Sleksu Pilaatu a jemaa male-aha á liman-aha, antara male-aha á ekse ira emnde a ekse baɗemme,
42023014	a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Náwa kwa siyaa zhel na, a ba kure á wesha larde, amá ya ndavanu elva-aha ŋanna á ba ákatafke á kure, shanánka haypa-aara áte una kwa se puwar ugje kure ganakini á ŋanaaŋa shairiya.
42023015	Hirudus keni shanka haypa na a guwaa zhel na ganakini á ŋanaaŋa shairiya. Aɗaba una ŋanna a eptsanaahe zlaɓe ádaliye ásezemiya. Estuwa, ba ɓaaka haypa na a guwaa ŋane hyephye ja shifa-aara.
42023016	Aɗaba una ŋanna, yá zuze á ba an ja, daaci yá ɓelanaaɓela.» ((
42023017	Am mbarsembe emnde ba kelaa muŋri á Paska sey slekse á ɓelaterá daŋgay palle maa,))
42023018	baɗemme-aatare ta jar ye ge Yaisu, a ba itare tá elvan ge Pilaatu á ba an ka kwárá: «Ejja zhel na a njeka an shifa ɗekiɗeki, ɓelaŋernaaɓela Barabas.»
42023019	Barabas wá, ta ŋguɗanaa aɗaba fitenire umele ta tsante am huɗe á ekse antara elva á shifa.
42023020	Sleksu Pilaatu wá, ŋane á kátá ɓela Yaisu. Aɗaba una ŋanna, a se mbeɗateruhe zlaɓe ádaliye elva-aara ge emnde a ekse.
42023021	Amá ta ŋwanante á ba an hula: Zleŋelezleŋela áte dzaŋgala, zleŋelezleŋela áte dzaŋgala, zleŋelezleŋela áte dzaŋgala, baɗemme-aatare ba estuwa.
42023022	A ndaaterhe zlaɓe ádaliye sleksu Pilaatu ge keƴire: «Labára ŋane ge kure? A gu uwe ŋane zhel na diyanka ya na? Iya wá, diyanka ya haypa na a guwaa ŋane, hyephye ja shifa-aara na. Yá zuze á ba an ja, yá ɓelanaaɓela.»
42023023	Amá itare tsaraatse degdege á ba áte náza-aatare, ta farhe zlaɓe ádaliye ge hula geni a zleŋelarzleŋela Yaisu. Daaci jejje am ire á Pilaatu, ta ganaa ba itare ndzeɗa.
42023024	Mazla-aara a naba eksarhe geni a gevge názena tá kataná itare ŋanna.
42023025	Daaci a naba ɓelateraa edda una ta danaa aɗaba fitenire á dem daŋgay, antara elva á shifa na, a vaterte Yaisu geni tá de maga názena tá kataná itare áte ŋane.
42023026	Tá aŋkwa á dánda Yaisu maa, de jarja ire antara ura Siraine umele zhera-aara Simaun átire sa á sawa am makwata maa, ta naba eksevaahe, ta far sepa dzaŋgala á ba an ndzeɗa, á ɗaba Yaisu an ŋane.
42023027	Estuwa dikele á emnde a ekse ta daa ɗaba Yaisu na antara ŋwasha. Ŋwasha na wá, tá ámbera kyuwa, tá tsaka ɗákwa.
42023028	Amá a eptsavte ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋwasha ŋanna: «Kure ŋwasha-aha á emnde a Urusaliima, kyuwawika iya, amá kyuwaukyuwa ire á kure antara egdzara á kure.
42023029	Aɗaba aŋkwa á sawa hare-aha na ni tá de bánba emnde: Sharánsha ire-aatare ŋwasha dziire antara ŋwasha na zlaɓe faranuka uɓa-aatare ge egdzere, ira ŋwasha na tá yeka mazla-aara na.
42023030	Am sarte ŋanna maa, tá de bateranba emnde ge wa-aha saɗaɗɗe: Mbeɗawaŋerarmbeɗe. Tá de bateranba ge egdzar wa-aha: Sheɓawaŋervesheɓe taslawa á kure!
42023031	Aɗaba má ta magante una ge nafa áŋwáslá, watse átsáme kena náza á náfá na an ula?»
42023032	Á ba am sarte ŋanna maa, tá aŋkwa emnde a bádza sleɗe ta buwa, ta daterhe antara Yaisu, ta de ceɓatera átirpalle.
42023033	Daraada am tate ŋanna tá ɗahaná an Feka á Ire na maa, ta naba zleŋelaa Yaisu, antara emnde a bádza sleɗe ŋanna áte dzaŋgala-aha-aatare, palle am naɗafa-aara, palle keni am názlaɓa-aara.
42023034	Amá a ba Yaisu: «Eddaye-aaruwa, naba ƴateraarƴe haypa-aatare, aɗaba diyarka.» Itare ta tegaa kazlaŋa á Yaisu am dagave-aatare. Ge ettega-aara wá, ta maga njeri ganakini a sesse edda una ni á zaná ŋane ma uwe keni.
42023035	Emnde baɗemme tá á ba á tsatse, tá ezzhara. A ba male-aha á Yahudiya-aha ágire tá epsawepsawa: «Ábi ŋane a lyese emnde umele? A lyelye kwa ire-aara keni, má ba ŋane una Almasiihu a eksesaa Dadaamiya.»
42023036	Sawji-aha keni ta ganaptehe, ta de valyananse elva a nyainye, ta maranaa mbazla ɗaŋɗaŋe tá kátá fanufe.
42023037	A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ábi ka bantsa ka, ka slekse á Yahudiya-aha, lyelye kwa ba ka ire á ŋa!»
42023038	Náwa názu ta puwetaa itare áte naláwa, ta fetehe áte dzaŋgala átire ge Yaisu: «Ba ŋane una slekse á Yahudiya-aha.»
42023039	Emnde a badza sleɗe na ta zleŋelateraa antara Yaisu na, palle-aatare a naba zlazlese Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Gakefka Almasiihu mazla-aara emtu? Lyelye kwa ire á ŋa, lyaŋerlye ŋere keni.»
42023040	Amá a naba valarhe ge palle na, a ba ŋane: «Ekka wá, labára á waŋka lyawa átuge Dadaamiya? Ka keni ká á ba am zlaɗa ŋanna tsa.
42023041	Miya antara ka wá, á jamiya ba haypa á miya. Názena tá magamiyán ge miya ba deydey á názena mi maganaa miya keni. Amá ŋane mu, a gu uwe, ábi ɓaaka?»
42023042	Daaci a ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu: «Tasle á ŋa iya wá, vacitu watse ká de sawa an ƴaikkire á ŋa na, ba tasle á ŋa yehiteyeha iya keni.»
42023043	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yá baka ba jirire: Ba vatena na, mí dá ba buwa á dem zlanna á Dadaamiya.»
42023044	Am sarte ŋanna wá, á maga vacitire. Amá má a de tsekwaa ge tabedammire wá, duniya baɗemme ɓaaka vaciya, dem saa keƴe ba estuwa. Kacekaca á dzegwa na am mashidi ƴaikke keni, a naba tamme kalkale am dagave.
42023046	Daaci Yaisu a naba kante kwárá á ba an ndzeɗa, a ba ŋane: «Eddaye-aaruwa, fanakemfa shifa-aaruwa am erva ge ekka.» Ba a ndaase una ŋanna, mazla-aara a naba emtsehe.
42023047	Male á sawji á Rauma, ba a naa duksa ŋanna magaavemage na wá, a fantau dise jirire á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: «Zhel na wá, ba jirire ɓaaka haypa-aara.»
42023048	Baɗemme á nalga á emnde na ndza a sateraa ba se zhárá ice na, ta daa á ŋaŋa ba ervauŋɗe aɗaba názena ta naana itare na.
42023049	Slakate-aha á Yaisu, antara ŋwasha na kwaye ta ɗabanaa á sawa am kwára á Galili na, ta tsaahe ƴiƴiye an itare, lauktu ta zhara názena aŋkwa á magava na.
42023050	Daaci ndza aŋkwa ura umele zhera-aara Yusufa, ŋane ura Arimatiya am Yahudiya. Zhel ŋanna wá, ura jirire, dzayya huɗe-aara, aŋkwa á ufa zamane na ni emnde tá de njá á ba am kwara á Dadaamiya na. Ŋane keni ura male am kendekyiya ƴaikke, amá eŋkale-aara ɗabaaka názena tá aŋkwa á slaslaná emnde umele, antara názena ta maganaa itare am sarte ŋanna.
42023052	Daaci a duhe ge ŋane á deza sleksu Pilaatu, a de ndavanu baráma á eksa emtsa á Yaisu.
42023053	A se tsekwaa emtsa na áte dzaŋgala, a faɗeme am kalpakane áŋwaslire, jeba á kalpakane ŋanna ba lefeɗɗe. Daaci a de zlavanaahe am irekhya ta yese am cacera, ba ser palle keni zlaɓe zlavaranaaka emtsa am huɗe-aara.
42023054	Vacite ŋanna wá, ge zlema, herzhe á fantaufe kwaskwe á puwansepuwe.
42023055	Ŋwasha na ta saa á ɗaba Yaisu kwaye á sawa am kwara á Galili na wá, ta ɗaba Yusufa á dem tate á heɗa Yaisu na, ta de zharanaahe irekhya-aara antara zlava-aara am irekhya.
42023056	Mazla-aara ba zlala-aatare á dá, ta de tsatsaa waye-aha-aatare, antara náza se-aatare, ganakini watse tá de wecar ge Yaisu. Vaci puwansepuwa maa, ta puwansehe emtsaaɗe áte una am tawraita.
42024001	Werre an eŋlya-waabere ge laade wá, ta duhe ge ŋwasha ŋanna ádete irekhya á Yaisu an waye-aha na ta tsatsanaa itare na.
42024002	Amá ta de beraa irekhya á ba an wácene, an tambara páláme ƴiƴiye an we-aara.
42024003	Ta demhe am irekhya na, amá sharánka Yaakadada Yaisu ɗekiɗeki.
42024004	Daaci palle a názu tá ndaaná itare ɓaaka ɗekiɗeki. Ba itare tá átira mága najipu ŋanna, ta naba jesarhe ge zála buwa ákatafke-aatare ba estuwa, ta tsekweme am naŋgyuwe na á maga wulwulire jipu na.
42024005	Jaterja lyawa ŋwasha na, ta puweme erva am ice. A ba emnde ŋanna tá elvan ge itare: «Labára kwá se tataya edda una an shifa am dagave á emnde a faya?
42024006	Ŋane ɓaaka áhuna tsetse, aŋkwa an shifa-aara ádaliye. Elva na a bakurnaa ŋane am haha á Galili na dedde am ire á kure emtu?
42024007	Aɗaba ndza a ndaakurnda, a ba ŋane: Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, watse tá vite ge emnde a mága haypa, tá de zleŋeliya áte dzaŋgala. Amá am hare ge keƴire wá, watse yá tsetse am faya.»
42024008	Daaci saasa elva-aha na ndza a baternaa Yaisu na baɗemme á sem ire-aatare.
42024009	Mazla-aara ba zlálá-aatare áte we á irekhya, tá dateraa labáre ge pukura-aha-aara kelaawa jemtekwe, antara emnde-aara umele baɗemme.
42024010	Náwa zhera á ŋwásha na ta dateraa labáre ge pukura-aha ŋanna: Maari mukse á emnde a Magdala, Yauwanna, Maari emmarge Yakuba, ira ŋwasha umele na ndza ta kerɗe, baɗemme ta daa ba labáre ŋanna.
42024011	Amá pukura-aha eksaranteka elva á ŋwasha na seke elva a jirire, fartarka an itare ɗekiɗeki.
42024012	Piyer wá, ŋane a naba tsetehe á ba am sarte ŋanna, zhagade-aara á dete we á irekhya na, a de zharaa ice á dem huɗe-aara, a de beraa ba kalpakane. Daaci ba eptsa-aara á da, á maga ba najipu-aara.
42024013	Ba vacite ŋanna maa, ta tsetehe ge pukura-aha buwa, ta dem ekse umele tá ɗaná an Aimawus, dagave-aatare an Urusaliima á maga kilaumaiter kelaawa jemtekwe.
42024014	Daaci tá aŋkwa á ndaha názena a magava áte Yaisu am hare-aha ŋanna am dagave-aatare.
42024015	Zlaɓe itare keni tá ndaha ba elva ŋanna am dagave-aatare maa, ba Yaisu an ire-aara a duhe ádezetare, aŋkwa á zlálá antara itare áte baráma.
42024016	Tá zhárá ba ura, amá aŋkwa názu a piyaterte ge diyeddiye-aara.
42024017	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kwá ndaha elva uwe kure áte baráma na?» Ta tsaahe wá, puwaapuwa vuwa-aatare.
42024018	A naba ŋwanante ge palle-aatare zhera-aara Kiliyaupas, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ka wayve am Urusaliima, zlaɓe cenakánka názena a magava am hare-aha na ka?»
42024019	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «A jaara uwe?» Ta ŋwanante, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Názena a magava áte Yaisu ura Nasarátu na cenakánka? Ŋane nabi á Dadaamiya, an hákuma jipu am slera-aara á katafke á Dadaamiya, aŋkwa hákuma á ndaha elva á katafke á emnde ázeŋárá.
42024020	Amá male-aha á liman-aha á miya, antara male-aha á Yahudiya-aha á miya, ta naba jar ye, ta de faterem am erva ge emnde a duniya, ganakini sey ta maganaa shairiya á shifa, daaci ta naba zleŋelehe áte dzaŋgala.
42024021	Baɗemme ndza ŋa tamán geni á de lyaná ba ŋane larde á Iserayiila. Amá kwaye ŋane názena a magava áte ŋane, hare keƴire-aara vatena.
42024022	Zlaɓe ádaliye maa, jaraŋerja eŋkale ŋwásha umele tá á ba ázeŋere. Aɗaba ta duhe ge itare an eŋlya-waabere ba vatena á dete we á irekhya-aara wá,
42024023	de berareka am irekhya. Mazla-aara ta naba saa, ta se mbeɗaŋeru labáre, a ba itare: Ta naba jesarhe ge malika-aha á katafke á ŋere ba estuwa, ta bantsa malika-aha ŋanna tsetse am faya.
42024024	Ta duhe ge emnde umele á ŋere á dete we á irekhya ŋanna, ta de bera ba seke una ta ndaanaa ŋwasha ŋanna. Ŋane wá, itare keni naránka.»
42024025	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kure wá, ɓaaka eŋkale á kure ɗekiɗeki, mbate elva-aha na ta ɓalanaa nabi-aha na baɗemme daaka á dem ire á kure, fakurtarka.
42024026	Diyakurka ɗekiɗeki ganakini sey Almasiihu á shushe zlaɗa-aha ŋanna, lauktu á dem ƴaikkire-aara? Ndza cenakuránka una?»
42024027	Daaci a palateraa názu á ndaana wakita á Dadaamiya á dete ŋane baɗemme. A fantau am wakita-aha na a puwetaa Muusa, date una ta puwetaa nabi-aha umele baɗemme.
42024028	Herzharanteherzhe ekse na tá demkwa na maa, Yaisu a magaa ba seke ŋane wá, zlaɓe zlauka shula-aara.
42024029	Daaci ta fantau ge ŋaŋanaa ázetare, a ba itare: «Gevge maŋgaripu mazla-aara Malum, vaƴiya ge de katafke, naba hare ázeŋere.» «Ane,» á bina, a naba duhe antara itare.
42024030	Njarinja arge masane maa, a eksante ɗafa am erva, a slafanaa we-aara ge Dadaamiya, a kezlanve ɗafa na, a vaterte ge itare.
42024031	Mazla-aara a naba werte ge ice-aatare, diyareddiye ge ŋanire, amá naránka ŋane mazla-aara.
42024032	A ba itare am dagave-aatare: «Kay, ázara kena emtakire á ervauŋɗe á miya am sarte na á palamiya názu am wakita á Dadaamiya áte baráma a sawa na. Higa eksanteka ervauŋɗe á miya ba seke kárá emtu?»
42024033	Ta naba eptsehe a ba am sarte ŋanna á sem Urusaliima, ta se beraa pukura-aha kelaawa jemtekwe na jarammeje antara emnde a nja-aatare.
42024034	Ta aŋkwa ndaha elva a Yaakadada am dagave-aatare, a ba itare: «Ba jirire tsetse Yaakadada am faya, aɗaba a maranaa ire-aara ge Simaun.»
42024035	Itare keni ta ndaaterhe labáre-aatare áte baráma, ta ndaaterhe geni diyareddiye Yaisu am sarte na a kezlanve ɗafa, a vaterte na.
42024036	Itare keni zlaɓe tá ndaha ba ŋane, ta naa ba Yaisu á tse am dagave-aatare, «A vakurteva Dadaamiya hairire,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare.
42024037	Má de gazlargazla wá, jaterja lyawa jipu, aɗaba itare tá kurken náza nye.
42024038	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Labára kwá maga lyawa estuwa? Labára kwá maga shaige estuwa am ervauŋɗe á kure?
42024039	Ábi una ba iya? Nawanaana erva-aha-aaruwa antara sera-aha-aaruwa. Fautefa erva á kure áte iya, tapawiyaatapa ba shagera. Aɗaba náza nye wá, ŋane ɓaaka vuwa-aara. An hyuweka, an hyaihyeka.»
42024040	Á baterá una ŋanna wá, ámbera á maraterá erva-aara, antara sera-aha-aara baɗemme.
42024041	Aley zlaɓe fartarka emtsaaɗe. Aɗaba ge kwakyire á higa wá, tá geƴá mága ba najipu áte ŋane. A naba ndavateruhe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Aŋkwa emtu náza za ázekure áhuna?»
42024042	Ta vante hyuwa á kelfe an teɗa shagera.
42024043	A lyevaahe, a naba zuhe á ba á katafke-aatare.
42024044	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Am sarte na ndza yá á ba an shifa-aaruwa am dagave á kure keni, ndza ya ndaakurnda baɗemme, a ba iya: Baɗemme á názena á tsakaná tawraita á Muusa áte iya, antara una am wakita á nabi-aha umele, ira una ta puwete am jabura, ndza ya ndaakurnda geni baɗemme sey watse á gevge.»
42024045	Daaci a naba vaterte eŋkale ganakini tá cenevaacena názena á ndaaná wakita á Dadaamiya.
42024046	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Náwa názena an puwa am wakita á Dadaamiya: Sey máki shushe Almasiihu zlaɗa, emtsamtsa. Am hare ge keƴire á de tsetse am faya.
42024047	Sey tá magateránmaga waazu ge nalgaadama baɗemme an zhera-aara, geni a magarmága tuba, Dadaamiya á ƴaterarƴe haypa-aha-aatare. Tá fantau am Urusaliima.
42024048	Daaci ba kure una kwa seyde-aha á elva-aha ŋanna.
42024049	Iya wá, yá de ɓelakurá názena a ba Edderwa watse á vakurteva na á sawa. Amá wá, njawinja á ba am huɗe á berni áhuna, dem sarte na má tsekwatsekwa hákuma á Dadaamiya ŋanna á sawa am samaya, á setarge kure.»
42024050	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, Yaisu a daterse am huɗe á ekse, kwaye a dateraa á dem Baytaniya. Daraada áhuwa maa, a ketaa erva-aha-aara a gaterar barka.
42024051	Am sarte na a gaterar barka ŋanna wá, ámbera á tegava an itare, a zlálá á dem samaya.
42024052	Itare ta fantau ge kazlan ugje á ba am tate ŋanna, lauktu ta eptsa á sem Urusaliima, ervauŋɗe-aatare emtake jipu.
42024053	Ba kelaazare icaranseka dem mashidi ƴaikke, tá de gálá Dadaamiya am mashidi-aara.
43001001	Kwaye am fakta, ba lauktu Dadaamiya á nderá duksa keni, edda una tá ɗaháná an elva á Dadaamiya na ndza aŋkwa tsawe. Elva ŋanna ndza ta ba kerɗe an Dadaamiya, elva ŋanna Dadaamiya.
43001002	Daaci elva ŋanna wá, kwaye am fakta ta ba kerɗe an Dadaamiya.
43001003	Baɗemme á duksa, Dadaamiya a nderanaa áte erva an ŋane. Ɓaaka názena ni ta nderanaa áte erva an ŋane ka.
43001004	Elva ŋanna wá, á vatertá ba ŋane shifa ge emnde. Shifa ŋanna maa, aŋkwa á vaterte parakkire á jirire ge emnde.
43001005	Parakkire ŋanna aŋkwa á mbe am tabeɗammire, amá dzegwánka tabeɗammire ganakini á emtsanaametsa.
43001006	Aŋkwa ura ndza a ɓelanaa Dadaamiya werre, zhera-aara Yuhanna.
43001007	Sawa-aara ge ŋane wá, ndza a sawa ge ɓalateraa elva á parakkire ŋanna ge emnde, ganakini a fartarfe emnde áte parakkire ŋanna.
43001008	Ŋane-ka una parakkire ŋanna; ŋane wá, á maga ba seydire á elva á parakkire ŋanna.
43001009	Parakkire ŋanna wá, parakkire á jirire, a semhe á sem huɗe á duniya wá, aŋkwa á mbe am dágave á emnde baɗemme, á maraterá parakkire á jirire.
43001010	Edda una ni tá ɗahaná an elva á Dadaamiya na wá, ndza á ba am huɗe á duniya. Ba duniya na keni Dadaamiya a nderanaa á ba áte erva an ŋane, amá duniya diseka ŋane ɗekiɗeki.
43001011	Ŋane a sem larde-aara ba ge ŋane, amá emnde-aara ŋanna lyiyarka.
43001012	Aley keni wá, tá aŋkwa emnde na ni ta lyevaa ŋane, fartarfe áte ŋane. Ge emnde ŋanna wá, a naba vaterte barama á gev egdzara á Dadaamiya.
43001013	Garevka egdzara á Dadaamiya áte una tá yaná emndimagwaha am duniya na, amá Dadaamiya a vaterta shifa aŋwaslire, geni tá gevge egdzara-aara.
43001014	Elva á Dadaamiya gevge urimagwe, a se nja á ba am dágave á miya, huɗe-aara palle áte emnde, ura jirire an tsaka ire, namiyánna ƴaikkire-aara, ƴaikkire na ni a vantaa Eddeŋara ge ŋane, Egdza-aara palle ba ŋane na.
43001015	Am sarte na a puwete ice-aara áte ŋane Yuhanna, a naba kante kwárá, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Náwa edda una ndza ya bakuraa elva-aara, á ba iya: Aŋkwa á sawa ura am iga-aaruwa, amá á jiyuje ŋane an ŋgahire na. Aɗaba kwaye zlaɓe yarika ya, amá ŋane aŋkwa.»
43001016	Aɗaba ŋane a hyephe a jauka, a gamiyar barka an tsaka ire ge miya baɗemme.
43001017	Dadaamiya a sateraa tawraita ge emnde á kya erva an Muusa, amá tara ŋgurna-aara antara jirire-aara baɗemme wá, a sanaa á ba áte erva an Yaisu Almasiihu.
43001018	Ɓaaka ura ndza nanna Dadaamiya ɗekiɗeki, amá Egdza-aara na palle ba ŋane, ta ba palle an Dadaamiya na, a se maratersaa ŋane Dadaamiya ge emnde.
43001019	Vacite umele, male-aha á Yahudiya-aha am Urusaliima ta ɓelaa liman-aha antara Laiwiŋkau-aha á deza Yuhanna geni tá de ndavanundave ŋane mu ware.
43001020	Yuhanna kwalaaka, a naba vaterte jawápa: «Iya wá, ya Almasiihu-ka», a ba ŋane á katafke á emnde baɗemme.
43001021	Ta ndavanuhe: «Ka Ailiya werre na emtu?» A ŋute ge Yuhanna: «A"aa, ya Ailiya-ka.» «Ka nabi na ŋá aŋkwa cena elva-aara am wakita á Dadaamiya na emtu?» «Ya ŋane ka», a ba ŋane zlaɓe.
43001022	«Ay ká ware kena? Ndaŋerndaha názena ni ŋá de mbeɗateru ge emnde na ta ɓelaŋerɓela na. Ate ka mu, ka ware?»
43001023	A ŋwaterante ge Yuhanna, a ba ŋane: «Iya wá, ya edda una ndza a ndahanaa nabi Aisaya werre, a ba ŋane: Aŋkwa ura á ɓálá elva am kaamba, a ba edda-aara: Aŋkwa á sawa Yaakadada, tsatsawanaatsatse barama ba ndeɗɗe na.»
43001024	Emnde na ta ɓelateraa á deza Yuhanna ŋanna wá, emnde umele-aatare ta Farisa-aha.
43001025	Itare ta ndavanuhe ge Yuhanna, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Labára ká magaterá baptisma ge emnde máki ka Almasiihu-ka, ka Ailiya-ka, ka nabi na á ndahaná wakita á Dadaamiya-ka?»
43001026	A ŋwaterante ge Yuhanna, a ba ŋane: «Iya wá, yá magakurá baptisma á ba an yawe, amá aŋkwa ura á de sawa am iga-aaruwa, ba kina keni aŋkwa á ba am dágave á kure diyakurka ba kure, ŋane wá,
43001027	ba ge slesaɗanse kimake am sera keni lyanefka ɗekiɗeki.»
43001028	Una-aha ŋanna a magava am Baytaniya áte iga a guwa á Urdun, tate na Yuhanna á magaterá baptisma ge emnde.
43001029	Makuralla-aara, ma ba a puwete ice-aara Yuhanna áte Yaisu, aŋkwa á duwa ádezeŋara wá, a ba ŋane: «Kwaye egdza zhel kyawe á sadake á Dadaamiya, á bezaná ŋane haypa á duniya baɗemme.
43001030	Ba ŋane edda una ndza ya bakuraa elva-aara, a ba iya: Aŋkwa á sawa ura am iga-aaruwa, amá á jiyuje ŋane an ŋgahire, aɗaba kwaye zlaɓe yarika ya keni ŋane aŋkwa na wá, ba ŋane.
43001031	Ba iya keni ndza diyanka dawale ŋanna estuwa, mbate aɗaba ba ŋane una ya se magateraa baptisma an yawe ge emnde geni a diyareddiye emnde a Iserayiila ba shagera.»
43001032	A ba Yuhanna zlaɓe ádaliye: «Ya nanna Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe á tsekwa á sawa am samaya ba seke takala wá, a se tsekwehe áte ŋane.
43001033	Werre wá, ndza diyanka ganakini ŋane ura estuwa, amá ndza a biyánba Dadaamiya na a ɓeli ge se magateraa baptisma an yawe ge emnde na, a ba ŋane: Watse ká nanna Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe á se tsekwanem am ire ge ura, ura ŋanna wá, ba ŋane una watse á magaterá baptisma ge emnde an Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe na.
43001034	Ya nanna una ŋanna», a ba Yuhanna, «Aɗaba una ŋanna yá enndáhá ba párákke geni ba ŋane una Egdza á Dadaamiya.»
43001035	Gurgekse-aara keni ba nja-aara am tate ŋanna Yuhanna, tá aŋkwa emnde buwa am pukura-aha-aara ázeŋara.
43001036	A naa Yaisu aŋkwa á degáshe wá, «Kwaye egdza zhel kyawe á sadake á Dadaamiya!» á bina.
43001037	Cenaráncena pukura-aha-aara buwa na elva ŋanna, ta naba tse, ta ɗába Yaisu.
43001038	A eptsavete ge Yaisu wá, a naa ba tá ɗabaná am iga. A ndavateruhe: «Kwá kátá uwe kure?» Tá ŋwanante a ba itare: «Ká njá áme ká Rabbi?» (amaana malum).
43001039	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Sawmbare, nawanaana tate ŋanna.» Daaci ta duhe, ta de zharanaahe tate na á nja Yaisu átekwa ŋanna, ta zlansau váha ázeŋara. Duwa-aatare ŋanna á maga saa ufaɗe á ice a vaciya.
43001040	Pukura-aha buwa na ta cenvaa seydire na a maganaa Yuhanna áte Yaisu, ta ɗába Yaisu na wá, palle-aatare Andere, egdza emmeŋara ge Simaun Piyer.
43001041	Am iga a tegava-aatare antara Yaisu wá, Andere ta de ja ire an egdza emmeŋara Simaun zuŋŋwe. Daaci a mbeɗanuhe, a ba ŋane: «Ŋere shaŋeránsha Almasiihu vatena» (amaana: Edda una a eksesaa Dadaamiya).
43001042	Daaci a puwanse á deza Yaisu na. Daremda áza Yaisu, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ba ka Simaun egdza á Yuhanna na ka? Mazla-aara wá, zhera á ŋa Kaifas.» Amaana: Piyer. Piyer na wá, palaha.
43001043	Makuralla-aara tsetse ire á Yaisu ge eptsa á dem kwárá á Galili maa, de jarje ire antara Filip. «Sawa ɗabiɗaba», a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane.
43001044	Filip, ŋane ura Baytisayda, ekse-aatare ba palle antara Andere ira Piyer.
43001045	Duwa á Filip, ŋane keni ta de jaa ire antara Natanayail, a mbeɗanuhe, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ŋere shaŋeránsha edda una Muusa a puwete elva-aara am tawraita, nabi-aha umele keni ta ndaha elva-aara na. Una ba Yaisu egdza á Yusufa, ura Nasarátu.»
43001046	A ba Natanayail á elvan ge ŋane: «Duksa shagera estuwa ni á jesaare á kya Nasarátu Filip?» A ba Filip: «Sawa nanaana ba ka.»
43001047	Am sarte na aŋkwa duwa Natanayail ádeza Yaisu, a ba Yaisu: «Náwa ura Iserayiila jirire na ni ɓaaka fida am ŋane ɗekiɗeki.»
43001048	«Ka diyise áme?» a ba Natanayail á elvan ge ŋane. A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Ba lauktu á duwa Filip á de ɗakɗáhá am ekte á nabugda na keni, iya yá zhárá ba ka.»
43001049	Daaci a ba Natanayail á elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, ekka wá, ka Egdza á Dadaamiya, ka Slekse á Iserayiila ba jire.»
43001050	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká fetare áte ya, aɗaba ya bakaa ya nákna am sarte na ká am ekte á nabugda na emtu? Duksa na á jauje ba ge una keni, sey watse ká nanna.»
43001051	A ba ŋane zlaɓe ádaliye á elvan ge ŋane: «Yá ndak ba jirire: watse kwá nánna degiya samaya an wacene ba waŋŋe, daaci malika-aha á Dadaamiya tá ɗálá á dem samaya, tá tsekwa zlaɓe á setarge iya ya Ura á emnde baɗemme.»
43002001	Am háre ge keƴire am iga a tse-aara, jerje muŋri á larusa am Kana am kwárá á Galili. Aŋkwa emmeŋara ge Yaisu am larusa ŋanna.
43002002	Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara keni ɗaraterɗáhá á dem larusa ŋanna.
43002003	Daaci ektsateraarektse mbazla maa, a ba Maari á elvan ge Yaisu: «Degiya ɓaaka zlauzle mbazla-aatare.»
43002004	Amá a ŋwanante ge Yaisu a ba ŋane: «Emma ká kwarisá ka slera-aaruwa emtu? Iya zlaɓe samka sarte-aaruwa emtsaaɗe.»
43002005	Amá duwa á Maari, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde a tega duksa, «Ma a bakuraa uwe keni naba magaumágá.»
43002006	Aŋkwa jeba á gahe á yawe-aha umele am tate ŋanna, Yahudiya-aha tá bara an ŋane áte una á kwaratersá nadina-aatare. Gahe-aha ŋanna wá, palle-aara á ekse yawe deydey hwámá ilyeɓe.
43002007	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge emnde a tega duksa: «Nawantenáhá gahe-aha na an yawe.» Ta naba nante yawe am gahe-aha na an we-aara.
43002008	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kina wá, kawvaaka cekwaaŋguɗi, vawanteva ge male á muŋri na.» Ta naba kevaahe, ta danánhe.
43002009	Male á muŋri ŋanna a tapaa yawe na a nyev mbazla na, diyaaka tate na ni ta sanaa átekwa. Amá emnde a tega duksa wá, itare diyardiya aɗaba ta paƴema ba itare yawe ŋanna á dem gahe-aha. Daaci male á muŋri na a ɗante zhele á larusa,
43002010	a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Emnde tá tegater mbazla na emtake jipu na emtsaaɗe zuŋŋwe ge emnde, má hyaterhya mbazla ge emnde lauktu tá paƴaterá una ektseváktsa emtakire-aara ni, ekka sem kina keni ka sheɓanve una emtake jipu na á ba am bere?»
43002011	Kwaye ŋane najipu á Yaisu zuŋŋwe, a maganaa am Kana, am kwárá á Galili. A marese estuwa ƴaikkire-aara, pukura-aha ta fetarehe áte ŋane.
43002012	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, ŋane, emmeŋara, egdzar mama-aha-ŋara, ira pukura-aha-aara, ta zlálá á dem Kafarnahum. De hararaaháre cekwaaŋguɗi áhuwa.
43002013	Herzhapteherzhe muŋri á Yahudiya-aha na tá ɗaháná an Paska na maa, a naba tsetehe ge Yaisu, a dem Urusaliima ge mága muŋri ŋanna.
43002014	Daada-aara am Urusaliima wá, a dem mashidi ƴaikke. Duwa-aara, a de bera emnde tá aŋkwa válá sla-aha, kyawe-aha, antara emnde a válá takala, ira emnde a peteke, tá an tabel-aha-aatare á katafke.
43002015	Yaisu a naba kezlante záwá, a ganve ba seke kurpe, a ŋgyaterse antara dabba-aha-aatare na baɗemme am mashidi na, a naba mbaɗaa tabel-aha á emnde a peteke, a puwevhe ge shuŋgu-aha-aatare ŋanna á dem áhá.
43002016	A ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde a vela takala keni «Jawanaaja áhuna! Labára kwá ganve bere á Edderwa bere á tsakala?»
43002017	Pukura-aha-aara tá zhárá ba maga-aara na wá, ta naba yehete názu am wakita á Dadaamiya, aŋkwa an puwa a ba ŋane: «Dadaamiya-aaruwa, wayantewáyá bere á ŋa an ervauŋɗe-aaruwa baɗemme, yá taa njeka tsekaɗɗe ɗekiɗeki.»
43002018	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a ba male-aha á Yahudiya-aha, tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ká maraŋerá najipu-ara kina lauktu ŋá dise átekwa geni a vaktaa ba Dadaamiya hákuma á mága una?»
43002019	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane: «Naba mbeɗawanaambeɗa kure mashidi na, yá tsantetse zlaɓe ádaliye am háre keƴe.»
43002020	A ba Yahudiya-aha tá elvan ge ŋane: «Yawe kul ufaɗe ju uŋkwahe tá nderá ba mashidi na náwa ŋane na ni, ká tsantetse ka am háre keƴe?»
43002021	Mbate ŋane a ndanaa áte mashidi-ka, ŋane a ndaha elva a emtsa-aara, antara tse-aara am fáyá.
43002022	Am sarte na tsetsa Yaisu am fáyá wá, saasa elva ŋanna á sem ire á pukura-aha-aara, ta fetarehe áte názena am wakita á Dadaamiya, antara elva-aha na ndza a ndahanaa ŋane baɗemme.
43002023	Am haraare Yaisu am Urusaliima am muŋri á Paska maa, kwakya najipu-aha na a maganaa ŋane, emnde keni kwakya fartarfe áte ŋane aɗaba najipu-aha ŋanna.
43002024	Amá Yaisu wá, fetareka an itare, aɗaba ŋane diyaadiya názu am ervauŋɗe-aatare baɗemme.
43002025	Aɗaba ŋane wá, tá banná emndeka elva áte ura, diyaadiya ba ŋane názu am huɗe á emnde baɗemme.
43003001	Ndza aŋkwa ura Farisa umele zhera-aara Nikaudaimus, palle á male-aha á Yahudiya-aha wá,
43003002	a seza Yaisu an vaƴiya, a se ndava elva ázeŋara. «Malum», a ba ŋane á elvan ge Yaisu: «Diyaŋerdiya geni a ɓelakaa Dadaamiya, aɗaba ɓaaka edda una á dzegwándzegwa mága najipu-aha na ká aŋkwa maganá ka na, máki ɓaaka Dadaamiya antara ŋane.»
43003003	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yá ndak ba jirire: Ɓaaka ura á dem zlanna á Dadaamiya máki yairseka ge buwire.»
43003004	A ba Nikaudaimus á elvan ge ŋane: «Tá yáná estara kena emgyegwe a zhele, á dzegwándzegwa dem huɗe á emmeŋara, lauktu tá eyya ádaliye emtu?»
43003005	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane «Yá ndak ba jirire: Ma ware edda-aara keni á daaka á dem zlanna á Dadaamiya ɗekiɗeki má yairseka an yawe antara an Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe.
43003006	Una tá yáná emnde am duniya na keni ba ge ire-aara. Tate na á yáná Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe keni á yáná ba sheɗekwe.
43003007	Maŋka najipu aɗaba ya bakaa sey tá yakurseye ge buwire.
43003008	Effeƴa wá, ma á dem tate-ara keni ba á vátá. Ká cenáncena mága-aara, amá wá, ma a tsetaa áme keni diyaŋka, ma á de tse áme keni diyaŋka. Edda una tá yáná an hákuma á Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe keni ba estuwa.»
43003009	A ba Nikaudaimus á elvan ge ŋane: «Á magava estara una ŋanna?»
43003010	A ŋwanante ge Yaisu: «Iyau ekka wá, ka malum á Iserayiila-aha ƴaikke keni diyaŋka una?
43003011	Yá ndak ba jirire, ŋere wá, ŋá ndakur názena ni diyaŋerdiya, antara názena ŋá nanna, amá kwá ceneka elva á ŋere.
43003012	Máki yá bakurá elva áte kazlaŋa á duniya aley cenakurvaaka fakurtaareka áte ya, sakwa kazlaŋa á samaya emtu?
43003013	Ay degiya ɓaaka edda una ndza a dem samaya ba palle keni. Cenaucena elva-aaruwa ya Ura á emnde baɗemme na ya sawa am samaya.
43003014	«Yeheteyeha názena ndza a maganaa Muusa am kaamba werre: A magaa havale an verzhagane, a zleŋelete áte zade, a kante á dem zhegela. Iya Ura á emnde baɗemme keni watse tá de zleŋeliyá ba estuwa.
43003015	Daaci ma a fetare ware áte ya keni á shansha shifa na á zleka na.
43003016	Aɗaba Dadaamiya wayatewáya duniya kwakya. Aɗaba una ŋanna a vante Egdza-aara palle ba ŋane. Ma a fetara ware áte Egdza ŋanna keni, á keɗeka ɗekiɗeki, á shansha shifa na á zleka na.
43003017	Dadaamiya ɓelaaka Egdza-aara á sem duniya geni á se ŋgwaɗa emnde, amá a belán geni tá ŋezleseŋzle emnde áte erva an ŋane.
43003018	Edda una fetarfe áte ŋane wá, ɓaaka shairiya áte ŋane. Amá edda una má fetareka áte ŋane wá, ba kina keni ŋánáŋa shairiya, aɗaba fetareka áte Egdza á Dadaamiya palle ba ŋane.
43003019	Náwa názena ni watse emnde tá shá ŋgwaɗa aɗaba ŋane: Samsa parakkire á sem duniya, amá emnde a duniya ƴarnaaƴa, itare ta hayaa ba tabeɗammire, aɗaba shagerka názena tá maganá itare.
43003020	Ma ware una á maga duksa shagerka na, wayaaka an parakkire ɗekiɗeki, a hayaa ba nja am tabeɗammire, geni a marseka parakkire shagerkire na á maganá ŋane na.
43003021	Amá edda una ni á maga duksa shagera wá, ŋane á kátá ba parakkire, geni a naránna emnde shagerire-aara antara geni a diyareddiya emnde fesarfire na á maganán ge Dadaamiya.»
43003022	Am iga a una ŋanna maa, a tsetehe ge Yaisu antara pukura-aha, ta dem tate umele á ba am kwárá á Yahudiya ŋanna, hararaare jipu am tate ŋanna, ta magateraa baptisma ge emnde áhuwa.
43003023	Yuhanna slemaga baptisma keni aŋkwa á magaterá baptisma ge emnde am ekse á Aynun herzhe an Salim, aɗaba kwakya yawe am tate ŋanna. Emnde kwakya tá dezeŋara, á magaterá baptisma.
43003024	Aɗaba zlaɓe eksarvaaka Yuhanna á dem daŋgay am sarte ŋanna.
43003025	Ay emnde umele am pukura-aha á Yuhanna, tá aŋkwa gajawe antara ura Yahudiya umele arge naɗe á Yahudiya-aha ge bára, lauktu tá shá cuɗeɗɗire áza Dadaamiya.
43003026	Duwa-aatare á deza Yuhanna, «Malum ƴaikke», a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane, «Zhel na ndza á njá ázeŋa áte iga a guwa á Urdun, ndza ka baŋeraa elva-aara na, zlaɓe aŋkwa emtu am ire á ŋa? Kwaye ŋane keni aŋkwa á magaterá baptisma ge emnde, baɗemme á emnde tá kela á ba dezeŋara.»
43003027	A ba Yuhanna á elvan ge itare: «Ɓaaka ura á shansha ba názara keni máki vanteka Dadaamiya.
43003028	Náza-aaruwa wá, ba kure keni diyakurdiya. Aɗaba ya bakurnaa ba iya an we-aaruwa geni iya wá, ya Almasiihu-ka, amá ya sleɓela á Dadaamiya ge se tsatsanaa baráma ge Almasiihu.
43003029	Diyakurdiya zhele á larusa wá, edda á mukse ba ŋane. Náza á slákáte wá, ŋane ba á njá átevege ura-aara zhele á larusa, á higa jipu ge cena kwárá á ura-aara máki á ndáhá elva. Ba duksa palle ge iya keni. Ya ba seke ura á zhele á larusa, kina ervauŋɗe-aaruwa ba seke nama.
43003030	Shagera ba á farfe ŋgahire-aara ge ŋane, á gulá náza-aaruwa.»
43003031	Edda una a sawa am samaya wá, baɗemme á duksa á ba am erva-aara. Amá ura á duniya wá, ŋane ba urimagwe, elva-aara keni á ndaha ba elva á duniya. Amá edda una a sawa am samaya wá, baɗemme á duksa á ba am erva-aara.
43003032	A ndáhá názena ni a nanaa ŋane, antara názena ni a cenanaa ŋane, amá ɓaaka ura á cena elva-aara.
43003033	Ma ware una a cenvaa elva-aara keni, edda-aara njantenja jirire á Dadaamiya.
43003034	Sleɓela á Dadaamiya wá, á ndáhá ba elva á Dadaamiya, aɗaba Dadaamiya á vante Sheɗekwe-aara ɓaaka zlakta-aara.
43003035	Dadaamiya wá, wayetewáyá Egdza-aara, baɗemme á duksa a fanem am erva ba ge ŋane.
43003036	Ma a fetaare ware áte Egdza á Dadaamiya keni shánsha shifa na á zleka na. Amá edda una fetarka áte ŋane wá, á shanka shifa, á segasheka edda-aara am ervauŋɗe á Dadaamiya ɗekiɗeki.
43004001	Cenaráncena Farisa-aha geni Yaisu aŋkwa á magaterá baptisma ge emnde kwakya, ma emnde keni vayya ba emnde-aara arge emnde á Yuhanna.
43004002	Cenáncena Yaisu elva-aatare baɗemme. Ge jirire wá, Yaisu an ire-aara magannaaka baptisma ge ura, tá maganá ba pukura-aha-aara.
43004003	A cenaa ba elva á Farisa-aha ŋanna Yaisu wá, a naba tsete am kwárá á Yahudiya ŋanna baɗemme, ge eptsa á dem kwárá á Galili.
43004004	Ge dem Galili ŋanna maa, sey á degáshe am huɗe á Samariya praatte.
43004005	Daada am ekse umele tá ɗáhána an Sikar am kwárá á Samariya maa, aŋkwa fe ndza a vantaa Yakubu ge egdza-aara Yusufa áte iga a ekse ŋanna.
43004006	Aŋkwa suwa ndza a yanaa Yakubu werre am fe ŋanna. Daaci a duhe ge Yaisu, a de njehe áte we á suwa ŋanna aɗaba kuɗukkuɗe vuwa-aara ge zlálá. Am sarte ŋanna keni hyephye vacitire.
43004007	Ay samsa mukse á emnde a Samariya a se ká yawe maa, «Viteva yawe yá shushe», a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane.
43004008	Am sarte ŋanna zlarzlálá pukura-aha-aara, ta de shekwa náza za am huɗe á ekse.
43004009	A ba mukse na á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká ura a Yahudiya ni, ká ndaviyu yawe ge iya ya mukse a Samariya? Yá vakteva ká essha?» (A ndaa una mukse na wá, aɗaba tá gyaaveka Yahudiya-aha antara Samariya-aha.)
43004010	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ba diyaŋkire ka wá, ma andze diyakdiya duksa na ni á vaterta Dadaamiya ge emnde, antara edda una náwa á ndavaku yáwe á sha na wá, baira ma ká ndavanuwa ba ka, ma ká shánsha yawe na á fá shifa am ura na.»
43004011	A ba mukse na á elvan ge ŋane: «Ká káná an uwe kwa eddaaye? Ganta á ŋa keni ɓaaka, suwa slaɗɗe vayvaya, ká sháná estara yawe á shifa ŋanna ká ndaná ka na?
43004012	Ekka jakuje ge eggyeŋere Yakubu na a yaŋer suwa na emtu? Ŋane, egdzara-aara ira walde-aha-aara baɗemme ta shaa ba yawe á suwa na!»
43004013	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Baɗemme á názena á shá yawe á suwa, ndera keni ba á wanwa zlaɓe ádaliye.
43004014	Amá edda una a shu yawe na yá vanta ya wá, á wanka ndera mazla-aara. Aɗaba yawe ŋanna yá vantá ya na á de nyev suwa am ŋane, suwa ŋanna á vante shifa na á zleka na ge edda-aara.»
43004015	A ba mukse na á elvan ge ŋane: «Viteva ka yawe ŋanna eddaaye, geni a wika ndera mazla-aara, yá shansha ire-aaruwa ge se ka yawe áhuna.»
43004016	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «De ɗanteɗaha kwa zhele á ŋa, kwá sawa kerɗe.»
43004017	«Ɓaaka zhele-aaruwa», a ba mukse na á elvan ge Yaisu. «Ɓaaka zhele á ŋa a ba ka na wá, ndaksenda jirire», a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane.
43004018	«Aɗaba zala-aha á ŋa miyenne ka gateraa ka wá, tá ilyeɓe, amá zhel na ká am mba-aara kina na zhele á ŋa ka. Ɓaaka fida am elva á ŋa na.»
43004019	A ba mukse na: «Kina wá, diyandiya ganakini ka nabi eddaaye.
43004020	Ká cenáncena emtu ndza ba werre keni eggye-aha á ŋere ta kezlan ugje ge Dadaamiya á ba áte wa na náwa ŋane na, amá á ba kure Yahudiya-aha sey Urusaliima palle una tate á kezlan ugje ge Dadaamiya.»
43004021	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Náwa yá ndaaka elva emmaaye, eccena ba shagera: Aŋkwa á sawa sarte umele wá, tate á kezlan ugje ge Dadaamiya watse áte wa na ka palle, am Urusaliima ka palle.
43004022	Kure Samariya-aha wá, ma kwá kezlan ugje ge ware keni diyakurka. Amá ŋere Yahudiya-aha wá, diyaŋerdiya edda una ni ŋá kezlan ugje ŋere. Aɗaba slelya ura á jesaare á ba dagave á Yahudiya-aha.
43004023	Amá aŋkwa á sawa sarte umele, ba kina keni samsa sarte ŋanna, emnde tá de kezlan ugje ge Dadaamiya na Dada ba ŋane na, an hákuma á Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe, tá de kezlan ugje á ba an jirire. Aɗaba Dadaamiya wá, á kátá emnde na ni tá kezlan ugje áte una ŋanna.
43004024	Dadaamiya wá, Sheɗekwe, emnde na tá kezlan ugje keni a kezlarankezla an hákuma á Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe, a kezlarankezla á ba an jirire.»
43004025	A ba mukse na á elvan ge ŋane: «Diyandiya watse á sawa Almasiihu, watse á se palaŋernaapálá ŋane sera á duksa baɗemme.»
43004026	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ba iya Almasiihu ŋanna yá ndaka elva na.»
43004027	Am sarte ŋanna, pukura-aha á Yaisu keni saremsa mazla-aara. Tá maga najipu-aara itare, Yaisu aŋkwa á nda elva antara mukse na. Amá ɓaaka ura a ndaana elva ge mukse na, geni ká kátá uwe ázeŋara, ɓaaka edda una a banán ge Yaisu geni a jakurma uwe antara mukse na.
43004028	Daaci mukse na a naba ɓelaa hwámá-aara áhuwa, a eptsehe á dem huɗe á ekse, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde:
43004029	«Sawmbare emtsaaɗe, nawanaana zhele umele náwa ŋane áhuna, a ɓalise názena ndza ya maganaa ya baɗemme, watse Almasiihu ŋara emtu estara?»
43004030	Estuwa kelá á emnde á sawa am huɗe á ekse, tá aŋkwa deza Yaisu.
43004031	Am sarte na ni eptsaptsa mukse na á de ɗaha emnde am huɗe á ekse, a ba pukura-aha tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Sawa seke zuze egdza náza za malum!»
43004032	Amá a ŋwaterante: «Aŋkwa náza zá-aaruwa, ɗafa na ni diyakurka kure na.»
43004033	A ba pukura-aha am dágave-aatare «Watse aŋkwa ura a sanaa náza za emtu?»
43004034	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Náza zá-aaruwa ŋanna wá, ba fansaare ge edda una a ɓeliɓela na, antara mága slera na a fiyaara ŋane na baɗemme.»
43004035	A ba ŋane á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «A ba palle á naraje-aha á kure: Zlaɓe a juwa tere ufaɗe lauktu tá ica hiya. Amá názena yá bakurná iya wá: Zharawanaazhárá emtsaaɗe fe ba shagera, duksa baɗemme naavene kyaŋŋe, herzhe icica-aara.
43004036	Edda una á ica hiya wá, á ba aŋkwa mbera-aara, á jáhá hiya ŋanna á dem tate á shifa na á zleka na. Daaci tara sleja hiya antara edda una á icica tá de higa baɗemme.
43004037	Aŋkwa naraje umele zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane: Á janá ura umele, icica keni á icaná ura umele. Naraje ŋanna jire.
43004038	Ya ɓelákuraa á de hala duksa am fe na magakurka slera am huɗe-aara ɗekiɗeki, ta maganaa ba emnde umele, amá kwá tapaná kure emtakire á slera-aatare.»
43004039	Kwakya emnde a Samariya na tá am ekse ŋanna fartarfe áte Yaisu, aɗaba elva na a de baternaa mukse ŋanna a ba ŋane: «A ɓalise názana ndza ya maganaa ya baɗemme.»
43004040	Aɗaba una ŋanna, am sarte na saremsa emnde a Samariya áseza Yaisu, ta eŋŋála geni a haraare ázetáre. A naba eksarhe ge Yaisu, a gaa hare buwa.
43004041	Emnde kwakya zlaɓe ádaliye fartarfe áte ŋane, aɗaba názu ta cenanaa am waazu-aara.
43004042	A ba itare tá elvan ge mukse na: «Kina wá, ŋá fetaare aɗaba elva á ŋa ka palle, ŋá fetaare áte ŋane aɗaba ŋa cenevaa á ba an hyema á ŋere elva am mbuwe-aara. Diyaŋerdiya ba jirire geni slelya duniya ba ŋane.»
43004043	Yaisu a magaa hare buwa am tate ŋanna maa, mazla-aara a naba tse, a zlálá á dem kwárá á Galili.
43004044	Aɗaba ba ŋane an ire-aara keni a bánba geni nabi á shanka ŋgáhire am eksa-aara ba ge ŋane.
43004045	Amá ba daadá-aara am Galili wá, emnde a Galili ta lyiyanaa á ba an erva buwa, aɗaba itare keni ta duwa á de maga muŋri am Urusaliima, daaci naránna itare keni názena a maganaa Yaisu am muŋri ŋanna baɗemme.
43004046	Daaci Yaisu a daliye zlaɓe ádaliye á dem Kána, ekse na ndza a ŋyanve yáwe, a ganve mbazla am huɗe-aara na. Ay aŋkwa ura male, a fanaa ŋgumna, á njá am Kafarnahum maa, lapika egdza-aara.
43004047	Cenáncena ura male na ganakini saasa Yaisu á sa am Yahudiya, aŋkwa am Galili, a naba dezeŋara: «Tasle á ŋa ɗabiɗába á dem Kafarnáhum, ká de mbanaambe egdza-aaruwa, shifa a juwa ba cekwa am ŋane», a bina.
43004048	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Palle ura á fetaare áte ya am dagave á kure na ɓaaka ɗekiɗeki, máki nakuránka najipu-aha.»
43004049	A ba zhel na: «Mi zlala kwa á dem mba-aaruwa Yaakadada, a zlauka shifa am egdzere!»
43004050	«Ezzlálá á dá, ɓaaka duksa áte egdza á ŋa», a ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane. Ŋane a naba fetaarehe áte elva na a ndaana Yaisu na, a naba dá-aara.
43004051	Ŋane keni aŋkwa á da wá, ta jaa ire antara walaaɗi-aha-aara, «Mbaambe egdzere ba lapiya layye», a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane.
43004052	A ndavateruhe: «A shánaa am sarte-ara ŋgulmire?» A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Deydey zura awaya wá, ɓelanaaɓelá zlágzlági.»
43004053	Amá eddarge egdzere wá, a naba diyeddiye geni egdzere a mbe á ba am sarte na a bannaa Yaisu ezzlálá á dá, ɓaaka duksa áte egdze á ŋa na. Daaci ŋane antara huɗe á há-aara baɗemme fartarfe áte Yaisu.
43004054	Kwaya ŋane buwire á najipu na a maganaa Yaisu am kwárá á Galili, a maganaa am sarte na saasa á sa am Yahudiya.
43005001	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, gyaregya muŋri á nadina am Urusaliima, tá aŋkwa duwa Yahudiya-aha. Yaisu keni a duhe.
43005002	Urusaliima wá, an ɓela am dala baɗemme an wakyiya-aha gergere. Aŋkwa derve ƴaikke herzhe an wakyiya na tá ɗaháná an wakyiya á kyawe-aha na. Ta jantaave ge derve ŋanna an bere-aha ilyeɓe. Zhera á derve ŋanna Baytijaata an elva á Ibraniŋkau-aha.
43005003	Daaci baɗemme á ekte á bere-aha ŋanna ba emnde na lapika vuwa-aatare, wulfe-aha, emnde a dere, antara ŋgurƴekwe-aha. ((Tá ufa gejava á derve ŋanna.
43005004	Aɗaba an wapaka, á tsekwa malika á Dadaamiya á sem derve ŋanna, daaci baɗemme á yáwe á gejava. Daaci am iga á gejava á yáwe ŋanna, ma a tsekwemaa ware zuŋŋwe keni á mbembe edda-aara ma á waná uwe keni.))
43005005	Aŋkwa ura umele á ba am dágave-aatare ŋanna, yáwe kul keƴe ju tiise á ba áte lapikere.
43005006	Am sarte na damda Yaisu, á zhárá zhel ŋanna á zlava. Am diyaadiya ganakini haraare lapikere-aara, a naba ndaan elva: «Wayak-wáyá emtu ká mbembe ba laŋŋe?», a ba ŋane, á elvan ge ŋane.
43005007	A ba zhel na á elvan ge ŋane: «Á eksitá ware-aaruwa kwa á dem derve am iga a gejava á yáwe malum-aaruwa? Ba kelaa má yá wava ge duwa, caare ba damda ura umele zuŋŋwe arge iya.»
43005008	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Ettse, faɗantefáɗá buce á ŋa, ezzlálá á da.»
43005009	Kerteŋ a naba mbehe, a tsetehe, a faɗante buce-aara, aŋkwa á zlálá ba uwe keni á maganka. Amá vacite ŋanna wá, kwaskwe á puwansepuwe.
43005010	Aɗaba una ŋanna, a ba male-aha á Yahudiya-aha tá elvan ge zhel ŋanna: «Vatena kwaskwe á puwansepuwe, an piya am tawraita ganakini ká sepa buce á ŋa vatena ge da.»
43005011	A ba zhel na á elvan ge itare: «Iya a binaa ba edda una a mbiyaahe na ettse, faɗantefáɗá buce á ŋa, ezzlálá á dá.»
43005012	Ta ndavanuhe, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ware ŋane edda una ni a bakaa faɗantefáɗá buce á ŋa, ezzlálá na?»
43005013	Zhel na a mbanaa Yaisu na keni, diyaaka edda una ni a mbanaa am lapikere ŋanna. Aɗaba a zlalá watsewatse Yaisu am tate ŋanna, a kuva kwakyire á emnde.
43005014	Shekwaashekwa maa, Yaisu a duhe ádeza dawale ŋanna am mashidi ƴaikke. A ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Kina wá, mbákmbe. Maŋka haypa mazla-aara geni a shaŋka una jauje ge una ŋanna.»
43005015	Mazla-aara a naba disehe geni ndza a tsantaa ŋane áte lapikere na, a de ba áza mala-aha á Yahudiya-aha, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ndza a mbiyaa ba Yaisu am lapikere-aaruwa.»
43005016	Aɗaba una ŋanna, male-aha á Yahudiya-aha ta naba gwarhe ge Yaisu an elva, geni a magán ge uwe una an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe.
43005017	Amá a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Edderwa wá, ma vaatara keni á maga ba slera. Aɗaba una ŋanna, iya sey ba yá emmaga.»
43005018	Elva-aara ŋanna a de vaterte ba ŋgwáɗáva zlaɓe ádaliye geni sey tá janaaja shifa-aara. Aɗaba a ba itare: «Faaka zherwe áte kwaskwe á puwansepuwe-ka palle, a bantsa ŋane, Dadaamiya Eddeŋara, a ganve ire-aara kalkale an Dadaamiya.»
43005019	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ɓaaka názu yá maganá iya an ire-aaruwa ya Egdzere, sey ya naaná á ba áza Edderwa. Baɗemme á názena ni á maganá Dada, Egdzere keni á maga ba ŋane una ŋanna.
43005020	Aɗaba Dada wayawáyá jipu an Egdza-aara. Aŋkwa á kwaranse názena á maganá ŋane baɗemme. Duksa ƴaikke a jauje ba ge una keni watse á kwaransekware. Á tsaame najipu na watse kwá maganá kure.
43005021	Ba seke una ni Edderwa aŋkwa á tsatertetse emnde na ba seke tá an emtsa, aŋkwa á vaterte shifa na wá, Egdza-aara keni ba estuwa, a naba vante shifa ge edda una á kataná ŋane.
43005022	Ɓaaka edda una ni á de kyáná Edderwa shairiya-aara. Baɗemme á shairiya a fanem am erva ge Egdza-aara.
43005023	A magaa una geni emnde baɗemme a farfa zherwe áte Egdza-aara keni, ba seke una tá aŋkwa fáná áte ŋane na. Edda una faaka zherwe áte Egdzere wá, faaka á ba áte Eddeŋara na a ɓelanaa na ŋane na.
43005024	«Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ma ware una a cenvaa elva-aaruwa, a fetaarehe áte edda una a ɓeliɓela na, edda-aara shánsha shifa na á zleka na. Ɓaaka shairiya áte edda-aara ɗekiɗeki, ŋane dedde am emtsa, daada am tate á shifa na á zleka na.
43005025	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Aŋkwa á sawa sarte umele, ba kina keni ba seke samsa. Am sarte ŋanna wá, emnde na ba seke tá an emtsa na watse tá cenáncena kwárá á Egdza á Dadaamiya. Ma a cenanaa ware kwárá-aara keni á gevge an shifa.
43005026	Ba seke una ni an hákuma Edderwa ge tsante ura, á gev an shifa na wá, a vante hákuma ge Egdza-aara keni, geni á tsante ura, á ganve an shifa.
43005027	A vante hákuma á kyá shairiya ge Egdza-aara keni, aɗaba Egdza-aara ŋanna Ura á emnde baɗemme.
43005028	Magauka najipu á una ŋanna ɗekiɗeki. Aɗaba aŋkwa á sawa sarte umele, ba emnde na tá an emtsa, tá am irekhye keni, watse tá cenáncena kwárá-aara,
43005029	watse tá sesse. Emnde na ni ndza ta magaa shagerire na, watse tá tse ge shaa shifa na á zleka na. Amá emnde na ndza ta magaa shagerkire wá, itare watse tá tse ge dem zlaɗa.»
43005030	A ba Yaisu zlaɓe ádaliye: «Iya an ire-aaruwa wá, ba uwe keni yá dzegwánka emmága-aara, sey má biyánba Dadaamiya. Daaci shairiya na yá kyáná ya wá, shairiya a jirire. Aɗaba yá kyáná áte una yá kataná ya-ka, yá kyáná áte una á kataná edda-una a ɓeliɓela.
43005031	Máki ya seyde á ire-aaruwa ba iya, tá dise estara kena emnde jirire-aaruwa?
43005032	Amá aŋkwa ura umele sleseyde-aaruwa ŋane. Diyandiya seydire na á maganá ŋane áte ya jirire.
43005033	Ndza kwa ɓelaa emnde á deza Yuhanna, ŋane keni maganaamaga seydire áte edda una ni ŋane jirire na.
43005034	Yá aŋkwa sá elva á Yuhanna antara seydire-aara á sem ire á kure na wá, ba geni kwá shánsha sawari, kwá lyelya shifa á kure. Iya ya ɓaaka an wedere á seydire na á maganá urimagwe áte ya.
43005035	Yuhanna wá, ŋane ndza ba seke parakkire, ndza á mbe am dágave á kure, ndza kwa higa an ŋane am sarte cekwaaŋguɗi.
43005036	Iya wá, aŋkwa seydire ƴaikke áte ya, jauje ge una a maganaa Yuhanna. Slera na a ɓeliyaa Edderwa ge ŋane, yá aŋkwa maganá ya na wá, á maganá ba slera-aaruwa ŋanna seydire áte ya, geni ya sleɓela á Dadaamiya.
43005037	Ba Edderwa ŋanna a ɓeliɓela na keni maganaamaga seydire-aara áte ya, amá kure cenakuránka kwárá-aara, nakuránka ŋane an ice á kure keni.
43005038	Daaci ŋakurnaaka elva-aara am kure, aɗaba fakurtarka áte Egdza-aara na a ɓelanaa ŋane.
43005039	Kwá aŋkwa ndá wakita á Dadaamiya, aɗaba aŋkwa am ire á kure geni watse kwá shá shifa na á zleka na. Ay degiya wakita á Dadaamiya ŋanna á ndá ba elva-aaruwa.
43005040	Aley kure wayakurka sezerwa ganakini kwá shánsha shifa ba jirire.
43005041	«Yá kátá ƴaikkireka ya áza emnde.
43005042	Amá duksa palle wá, am ervauŋɗe á kure wá, wayakurka kure an Dadaamiya ɗekiɗeki.
43005043	Iya, ya sawa an elva á Edderwa, lyiyakurika ɗekiɗeki, amá má samsa ura umele á ba an ire-aara wá, kwá ellyiya.
43005044	Ma ware á kure keni á kátá ba gálá áza emnde, kwá paŋka ni á galákurá ba Dadaamiya palle. Ay una ni, kwá fetaare estara kena áte ya?
43005045	Amá bawánka zlaɓe am ervauŋɗe á kure, geni watse yá de icakuraare sera áza Edderwa. Edda una watse á de icakuraare sera wá, Muusa na kwa fetaare kure an ŋane na.
43005046	Amá ma andze fakurtarfe áte Muusa ba jirire wá, iya keni ma kwá fetarfe áte ya. Aɗaba názena a puwetaa Muusa na á ndá ba elva-aaruwa.
43005047	Am fakurtareka áte názena a puwetaa ŋane, kwá fetaare estara kena áte elva na yá ndaná ya?»
43006001	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, a tsetehe ge Yaisu, a zlalehe a dete iga a guwa á Galili. Tibariyas keni tá ɗáhá ba háye na am guwa ŋanna.
43006002	Emnde kwakya ta ɗabemhe á dem tate ŋanna, aɗaba naránna najipu-aha na a maganaa ŋane, a naba mbateraahe emnde na lapika vuwa-aatare.
43006003	Yaisu antara pukura-aha-aara ta ɗaletaa áte egdza wa, ta de njehe.
43006004	Muŋri á Yahudiya-aha na tá ɗaná an Paska na keni herzhavteherzhe.
43006005	Yaisu a kante ice wá, á zhárá ba dikele á emnde tá aŋkwa dezeŋara. A ba ŋane á elvan ge Filip: «Mí de sháná áme náza zá na á se hyaterhye ge emnde na?»
43006006	A ndán ba ge cena názu am mbuwe á Filip ka wá, ŋane diyaadiya názena ni watse á maganá ŋane.
43006007	A ŋwanante ge Filip, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ma mi shekweve náza zá á gursa deremke keni á hyeteka ɗekiɗeki áte emnde, máki má kátá ma ware-aatare keni a shánsha cekwa.»
43006008	A ba Andere egdza emmeŋara ge Simaun Piyer, palle á pukura-aha-aara, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane:
43006009	«Náwa aŋkwa egdze umele áhuna an depaiŋ ilyeɓe antara kelfe buwa, amá keni á magaterá uwe kena ge dikele á emnde na?»
43006010	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Bawateránba ge emnde a njarinja baɗemme áte másá.» Aɗaba kwakya másá am tate ŋanna shagera ge nja átekwa. Tá naba njehe ge emnde, kezlakula á zála á maga debu ilyeɓe.
43006011	Yaisu a lyevaa depaiŋ na, a slafan we-aara ge Dadaamiya, daaci a kazlanve, a tegateraa ge emnde na tá njanja áte másá na. Arge kelfe keni a magán ba estuwa. Baɗemme á emnde zaruze á ba áte huɗe-aatare.
43006012	Hyaterhya ge emnde baɗemme maa, a ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara: «Jawanmárje ge jugena-aara na baɗemme, a badzevka ba palle keni.»
43006013	Depaiŋ ilyeɓe ŋanna á hyaterhe ge emnde, baira jauje. Jarantejáhá jugena-aara, a netaa kenday saɗaɗɗe kelaawa ju buwa.
43006014	Naránna emnde najipu na a maganaa Yaisu maa, a ba itare ba parakke: «Zhel na wá, ba jirire ba ŋane nabi na ta bantsa watse á sawa á sem duniya na.»
43006015	Daaci diyeddiye Yaisu ganakini watse tá se fáná am sleksire á ba áte laarire, a zlalehe zlaɓe ádaliye á dete ire á egdza wa, ba ŋane palle.
43006016	Eblyabelya vaciya maa, ta tsekwese ge pukura-aha-aara á sawa áte wa, ásete we á haye,
43006017	ta demhe am paare á yawe ge dem Kafarnáhum. Gevge vaƴiya, amá zlaɓe samka Yaisu emtsaaɗe.
43006018	A tsetehe ge válale, baɗemme á haye á vaza.
43006019	Bakarvaabáká paare, á maga kilaumaiter ilyeɓe, ma uŋkwahe keni wá, tá zhárá ba Yaisu am iga-aatare, á zlála áte yawe, á dezetare tá am paare na. Daaci baɗemme-aatare ŋáteráŋa lyawa.
43006020	Amá «A wakurka lyawa,» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare, «degiya ba iya.»
43006021	Ba itare keni varanteve baráma ge dem paare wá, tá zhárá ba tá áte we á guwa am tate na tá kátá demkwa itare na.
43006022	Mákuralla-aara maa, ba kelaa á emnde na ta geƴaa áte iga a guwa na, ta fantau ge tataya Yaisu. Amá diyardiya ganakini ndza ɓaaka paare umele ɗekiɗeki am tate ŋanna, sey ba palle na ta zlalaa pukura-aha an ŋane na. Diyardiya geni damka Yaisu am paare ŋanna.
43006023	Daaci ta naba demhe ge paare-aha umele á da am Tibairiyas á ba á dem tate ŋanna Yaakadada a slafanaa we ge Dadaamiya arge náza za, a hyaterhe an ŋane na.
43006024	Emnde tá ezzhara wá, ma Yaisu, ma pukura-aha-aara keni baɗemme ta ɓaaka. Ta naba demhe am paare-aha ŋanna, ta zlálá á dem Kafarnahum, ta de zharanaa áhuwa.
43006025	Sawa-aatare wá, ta se bera Yaisu áte we á guwa. Ta ndavanuhe, a ba itare: «Ka sawa vaatara á sehuna Malum?»
43006026	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Kwá tatayiyá aɗaba ba náza za na ya zukurwa ya, kwa ƴanaa ba kure na. Cenakuránka ba názara keni am názena yá kátá bakurná ya an najipu-aaruwa.
43006027	Shuŋŋulauka náza za na á shekwaaka bádza na, shuŋŋulaushuŋŋula una á badzeka ɗekiɗeki, á vante shifa na á zleka na ge ura. Náza za ŋanna yá vakurta ba iya Ura á emnde baɗemme, yá vakurte an hákuma na a vita Edderwa Dadaamiya.»
43006028	Ta ndavanuhe, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ŋá shuŋŋula slera-ara una á kataná Dadaamiya na?»
43006029	A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane «Náwa slera na á kataná Dadaamiya ázekure: slera á kure wá, ba kwá fetare áte edda una a ɓelanaa ŋane».
43006030	A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Máki estuwa wá, maraŋeránmárá najipu na ni ŋá diyakse átekwa geni a ɓelakaa Dadaamiya, ŋá nanaana an ice á ŋere, lauktu ŋá faktarfe.
43006031	Werre wá, eggye-aha á ŋere ndza zaruze mannu am kaamba, aŋkwa elva-aara am wakita á Dadaamiya, a ba ŋane: A vaterte náza za á sawa am samaya.»
43006032	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Degiya ba mannu ŋanna keni ndza a vakurtaa Muusa ka, amá náwa Edderwa aŋkwa á vakurte náza za á jirire á sawa am samaya.
43006033	Aɗaba náza za na ni á vakurta Dadaamiya na wá, ba ŋane edda una a sawa am samaya na. Á vanterta ba ŋane shifa ge emnde.»
43006034	Daaci a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, vaŋerteva náza za ŋanna ba kelaazare.»
43006035	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ba iya una ya ɗafa na á vante shifa ge ura. Ma ware una a sezerwa, a fetarhe áte ya, á wanka waya antara ndera ɗekiɗeki.
43006036	Ya ndakurndáha tsa, kure keni nakurina tsa, aley fakurtareka áte ya.
43006037	Baɗemme á emnde na ni a vitaa Edderwa na watse tá sáwá ázerwa. Ma a semaa ware á sezerwa keni yá baŋka ɗekiɗeki.
43006038	Aɗaba sanka á sawa am samaya ge se maga názena yá kataná ya, amá názena á kataná edda una a ɓeliɓela.
43006039	Náwa názena ni á kataná edda una a ɓeliɓela na: Emnde na ni a vitá ŋane na, yá keɗanaaka ba palle keni. Am halavuwa á duniya, yá tsatertetse baɗemme am faya.
43006040	Názena á kataná Edderwa wá, baɗemme á emnde na ni ta naa ya Egdza-aara, ta fetarhe áte ya na, tá shansha shifa na á zleka na. Am halavuwa á duniya, yá tsatertetse am faya.»
43006041	Daaci farantaufe Yahudiya ge wesha elva áte Yaisu, aɗaba a bantsa ŋane: «Ya náza za na a tsekwaa á sawa am samaya.»
43006042	Ta bantsa itare: «Abi Yaisu ŋara ba ŋane, ba ŋane una egdza á Yusufa? Diyaŋerdiya tara eddeŋara an emmeŋara. Ay ni a ba ŋane a sawa am samaya?»
43006043	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Weshauka elva am dágave á kure ba dey.
43006044	Ɓaaka ura á dzegwándzegwa ba ŋane an ire-aara sezerwa, sey á taɗáná Edderwa na a ɓeliyaa á sem duniya na. Ma ware una a sezerwa keni sey yá tsantetse am faya am halavuwa á duniya.
43006045	Aŋkwa puwatepuwa nabi-aha, a ba itare: Dadaamiya watse á kwaratersekware ba ŋane elva-aara ge emnde. Daaci edda una máki faafa hyema am elva á Edderwa ŋanna, lyevaalya wá, ŋane á sáwá ásezerwa.
43006046	Una á banka ganakini aŋkwa ura nanna Dadaamiya. Ɓaaka ɗekiɗeki. Sey edda una a sawaa am samaya na. Ŋane wá, nanna aɗaba Eddeŋara.
43006047	«Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ma a fetaare ware áte ya keni, shánsha shifa na á zleka na.
43006048	Ba iya una ya ɗafa na á fá shifa á jirire am ura na.
43006049	Eggye-aha á kure ta zu ɗafa na tá ɗaná an mannu na am kaamba, aley keni ba emtsaremtsa.
43006050	Amá náwa ɗafa na ni a tsekwa á sawa am samaya, ma a zuwaa ware ɗafa ŋanna keni a emtseka ɗekiɗeki.
43006051	Ba iya una ya ɗafa ŋanna a tsekwaa á sawa am samaya, á vante shifa ge ura na. Ma a zuwaa ware ɗafa ŋanna keni á shánsha shifa na á zleka na. Ɗafa ŋanna yá vantá ya na wá, vuwa-aaruwa ba ge iya, yá vanterte ge emnde a duniya baɗemme, ganakini tá shánsha shifa an ŋane.»
43006052	Elva ŋanna a tsante elva ƴaikke am dágave á Yahudiya-aha. A ba itare am dágave-aatare: «Á vamite estara vuwa-aara geni mí ezza na?»
43006053	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Máki zakuruka hyuwa á vuwa-aaruwa, shakuruka uzhe-aaruwa, iya Ura á emnde baɗemme, kwa ɓaaka an shifa am kure ɗekiɗeki.
43006054	Edda una á zá hyuwa á vuwa-aaruwa, á shá uzhe-aaruwa keni wá, shánsha shifa na á sleka na, am halavuwa á duniya yá tsantetse edda-aara am faya.
43006055	Aɗaba ba iya una ya ɗafa á jirire, uzhe-aaruwa keni náza shá á jirire.
43006056	Daaci ma ware una aŋkwa á zá hyuwa á vuwa-aaruwa, aŋkwa á shá uzhe-aaruwa, edda-aara ŋanna slenja á ba áte vuwa-aaruwa, iya keni yá aŋkwa antara ŋane.
43006057	Edderwa na a ɓeliyaa ŋane na wá, edda á shifa ba ŋane, a njiyaa ba ŋane an shifa. Ba duksa palle ge edda una á zá hyuwa á vuwa-aaruwa keni, yá njanaanja edda-aara an shifa.
43006058	Una ŋanna ɗafa á jirire na ni a tsekwaa á sawa am samaya; gergere antara una ndza ta zanaa egghye-aha á kure am kaamba werre. Itare sharánka shifa a jirire an ŋane. Amá ɗafa na yá teganá ya wá, ma a zuwaa ware keni á shá shifa na á zleka na an ŋane.»
43006059	Elva-aha ŋanna a kwaratersaa Yaisu ge emnde am mashidi á Yahudiya-aha am Kafarnahum.
43006060	Am iga a elva ŋanna maa, emnde kwakya á ba am emnde a ɗaba Yaisu, ta bántsa: Elva na degdege, á dzegwánka ura.
43006061	Nánna Yaisu ganakini tá wesha elva emnde a ɗaba ŋane am dagave-aatare, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Á wákurá ba elva-aaruwa na emtu am ervauŋɗe?
43006062	Má watse nakuránna aŋkwa á zlálá Ura á emnde baɗemme á dem tate na ndza a sawa átekwa mu, watse kwá bá uwe?
43006063	Á vantá ba Sheɗekwe á Dadaamiya shifa ge ura. Slera á emndimagwaha an ndzeɗa-aatareka una. Daaci elva-aaruwa na yá aŋkwa á bakurná ya na wá, Sheɗekwe ŋara ba ŋane, shifa ŋara ba ŋane.
43006064	Amá tá aŋkwa emnde na fartarka am dágave á kure.» Aɗaba á ba am fantaufe keni Yaisu diyaadiya emnde na watse tá fetareka na, diyaadiya edda una watse á de vela ŋane keni.
43006065	A farhe zlaɓe ádaliye, a ba ŋane: «Ya bakurnaa aɗaba una ŋanna, a ba iya, ɓaaka ura á dzegwándzegwa ba ŋane an ire-aara sezerwa, sey máki a taɗanaa Edderwa.»
43006066	A fantau á ba am sarte ŋanna, emnde a fetarfe kwakya ta ƴaa ɗaba Yaisu, zlalarka antara ŋane mazla-aara.
43006067	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge pukura-aha-aara kelaawa ju buwa: «Kure keni kwá kátá ƴiƴa emtu?»
43006068	A ŋwanante ge Simaun Piyer, a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Yaakadada, ŋá shá shifa na á zleka na á ba am elva á ŋa palle, ŋá de ɗaba ware umele?
43006069	Ŋere wá, faŋertarfe. Aɗaba diyaŋerdiya ganakini ba ka una ka sáwá áza Dadaamiya, ka cuɗeɗɗe.»
43006070	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kwa emnde kelaawa ju buwa na, ábi ya dzerakursaa ba iya? Ay aŋkwa ura palle am kure, ŋane ura á shaitaine.»
43006071	Una ŋanna wá, a ndanaa áte Yahuda egdza á Simaun Iskariyaut. Aɗaba Yahuda ŋanna, ŋane keni ba palle á pukura-aha á Yaisu kelaawa ju buwa tsa, amá a velanaa ba ŋane Yaisu.
43007001	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, Yaisu aŋkwa á já ɗaba á ba am kwárá á Galili, wayaaka de nja am Yahudiya mazla-aara, aɗaba Yahudiya-aha tá aŋkwa tsagwaɗa ba ŋane ge ja ba shifa-aara.
43007002	Herzhapteherzhe muŋri á Yahudiya-aha na tá ɗaháná an muŋri á bere á kacakaca maa,
43007003	a ba egdzar mama-aha-ŋara tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ƴánƴa dágave na mazla-aara, tsetse ezzlálá á dem Yahudiya, a de naránna emnde á ŋa na tá áhuwa keni slera á ŋa.
43007004	Aɗaba edda una ni á kátá emnde baɗemme tá diyeddiye ŋane wá, á sheɓeka ire-aara. Ábi ká maga najipu-aha á ba ka? Shagera ba ká de maganaamaga una ŋanna á katafke á nalga á emnde wá, lauktu tá diyaksediye.»
43007005	Ba egdzar mama-aha-ŋara keni fartareka áte ŋane ɗekiɗeki.
43007006	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Náza á kure wá, ma sarte-ara keni baɗemme ba shagera. Iya wá, yá duka á dem muŋri ŋanna, aɗaba zlaɓe samka sarte-aaruwa emtsaaɗe.
43007007	Kure wá, emnde a duniya tá dzegwánka fákurá áte kelaadire. Amá iya wá, wayarika emnde a duniya, aɗaba yá márá shagerkire á slera-aatare á segashe.
43007008	Ekkure wá, daumbare á dem muŋri. Amá iya wá, yá duka aɗaba zlaɓe samka sarte-aaruwa emtsaaɗe.»
43007009	A ndaterse una ŋanna, a njehe am kwárá á Galili, ŋane zlalaaka.
43007010	Zlarzlálá egdzar mama-aha-ŋara á de zá muŋri ŋanna maa, sheɓanve ire-aara atuge ice-aatare ŋane keni a duhe á dem muŋri ŋanna, amá wá, marateranka ire-aara ge emnde.
43007011	Male-aha á Yahudiya-aha tá aŋkwa tataya ba Yaisu am muŋri ŋanna, tá aŋkwa enndáva am dágave á emnde: «Kwa naaná áme Yaisu?»
43007012	Daaci baɗemme á emnde am muŋri ŋanna, tá ndáhá ba elva á Yaisu am dágave-aatare an gá kwárá. A ba emnde umele: «Yaisu ŋanna wá, ura maggwe.» A ba emnde umele: «Zhel ŋanna slekeɗa emnde.»
43007013	Amá baɗemme á una ŋanna tá ndaaná á ba an ila, aɗaba tá kuva a cenaráterka male-aha á Yahudiya-aha.
43007014	Amá am dagave á muŋri wá, tá zhárá ba dámda Yaisu á dem mashidi ƴaikke am Urusaliima, aŋkwa á ndater elva ge emnde.
43007015	Tá maga ba najipu-aara Yahudiya-aha. Ta bántsa itare: «Zhel na mu a shanaa áme ŋane diya estuwa na, wallá a ndaase laya á malumireka, uweka?»
43007016	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Elva na yá tsakaná ya na wá, yá ndaaná ya an ire-aaruka, elva-aha ŋanna á sáwá áza Dadaamiya na a ɓeliɓela na.
43007017	Edda una ni á kátá mága názena á kataná Dadaamiya wá, á naba diyeddiye elva-aaruwa na, tara a sawa áza Dadaamiya, an tara yá ndaaná ba iya an ndzeɗa-aaruwa keni.
43007018	Edda una ni á ndáhá ba elva á ire-aara, á kataná ƴaikkire ge ire-aara. Amá edda una á kataná ƴaikkire ge edda una a ɓelanaa ŋane wá, slejirire ba ŋane, ɓaaka zlerma am ŋane ɗekiɗeki.
43007019	Sakuránka Muusa tawraita emtu? Ay ábi ba palle á kure keni ɓaaka edda una ɗabáteɗaba shairiya-aha na am huɗe-aara. Ya gu uwe kena kwá kátá jija na?»
43007020	A ba emnde na tá am jáháva, tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Ká an shaitaine emtu? Ware ŋane á kátá jagja na?»
43007021	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ya magaa ba slera palle an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe, amá baɗemme á kure kwá maga ba najipu-aara.
43007022	A ba Muusa am tawraita wá: Kwá belá egdzere am sheɗekwe am hare ge tiisire. Ge jirire wá, a fantauwa Muusa ka, ta fantau am eggye-aha á kure werre. Aɗaba elva á Muusa ŋanna wá, kwá aŋkwa ɓelá egdzere am sheɗekwe ma an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe keni.
43007023	Má kwá aŋkwa maga una ŋanna an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe geni a badzevka tawraita á Muusa, sakwa ura lapika vuwa-aara emtu? Labára kwá ica ervauŋɗe áte ya geni labára ya mbá ura an kwaskwe á puwansepuwe, ura lapika vuwa-aara tsa?
43007024	Ƴawánƴa mága jeba una. Zharauka kure názena áte iga na, amá magaumága jirire.»
43007025	A ba emnde a Urusaliima: «Edda una tá tatayán ge ja ba shifa-aara na ŋane ka una?
43007026	Aŋkwa á ndá elva-aara ba parakke mazla-aara, ɓaaka ura á piyantepiya. Watse diyareddiye male-aha á miya ganakini ba ŋane una Almasiihu ka?
43007027	Amá keni estuweka. Má watse samsa Almasiihu wá, watse ɓaaka ura á diyeddiye tate na a sawa átekwa. Amá náza á zhel na diyamidiya baɗemme tate na ni á sawa ŋane átekwa.»
43007028	Am sarte ŋanna maa, Yaisu aŋkwa á ndater elva ge emnde am mashidi ƴaikke. A kante kwárá, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Kina diyakuridiya emtu ba jirire? Diyakurdiya emtu tate na ya sawa átekwa? Iya wá, sanka ba ya an ire-aaruwa, aŋkwa edda una a ɓeliɓela, diyakurka ba kure. Edda-aara ŋanna ura jirire seke ŋane ɓaaka.
43007029	Iya wá, diyandiya edda-aara, aɗaba ya sawa ázeŋara, a ɓeliyaa ba ŋane.»
43007030	Tá kátá ekseksa, amá ɓaaka ura dzegwándzegwa fanve erva, aɗaba zlaɓe samka sarte-aara.
43007031	Mbate kwakya emnde na fartarefe áte ŋane am jáháva ŋanna. Ta bantsa itare: «Una ni ta bantsa watse á sawa Almasiihu umele, á se maga najipu-aha na á jauje ge náza á zhel na zlaɓe ádaliye?»
43007032	Cenaráncena Farisa-aha elva na tá aŋkwa ndaaná emnde áte Yaisu an ila maa, ta naba magaa sawari antara male-aha á liman-aha, daaci ta naba puwaa emnde a ufa mashidi á de eksa Yaisu na.
43007033	Nánna Yaisu estuwa, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Iya wá, yá haraaka kwakya ázekure mazla-aara, yá eptsa ádeza edda una a ɓeliɓela na.
43007034	Watse kwá tatayitátaya, amá watse kwá shika, aɗaba kwá taa daaka á dem tate na yá detekwa ya.»
43007035	A ba Yahudiya-aha am dágave-aatare: «Watse á deme kena ŋane ni, miya mi taa daaka na? Watse á zlálá ádeza Yahudiya-aha á miya na zlalarzlálá á dem dágave á Yunaniŋkau-aha na, ge magateraa waazu ge Yunaniŋkau-aha ka?
43007036	Elva na a bantsa ŋane ni, watse kwá tatayitátaya, amá watse kwá shika, aɗaba kwá taa daaka á dem tate na yá detekwa ya, a ba ŋane na mu, á kátá ba uwe ŋane?»
43007037	Daaci kwaskwe na ni á zle muŋri ŋanna átekwa na wá, jauje ge hare-aha umele baɗemme am muŋri ŋanna. Vacite ŋanna maa, a tsetehe ge Yaisu, a tsaahe am dágave á emnde, a kante kwárá ba shagera, a ba ŋane á elvan ge emnde: «Ma á wáná ndera ge ware keni a se shushe ázerwa.
43007038	Ma a fetaara ware áte ya keni, a jerje háye am edda-aara, háye na ni á vante shifa ge ura á degeza am edda-aara. Una názu a ndaana wakita á Dadaamiya.»
43007039	Yaisu á ndá elva a Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe na watse tá sháná emnde a fetarfe. Am sarte ŋanna zlaɓe sharánka Sheɗekwe Cuɗeɗɗe emtsaaɗe, aɗaba zlaɓe demka Yaisu am ƴaikkire-aara.
43007040	Am sarte na cenarvaacena emnde a jáháva elva-aara ŋanna maa, a ba emnde umele-aatare: «Zhel na, ba jirire ba ŋane nabi na ta baa watse á sawa na.»
43007041	A ba emnde umele: «Almasiihu na ba ŋane.» A ba emnde umele zlaɓe adaliye: «Almasiihu na tá enndá na á jesare am Galili ka.
43007042	Aɗaba a ba wakita á Dadaamiya wá, Almasiihu á de jesare á ba am dágave á emnde a jeba á Dawuda, á jesare am Baytilama ekse na ndza á njá amkwa Dawuda ŋanna.»
43007043	Baɗemme á ye á emnde am jáháva gevge gergere am elva a Yaisu ŋanna.
43007044	Emnde umele am dágave-aatare tá kátá eksa Yaisu, amá ɓaaka ura dzegwándzegwa fanve erva.
43007045	Daaci eptsaraapetsa kwakwane-aha á Farisa-aha, antara male-aha á liman-aha na ba estuwa á dezetare. Ta de ndavateruhe ge emnde na, a ba itare tá elvan ge itare: «Labára sakuránka Yaisu na?»
43007046	Tá ŋwaterante ge emnde na, a ba itare: «Kay! Zhel ŋanna ba vaci palle keni cenaŋeránka ura á ndáhá elva seke ŋane.»
43007047	A ba Farisa-aha tá elvan ge itare: «Kure keni watse badakurubade zhel na ka?
43007048	Kwa nanna fartarfe male-aha, antara Farisa-aha á ŋere áte ŋane emtu?
43007049	Ábi sey tá fetaara ba ŋguɗi-aha áte ŋane, emnde na diyarka tawraita ɗekiɗeki, tá an nyainye áza Dadaamiya na.»
43007050	Amá aŋkwa Nikaudaimus na ndza a deza Yaisu an vaƴiya na am dagave-aatare, ŋane keni ba palle á Farisa-aha na tá áhuwa ŋanna, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare:
43007051	«Ay degiya am tawraita á miya wá, mi taa ŋguɗeka ura ba estuwa, sey máki cenamivaacena elva am mbuwe-aara antara názena a guwaa ŋane.»
43007052	A ba itare tá elvan ge Nikaudaimus: «Ekka keni ka ura á Galili emtu a gá? Eppákyá názu am huɗe á wakita má watse ká shánsha ba palle keni nabi na a jesaare am Galili!» ((
43007053	Am iga á una ŋanna maa, ma ware keni a eksaa ba baráma de mba-aara.
43008001	Yaisu wá, a dete ire á Wa Anyaranyara.
43008002	Ba eŋlya-waabere wá, a tsekwese, a eptsa á ba dem mashidi ƴaikke suuwe, a de njehe, ta duhe ge emnde ádezeŋara, a fantau ge vaterte sera á elva.
43008003	Daaci malum-aha á tawraita antara Farisa-aha ta naba sanaa mukse ta ekseva am gwardzire, ta tsa mukse na á katafke á emnde baɗemme.
43008004	Daaci ta ndavanu elva ge Yaisu: «Malum,» a ba itare, tá elvan ge ŋane: «Náwa mukse na wá, ŋa eksevaa am gwardzire.
43008005	Názu a baŋernaa Muusa am tawraita wá, mukse na á maga jeba una wá, ba tá ja shifa-aara an nákwá. Ekka mu ázara á ba elva á ŋa?»
43008006	Ta banaa una ba geni tá tsagwaɗaná an ŋane, geni tá shánsha elva na an dzálá am mbuwe-aara. Amá a gaavehe ge Yaisu, áŋkwa á puwa áte haha an gulanda-aara.
43008007	Am itare ƴaránka ndáva na, á kante ire Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Máki aŋkwa edda una ndza maganaaka haypa ɗekiɗeki am kure wá, a fantaufe edda-aara zuŋŋwe ge dzega mukse na an nákwa.»
43008008	A ndaase una ŋanna, a gaavehe zlaɓe ádaliye, aŋkwa á puwa áte haha an gulanda-aara.
43008009	Ba ta cenaa elva ŋanna wá, ta fantau ge zlálá an palpale, ta fantuwa male zuŋŋwe, a jauwa ba mukse na palle á tse á katafke á Yaisu.
43008010	A kante ire Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge mukse ŋanna: «Tá áme emnde na? Ɓaaka edda una dzegwándzegwa ŋguɗakŋguɗa emtu?»
43008011	A ŋwanante ge mukse na, a ba ŋane: «Ɓaaka degiya malum.» A ba Yaisu á elvan ge ŋane: «Iya keni yá ŋguɗaŋka. Ezzlálá, amá dalika á maga haypa.»))
43008012	A ba Yaisu zlaɓe ádaliye á elvan ge emnde: «Ba iya una ya parakkire ge duniya. Ma a ɗabiyaa ware keni á shánsha parakkire na á vante shifa ge ura na, edda-aara á zlaleka am tabeɗammire mazla-aara.»
43008013	A ba Farisa-aha tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ká aŋkwa á maganá ba ka seydire áte ire á ŋa na wá, elva á ŋa ŋanna jirireka ɗekiɗeki.»
43008014	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ma yá maganá ba ya seydire áte ire-aaruwa keni, elva-aaruwa jirire. Aɗaba diyandiya tate na ya sawa átekwa, diyandiya tate na yá zlálá ádetekwa. Amá kure diyakurka ma tate na ni ya sawa átekwa, ma tate na yá zlálá ádetekwa keni.
43008015	Kure kwá naba icanve elva áte ura, áte una kwá kataná kure emndimagwaha, amá iya yá ŋguɗeka ura ɗekiɗeki.
43008016	Ma ya icanve elva áte ura keni, yá maganá á ba an jirire, aɗaba ganevka an ire-aaruwa am elva ŋanna, amá aŋkwa Edderwa na a ɓeliɓela na antara ya.
43008017	Aŋkwa an puwa am tawraita á kure, a ba ŋane: Máki seyde-aha buwa ta ndaase ba elva palle wá, elva-aatare jirire.
43008018	Náwa yá aŋkwa maga seydire áte ire-aaruwa. Edderwa na a ɓeliɓela na keni aŋkwa á maga seydire áte ya.»
43008019	A ba itare tá elvan ge Yaisu «Áma eddeŋa ŋanna?» A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ba iya keni diyakurika sakwa Edderwa emtu? Ma andze diyakuridiya wá, ma kwá naba diyeddiye Edderwa keni.»
43008020	Kwaye ŋane elva na Yaisu a ndater ge emnde am mashidi ƴaikke, am tate na tá fá sadake á nasherire átekwa na. Ɓaaka ura a piyante elva-aara ɗekiɗeki aɗaba zlaɓe samka sarte-aara emtsaaɗe.
43008021	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare zlaɓe ádaliye: «Iya wá, yá zlálá, watse kwá tatayitátaya, amá watse kwá shika. Watse kwá emtsa á ba am haypa-aha á kure. Kwá dzegwánka dem tate na yá detekwa ya na.»
43008022	A ba Yahudiya-aha am dágave-aatare: «Watse á de já ire-aara ka? Aɗaba a ba ŋane, kwá taa daaka á dem tate na yá detekwa.»
43008023	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kure kwa jesaare á ba am duniya na, amá iya wá, ya sawa á sa am samaya. Kure kwa ba emnde a duniya na, amá iya wá, ya ura á duniya-ka.
43008024	Ya bakurnaa aɗaba una ŋanna watse kwá emtsemtsa á ba am haypa-aha á kure. Aɗaba ba jirire watse kwá emtsa á ba am haypa-aha kure máki fakurtaareka ganakini ba iya una Iya.»
43008025	A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ka ware?» A ŋwaterante, a ba ŋane: «Ya ba edda una kwaye am fantaufe ya ndaakur ba ŋane na.
43008026	Yá an elva kwakya ge ndanaa áte kure, ba jirire kwá taa ŋezleka am elva ŋanna. Amá baɗemme ba jirire. Aɗaba yá ndaakur ba názena ya cenanaa áza edda una a ɓeliɓela na.»
43008027	Cenaránka ɗekiɗeki geni á ndater elva á Eddeŋara.
43008028	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Vacite na ni kakuranteka Ura á emnde baɗemme wá, kwá de dise ba vacite ŋanna, ganakini iya wá, ya ba Iya. Kwá de diyeddiye geni názena yá maganá ya baɗemme na wá, ba iya an ire-aaruwa ka. Ma yá ndáhá uwe keni, yá ndá ba názena a kwarisaa Edderwa.
43008029	Edda una a ɓeliɓela na aŋkwa antara ya, á ƴika ya palle ɗekiɗeki, aɗaba ma vaatara keni yá magá ba názena á kataná ŋane.»
43008030	Ba Yaisu a ndaase una ŋanna wá, emnde kwakya fartarfe áte ŋane.
43008031	Daaci a ba Yaisu á elvan ge Yahudiya-aha na fartarfe áte ŋane: «Máki tsakuraatse á ba áte elva-aaruwa wá, kwa emnde-aaruwa ba jirire,
43008032	kure kwá diyeddiye jirire, jirire á kure á palakuraapálá. Kwá kwaraná ba kure ire á kure.»
43008033	A ba itare tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Ázara a ba ka? Ŋere ŋa eggye-aha á Ibrahima miyenne, ba vaci palle keni daŋeremka am erva á ura ni, watse kwá kwaraná ba kure ire á kure, á ba ka?»
43008034	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ma ware una á magá ba haypa na, edda-aara náve á haypa.
43008035	Náve wá, ma estara keni á gevka ura á huɗe á há ɗekiɗeki. Amá egdzere wá, ma vaatara keni ba ura á huɗe á há ŋanna.
43008036	Daaci máki a palakuraa Egdza á Dadaamiya am navire á kure wá, shakuránsha ire á kure ba jirire.
43008037	Diyandiya degiya ganakini kwa eggye-aha á Ibrahima. Amá labára kena kwá lyiyeka elva-aaruwa, kwá aŋkwa á tataya ja shifa-aaruwa na?
43008038	Yá ndá ba názena ya naaná áza Edderwa, kure keni kwá magá ba názena a bakurnaa eddekure.»
43008039	A ba itare, tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Eddeŋere ba Ibrahima ge ŋere.» A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ma andze kwa egdzara á Ibrahima ba jirire wá, ma kwá maga ba názena ndza a maganaa ŋane.
43008040	Amá náwa yá aŋkwa ndaakur ba jirire názena ya cenanaa ya áza Dadaamiya, aley kure kwá tataya ba já shifa-aaruwa. Ibrahima wá, ŋane magaaka una ɗekiɗeki.
43008041	Kure kwá maga ba slera á eddekure.» A ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ŋere ŋa masagwa-aha ka ɗekiɗeki, Eddeŋere ba Dadaamiya palle.»
43008042	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Ma andze ni kwa egdzara á Dadaamiya ba jirire wá, ma andze kwá wayiwáyá. Aɗaba iya ya sawa ázeŋara ge sezekure na. Sanka ba ya an ire-aaruwa, a ɓeliyaa ba ŋane, yá njá á ba áte ŋane áhuna na.
43008043	Labára ŋane á duka elva-aaruwa á dem ire á kure ɗekiɗeki? Á duka á dem ire á kure aɗaba kwá dzegwánka cena elva-aaruwa.
43008044	Kure wá, eddekure ba Shaitaine. Kwá kátá maga názena á kataná eddekure. Aɗaba ŋane sleceba emnde kwaye am fakta, ɓaaka jirire-aara ɗekiɗeki, aɗaba ɓaaka jirire am ŋane. Ndáhá fida wá, duksa-aara ge ŋane, aɗaba slera-aara ba fida, ŋane male á fida.
43008045	Amá iya wá, yá ndáhá ba jirire. Aɗaba una ŋanna wayakurika.
43008046	Emtu ware edda-aara am kure á sansese haypa-aaruwa parakke? Ay má yá ndá ba jirire baɗemme, labára kwá fetarka áte ya?
43008047	Ura á Dadaamiya wá, á cená elva á Dadaamiya. Amá kure kwa emnde á Dadaamiya-ka. Aɗaba una ŋanna kwá feka hyema áte elva-aaruwa.»
43008048	A ba Yahudiya-aha tá elvan ge Yaisu: «Ndaŋeraŋka emtu ganakini ka wá, ka ura Samariya? Ndza ndaŋeraŋka emtu ganakini ká an jini am ire?»
43008049	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Yá an shaitaine ka ɗekiɗeki, yá gálá ba Edderwa, amá kure kwá aŋkwa epsawipsawa.
43008050	Iya wá, ndanka ya ganakini a galarigálá emnde. Amá aŋkwa edda una a wayiyantaa ŋane ganakini a galarigálá emnde. Daaci watse á ndaaná ba ŋane elva á kure.
43008051	Yá ndaakur ba jirire: Ma ware una a magaa fesarefire am elva-aaruwa, ŋane á emtseka ɗekiɗeki.»
43008052	A ba Yahudiya-aha tá elvan ge ŋane: «Kina wá, diyaŋerdiya mazla-aara geni ba jirire ká an jini am ire. Ibrahima emtsametsa, nabi-aha umele keni matsarmatsa, ekka ni má ura á maga fesarefire am elva á ŋa, á emtseka, á ba ka?
43008053	Eggyemiya Ibrahima an ire-aara maa, emtsametsa, jakuje ge ŋane emtu? Nabi-aha keni emtsaremtsa, ka mu ká zhárá ire á ŋa ka ware?»
43008054	A ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Máki yá galaná ba iya ire-aaruwa wá, ƴaikkire-aaruwa hyepka duksa ɗekiɗeki. Iya á galiya ba Edderwa. Ba ŋane edda una kwa bantsa kure Dadaamiya na.
43008055	Amá diyakurka ŋane ŋanna ɗekiɗeki. Iya wá, diyandiya. Ma ya bánba diyanka wá, ya slefida seke kure. Diyandiya ba parakke, yá aŋkwa á fansarefe am elva na á ndaaná ŋane.
43008056	Dadaamiya ndza a banánba ge eggyekure Ibrahima ganakini watse á hyemhye am sarte-aaruwa, a higa jipu arge elva ŋanna. Am sarte na marannaamárá Dadaamiya, ervauŋɗe-aara ndza ba seke nama.»
43008057	A ba Yahudiya-aha tá elvan ge ŋane: «Ba yáwe kul ilyeɓe keni ká hyefka ni, ka nánna Ibrahima, a ba ka?»
43008058	«Yá ndaakur ba jirire,» a ba Yaisu á elvan ge itare: «Kwaye zlaɓe yareka Ibrahima keni yá aŋkwa ya.»
43008059	Ta naba halem nákwa am erva tá kátá eddzága maa, a naba sheɓevhe ge Yaisu, a sesehe am mashidi ŋanna.
43009001	Daaci aŋkwa á degashe Yaisu am tate umele wá, a naa ura wulfe ta yán ba estuwa.
43009002	Ta ndavanuhe ge pukura-aha, a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane: «Malum, ta yanaa aɗaba haypa á ware zhel na wulfe? Haypa á tara eddeŋara an emmeŋara emtu? Emtu haypa-aara ba ge ŋane he?»
43009003	A ŋwaterante ge Yaisu, a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare: «Ta yese wulfe aɗaba haypa-aara ka, tara eddeŋara an emmeŋara keni haypa-aatare ka. Una a gev ba geni a naránna emnde slera ƴaikke na á de maganá Dadaamiya áte ŋane.
43009004	Am zlaɓe aŋkwa tsawe vaciya wá, magaumimága slera á edda una a ɓeliɓela na. Aɗaba aŋkwa á sawa vaƴiya, ura á dzegwánka mága slera mázla-aara.
43009005	Am sarte na zlaɓe yá aŋkwa am duniya na wá, ya parakkire ge duniya.»
43009006	Ba a ndaase elva ŋanna, mazle-aara a naba kyefaa nyaihe á dem áhá, a wasletaa egdza haha cekwaaŋguɗi an nyaihe-aara, a ndaɓanaanuhe ge ice á wulfe na,
43009007	a ba ŋane á elvan ge ŋane: «Ezzlálá de baraabárá ice á ŋa am derve na tá ɗaná an Silauwam na.» Silauwam ŋanna wá, amaana: sleɓela. A duhe ge wulfe na, a de baraa ice-aara wá, aŋkwa a nanna. Á sá wá, ba laŋŋe ice-aara.
43009008	Daaci emnde a slala-aara, antara emnde na ndza ta naa á ŋala na, a ba itare: «Una ni ba wulfe na á ŋala, á njá áhuwa na ka?»
43009009	A ba emnde umele; «Ba ŋane». Amá a ba emnde umele: «Una ŋaneka, ba gáráva.» Amá «Una ba iya,» a ba ŋane á elvan ge itare.
43009010	Ta ndavanu elva: «A wertaa estara ice á ŋa?» a ba itare tá elvan ge ŋane.
